recipe_description: This recipe eschews sugary sauces in favor of refreshingly raw Trader Joe’s Cranberries and just-sweet-enough chunks of fresh apple. With a bite of crystallized ginger and tangy orange juice in the mix, it’s a welcome counterpart to the richness of the Thanksgiving meal—and since there’s no cooking involved, it won’t take up precious real estate on the stove on T-Day!
recipe_overview: Serves: 8 Prep Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 bag TJ’s Cranberries, rinsed and drained', '1 medium-sized TJ’s Gala Apple or SweeTango Apple, peeled & cut into large chunks', '1/4 teaspoon TJ’s Ground Nutmeg (optional)', 'Pinch TJ’s Sea Salt', 'Zest and 1/4 cup juice from 1 TJ’s Orange', '1/4 cup diced TJ’s Crystallized Ginger', '1/3 cup TJ’s Walnut Baking Pieces', '1/2 cup TJ’s Multi-Floral & Clover Honey']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Add cranberries, apple chunks, nutmeg, salt, and orange zest to bowl of a food processor. Pulse 15 times to create a chunky relish. Add orange juice and pulse a couple more times to combine.', 'Transfer mixture to a bowl and fold in ginger, walnuts, and honey. Cover and refrigerate for 1 hour and up to 1 day before serving.', 'Tags: Condiment, Cranberry, Raw, Side Dish, Thanksgiving']

recipe_description: The Christmas Trees of Thanksgiving, Trader Joe's Brussels Sprouts Stalks herald the start of the season. You can decorate them and showcase them as a point of commune and celebration. But, unlike the iconic evergreens, these enchanting offerings of Brassica buds spiraled around a sturdy stem can be eaten, too. The sprouts can be removed and then broiled, steamed or sautéed separately. Or, give your turkey a run for its centerpiece money and roast the whole stalk in the oven, complete with a sweet maple & olive oil glaze.
recipe_overview: Serves: 6 - 8 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 55 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 TJ's Brussels Sprouts Stalk (Seasonal)", "3/4 cup of your favorite TJ's Maple Syrup", "1/4 cup TJ's Extra Virgin California Estate Olive Oil", "1/4 teaspoon TJ's Ground Black Pepper, or to taste", "1/4 teaspoon TJ's Sea Salt, or to taste", "TJ's Dried Cranberries or TJ's Fresh Pomegranate Seeds, for garnish"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 350°F. Trim the stalk down to the fullest, best looking part. Trim sprouts off one side to make a flat bottom. Trim any "tough" leaves from the sprouts. Rinse stalk and trimmed sprouts well in fresh water. Wrap damp stalk in cling wrap and heat in the microwave for 4-5 minutes. Place the trimmed loose sprouts in a bowl, cover with cling wrap and microwave for 3 minutes.', 'Whisk maple syrup and olive oil together. Place stalk flat side down along with any loose sprouts on a roasting pan and pour the maple syrup mixture over. Use a pastry brush to mop the maple syrup onto all sides of the sprouts and stalk. Season, to taste, with salt and pepper.', 'Place pan in oven and roast for 45 minutes, or until sprouts on stalk are fork-tender and caramelized to a golden color.', 'To serve: Place stalk on a holiday platter, pour any syrup from roasting pan over and garnish with something bright and tart such as dried cranberries or fresh pomegranate seeds.', 'Tags: Fancy, Meatless, Roasted, Seasonal, Thanksgiving']

recipe_description: Within days of harvest, U.S.-grown Trader Joe’s Roasted Broccoli is trimmed to essentially just the “flowers” and seasoned with olive oil, sea salt, and pepper before it’s oven-roasted at 500°F for a short period of time. The high-temperature plus short cooking time ensures true, roasted texture and flavor, ready to enjoy on its own or add a green boost to comfort food favorites, like this classic recipe for broccoli mac & cheese.
recipe_overview: Serves: 6 - 8 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 15 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1lb your favorite short cut of TJ’s Pasta (Macaroni, Farfalle, Fusilli, etc.)', '2 cups TJ’s Whole Milk', '1 package (8 oz.) TJ’s Cream Cheese, cubed', 'Dash of TJ’s Garlic Powder (optional)', '1 bag TJ’s Shredded Sharp Cheddar', '2 tablespoons TJ’s Unsalted Butter', 'TJ’s Black Pepper', '1 package TJ’s Roasted Broccoli, microwaved according to package directions (cut any large pieces into smaller florets, if needed)']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook pasta until barely al dente. Drain and set aside.', 'While pasta cooks, add milk to a large pot and bring to a simmer. Reduce heat to low and whisk in cream cheese and garlic powder until totally smooth.', 'Add cheese and butter and continue whisking until the cheese is fully melted.', 'Add cooked pasta to sauce and stir to coat. Add roasted broccoli and cook a few minutes more, continuing to stir until sauce has thickened slightly. Remove from heat and stir in fresh ground pepper to taste.', 'Let cool slightly before digging in!', 'Tags: Cheese, Cheesy, Comfort Food, Entertaining, Side Dish, Thanksgiving']

recipe_description: Within days of harvest, U.S.-grown Trader Joe’s Roasted Green Beans are seasoned with olive oil, sea salt, and pepper before they’re oven-roasted at 500°F for a short period of time. The high-temperature plus short cooking time ensures true, roasted texture and flavor, whether you serve them as a side dish for roast chicken or grilled fish, or atop a bed of rice for a meatless meal.
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 - 6 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 20 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 tablespoon TJ’s Olive Oil', "1/2 TJ's Jumbo White Onion, diced", 'Pinch TJ’s Sea Salt', '2-3 cloves TJ’s Garlic, minced', '2 teaspoons TJ’s Organic Ground Cinnamon', '1 ½ teaspoons TJ’s Organic Ground Cumin', '½ teaspoon TJ’s Ground Pepper', '1 can (15 oz.) TJ’s Organic Tomato Sauce', '1 can (14.5 oz.) TJ’s Organic Diced No Salt Added Tomatoes, drained', '1 package TJ’s Roasted Green Beans']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Heat olive oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium heat. Add diced onion and salt and sauté 3 minutes. Add garlic and sauté until onions are translucent.', 'Add cinnamon, cumin, and pepper and sauté just until fragrant. Add tomates and tomato sauce and bring to a simmer. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.', 'Add green beans to sauce and stir to combine. Simmer 5 minutes. Remove from heat and let cool slightly before serving.', 'Tags: Entertaining, Meatless, Side Dish, Thanksgiving']

recipe_description: Done right, roasted vegetables possess a wonderful contrast of textures, from the softer inner parts to the browned bits of the exterior—not to mention the balance they provide to other rich dishes on the holiday table. But what to do if your oven is tied up with turkey or ham and you’re hankering for roasted veggies? Combine Trader Joe’s Roasted Cauliflower with an array of chewy dried fruit, crunchy almonds, and tangy dressing for a light yet satisfying side dish that’s ready in less than 10 minutes—no oven necessary.
recipe_overview: Serves: 6 - 8 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 2 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['2 packages TJ’s Roasted Cauliflower, microwaved per package instructions', '1/4 cup TJ’s Dried Cranberries', '1/4 cup TJ’s Golden Raisins', '1/4 cup TJ’s Raw Sliced Almonds', '1/3 cup TJ’s Organic Rosé Vinaigrette', '2 TJ’s Green Onions, chopped', 'Handful TJ’s Fresh Parsley, chopped']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Add cauliflower, cranberries, raisins, and almonds to a shallow bowl or serving platter. Drizzle with vinaigrette and gently stir to coat. Shower with chopped green onions and parsley and serve.', 'Tags: Cauliflower, Fall, Side Dish, Thanksgiving']

recipe_description: Think of Trader Joe’s Creamed Greens as a twist on creamed spinach, with Brussels sprouts as the flavor focal point. Rich, creamy, hearty, and delicious, it’s fully cooked before being frozen, so it’s ready to heat and eat in minutes. For a holiday dinner-worthy presentation, plate it on your favorite serving dish and top with crunchy breadcrumbs and savory bacon.
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Cooking Time: 5 - 20 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['2 tablespoons your favorite TJ’s Olive Oil', '½ cup TJ’s Japanese Style Panko Breadcrumbs', '1 tray TJ’s Creamed Greens (seasonal), cooked according to package directions', '3 pieces TJ’s Fully Cooked Uncured Bacon, cooked according to package directions and crumbled into pieces']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', "Add olive oil to a skillet over medium heat. When olive oil is hot, add breadcrumbs and stir to combine. Cook 5 minutes or so, stirring frequently, until evenly toasted to a golden brown (don't take your eyes off the pan—the breadcrumbs can go from beautifully burnished to burnt in a flash!). Remove from heat and set aside.", 'Transfer heated creamed greens to a serving dish. Top with toasted breadcrumbs and bacon, and enjoy.', 'Tags: Comfort Food, Fall, Side Dish, Thanksgiving']

recipe_description: We're the first to admit that we're gaga for guac, but for delicate dippers, sometimes a chunky guac is not the way to go. Enter this whipped avocado dip recipe: it's delightfully fluffy, with buttery avocado flavor, a tangy creaminess, and a superlight texture that won't leave you with a mess of broken chips in your dip bowl. Pair it with wafer-thin sweet potato chips or dollop it on enchiladas for savory avo bliss.
recipe_overview: Serves: 6 - 8 Prep Time: 5 Hours
recipe_ingredients: ["1 package (2 trays) TJ's Avocado's Number Guacamole", "Juice of half a TJ's Lime", "1/2 cup TJ's Sour Cream", "Pinch TJ's Sea Salt"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Add all ingredients to a medium bowl. Use a hand mixer to beat 3 to 5 minutes until mixture is fluffy and no lumps remain, stopping to scrape down the sides of the bowl as needed. Taste and adjust salt if necessary, and serve.', 'Tags: Avocado, Condiment, Dip']

recipe_description: The county fair maybe cancelled this year, but you can make your fair share of deep fried treats from the comfort of your own home using Trader Joe’s Corn Cookie Baking Mix.
recipe_overview: Serves: 8 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 20 - 25 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 bottle (1 quart) TJ’s Canola Oil', '1 Large Egg', '1 cup TJ’s Whole Milk', '1 container TJ’s Corn Cookie Baking Mix', '1 package TJ’s Uncured Beef Hot Dogs, cut into thirds', "TJ's Honey Pale Ale Mustard (or your favorite TJ's Mustard), for dipping"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Fill a large pot with canola oil (oil should come up about three inches high or so). Heat on medium heat until oil reaches 365°F.', 'While oil heats, whisk egg and milk in a large bowl. Add mix and stir to combine.', 'Line a plate with paper towels, set aside.', 'Dip 1-3 hot dog pieces in batter and use tongs to carefully place in hot oil. Fry 2-3 minutes, until corn dog bites turn golden brown. Use a slotted spoon to remove from oil, allowing excess to drip back into pot before transferring to a paper-towel-lined plate.', 'Let corn dog bites cool slightly. Serve with mustard or your favorite sauce for dipping. Enjoy!', 'Tags: Corn, Hot Dog, Summer']

recipe_description: Trader Joe’s Vegan Caesar Dressing uses an ingenious mix of plant-based ingredients, including tofu, capers, mustard, and miso to create a deliciously savory, enticingly peppery, and satisfyingly creamy Caesar Dressing while remaining totally vegan! This vegan Caesar salad recipe brings the restaurant classic to life, complete with a batch of savory, vegan “Parmesan cheese” and garbanzo bean croutons.
recipe_overview: Serves: 2 - 4 Prep Time: 15 Minutes Cooking Time: 20 - 30 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 can TJ’s Organic Garbanzo beans, drained', '1 tablespoon TJ’s Olive Oil', '1 teaspoon TJ’s Vegan Chicken-less Seasoning Salt', '¾ cup TJ’s Raw Cashew Pieces', '3 tablespoons TJ’s Nutritional Yeast', '¾ teaspoon TJ’s Sea Salt', 'Dash TJ’s Garlic Powder', '1 bag TJ’s Organic Romaine Salad', 'TJ’s Vegan Caesar Dressing', 'TJ’s Black Pepper', '1 TJ’s Lemon, cut into wedges']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Prepare garbanzo beans: Preheat oven to 400°F.', 'Spread drained garbanzo beans on a clean, lint-free towel or paper towels and pat dry. Transfer beans to a small bowl, add olive oil and stir to coat.', 'Spread beans on a rimmed baking sheet and roast on center rack of oven for 20-30 minutes. Remove from oven and toss beans with vegan chicken-less seasoning salt, set aside.', 'Prepare vegan “Parmesan cheese”: While garbanzo beans are roasting, add cashew pieces, nutritional yeast, sea salt and garlic powder to a food processor. Pulse to a fine meal, stopping to scrape down the sides of the bowl as necessary. Set aside. (This recipe will yield enough “cheese” to sprinkle on salads, pasta dishes, omelettes…store the leftovers in an airtight container in the fridge and it will keep for a couple of weeks.)', 'Assemble salad: Arrange romaine salad on a serving platter or large shallow bowl. Drizzle with 3 tablespoons dressing and 1 tablespoon vegan Parmesan and toss to coat. Add more dressing if desired.', 'Top with roasted garbanzo beans, sprinkle with vegan Parmesan, and finish with a few grinds of black pepper. Serve with lemon wedges and more dressing on the side.', 'Tags: Salad, Vegan']

recipe_description: Atalanta® Halloumi is made on the island of Cyprus using sheep’s milk. During production, the curds are heated to high temperatures, a process which gives it both its “squeaky” texture and ability to hold its shape when cooked or grilled. Atalanta®’s cheesemakers also include a bit of mint, which adds a slight refreshing counterbalance to Halloumi’s natural brininess. Highlight its irresistibly salty flavor further by pan-frying and pairing it with ripe peaches, fermented jalapeños and a spicy-sweet dressing for a salad that sings of summer.
recipe_overview: Serves: 3 - 4 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 8 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['2 tablespoons TJ’s Pickled Fermented Jalapeños (reserve liquid from jar)', 'Your favorite TJ’s Honey', 'Your favorite TJ’s Olive Oil', '2 packages TJ’s Microgreens OR 1 package TJ’s Organic Spring Mix', '2 ripe TJ’s Peaches, pitted and thinly sliced', '1 package Atalanta Halloumi Cheese, drained and sliced ¼-inch thick', 'TJ’s Black Pepper']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'In a small bowl, mix equal parts liquid from jar of pickled fermented jalapeños, honey and olive oil, set aside.', 'Arrange greens on a serving platter. Drizzle with desired amount of dressing and toss gently to evenly coat.', 'Arrange peach slices and jalapeños atop greens, set aside.', 'Preheat a nonstick skillet to medium high. Pat halloumi slices dry with paper towels. Brush both sides with olive oil.', 'Fry halloumi 3-4 minutes per side, until golden brown. Remove from heat.', 'Arrange fried halloumi atop salad. Top with a few grinds of black pepper and serve.', 'Tags: Cheese, Salad, Spicy, Summer']

recipe_name: Sea Salted Saddle Crisp Salsa Snackers
recipe_description: Trader Joe's Sea Salted Saddle Potato Crisps are made from a combination of dried potatoes, corn meal, and rice flour and formed into perfectly "saddle-shaped" Crisps, hence the name we’ve chosen for these choice chips. They’re cooked in sunflower oil to peak addictive crispiness, then Sea Salted juuust right for solo snacking (but in our humble opinion, a scoop of pico de gallo and a sprinkle of cheese never hurt anyone).
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Prep Time: 2 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['TJ’s Sea Salted Saddle Potato Crisps', 'TJ’s Pico de Gallo Salsa (Mild or Hot, your choice!)', 'TJ’s Fancy Shredded Mexican Cheese Blend', 'TJ’s Fresh Cilantro (optional)']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Top a saddle crisp with a scoop of pico de gallo and sprinkle with cheese. Top with cilantro and enjoy immediately.', 'Tags: Entertaining, Party, Salty, Snack, Spicy']

recipe_description: Trader Joe’s Cornbread Mix is the stuff of legends in our baking mix section, a tried-and-true tribute to one of our favorite foods: corn! Here we’ve gilded the grain-lily with the addition of spicy salsa and pepper jack cheese, and baked the Mix into muffins (pro-tip: TJ’s Organic Ghee & Sunflower Oil Spray ensures the muffins can be removed from the tin with the greatest of ease!). Eat them alone, or slather with TJ’s Cultured Butter for a marvelous appetizer or accompaniment to a main dish.
recipe_overview: Serves: 14 - 16 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 25 - 30 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 TJ’s Large Egg', '½ cup TJ’s Sunflower Oil', '½ cup TJ’s Milk', '1 box TJ’s Cornbread Mix', '1 ½ cups TJ’s Shredded Pepper Jack Cheese, divided', '1 jar TJ’s Cowboy Caviar Salsa', 'TJ’s Organic Ghee & Sunflower Oil Spray']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 350°F. Grease two muffin tins with organic ghee spray, set aside.', 'Beat egg, oil and milk in large mixing bowl. Stir in cornbread mix, salsa and 1 cup cheese just until combined—do not overmix.', 'Spoon batter into prepared muffin tin cups, 2/3 full. Sprinkle with remaining cheese.', 'Bake muffins 25-30 minutes, rotating pans halfway through cooking. Remove from oven and let cool 5 minutes.', 'Use a butter knife to gently lift muffins out of tin. Serve warm, or store in an airtight container and enjoy within two days.', 'Tags: Baking, Cheesy, Corn, Spicy']

recipe_description: The crisp, fresh nature of Trader Joe's Buffalo Ranch Chopped Salad makes it ideal for that hot summer day when you don’t want to cook, but still want interesting flavors to pique your palate. And, it’s enough for a couple people—or more if you’re enjoying it as a side.
recipe_overview: Serves: 2 - 4 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 15 - 20 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["4 TJ's Breaded Chicken Tenderloin Breasts", "1 package TJ's Buffalo Ranch Chopped Salad"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 400°F. Arrange chicken evenly on baking sheet. Place on center rack of oven and bake 15-20 minutes, until internal temperature of chicken reaches 165°F. Remove from oven and set aside.', 'Toss salad, dressing and toppings in a large serving bowl. Slice chicken and place atop salad. Serve and enjoy.', 'Tags: Chicken, Quick Meal, Salad']

recipe_description: It’s safe to say that a big reason to enjoy a baked potato is the toppings that adorn it. This recipe has all the bases covered with crumbled bacon, sliced green onions, and a hit of creamy, smoky, melty goodness, thanks to Trader Joe’s 2 Year Aged Smoked Cheddar Cheese with Paprika.
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 1 Hour 15 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['4 TJ’s Large Russet Potatoes', 'TJ’s Olive Oil', 'TJ’s Sea Salt', '1 package TJ’s Smoked Cheddar with Paprika, shredded', '8 slices TJ’s Fully Cooked Uncured Bacon, cooked and crumbled into pieces', 'TJ’s Green Onions, thinly sliced']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 400F. Scrub potatoes under cool running water and pat dry. Use a fork to pierce each potato to allow steam to escape. Rub potatoes in olive oil and coat with sea salt.', 'Arrange potatoes evenly on a baking sheet and bake on center rack of oven for 60-70 minutes, until skins are crisp and a fork easily pierces the flesh.', 'When potatoes have cooled enough to handle, use a fork to gently break open the skin lengthwise across the top of the potato. Push the two ends of the potato toward the middle, and top each with a handful of cheese.', 'Return potatoes to oven for 5 minutes to melt cheese. Remove from oven and top with more cheese, bacon, and green onions. Let cool slightly and enjoy.', 'Tags: Cheese, Comfort Food']

recipe_description: Made with Spanish-grown sweet red peppers that are slowly roasted over hard wood planks, Trader Joe’s Smoked Paprika packs a powerfully smoky punch. It’s the key to the sweet-smoky flavor of this slaw recipe that makes for an excellent warm-weather side dish or meatless main.
recipe_overview: Serves: 2 - 4 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 5 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 bag TJ’s Broccoli & Kale Slaw Complete Salad Kit', '1 tablespoon TJ’s Olive Oil', '2 teaspoons TJ’s Smoked Paprika', '1 can TJ’s Organic Great Northern Beans, drained and rinsed', 'TJ’s Sea Salt']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'In a serving bowl, toss the slaw with included dressing and toppings, set aside.', 'Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add paprika and stir until fragrant, about 1 minute. Add beans and a pinch of salt and stir to coat. Heat 3-5 minutes or until heated through. Remove from heat and let cool slightly.', 'Add warm beans to salad and gently toss to incorporate. Enjoy immediately.', 'Tags: Meatless, Quick Meal, Salad, Side Dish']

recipe_description: What do you get when you pair pieces of pineapple with pickled jalapeños and put ’em on a pizza? You get a satisfying combination of sweet, spicy, and briny, together in pizza form! And what do you get when you swap your snooze-worthy “regular” crust with delicious TJ’s Naan? Why, you get a pineapple n’ pickled jalapeño pizza with a Tandoori twist!
recipe_overview: Serves: 2 - 4 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 15 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 package TJ’s Frozen Tandoori Naan', '1/2 cup TJ’s Pizza Sauce', '2 cups TJ’s Shredded Mozzarella Cheese', '1/2 cup TJ’s Frozen Pineapple Tidbits, thawed', '3/4 cup TJ’s Pickled Fermented Jalapeño Slices']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 400°F.', 'Place naan on a sheet pan and heat in oven for 2-3 minutes until warmed. Remove from oven and let cool slightly, leave on sheet pan.', 'Evenly divide the pizza sauce among the naan and spread to the edges. Sprinkle with cheese. Add pineapple and jalapeños.', 'Bake on center rack for 10-12 minutes or until warm and bubbling.', 'Enjoy.', 'Tags: Pizza, Spicy']

recipe_description: Dipping warm, crusty bread in high-quality olive oil is delightful… But dipping warm, crusty bread in Trader Joe’s Mediterranean Blend Extra Virgin Olive Oil mixed with Parmesan cheese, chili flakes, and sautéed garlic is divine…
recipe_overview: Serves: 3 - 4 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 3 - 4 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1/3 cup + 1 tablespoon TJ’s Organic Mediterranean Blend Extra Virgin Olive Oil, or your favorite TJ’s Olive Oil', '2 cloves TJ’s Garlic, minced', '1 teaspoon TJ’s Red Chili Pepper', '1/3 cup TJ’s Grated Parmesan Cheese', '1 TJ’s Organic French Baguette or your favorite TJ’s bread, warmed & sliced']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'In a small pan over low heat, sauté minced garlic with 1 tablespoon olive oil, just until slightly browned, about 2 – 3 minutes.', 'Place flakes, 1/3 cup olive oil, and cheese in a shallow serving dish and add sautéed garlic. Mix to combine.', 'Dip sliced bread in mixture and enjoy!', 'Tags: Bread, Dip, Olive Oil']

recipe_description: Trader Joe’s Everything But the Elote Seasoning Blend includes hints of nearly everything that comes along with elote (chile pepper, Parmesan, chipotle powder, dried cilantro, sea salt, etc.), except, of course, the elote itself. But in this recipe, the corn comes back, only this time, it’s off the cob... Pop Goes the Elote!
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 - 5 Prep Time: 2 Minutes Cooking Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['¼ cup TJ’s Olive Oil', '½ cup TJ’s Organic Popping Corn ', '3 tablespoons TJ’s Salted Butter, melted', '3 tablespoon TJ’s Everything but the Elote Seasoning Blend']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'In a 3-quart pan, pour in oil to cover the bottom.  Add 2-3 kernels of corn to pan, cover and heat. When these kernels pop, add the remaining popping corn, then cover and shake pan over medium heat until popping stops. ', 'Remove from heat. Pour melted butter and sprinkle seasoning over popcorn. Mix until thoroughly covered.', 'Let popcorn cool slightly and enjoy!', 'Tags: Seasoning, Snack']

recipe_name: Blood Orange & Butter Lettuce Salad with Avocado, Fennel & Feta
recipe_description: From its soft, butter lettuce base to the blood orange vinaigrette you’ll dress it with, there’s something downright romantic about this Blood Orange & Butter Lettuce Salad with Avocado, Fennel & Feta. Individually, its components are as different as can be. But—as in any healthy relationship—when they come together, they complement each other beautifully. Buttery, diced avocados brush against tangy slices of citrus… Crunchy, salted pecans offset creamy, crumbled feta… Crisp, flavorful fennel (yes, fennel!) plays off smooth, mild lettuce… Need we go on?
recipe_overview: Serves: 2 - 4 Prep Time: 15 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['Vinaigrette:', '2 teaspoons TJ’s Shallots, minced ', '1 TJ’s Blood Orange ', '2 tablespoons TJ’s Organic Raw Apple Cider Vinegar ', '¼ teaspoon TJ’s Salt', 'Pinch TJ’s Black Pepper', '2 tablespoons TJ’s Extra Virgin Olive Oil ', 'Salad:', '4 TJ’s Blood Oranges', '½ bulb TJ’s Fresh Fennel', '1 cup TJ’s Roasted & Salted Pecan Halves ', '1 TJ’s Avocado', '3 tablespoons TJ’s Organic Crumbled Feta Cheese ', '1 bag TJ’s Butter Lettuce', ' ']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Vinaigrette:', 'Place minced shallots in a small bowl. Squeeze the juice from one blood orange over the shallots. Add vinegar, salt, and pepper. Let sit for 10 minutes while you prep your salad. After 10 minutes, whisk in the olive oil. Set aside.', 'Salad:', 'Using a sharp knife, remove stems & fonds from fennel and slice in half vertically. Using only ½ of the bulb, cut out the core. Slice into thin bite-sized strips. Set aside.', 'Peel the remaining four blood oranges. Slice them into rounds or bite-sized pieces. Set aside.', 'Chop pecans. Set aside.', 'Dice avocado. Set aside.', 'In a large bowl, combine lettuce, fennel, blood oranges, pecans, avocado, feta, and ½ of the vinaigrette and lightly toss.', 'Serve with the remainder of the vinaigrette on the side. Enjoy!', 'Tags: Avocado, Orange, Salad']

recipe_name: Tastes Like Chicken Vegan Cauliflower Steaks
recipe_description: Chicken-flavored seasoning salt has been a hot food trend in Australia for a few years now. When our Buyer first tried it, sprinkled over a basket of hot fries, she knew she had to bring it to Trader Joe’s. But we’ve upped the ante. We’ve made ours 100% vegan. Yes, vegan.
recipe_overview: Serves: 2 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 15 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['¼ cup TJ’s Extra Virgin Olive Oil', '2 teaspoons TJ’s Vegan Chicken-less Seasoning Salt ', '1 head TJ’s Organic Cauliflower', 'TJ’s Canola Oil Spray']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 400°F. Lightly spray a sheet pan with canola oil spray, set aside.', 'In a small bowl, mix together olive oil and seasoning. Set aside.', 'Rinse cauliflower and remove leaves. Trim bottom of the cauliflower stem, but make sure to keep the core intact. Cut into thick (1” or so) slices.', 'Arrange cauliflower slices on sheet pan. Brush half of the oil mixture on cauliflower. Carefully turn cauliflower slices over and brush on the remaining mixture.', 'Place on middle rack in oven and bake for 15 minutes or until cauliflower is easily pierced with a fork.', 'Remove from oven and let cool slightly. Serve warm and enjoy!', 'Tags: Cauliflower, Meatless, Quick Meal, Vegan']

recipe_description: If you’ve been to a poké bar, you’re likely familiar with Furikake—it’s a multi-purpose Japanese seasoning that’s a fan favorite on the fast-fish scene. But Furikake isn’t just for fish, folks—as you’ll soon find, it’s for “fries,” too! Baked Tofu Fries, that is…
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 - 5 Prep Time: 20 Minutes Cooking Time: 25 - 30 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['TJ’s Canola Oil Spray', '2 packages TJ’s Sriracha Flavored Baked Tofu', '2 large TJ’s Eggs, egg whites separated', '¾ cup TJ’s Panko Breadcrumbs', '¼ cup TJ’s Grated Parmesan Cheese', '¼ cup TJ’s Nori Komi Furikake']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 400°F. Line a sheet pan with parchment paper and spray lightly with canola oil spray.', 'Cut tofu into thin, “fry-sized” strips.', 'Place egg whites in a small bowl.', 'In a medium bowl, combine breadcrumbs, Parmesan, and furikake and toss together.', 'One by one, dredge tofu strips in egg whites, making sure every side is covered. Briefly hold each strip over bowl and allow excess to drip off. Roll egg white-covered strip in the breadcrumb/furikake mix until all sides are thoroughly covered. Place on greased baking sheet. Repeat until all tofu strips are properly coated and placed on baking sheet, a few inches apart.', 'Once all tofu strips are placed on sheet, lightly spray them with canola oil spray.', 'Place sheet in center rack of oven and bake for about 25 minutes or until golden brown.', 'Remove from oven, let cool, enjoy!', 'Tags: Japanese, Meatless, Tofu']

recipe_overview: Serves: 10 - 12 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 40 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1/2 cup TJ's Organic Reduced Sugar Raspberry (or Strawberry) Preserves", "2 jars TJ's Sweet Chili Sauce", "2 packages TJ's Turkey Meatballs"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 350°F.', 'Prepare sauce: In a sauce pan over medium heat, add raspberry preserves and sweet chili sauce. Heat until sauce begins to bubble, about 8-10 minutes, stirring occasionally. Remove from heat.', 'Place meatballs in a 9x9 baking dish and cover with warm sauce mixture. Place dish in oven and heat for 40 minutes, or until meatballs are heated to 165°F and sauce is hot. Alternatively, use a slow cooker to heat meatballs and sauce, about 5-6 hours on low, or 2-4 hours on high until heated through.', 'Tags: Big Game, Party, Turkey']

recipe_description: A Feta of this quality deserves to be savored. Made for us by 4th generation Israeli cheesemakers, it’s creamy yet crumbly, totally toothsome, and wonderfully briny. Here, we’ve given it the royal treatment by brushing it honey and baking it to slightly-browned, barely-bubbling perfection…
recipe_overview: Serves: 2 - 3 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 container TJ’s Israeli Feta', '2 tablespoons TJ’s California Extra-Virgin Olive Oil', '1 tablespoon TJ’s Multi-Floral & Clover Honey', 'TJ’s Organic On The Vine Tomatoes, sliced (optional)', 'TJ’s Middle Eastern Style Flatbread (optional)', 'TJ’s Thyme for garnish (optional)']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat the oven to 400 degrees.', 'Line a small baking pan with foil.', 'Cut feta as you would cut a loaf of bread into four equal slices. Place slices facedown on foil-covered sheet pan. Cover with olive oil.', 'Bake for eight minutes, or until the cheese is soft to the touch (but not melted). Remove from oven.', 'Preheat the broiler.', 'Heat the honey in the microwave until it is fluid enough to spread with a pastry brush. Remove honey from microwave and spread generously over feta slices.', 'Place honey-covered feta in broiler for about two minutes. Keep a close eye on it and remove from broiler once the top of the cheese browns and begins to bubble.', 'Serve with flatbread, tomatoes, and thyme. Enjoy!', 'Tags: Cheese, Entertaining, Honey, Mediterranean, Roasted']

recipe_description: It’s one thing to heat up Trader Joe’s Frozen Mashed Potatoes and serve them as-is, but it’s another thing entirely to doctor them up with cheese, butter, & cream. This indulgent recipe from one of our Southern California Store Captains might just be the very definition of “leveling up.”
recipe_overview: Serves: 6 - 9 Prep Time: 2 Minutes Cooking Time: 15 - 20 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['2 bags Trader Joe’s Frozen Mashed Potatoes', '1 bottle (16 oz) TJ’s Heavy Cream', '1 package TJ’s Shredded Swiss Cheese & Gruyère Cheese Blend', "1/2 stick TJ's Salted Butter", "TJ's Parsley, chopped, for garnish"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Empty both packages of potatoes into a large pot. Stirring frequently, warm over medium heat for about 5 minutes or until the potato medallions start to break apart. Add butter, cheese, and heavy cream and stir until evenly mixed. Continue to cook for about 15 minutes or until all cheese and butter have melted and mixture is warmed throughout. ', 'Serve immediately and enjoy!', 'Recipe Credit: Captain Jason at store #171 in Pasadena, CA', 'Tags: Cheese, Entertaining, Fall, Frozen, Garlic, Holiday, Thanksgiving, Winter']

recipe_description: Trader Joe’s Oven Baked Cheese Bites with Black Summer Truffle pack a real punch of truffle flavor, making them a real treat for true truffle fanatics. In addition to making a great snack, their tangy, cheesy, truffle-y crunch makes them an exceptional addition to this snack mix recipe.
recipe_overview: Serves: 2 - 4 Prep Time: 2 Hours
recipe_ingredients: ['2 packages TJ’s Oven Baked Cheese Bites with Black Summer Truffle (seasonal) or TJ’s Oven Baked Cheese Bites', '2 cups TJ’s Organic Popcorn with Organic Extra Virgin Olive Oil', '1 cup TJ’s Dry Roasted Unsalted Almonds', '1 cup TJ’s Gluten Free Pretzel Twists']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'In a large mixing bowl combine Cheese Bites, Popcorn, Almonds, and Pretzel Twists. Toss together and enjoy!', 'Tags: Almond, Cheese, Entertaining, Fall, Truffle']

recipe_description: Sometimes, spending hours lovingly preparing a hot, nutritious meal is just the kitchen therapy you need. Other times, the very thought of laboring over lunch or dinner is more torturous than it is therapeutic. Our Warm Cruciferous Cranberry Slaw is for those other times. Ready in just 10 minutes and best served warm, this hearty, winter-inspired side is a cinch to make and guaranteed to wow—further proof that one needn’t be nimble with a knife or a first-class flambé artist to create a delicious dish—just a bag of Trader Joe's Cruciferous Crunch and a few crunchy, savory toppings.
recipe_overview: Serves: 2 - 4 Cooking Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 bag TJ’s Cruciferous Crunch', '2 teaspoons TJ’s Organic Extra Virgin Olive Oil', "1/4 teaspoon TJ's Sea Salt", 'Juice of 1 TJ’s Lemon', 'TJ’s Organic Dried Cranberries', 'TJ’s Dry Toasted & Sliced Almonds', 'TJ’s Shaved Parmesan, Romano & Asiago Cheese']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'In a large skillet over medium-high heat, add olive oil. When heated, add cruciferous crunch and sauté 3 minutes until slightly wilted. Remove pan from heat and pour contents into a large bowl. Add salt and lemon juice and toss until coated. Divide greens among two plates and top with a handful of dried cranberries, almonds and cheese. Serve warm.', 'Tags: Fall, Thanksgiving']

recipe_description: With their vibrant orange hue and naturally sweet flavor, Trader Joe’s Organic Sweet Potatoes are the ideal base for this comforting gratin. Trader Joe’s Spinach & Artichoke Dip provides plenty of creaminess and green veggie action between sweet potato layers, while our Quattro Formaggio Shredded Cheese Blend lends a savory sharpness to the finished dish. While this cold-weather recipe is large enough to feed a potluck crowd, the recipe halves easily for a smaller group.
recipe_overview: Serves: 10 - 12 Prep Time: 15 Minutes Cooking Time: 1 Hour 5 Minutes - 1 Hour 15 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['TJ’s Canola Oil Spray', '1 bag (3 lbs.) TJ’s Organic Sweet Potatoes, peeled and sliced into thin planks', '4 packages TJ’s Frozen Spinach & Artichoke Dip, microwaved according to directions', '1/3 cup TJ’s Milk', '2 cups TJ’s Quattro Formaggio Shredded Cheese Blend, divided']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 400F. Stir milk into microwaved spinach dip, set aside. Grease a 9-inch by 13-inch baking dish with canola oil spray. Arrange half of the potato slices in an even layer in baking dish, slightly overlapping as you go. Spread half of the spinach dip over potatoes and sprinkle with half of the cheese. Repeat potato and dip layers (the rest of the cheese will be added later) and cover baking dish with foil.', 'Bake on center rack of oven for 40 minutes. Remove dish from oven and discard foil. Sprinkle remaining cheese on top, return to oven and bake 25-30 minutes, until golden and bubbling. Remove from oven and let cool 15-20 minutes before serving.', 'Tags: Casserole, Cheese, Cheesy, Comfort Food, Dip, Entertaining, Fall, Sweet Potato, Thanksgiving, Winter']

recipe_description: Trader Joe’s Gluten Free Cornbread Mix has the same classically moist & grainy texture, and sweet, buttery, corn flavor as our traditional cornbread mix – but without gluten (brown rice flour substitutes for wheat flour in this version). We’ve pumped it up by adding orange zest and fresh cranberries to bring a tangy-tart flair.
recipe_overview: Serves: 8 - 9 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 40 - 50 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 package TJ’s Gluten Free Cornbread Mix (seasonal)', '1 large TJ’s Egg', '½ cup TJ’s Canola Oil', '¾ cup TJ’s Whole Milk', '1 cup halved TJ’s Organic Fresh Cranberries (seasonal)', 'Zest from 1 Orange']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 375°F. Grease a 9 x 5-inch loaf pan, set aside.', 'Add egg, oil and milk to a large mixing bowl and beat. Add cornbread mix and mix well for 2 to 3 minutes. Add orange zest and cranberries and mix until combine.', 'Pour batter into prepared loaf pan.', 'Bake on the center rack of oven for 40 – 50 minutes or until golden brown and a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.', 'Remove from oven and let cool. Enjoy.', 'Tags: Baking, Cranberry, Fall, Limited Quantity, Orange, Thanksgiving']

recipe_description: Sprinkled with TJ’s Everything But The Bagel Sesame Seasoning Blend and baked until oozing, these roll-ups make for a cheesy, taste-bud tickling snack or appetizer.
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 - 8 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 12 - 14 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['TJ’s Everything But The Bagel Sesame Seasoning Blend', '1 package TJ’s Crescent Rolls', '4 slices TJ’s Sliced Aged Swiss Cheese, sliced in half', '4 slices TJ’s Organic Black Forest Ham, sliced in half']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 350°F. Pour a few tablespoons of seasoning onto a shallow plate, set aside.', 'Remove crescent roll dough from package and gently separate into 8 triangles. Top a dough triangle with a piece of cheese and a piece of ham. Roll into a crescent shape, then gently roll outside of dough in everything seasoning and place on an ungreased baking sheet. Repeat with remaining ingredients.', 'Bake rolls on center rack of oven for 12-14 minutes, until rolls are golden brown and cheese is melted. Remove from oven and let cool slightly before serving.', 'Tags: Cheese, Entertaining, Party, Salty']

recipe_description: Made with certified organic, pasteurized cow’s milk and aged for a minimum of 10 months on wooden boards, Trader Joe’s Organic Gouda Cheese taps into a tradition of Dutch Gouda production that goes back to the 12th century. With 10 months of aging, it’s been given just enough time to develop superbly nutty & lightly caramel-y flavors, while maintaining a slightly crystallized yet impossibly creamy texture that’s just soft enough for easy shredding and melting.
recipe_overview: Serves: 8 Prep Time: 15 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['TJ’s Organic Dutch Gouda', 'TJ’s 1,000 Day Aged Gouda', 'TJ’s Smoked Gouda', 'Your favorite TJ’s Honey', 'TJ’s Dry Roasted Unsalted Almonds', 'TJ’s Peach, sliced', '¼ TJ’s Cantaloupe, seeds removed and cut into cubes or scooped into balls', 'TJ’s Red Cherries']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Slice or cube cheeses as desired (wash your knife in between cheeses to keep the flavors separate). Arrange in piles on a large serving platter or cheese board. Fill in the gaps with fruit and almonds. Pour honey into a small dipping bowl or ramekin and nestle in between fruit and cheese. Serve with dry white wine, cider, or another sparkling summer refreshment of your choosing.', 'Tags: Cheese, Entertaining, Party, Summer']

recipe_description: Summer is in full swing, which means Trader Joe’s is serving up the best darn Potato Salad you ever did taste! What does "best darn" taste like, exactly? Creamy russet potatoes are mixed with real mayonnaise, chopped green onions, crunchy celery, and hard-cooked eggs, all simply seasoned and ready to enjoy. Whether you're poolside or park-bound, it's the total package.
recipe_overview: Serves: 6 - 8 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 4 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 package TJ’s Mexican Style Roasted Corn & Cotija Cheese (reserve included cheese packet for garnish)', '1 TJ’s Red Bell Pepper, cored, de-seeded and diced', "1 container TJ's Old Fashioned Potato Salad", 'TJ’s Fresh Cilantro, chopped']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Place corn and sauce pellets into a microwave safe dish, cover and cook on HIGH for 3 minutes. Remove cover, stir gently, and cook 1 minute longer.', 'Transfer potato salad to a large serving bowl. Gently fold corn and bell pepper into potato salad. Garnish with cheese and cilantro and serve.', 'Tags: 4th of July, BBQ, Party, Side Dish, Spicy, Summer']

recipe_description: Summer is in full swing, which means Trader Joe’s is serving up the best darn Potato Salad you ever did taste! What does "best darn" taste like, exactly? Creamy russet potatoes are mixed with real mayonnaise, chopped green onions, crunchy celery, and hard-cooked eggs, all simply seasoned and ready to enjoy. Whether you're poolside or park-bound, it's the total package.
recipe_overview: Serves: 6 - 8 Prep Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 container TJ's Old Fashioned Potato Salad", '1 TJ’s Persian Cucumber, thinly sliced', '1 TJ’s Red Bell Pepper, cored, de-seeded and diced', '1/3 cup TJ’s Feta Cheese Crumbles', '½ jar TJ’s Kalamata Olives, drained and sliced in half', 'TJ’s Fresh Parsley, chopped']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Transfer potato salad to a large serving bowl. Gently fold in cucumbers, bell pepper, cheese, and olives. Garnish with parsley and serve.', 'Tags: 4th of July, BBQ, Party, Side Dish, Summer']

recipe_description: Starting with a sturdy base of Trader Joe’s Organic Brown Rice & Quinoa Spaghetti that’s cooked perfectly al dente, this pasta salad layers snappy haricots verts and blanched kale with crunchy slivered almonds for an array of teeth-tickling textures. The whole thing is tied together with Trader Joe’s Green Goddess Salad Dressing, a salad sidekick that offers fragrant notes of basil & chives, savory garlic & green onion, bright lemon juice, and tangy apple cider vinegar, ensuring flavorful zing in every forkful of pasta and veggies.
recipe_overview: Serves: 6 - 8 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 package TJ’s Organic Brown Rice & Quinoa Spaghetti', '1 bag TJ’s Organic Tuscan Kale, stems removed OR 1 bag TJ’s Cruciferous Crunch', '1 bag TJ’s Fresh Haricots Verts', '1 bottle TJ’s Green Goddess Salad Dressing', '1 cup TJ’s Toasted Slivered Almonds', 'TJ’s Sea Salt', 'TJ’s Fresh Basil, rinsed and dried']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', '  Cut corner off bag of haricots verts and microwave 2 minutes. Remove haricots verts from package and place on a clean dish towel to cool and dry. Transfer haricots verts to cutting board and slice in half crosswise; set aside.', 'Bring a large pot of generously salted water to a boil. Add pasta and cook 7 minutes. Add kale and cook about 2 more minutes, until noodles are very al dente and kale is wilted. Drain and rinse thoroughly with cold water. Drain very well and transfer mixture to a large bowl. Add haricots verts, dressing, and almonds to bowl and toss to combine. Season to taste with sea salt and toss once more.', 'Serve immediately, or chill pasta salad for 1 hour. Tear up or slice fresh basil and garnish just before serving.', 'Tags: Meatless, Pasta, Salad, Spring, Summer']

recipe_description: While traditional feta is made with sheep’s milk, Trader Joe’s Organic Crumbled Feta Cheese is made in Wisconsin with organic, rBST-free cow’s milk. The cow’s milk offers a milder flavor than sheep’s milk, while retaining the pleasant tanginess so favored by feta fans. The curds are bathed in a salty brine (think of it as “pickling” but with cheese!), then drained, gently pressed and dried to allow the saltiness to infuse throughout. This process creates a buttery tanginess and a slightly firm texture that crumbles with ease. Crumbly, briny Cheese made with organic milk? Be still our palates!
recipe_overview: Serves: 6 Prep Time: 1 Minute
recipe_ingredients: ['1 package TJ’s Steamed & Fully Cooked Lentils', '1 package TJ’s Organic Crumbled Feta Cheese', '1 container TJ’s Bruschetta Sauce']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', "In a medium bowl, combine lentils, feta and bruschetta sauce, and stir. Garnish with fresh basil or parsley, if you like, and serve with your favorite TJ's crackers.", 'Tags: Meatless, No Cook, Party, Protein, Snack']

recipe_description: Made with big chunks of organic diced tomatoes, organic tomato paste, organic onions, and organic jalapeños, then spiced with organic cayenne pepper and organic dehydrated garlic, Trader Joe’s Organic Thick & Chunky Salsa is fresh and flavorful, packing just the right amount of medium-level heat. And, boy, is this Salsa versatile.
recipe_overview: Serves: 6 - 8 Prep Time: 5 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 package TJ’s Cream Cheese, softened', '1 ½ cups TJ’s Organic Thick & Chunky Salsa', 'Your favorite TJ’s Tortilla Chips']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Unwrap cream cheese and arrange on serving plate or in wide shallow bowl. Top with salsa. Grab your favorite Trader Joe’s Tortilla Chips and dig in!', 'Tags: Big Game, Entertaining, Organic, Party, Salsa, Snack']

recipe_description: In the style of our popular Freeze Dried Strawberries, Freeze Dried Fuji Apple Slices, etc., our new Trader Joe’s Freeze Dried Red Seedless Grape Slices are just what their name suggests: sweet, tangy red seedless grapes that have been picked at peak ripeness, then immediately sliced and freeze-dried with their skins left on to lock in their intense flavor. Unlike most of the dried fruit you’d find at a grocery or convenience store, these Grapes are free from added sulfur (unsulfured), free from added sugar (unsweetened), and never exposed to any high temperatures in the drying process.
recipe_overview: Serves: 6 Prep Time: 1 Minute
recipe_ingredients: ["2 bags TJ's Freeze Dried Red Seedless Grapes Slices", "1 bag TJ's Bamba Peanut Snacks"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Combine grape slices and Bamba in a medium bowl. Shake it up to evenly distribute (you want to make sure to get PB&J flavor in every handful). Dig in!', 'Tags: Snack']

recipe_description: Trader Joe’s Carolina Gold Barbeque Sauce is a rich, thick golden-hued, mustard-based sauce that reminds us of some of the best-grilled meats we’ve enjoyed in the Carolinas. It’s sweet & smoky, with a hint of molasses and an ideal blend of spices.
recipe_overview: Serves: 6 - 8
recipe_ingredients: ['1 bag TJ’s Party Size Mini Meatballs', "1 bottle TJ's Carolina Gold Barbeque Sauce", "TJ's Fresh Chives, chopped", "TJ's Red Chili Pepper Flakes"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Place meatballs in a large microwave-safe container with lid. Microwave 4 minutes.', 'Meanwhile, in a small saucepan, heat barbeque sauce on low, stirring occasionally.', 'Remove bowl of meatballs from microwave. Add meatballs to saucepan and stir to coat with sauce. Continue to heat on low, about 3 minutes, until sauce is bubbly.', 'Transfer meatballs and sauce to a serving bowl. Garnish with chives and chili flakes to taste, and dig in!', 'Tags: Big Game, Party, Savory']

recipe_description: “Just add beer and butter”—possibly the five best words to be combined in one sentence. It’s also the phrase you’ll find gracing each box of Trader Joe’s Beer Bread Mix.
recipe_overview: Serves: 8 - 16 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 55 Minutes - 1 Hour 5 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["TJ's Canola Oil Spray", "1 box TJ's Beer Bread Mix (seasonal)", '1 can Simpler Times Lager', "1 block TJ's Unexpected Cheddar, grated and divided", "1/2 cup TJ's Hot & Sweet Jalapeños, halved, plus more for garnish", "1/2 stick TJ's Unsalted Butter, melted"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 350°F. Grease a 9"x5" loaf pan with canola oil spray; set aside.', 'Add beer bread mix to a large bowl and make a well in the center. Pour beer into well and gently stir until a shaggy dough forms (do not overmix). Gently stir in 3/4 of the grated cheese and the halved jalapeños.', 'Spread dough into greased loaf pan. Top with remaining cheese and a few jalapeño slices for garnish. Pour melted butter evenly over top.', 'Place a large rimmed baking sheet on the bottom rack of oven to catch any drips. Place the loaf pan on the center rack and bake 55-65 minutes, or until a toothpick placed in center of loaf comes out clean. ', 'Remove pan from oven and let cool 15 minutes before removing loaf from pan. Slice and enjoy!', 'Tags: Beer, Bread, Cheese, Comfort Food, Winter']

recipe_description: Interested in a soft-ripened cheese with a little more oomph? Le Rustique Camembert fits the bill. Native to Normandy, France, this Camembert is a holiday staple in the Trader Joe's cheese canon. Similar to Brie (but from a different native region of France), this creamy, pleasantly tangy, full-flavored cheese makes a fabulously fancy & festive appetizer when baked and topped with tangy Trader Joe's Cranberry Orange Relish.
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 - 6 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 5 - 15 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 wheel Le Rustique Camembert (seasonal)', "1/3 cup TJ's Cranberry Orange Relish (seasonal)", "TJ's Water Crackers, for serving", "TJ's Walnuts and Fresh Rosemary, for garnish (optional)"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 350°F. Unwrap camembert and place in the center of a small cast iron skillet or ceramic baking dish. Place on center rack of oven and bake 5-15 minutes (check every 5 minutes or so and remove from oven when cheese is oozing to your desired preference).', 'Top cheese with cranberry relish*. Let cool slightly and garnish with walnuts and rosemary. Serve with water crackers for dipping.', '*You can add the cranberry relish prior to baking, if desired; the color and tanginess of the relish will be somewhat subdued if you go this route.', 'Tags: Cheese, Entertaining, Holiday, Party']

recipe_description: Trader Joe’s Toscano Cheese combines the robust, nutty characteristics of aged parmesan with a creamy farmstead Cheddar—a particular profile that allows for maximum fromage flavoring. One variation on our shelves is soaked in Syrah, imbuing the cheese with jammy blackberry and plum notes. Another version offers a generous coating of Black Pepper, for a nose-tingling aroma and pungent flavor. Both Cheeses are excellent on a serving board with honey, whole grain mustard, fresh grapes, and an array of your favorite crackers.
recipe_overview: Serves: 10 - 12 Prep Time: 20 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["TJ's Creamy Toscano Cheese Soaked in Syrah", "TJ's Toscano Cheese with Black Pepper", "TJ's Whole Grain Dijon Mustard", "Your favorite TJ's Honey", "TJ's Crisps (Fig & Olive or Raisin & Rosemary)", "TJ's Seedless Grape Medley", "TJ's Prosciutto or TJ's Uncured Salame di Parma Mild Salami", "TJ's Cornichons", "TJ's Rosemary Marcona Almonds"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Remove cheese from fridge 30 minutes prior to serving. Set each wedge on opposite ends of a large cheese board or serving platter. (Try to build your board in the location where it will be enjoyed—the precarious piles of goodies may roll around when you move the board!)', 'Slice each cheese wedge and shingle slices along the length of the board. Place two small dipping dishes or ramekins on board; fill one with honey and fill the other with mustard.', 'Add a few piles of crisps to each side of the board. Fill the gaps on the board with haphazard piles of grapes, prosciutto, cornichons, and almonds. Enjoy!', 'Tags: Cheese, Entertaining, Holiday, Party']

recipe_description: Produced using the whole milk of the region’s native Manchega sheep, Trader Joe's Manchego Añejo Cheese exemplifies the clean, buttery, slightly nutty flavor and delightfully crumbly texture of Manchego, then takes it to another level altogether by aging it for a full year. All that extra time lets the cheese develop rich, caramelized notes and a firm, but still gracefully elastic structure, making it a staunchly dependable appetizer companion for dried figs, prosciutto, and a crisp glass of Sauvignon Blanc.
recipe_overview: Serves: 6 - 12 Prep Time: 15 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 wedge TJ's 12-Month Aged Manchego Añejo, cubed", "6 TJ's Black Mission Figs, halved (Seasonal)", "6 slices TJ's Prosciutto, sliced in half lengthwise", "TJ's Whole Grain Dijon Mustard and TJ's Honey, to serve (optional)", 'Toothpicks']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Fold a slice of prosciutto back and forth on itself to create a ruffled look. Gently skewer the folded prosciutto with a toothpick, followed by a fig half and a cube of cheese. Repeat assembly process with remaining ingredients.', "Serve alone or with TJ's Whole Grain Dijon Mustard and your favorite TJs Honey for dipping.", 'Tags: Cheese, Entertaining, Holiday, Party']

recipe_description: At first bite, Trader Joe’s Unexpected Cheddar tastes like an aged Cheddar. And then something unexpected happens. The smooth creaminess of the Cheddar gives way to a tangy flavor and slightly crumbly texture, a subtle hint of salt crystallization is discovered, and it begins to taste like an aged Parmesan. Surprising, astonishing, and unanticipated. Unexpected indeed!
recipe_overview: Serves: 8 - 12 Prep Time: 15 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 package TJ’s Unexpected Cheddar, broken into chunks', '1 package TJ’s Cream Cheese', '1 teaspoon TJ’s Chili Pepper Sauce', '1 teaspoon TJ’s 21 Seasoning Salute', '1 teaspoon Lemon Juice', '½ package TJ’s Sweet & Spicy Pecans, chopped', "TJ's Golden Rounds Crackers, for serving"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Add cheeses, chili pepper sauce, seasoning and lemon juice to food processor bowl. Pulse to bring mixture together, scraping down sides of bowl as needed. Continue to process until mixture is smooth, 1-2 minutes.', 'Lay a square of cling wrap large enough to cover cheese ball on work surface. Scoop cheese mixture into center of wrap, then gather wrap up on all sides, gently shaping the mixture into a ball. Twist the ends of the cling wrap tightly, and refrigerate cheese ball (2 hours minimum, but overnight really lets the flavors meld together!).', 'Before serving, remove cheese ball from fridge. Spread chopped pecans on work surface. Unwrap cheese ball and press into chopped pecans, gently reshaping as needed. Serve with a cheese spreader, surrounded by TJ’s Golden Rounds Crackers.', 'Tags: Appetizer, Cheese, Entertaining, Party']

recipe_description: Subtly sweet and not too hot, Trader Joe’s Sweet Italian Pork Sausage is pre-seasoned and ready to star in everything from sausage & peppers to meat sauce. Add to it this stuffing recipe for your Turkey Day Feast, and be prepared for coworkers to ask, “What’s that delicious smell?” when you reheat leftovers for lunch.
recipe_overview: Serves: 10 - 12 Prep Time: 20 Minutes Cooking Time: 35 - 45 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['TJ’s Canola Oil Spray', '1 box TJ’s Cornbread Stuffing Mix', '4 tablespoons TJ’s Unsalted Butter', '4 cups Water', '1 lb. TJ’s Sweet Italian Pork Sausage or Hot Italian Pork Sausage, casing removed', '½ bag TJ’s Organic Tuscan Kale', '1 package TJ’s Organic Cooked & Peeled Chestnuts, halved', 'TJ’s Shaved Parmesan, Romano & Asiago Cheese', 'TJ’s Cranberry Sauce & Turkey Gravy, for serving (optional)']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 350°F. Grease a 13x9-inch casserole dish with canola oil spray and set aside.', 'In a large saucepan, mix butter, water and seasoning pouch from stuffing mix and bring to a low boil for 3-5 minutes. Remove from heat and gently fold in croutons until thoroughly moistened. Transfer to a large bowl, cover and let sit 10 minutes.', 'While stuffing sits, heat a large sauté pan or skillet over medium. Add sausage to pan and sauté, stirring occasionally, until cooked through, about 8 minutes. Add kale to pan and sauté a few minutes more to wilt. Remove from heat and stir in chestnuts.', 'Gently fold sausage mixture into stuffing until evenly distributed. Transfer to casserole dish in an even layer. Top with a generous handful of cheese.', 'Place dish on center rack of oven and bake until center is heated through and top is golden brown, 30-45 minutes. Remove stuffing from oven and let cool slightly. Serve with gravy and cranberry sauce on the side.', 'Tags: Casserole, Comfort Food, Fall, stuffing, Thanksgiving']

recipe_description: Who needs mashed potatoes when you can crumble Trader Joe's Turkey and Stuffing Seasoned Kettle Chips atop a Cheesy Hash Brown Casserole? First you taste the turkey, then comes the stuffing. If you close your eyes, you’ll swear you can taste the creamy gravy… even as you crunch into these 100% American-grown, patiently kettle-cooked potato chips.
recipe_overview: Serves: 8 - 12 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 45 - 55 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["TJ's Canola Oil Spray", "11⁄2 bags TJ's Shredded Hash Browns, thawed", "1 tub (16 ounces) TJ's Sour Cream", "1 package TJ's Condensed Cream of Portabella Mushroom Soup", "2⁄3 package (8 ounces) TJ's Shredded Sharp Cheddar", "1⁄2 package TJ's Green Onions, trimmed and thinly sliced, divided", "2 cups crushed TJ's Turkey and Stuffing Seasoned Kettle Chips"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 350°F. Grease a 9x13 casserole dish with canola oil spray, set aside.', 'In a very large bowl, stir sour cream and condensed soup until combined. Add hash browns and stir to coat evenly with soup mixture. Gently fold in cheese and 3⁄4 of the green onions. Spread mixture evenly in prepared casserole dish and cover with crushed potato chips.', 'Bake casserole on center rack of oven until center is heated through and cheese is bubbling, 45-55 minutes. Remove from oven and let cool slightly. Top with remaining green onions before serving.', 'Tags: Casserole, Thanksgiving']

recipe_description: These portable parcels of stuffing goodness are a warm and inviting antidote to chilly fall days. The recipe starts with Trader Joe's Cornbread Stuffing Mix, liberally seasoned with chicken broth, garlic & onion powders, and fragrant spices. Once the stuffing is prepared, Dried Cranberries are folded in for a slightly sweet chew.
recipe_overview: Serves: 12 Prep Time: 15 Minutes Cooking Time: 40 - 45 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 box TJ’s Cornbread Stuffing Mix', '4 tablespoons TJ’s Unsalted Butter', '4 cups Water', '1 cup TJ’s Dried Cranberries', 'TJ’s Canola Oil Spray', "6 TJ's Fully Cooked Turkey Meatballs, microwaved according to package directions and halved", 'TJ’s Turkey Gravy, for serving (optional)']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', '1:00', '  Preheat oven to 350°F. Mix butter, water and seasoning pouch from stuffing mix in a large saucepan and bring to a low boil for 3-5 minutes. Remove from heat and gently fold in croutons until thoroughly moistened. Cover and let sit for 10 minutes.', 'While stuffing sits, place turkey meatballs in a microwave-safe dish. Cover and microwave 2-3 minutes. Remove from microwave, slice in half and set aside. Remove lid from stuffing and gently stir in cranberries.', 'Grease a 12-cup muffin pan with canola oil spray. Fill muffin cup about 1/3 full with stuffing. Add a turkey meatball half (flat side down) and cover with stuffing until you have a small mound that sits slightly above the rim of the pan. Repeat with remaining stuffing and turkey meatball halves. Place pan on center rack of oven and bake 40-45 minutes. Remove pan from oven and let sit 10 minutes.', 'While muffins cool, heat gravy according to package directions. Gently remove muffins from pan with a fork or butter knife. Serve with gravy for dipping.', 'Tags: Fall, Thanksgiving']

recipe_description: Trader Joe’s Chèvre with Honey Goat’s Milk Cheese combines the sweet goodness of honey with the tangy temptation of goat cheese. Slather it on Brioche Toasts and pair with your favorite rosé for a simple, slightly sweet appetizer or afternoon snack.
recipe_overview: Serves: 5 Prep Time: 5 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["2 packages TJ's Chevre With Honey Goat's Milk Cheese", "1 cup TJ's Wild Blueberries, defrosted", "10 TJ's Brioche Toasts"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Slather brioche toasts with goat cheese and garnish with blueberries. Enjoy!', 'Tags: Cheese, Snack, Toast']

recipe_description: Top Trader Joe's Gluten Free Crispbreads with Whipped Cream Cheese and Everything But The Bagel Sesame Seasoning Blend for a hearty snack or fancy appetizer that comes together in less than five minutes.
recipe_overview: Serves: 1 Prep Time: 3 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["TJ's Gluten Free Crispbreads", "TJ's Whipped Cream Cheese", "TJ's Everything But The Bagel Sesame Seasoning Blend", 'Fresh Dill, for garnish (optional)']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Generously slather a crispbread with cream cheese. Sprinkle liberally with seasoning blend and top with fresh dill. Enjoy!', 'Tags: Cheese, Savory, Snack']

recipe_description: If you build it, they will dip—“it” being a creamy, Five-ish Layer Dip, of course. Topped with an organic blend of our most popular cheeses (Mozzarella, Monterey Jack and Cheddar), this recipe is a perennial party favorite.
recipe_overview: Serves: 8 - 10 Prep Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 can TJ's Organic Salsa Style Refried Black Beans", "1 package TJ's Avocado's Number Guacamole", "1 tub (16 oz) TJ's Organic Sour Cream", "1 jar TJ's Double Roasted Salsa", "1/2 bag TJ's Organic Shredded 3 Cheese Blend", "1/2 can TJ's Sliced Black Olives", "4 TJ's Green Onions, thinly sliced", "Handful TJ's Fresh Cilantro, chopped", "TJ's Restaurant Style Tortilla Chips (or your favorite TJ's Tortilla Chips) for dipping", '2-quart serving dish (or individual ramekins) for dip assembly']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'In a 2-quart serving dish, use a spatula to spread beans across the bottom of the dish in an even layer. Continue gently layering with guacamole, sour cream, and salsa (rinse your spatula when switching ingredients to keep your layers clean).', "Top with cheese, green onions, cilantro, and olives. Dig in with your favorite TJ's tortilla chips.", 'Tags: Big Game, Dip, Party']

recipe_description: Do you tend to avoid traditional (read: heavy on the palate) pasta dishes due to the carb-induced slumber often left in their wake? Then try this Cool & Spicy Noodle Salad, a savory, peanut-y side dish that’s a little bit Thai, a little bit Italian, and a whole lot of energizing flavor.
recipe_overview: Serves: 8 Prep Time: 40 Minutes Cooking Time: 7 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 package TJ's Organic Yellow Lentil & Brown Rice Spaghetti", "1 package TJ's Shredded Cabbage", "1/2 package TJ's Shredded Carrots", "2 TJ's Red Bell Peppers, cored and very thinly sliced", "1 cup TJ's Spicy Peanut Vinaigrette, plus more to taste", 'Handful Fresh cilantro, rinsed and chopped (optional)', "Handful of TJ's Half Salted Peanuts, crushed (optional)"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Prepare pasta according to package directions. Meanwhile, prepare a large bowl of ice water. Transfer cooked, drained pasta to ice water to cool. Drain pasta thoroughly and add to a very large mixing bowl.', 'Add cabbage, carrots, bell peppers and vinaigrette to pasta. Gently toss to combine. Adjust dressing to taste and add cilantro, if desired. Cover and chill 30 minutes. Garnish with crushed peanuts prior to serving.', 'Tags: Pasta, Salad, Summer']

recipe_description: Trader Joe's Sliced Prosciutto is crafted for us by a well-known, award-winning Italian salumeri here in the U.S. They begin with full hams that are cured in the traditional Italian style, then allowed to age slowly for 10-12 months.
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 - 8 Prep Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1/2 TJ's Tuscan Melon (or small cantaloupe), cubed", "1 package TJ's Sliced Prosciutto, gently sliced in half lengthwise", 'Fresh Basil, rinsed & dried', 'Toothpicks']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Lay a piece of prosciutto on a clean, dry work surface. Set a melon cube at one end, and wrap prosciutto around melon. Top with a fresh basil leaf or two, and push a toothpick through the center to secure. Enjoy!', 'Tags: Fruit, No Cook, Summer']

recipe_description: Think of this recipe as a cheese board in snack mix form: the combination of pucker-producing Pickled Popcorn, crunchy Cheddar Rockets, and savory Smoked Almonds hits all the flavors of the real thing, no knives required.
recipe_overview: Serves: 8 - 12 Prep Time: 3 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 bag TJ's Popcorn in a Pickle", "2 cups TJ's Cheddar Rockets", "2 cups TJ's Smoked Seasoned Mesquite Almonds"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'In a large serving bowl, gently combine popcorn, cheddar rockets and almonds. Enjoy!', 'Tags: Party, Pickled']

recipe_description: Trader Joe’s Traditional Tunisian Harissa is one of those special sauces that you will want to put on everything and anything, once you get a taste. It's prepared in small batches with fresh, red chiles that are grilled in a tumbler over an open flame, and blended with a traditional mix of herbs and spices. This deep red concoction is smooth and spreadable, with a little smoke flavor (from the grilling), and a healthy amount of heat. Yes, it is as flavorfully divine as it sounds.
recipe_overview: Serves: 6 - 8 Prep Time: 5 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 container TJ's Old Fashioned Potato Salad", "1 tablespoon TJ's Traditional Tunisian Harissa (or more, if you're feeling brave!)", "4 slices TJ's Fully Cooked Uncured Bacon, microwaved and crumbled into pieces"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Combine potato salad and harissa in a medium serving bowl. Taste and add more harissa, if desired. Gently fold in bacon crumbles. Enjoy immediately, or refrigerate until ready to serve.', 'Tags: 4th of July, Bacon, BBQ, Party, Spicy, Summer']

recipe_description: The slightly sweet flavor profile of TJ's Cornbread Mix is amplified by the even sweeter addition of our famed, frozen Wild Boreal Blueberries in this Southern-inspired dessert. Serve this sweet-but-not-too-sweet cake warm, generously slathered with whipped honey butter, and you’ll be in cornbread heaven.
recipe_overview: Serves: 9 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 40 - 45 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["3/4 cup TJ's Organic Sour Cream", "1/2 cup TJ's Sunflower Oil", "1/4 cup TJ's Whole Milk", "1 TJ's Egg", "1 box TJ's Cornbread Mix", "1 1/2 cups TJ's Frozen Wild Boreal Blueberries, divided"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 350°F. Grease an 8-inch square baking pan, set aside.', 'In a large bowl, whisk sour cream, oil, milk and egg until smooth. Add cornbread mix and stir gently to combine; do not overmix.', 'Add 1/2 cup frozen blueberries to prepared baking pan. Scrape cornbread batter atop blueberries, spreading batter evenly to sides of pan. Cover surface of batter with remaining blueberries.', 'Place baking pan on center rack of oven and bake 40-45 minutes, until cake is golden and edges pull away from sides of pan. Remove from oven and let cool 15 minutes before slicing.', 'Tags: Cake, Corn, Summer']

recipe_description: Nothing says summer like fresh corn grilled in its own husk. Baste it with Trader Joe's Green Goddess Salad Dressing and a smattering of chili flakes before you toss it on the grill, and you've got a fresh-tasting, unfussy side dish to pair with the rest of your summer fare.
recipe_overview: Serves: 8 Prep Time: 1 Hour 15 Minutes Cooking Time: 20 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["8 ears TJ's Fresh Corn", "TJ's Green Goddess Salad Dressing", "TJ's Red Chili Pepper Flakes (optional)", "TJ's Sea Salt & Pepper, to taste"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Remove two or three outer layers of the husk from each ear of corn. A few layers should remain to protect the corn as it cooks. Gently peel back the remaining husks to expose the corn and remove as much of the silk as is possible. Place husks back over the ears and add to a large bowl or baking dish. Fill with water to cover corn and soak for 1 hour.', 'Gently peel back the husks once again to expose the corn. Baste generously with dressing, and top with chili flakes (if using), salt and pepper.', 'Fold the husks back into place and line up all the corn on a sturdy sheet of aluminum foil. Place the foil directly on the grill over medium heat. Grill 15 minutes, turning frequently. Remove foil from grill and cook another 5 minutes, allowing the husks to get nice and charred. Remove from grill and let cool for a few minutes before serving.', 'Tags: BBQ, Corn, Grilling, Summer']

recipe_description: When we crafted this Kickin' Corn Dip recipe in our test kitchen, our tasters simply couldn't get enough of it. It takes three cheeses to create its creamy base: velvety cream cheese, spicy Monterey Jack, and our finely shredded Mexican Blend for superb meltability.
recipe_overview: Serves: 8 - 10 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 30 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 package TJ's Cream Cheese, softened", "1 jar TJ's Cowboy Caviar Salsa", "3/4 cup TJ's Shredded Monterey Jack Cheese", "1 cup TJ's Fancy Shredded Mexican Blend Cheese, divided", "1/4 cup TJ's Roasted Corn"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 375°F. Grease a 2-quart baking dish with cooking spray, set aside.', 'Add cream cheese to a medium size, microwave safe bowl. Microwave on half power for 1 minute intervals, whipping with a fork in between, until warm and smooth. Add cowboy caviar, Monterey Jack cheese and 3/4 cup fancy shredded Mexican blend and stir to combine. Scrape mixture into prepared baking dish and top with remaining cheese and roasted corn.', 'Place dish on center rack of oven and bake 30 minutes, until well browned and bubbling. Cool slightly before digging in with your edible scoop of choice (chips, crudités Cornbread Crisps...).', 'Tags: Big Game, Corn, Dip, Party, Spicy']

recipe_description: Trader Joe's Organic Whole Carrots become tender and sweetly fragrant thanks to a hot bath in TJ's Brewed Ginger Beer and honey. Simple yet elegant, this dish is equally delicious served hot or cold. Feel free to reduce or omit the cayenne pepper for the heat-averse crowd.
recipe_overview: Serves: 6 - 8 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 30 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 bag (1 lb.) TJ’s Organic Carrots', '1 bottle (12 oz.) TJ’s Brewed Ginger Beer', '2 tablespoons TJ’s Cultured Butter or Salted Butter', '1/4 teaspoon TJ’s Cayenne Pepper', '1 tablespoon TJ’s Honeycomb Honey', "TJ's Unsalted Dry Toasted Sliced Almonds and Fresh Chopped Parsley, for garnish"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Peel carrots and trim ends. Slice on a diagonal, about ¼-inch thick. Add carrots, ginger beer and butter to a large sauté pan. Cover and bring to a simmer. Remove lid and stir. Reduce heat to low, replace lid and simmer 5 minutes more.', 'Remove lid and stir in cayenne pepper and honey. Continue to cook, stirring occasionally until liquid is reduced to a thick glaze, about 15 minutes. Remove pan from heat and let cool 5 minutes. Garnish with almonds and parsley before serving.', 'Tags: Fall, Ginger, Holiday, Thanksgiving']

recipe_description: This savory, slightly sweet scone gets a dose of Mediterranean flavor from our very own Falafel Mix.
recipe_overview: Serves: 12 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 15 - 17 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['Harissa Yogurt', "1 cup TJ's Plain Whole Milk Greek Yogurt", "2 heaping teaspoons TJ's Traditional Tunisian Harissa (or more, to taste)", 'Falafel Scones', "1 cup TJ's Falafel Mix", "1 cup TJ's All Purpose Flour", "3 tablespoons TJ's Organic Sugar", "1 tablespoon plus 1 teaspoon TJ's Baking Powder", "1/2 cup (1 stick) TJ's Unsalted Butter, cold, cut into small chunks", "2 TJ's Large Eggs", "1/2 cup TJ's Heavy Cream", "1/2 cup TJ's Sundried Tomatoes in Olive Oil, roughly chopped OR 1/2 TJ's Roasted Red Bell Pepper, drained and thinly sliced"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 400°F. Line a large baking sheet with parchment paper or spray with cooking spray; set aside. Combine yogurt and harissa in a small bowl, cover and refrigerate.', 'In a large bowl, combine falafel mix, flour, sugar, and baking powder in a large bowl. Cut the butter into the dry ingredients until crumbly, leaving pea sized chunks of butter. Set aside.', 'In a medium bowl, lightly beat the eggs and heavy cream. Make a well in the center of dry mixture and add egg mixture. Fold gently with a spatula, until just combined. Gently stir in sundried tomatoes, if using.', 'Divide dough in half. Stretch dough into a circle, about 6 inches in diameter and 1/2 inch thick, and place it on the prepared baking sheet. Repeat with remaining dough. Cut each circle into six triangles, and top with sliced red bell pepper, if using.', 'Place baking sheet on center rack of oven and bake 15-17 minutes until golden. Remove from oven and transfer scones to a wire rack to cool. Wait 5 minutes, then serve with harissa yogurt for drizzling.', 'Tags: Baking, Mediterranean']

recipe_description: A bit of heat, a bit of sweetness, a lot of cream cheese. This 'wich is especially excellent when cut into triangles and served as an appetizer.
recipe_overview: Serves: 3 Cooking Time: 20 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["6 slices TJ's Multigrain Bread", "1 jar TJ's Hot & Sweet Pepper Jelly", '1 block of TJ\'s Cream Cheese, cut into 1/4" slices', "3 tablespoons TJ's Unsalted Butter"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Heat skillet over medium heat. Divide butter and spread evenly on slices of bread. Place one slice butter-down on skillet. Immediately place slices of cream cheese onto bread, enough to cover (about five). Top cream cheese with pepper jelly. Place second slice of bread on top with butter facing up.', 'Let cook for 3-4 minutes, until bottom is golden brown. Flip the sandwich and let it cook for 3-4 more minutes, until bottom is golden brown and the cream cheese has softened.', 'Transfer sandwich to a cutting board and cut into triangles, or your preferred shape.', 'Cook remaining two sandwiches in the same manner. Serve immediately.']

recipe_description: A toast with the most! Pile the fruit as high as your heart desires.
recipe_overview: Serves: 2 Prep Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["2 slices of your favorite TJ's Multigrain Bread", '1 cup blackberries', "1 cup TJ's Frozen Peach Slices, defrosted", '2 teaspoons honey', '1 teaspoon fresh mint, chopped', "2 tablespoons TJ's Creamy Salted Cashew Butter", 'Additional mint for garnish, if desired']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Toast slices of bread to desired crispiness.', 'While bread is toasting, slice defrosted peaches into one-inch pieces. Place peaches, blackberries, honey, and chopped mint in a bowl and stir to combine.', 'Spread cashew butter on toast. Divide fruit salad evenly atop toast. Garnish with additional mint leaves and a drizzle of honey, if desired. Serve immediately', 'Tags: Spring, Summer, Toast']

recipe_description: Trader Joe’s Organic Carrots of Many Colors taste like carrots—no surprise there—but their color really pops on a plate. Slice these vibrant taproots into spears, present them on a tray, and serve them with your favorite dip. Or toss them with olive oil, thyme, and salt & pepper, and roast them for about 20 minutes. The earthy, sweet flavor of these roasted carrots is equally at home alongside an Easter ham or Thanksgiving turkey dinner.
recipe_overview: Serves: 6 - 8 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 18 - 23 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 package (2 pounds) TJ's Organic Carrots Of Many Colors, rinsed and dried", "1 tablespoon TJ's Organic Extra Virgin Olive Oil", "1 tablespoon TJ's Organic Apple Cider Vinegar OR Balsamic Vinegar", "Pinch TJ's Sea Salt", 'Fresh Thyme']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 400°F. Line a large baking sheet with parchment paper, set aside.', 'Peel carrots and trim ends, discard ends and peels. Slice carrots in half crosswise, then slice in half lengthwise. Add carrots to a large bowl and drizzle with olive oil, vinegar, and salt, and toss to coat. Spread carrots evenly on prepared baking sheet and tuck a few sprigs of fresh thyme in between the carrots.', 'Place baking sheet on center rack of oven and roast 15-20 minutes, until carrots are fork tender. Turn oven to broil (high) and broil carrots 2-3 minutes (watch carefully to avoid burning). Remove sheet from oven and let cool 5 minutes before serving.', 'Tags: Easter, Fall, Holiday, Spring, Thanksgiving']

recipe_overview: Serves: 3 Prep Time: 1 Hour Cooking Time: 7 - 9 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 cup TJ's Falafel Mix", '3/4 cup water', "1 bottle TJ's Sunflower Oil", "9 teaspoons TJ's Crumbled Feta, divided", "Your favorite TJ's Hummus, Salad Greens, and Flatbread (Flatbread, Naan, Malabari Paratha, etc.) for serving (optional)"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Combine falafel mix and water in a medium sized bowl; cover and set aside for one hour.', 'Roughly divide falafel dough into 9 sections. Holding one piece of dough in your palm, press a teaspoon of feta into the center and mold the dough around it to conceal the feta. Repeat with remaining dough (you should have 9 dough balls).', 'Fill a 3-quart stockpot with sunflower oil, about four inches high. Turn heat to medium-high and heat oil to 300°F.', 'Working in batches, use a long-handled slotted spoon to gently lower dough balls into oil. Fry until floating and dark golden brown, 2 to 2 1/2 minutes. Transfer to a paper towel lined plate and cool 2 to 3 minutes before serving. Serve as an appetizer with your favorite hummus, or atop a bed of greens or in a toasted flatbread for a meatless meal.', 'Tags: Meatless']

recipe_description: This bright, fresh side dish is a perfect partner to our Spatchcocked Lemon Rosemary Chicken.
recipe_overview: Serves: 6 Prep Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["2 packages TJ's English Peas", "2 teaspoons TJ's Organic Tunisian Extra Virgin Olive Oil", "Juice of 1 TJ's Lemon", "20 TJ's Mint leaves, chopped", "Dash TJ's Sea Salt, to taste", "TJ's Goat Cheese Crumbles"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Microwave peas according to package directions. Add peas to a colander and rinse under cold water for 1-2 minutes to stop cooking. Shake colander to remove excess water, and pour peas into a medium-sized bowl. Add olive oil, lemon juice and mint, and gently stir to combine. Add sea salt to taste.', 'To serve, spoon peas into a bowl or plate, and top with goat cheese crumbles.', 'Tags: Mint, Peas, Spring']

recipe_description: Crisp and pleasantly salty with a warm, tender interior, Trader Joe’s Trader Potato Tots hit the mark for appetizer awesomeness and superb late-night snacking. They’re crafted with shredded Northwest potatoes that are pressed into bite-size nuggets and fried to achieve a gloriously golden, crunchy exterior. Use them as a base for cheesy Totchos with hot & sweet jalapeños, black beans, and your protein of choice—we opted for a batch of Jackfruit Carnitas for a marvelously meatless presentation.
recipe_overview: Serves: 8 - 10 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 25 - 30 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 bag TJ's Trader Potato Tots", "1 block TJ's Jalapeño Jack Cheese, shredded and divided", "1 can TJ's Organic Black Beans, drained", '1/2 batch of Jackfruit Carnitas (or 2 cups of your favorite cooked protein)', "TJ's Hot & Sweet Jalapeños, Sour Cream & Cilantro (for garnish)"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Spread tots on a large, rimmed baking pan and cook according to package directions.
