Remove pan from oven and set on heat-safe work surface.', 'Using tongs or a spatula, pile half of the tots in the center of the pan. Sprinkle with half of the cheese, then pile remaining tots on top. Scatter black beans, jackfruit carnitas, remaining cheese and jalapeños atop the tots. ', 'Return pan to oven and cook 5-10 minutes more to melt the cheese. Remove from oven and let cool slightly. Garnish with cilantro and sour cream, and enjoy!', 'Tags: Big Game, Meatless, Nachos, Potatoes, Snack']

recipe_overview: Serves: 8 Cooking Time: 30 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 package TJ's Party Size Mini Meatballs", "1 jar TJ's Masala Simmer Sauce", "1 jar TJ's Mango & Ginger Chutney"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Slow Cooker Method: Add meatballs, sauce and chutney to a 2-quart slow cooker and stir until meatballs are evenly coated. Heat 2-3 hours on high, stirring after 1 hour. Switch slow cooker to warm setting to serve.', 'Oven Method: Preheat oven to 350°. Place meatballs in a baking dish (appx. 9" x 9") and cover with masala sauce. Place on center rack of oven and cook for 20-30 minutes, or until meatballs are heated through and sauce is hot. Serve with chutney for dipping.', 'Tags: Big Game, Entertaining, Meatballs, Party']

recipe_description: Few culinary combos have the power to create crowds at a buffet like crunchy chips and hot cheese dip...
recipe_overview: Serves: 6 - 8 Prep Time: 3 Minutes Cooking Time: 10 - 15 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 wedge TJ's Triple Creme Brie", "1 bag TJ's Pumpkin Tortilla Chips (seasonal)", "TJ's Pumpkin Butter (optional, seasonal)"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 350°F. Unwrap brie and place in the center of a small baking dish (there should be room for the cheese to spread and fill the dish as it melts). Place on center rack of oven and bake 10-15 minutes or until gently bubbling (watch closely after the 10 minute mark to avoid burned cheese!). Remove from oven and let cool 5 minutes. If desired, stir in a spoonful of pumpkin butter, then grab some Pumpkin Tortilla Chips and dig in!', 'Tags: Cheese, Fall, Party, Pumpkin, Snack']

recipe_description: Food may not be the first thing that comes to mind when you hear the phrase “dress for success,” but it should be. After all, a well-seasoned salad dressing can make or break a meal, especially if salad is the focal point. Too heavy and the flavors of the other components are lost; too light and there’s nothing to really hold it together.
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 - 6 Prep Time: 5 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1/4 cup TJ's Organic Tahini", "Juice of 1 TJ's Lemon", "1/4 cup water; 2 teaspoons TJ's Minced Garlic", "1/8 teaspoon TJ's Sea Salt, or to taste"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Add all ingredients to a small bowl and whisk vigorously until well incorporated. Taste and adjust seasoning as necessary. Drizzle with abandon and enjoy!', 'Tags: Salad, Sauce']

recipe_description: These flavorful Trader Joe’s Yellow Cling Peaches are grown in Valencia, Spain where they’re nurtured in proximity to the warm Mediterranean Sea—then peeled, pitted, and preserved in white grape juice. Serve the beautiful, intact Halves with a dollop of cheese or cream in the center and a sprinkle of granola or coconut. Slice to add a pop of color & burst of juicy sweetness to your ice cream, yogurt, or fruit salad. Or try this sweet-savory breakfast or snack combo and layer them on toast atop a hearty schmear of Trader Joe’s Goat’s Milk Cheese Marinated with Herbs.
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 2 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["4 slices TJ's Multigrain Bread", "1 container TJ's Goat's Milk Cheese Marinated With Herbs, softened to room temperature", "4 TJ's Cling Peach Halves, thinly sliced", 'Fresh Basil, chopped, for garnish']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Toast multigrain bread to desired level of doneness. Top each piece of toast with a goat cheese disk and spread to cover evenly. Top with peach slices and basil. Drizzle with oil & herbs from cheese container, if desired. Enjoy!', 'Tags: Snack, Spring, Summer, Toast']

recipe_overview: Serves: 6 - 8 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 10 Minutes - 1 Hour
recipe_ingredients: ["1 package TJ's Grilled Asparagus Spears, thawed according to package directions and chopped into large pieces", "1 bag TJ's Roasted Corn, microwaved according to package directions", "½ TJ's Red Onion, diced", "2 TJ's Red Bell Peppers (or Enjoya Peppers), chopped", '½ to ¾ cup TJ’s Organic Rosé Vinaigrette', "TJ's Sea Salt"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Combine vegetables in a large bowl. Drizzle with vinaigrette and gently toss to coat. Season to taste with salt. Chill in refrigerator for 1 hour and serve.', 'Tags: Corn, Salad, Summer']

recipe_description: With its fresh flavors and varying textures, this quinoa salad is the perfect base for delicately grilled shrimp or fish.
recipe_overview: Serves: 6 - 8 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 10 - 15 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1/2 bag TJ's Organic Tricolor Quinoa", "1 cup TJ's Pineapple Tidbits", "1/2 bag TJ's Sugar Snap Peas, sliced", "3 TJ's Green Onions, sliced", "1/2 bag TJ's Shredded Carrots", "1/2 cup TJ's Roasted Sliced Almonds", "1/4 to 1/2 cup TJ's Fat Free Sesame Vinaigrette (to taste)", "TJ's Sea Salt & Pepper (to taste)"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Prepare the quinoa according to package directions. While quinoa cooks, add pineapple tidbits to a saute pan over medium heat. Cook 2-3 minutes, stirring occasionally. Turn heat to medium-high and add snap peas and green onions to pan. Add 2 tablespoons water and cover with lid to steam, about 2 minutes. When water has evaporated, remove pan from heat.', 'In a large bowl, add all ingredients, tossing gently to combine. Season to taste with salt & pepper, and add more dressing if desired. Serve warm, or chill for 1 hour and serve.', 'Tags: Salad, Summer']

recipe_description: Elote is a Mexican street food marvel that consists of a grilled corncob slathered in mayonnaise and covered in cotija cheese. Then, there’s esquites. This is the easier-to-eat, less-messy version of elote, where the corn is cut off the cob, put into a cup, and mixed with the aforementioned mayo & cotija. Modeled after the latter, Trader Joe’s Mexican Style Roasted Corn with Cotija Cheese is the at-home version of this favored street food, and your ticket to a deceptively simple summer side dish.
recipe_overview: Serves: 6 - 8 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 5 - 6 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 bag TJ’s Organic Red Lentil Sedanini', '1 bag TJ’s Mexican-Style Roasted Corn with Cotija Cheese', "1 can TJ's Organic Black beans, drained", 'Juice of 2 TJ’s Limes', '½ tablespoon TJ’s Spanish Extra Virgin Olive Oil', 'Fresh cilantro, chopped, for garnish']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add pasta to pot, return to boil and cook for 5-6 minutes, until al dente. Drain pasta and rinse with cold water to stop cooking. Transfer pasta to a large bowl and toss with olive oil to keep from sticking; set aside.', 'While pasta boils, microwave corn according to package directions. Add corn, cheese packet, black beans and lime juice to pasta, tossing gently to combine. Salt and pepper to taste, garnish with cilantro and enjoy.', 'Tags: 4th of July, Corn, Pasta, Salad, Summer']

recipe_overview: Serves: 6 - 8 Prep Time: 7 Minutes Cooking Time: 45 - 50 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1/2 package TJ's Uncured Apple Smoked Bacon (or your favorite TJ's Bacon), chopped (optional)", "1 cup TJ's Diced Onions", "4 cans TJ's Organic Baked Beans", "1/2 cup TJ's Organic Sriracha & Roasted Garlic BBQ Sauce", 'Freshly chopped Cilantro, Chives or Parsley, for garnish (optional)']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 400º F. Heat a large skillet over medium flame, add bacon and brown 5-7 minutes. Remove bacon and set on a paper towel lined plate to drain. Pour off bacon fat from pan; add onion to pan and sauté until translucent, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat.', 'Pour beans into a 9x13 baking dish. Add bacon, onion, and bbq sauce and stir to combine. Place dish on center rack of oven and bake for 45-50 minutes, or until beans are bubbly, caramelized around the edges and slightly browned on top. Remove dish from oven and let cool 5 minutes. Garnish with cilantro, chives or parsley and enjoy!', 'Tags: Bacon, BBQ, Summer']

recipe_description: Paired with cole-cousins in the form of red wine vinaigrette-tossed Cruciferous Crunch—with a handful of Slivered Dry-Toasted Almonds, and a swoosh of rich Trader Joe's Mediterranean Hummus—this is more than just a salad; it’s an exciting side dish that easily morphs into a full meal with the addition of chicken or tofu.
recipe_overview: Serves: 2 - 4 Cooking Time: 20 - 23 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 bag TJ's Organic Broccoli Florets", "1 bag TJ's Cruciferous Crunch", "1/3 cup TJ's Red Wine Vinaigrette", "1 tub TJ's Mediterranean Hummus (or your favorite TJ's Hummus)", "1 bag TJ's Dry Toasted Slivered Almonds", "TJ's Red Pepper Flakes (optional)", "Juice of 1 TJ's Lemon", "Your favorite TJ's Olive Oil", "TJ's Salt & Pepper"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 400°F. Line a large baking sheet with parchment paper. Arrange broccoli florets evenly on baking sheet. Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice, and season with red pepper flakes, salt and pepper. Place sheet on center rack of oven and roast 20-23 minutes, tossing halfway through cooking. Remove from oven and allow to cool slightly.', 'While broccoli cooks, in a large bowl toss cruciferous crunch with red wine vinaigrette. Set aside to wilt.', 'Prepare four serving bowls. Spread a large spoonful of hummus inside each bowl with the back of a spoon. Divide wilted cruciferous crunch among the bowls and top each with roasted broccoli and a sprinkle of slivered almonds. Serve immediately.', 'Tags: Meatless, Roasted, Salad, Winter']

recipe_description: This creamy sauce is perfect for drizzling atop fajitas or Carnitas Tacos.
recipe_overview: Serves: 6 - 8 Prep Time: 5 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1/2 cup TJ's Organic Sour Cream", '2 tablespoons finely chopped Cilantro', '2 teaspoons Water', "Juice of one TJ's Lime", "Pinch of TJ's Sea Salt"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Add all ingredients to the bowl of a blender or food processor. Blend for 1-2 minutes until smooth. Pour into a bowl or squeeze bottle and drizzle atop eggs, burritos, tacos, salads, fajitas, burgers...', 'Tags: Cilantro, Dip, Sauce, Tacos']

recipe_description: This creamy green sauce is perfect for drizzling atop burgers or Mango Fish Tacos.
recipe_overview: Serves: 6 - 8 Prep Time: 5 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["2 TJ's Avocados", "1/2 cup TJ's Organic Sour Cream", "3 tablespoons TJ's Salsa Verde", '2 teaspoons Water', "1 1/2 teaspoons TJ's Garlic Powder", "Juice of one TJ's Lime", "Pinch of TJ's Sea Salt"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Add all ingredients to the bowl of a blender or food processor. Blend for 1-2 minutes until smooth. Pour into a small serving bowl or squeeze bottle and drizzle atop eggs, burritos, tacos, salads, fajitas, burgers...', 'Tags: Dip, Sauce']

recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Cooking Time: 12 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 tablespoon TJ's Organic Extra Virgin Coconut Oil", "1 cup TJ's Diced Onions", "1 bag TJ's Fresh Riced Cauliflower", "1-2 teaspoons TJ's Cumin (to taste)", "TJ's Sea Salt (to taste)"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'In a large skillet, heat coconut oil over medium-high heat. Add diced onions and sauté 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add riced cauliflower to skillet and sauté another 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add cumin and sauté another two minutes, until fragrant. Season to taste with salt and serve immediately.', 'Tags: Cauliflower']

recipe_description: Meet the easiest, tastiest recipe for all of your chip-and-dip needs: Trader Joe’s Everything but the Bagel Sesame Seasoning Blend with Organic Sour Cream. And don’t forget the Ridge Cut Potato Chips!
recipe_overview: Serves: 8 - 10 Prep Time: 2 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 tub (16 ounces) TJ's Organic Sour Cream", "1/2 jar TJ's Everything but the Bagel Sesame Seasoning Blend", 'Chopped Fresh Chives, for garnish (optional)']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Spoon sour cream into a serving bowl. Fold in seasoning and stir until well mixed. Cover and refrigerate for 30 minutes. Garnish with chopped chives, if desired. Serve with potato chips, carrot sticks, pita chips, celery sticks, bell peppers, pretzel slims, cucumbers...', 'Tags: Big Game, Dip, Party']

recipe_name: Kiss My Cornbread with Jalapeños & Bacon
recipe_description: Folding Trader Joe’s Hot & Sweet Jalapeños into our pleasantly sweet Cornbread Mix gives this recipe some heat, without any need for fire extinguishers. Including bacon makes it that much more delicious, because, well, bacon (we used our Uncured Applewood Smoked Bacon, but feel free to sub in your favorite TJ's bacon here). And while it’s perhaps gilding the lily a bit, our Clarified Butter (Ghee) is the ideal partner to honey for added sweet & savory in every bite.
recipe_overview: Serves: 9 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 35 - 38 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['Honey Butter', '2 parts TJ’s Clarified Butter', "1 part your favorite TJ's Honey", 'Cornbread', '2 TJ’s Organic Brown Eggs', '½ cup TJ’s Sunflower Oil', '¾ cup TJ’s Milk', '1 box TJ’s Cornbread Baking Mix', '½ cup TJ’s Hot & Sweet Jalapeños, diced', '4 slices TJ’s Apple Smoked Bacon, cooked and chopped']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 350°F. Grease bottom and sides of an 8-inch square baking pan. In a small bowl, mix clarified butter and honey; set aside.', 'Beat eggs, oil, and milk in a large mixing bowl. Add cornbread mix and stir just until moistened—do not over mix. Fold in diced jalapeños and chopped bacon. Pour mix into prepared pan.', 'Bake on the center rack of oven 35-38 minutes or until golden brown and toothpick inserted into center comes out clean. Serve warm, with honey butter.', 'Tags: Bacon, Baking, Corn']

recipe_overview: Serves: 6 - 8 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 20 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["3 cups TJ's Cheddar Rockets", "2 cups TJ's Oyster Crackers", "2 cups TJ's Pretzel Slims", "1 cup TJ's Roasted Unsalted Peanuts", "1 tablespoon TJ's Taco Seasoning (2 tablespoons for a spicier mix)", "2 tablespoons TJ's Canola Oil", '2 tablespoons water']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 300°F. In a large mixing bowl, mix cheddar rockets, oyster crackers, pretzel slims, and peanuts. In a separate small bowl, mix taco seasoning, canola oil, and water. Pour mixture over cereal and toss until pieces are completely coated. Spread mixture evenly onto baking sheet. Bake for 20 minutes, stirring after 10 minutes. Cool completely before serving.', 'Tags: Big Game, Crunchy, Snack']

recipe_overview: Serves: 4 - 6 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 20 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['For the Pretzel Bites*', "1/4 cup TJ's All Purpose Flour", "1 package TJ's Plain Pizza Dough", "1 TJ's Egg", "TJ's Sea Salt", "*If you'd prefer to skip the pretzel-making, substitute the ingredients above with 1 package of TJ's Big Soft Pretzels, prepared according to package instructions & cut into bite-sized pieces. ", 'For the Beer Cheese Dip', "1 teaspoon TJ's Extra Virgin Olive Oil", "1 tablespoon TJ's Shallots, minced", "4 cups TJ's Shredded Sharp Cheddar Cheese (or your preferred Cheddar)", "1/2 teaspoon TJ's Garlic Powder", '12 ounces Josephsbrau Bohemian Lager', "8 ounces TJ's Cream Cheese", "1 teaspoon TJ's Dijon Mustard", "TJ's Sea Salt & Black Pepper, to taste"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Prepare the Pretzel Bites:', 'Remove dough from package and let rest for 10 minutes. Preheat oven to 350°F. Spray a large baking sheet with cooking spray. In a small bowl, beat one egg and set aside. Roll out pizza dough to about 1/2 inch thick. Cut into 1 1/2 inch strips, and then cut strips lengthwise into small rectangles. Brush tops of dough pieces with egg and use grinder to add desired amount of salt on top. Place bites on a baking sheet, two inches apart. Bake 12-15 minutes. Remove from oven and let cool 5 minutes prior to serving. ', 'Prepare the Beer Cheese Dip:', 'In a medium saucepan, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add shallots and cook until translucent. Add beer, garlic powder, Dijon, salt and pepper. Bring to a boil. Lower heat and slowly add cream cheese, whisking to incorporate. Slowly add shredded cheeses and stir until melted. Serve immediately.', 'Tags: Beer, Big Game, Cheesy, Dip']

recipe_description: This is an heirloom family gravy recipe that's been handed down for four generations. Made simpler with Trader Joe's Mirepoix (an essential soup- and sauce-starter comprised of conveniently chopped carrots, celery and onions), the base of this rich gravy calls for a roux (say "ROO"). It's a mixture of fat and flour used to thicken soups, stews, gravy and other velvety sauces. Proceed with caution: one taste and you'll be tempted to slurp this Southern classic right out of the gravy boat.
recipe_overview: Serves: 6 - 8 Cooking Time: 40 - 50 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 Turkey Neck, from TJ's Fresh Whole Turkey of your choice (if you choose to omit turkey neck, increase measurement of TJ's Turkey Stock to 3 Cups, and increase simmering time to thicken the gravy)", "1 container TJ's Mirepoix", "1 tablespoon TJ's Olive Oil", "½ cup (one stick) TJ's Unsalted Butter", "½ cup Baker Josef's All-Purpose Flour", "1 cup TJ's Turkey Stock", "1 teaspoon TJ's Sea Salt", "½ teaspoon TJ's Black Pepper", '2 tablespoons pan drippings from cooked turkey (optional)']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Place the turkey neck in a medium pot with 2 1/2 Cups of water. Cover and bring to a boil. Remove lid, reduce heat to low and simmer for 20-25 minutes, until meat can be pulled from turkey neck with forks. Turn off heat, set shredded turkey meat and stock aside, and discard turkey neck.', 'While turkey neck stock simmers, heat olive oil in a large sauté pan over medium heat. Add Mirepoix to pan and sauté for 20 minutes or until browned, stirring occasionally. Turn off heat and set aside.', 'For the roux: In a wide sauce pan, melt the unsalted butter over medium heat. Add flour and whisk vigorously until flour is fully incorporated with butter, being careful not to burn the mixture. Roux will darken slightly to a light caramel color.', "Measure 2 cups of the turkey neck stock from pot and slowly incorporate into the roux, whisking constantly. Repeat the process with 1 cup TJ's Turkey Stock, incorporate slowly and whisk constantly. Add sautéed Mirepoix, salt, pepper and pan drippings (if desired) to the gravy and stir until combined. Reduce heat to low and simmer until desired consistency is reached. Serve immediately*.", '*If dinner is not quite ready, keep gravy covered on the stove over low heat, stirring occasionally. Just before serving, add stock to thin gravy to desired consistency.', 'Tags: Fall, Gravy, Thanksgiving, Turkey']

recipe_overview: Serves: 6 - 8 Cooking Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 cup TJ’s Hummus', '½ can TJ’s White Beans', '¾ cup TJ’s Plain Greek Yogurt', '1 teaspoon TJ’s Harissa', '1 cup TJ’s Persian Cucumber, chopped', '½ cup TJ’s Tomatoes, chopped', '¼ cup TJ’s Feta Cheese', '1/3 cup TJ’s Kalamata Olives, sliced', 'TJ’s Black Pepper, to taste']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'In a baking dish or wide bowl, spread hummus to cover bottom of dish.', 'Drain and rinse white beans, then layer evenly over hummus. Stir together Greek yogurt and harissa until combined. Spread Greek yogurt mixture on top of white beans. Add chopped cucumbers, chopped tomatoes, and sliced Kalamata olives, respectively, on top of dip. Sprinkle with Feta cheese and fresh ground black pepper, if desired.', 'Tags: Big Game, Dip, Party']

recipe_overview: Serves: 6 - 8 Prep Time: 5 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['2 cup TJ’s Vanilla Greek Yogurt', ' 1/3 cup TJ’s Clover Honey', '1 teaspoon TJ’s Pumpkin Pie Spice (seasonal)']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Combine all ingredients in a bowl and stir until blended. Serve with sliced apples or Cinnamon Apple Sticks for dipping.', 'Tags: Dip, Fall, Party']

recipe_overview: Serves: 8 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 30 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 Butternut Squash, roasted and cubed', "1 tablespoon Trader Joe's Organic Tahini", '½ teaspoon Paprika, plus more for garnish', '¼ teaspoon Salt', '¼ teaspoon Pepper', 'Juice of ½ a Lime', "¼ cup Trader Joe's Avocado Oil, plus more for garnish", 'Your favorite chips or veggies for dipping (we like Organic Blue Corn Tortilla Chips)']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Add all ingredients, except avocado oil, to food processor or blender. Turn on food processor/ blender and slowly drizzle oil into the mixture, about 30-45 seconds.', 'Once the oil has been added, turn off the machine and scrape down sides of bowl. Blend for another 30 seconds to 1 minute. Spoon into serving dish. using spoon to create a well in the center of hummus.', 'Garnish with olive oil and paprika. Serve with chips or veggies for dipping, or dig in with a spoon!', 'Tags: Fall, Seasonal, Squash, Thanksgiving']

recipe_overview: Serves: 12 - 14 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 2 Hours 30 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['Cakes', 'TJ’s Canola Oil Spray', '2 large TJ’s Eggs', '1 cup Sunflower Oil', '1 ½ cups TJ’s 2% Milk', '2 boxes TJ’s Cornbread Mix', '2 cups TJ’s Sharp Cheddar Cheese, shredded', '1 pkg TJ’s Fully Cooked Uncured Applewood Smoked Bacon', 'Savory Frosting', '1 pkg (7.5 oz.) Crème Fraiche', '1 pkg (8 oz.) Mascarpone', '1 teaspoon Dijon Mustard']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 350°F.', 'Prepare 2 Cake Pans (8"x8"x2"): use bottom of cake pan to measure/trace 2 circles on parchment paper; cut out the circles and set aside. Spray the inside of the cake pans with canola oil. Place parchment circles in the pan bottoms and spray over top with butter flavored oil. Set aside.', 'Prepare & Bake Cakes: in a large mixing bowl, beat eggs, sunflower oil, and milk. Add cornbread mix and stir until moistened, being careful not to overmix. Fold in shredded Cheddar. Divide batter between prepared cake pans. Place on center rack of oven and bake. At 35 minutes, test centers with a toothpick; when toothpicks come out clean, remove cornbread to cool (in pans) for 10 minutes. After 10 minutes, run a knife around the inside of the pans, flip pans upside down and ease cornbread out onto a cooling rack to cool completely, about 40-50 minutes.', 'Prepare Bacon: while cornbread is cooling, prepare bacon according to package stove top directions. Let rest on paper towels to cool completely. Once cooled, chop bacon into ½ inch pieces. Set aside.', 'Prepare Frosting: add mascarpone, crème fraiche and Dijon mustard to the mixer bowl. Using an electric mixer with whip attachment, start mixing on low setting; gradually increase speed to medium and whip to stiff peaks, about 2 minutes or less.', 'Assemble Cake: place a dollop of frosting onto cake plate to anchor. Place 1 cornbread cake, top side down, on top and center on plate. Frost and sprinkle with ¼ of chopped bacon. Top with second cornbread cake and lightly frost sides the entire cake. Frost cornbread top with what remains, and pile on remainder of bacon, as decoratively as you like!', 'Tags: Bacon, Cake, Cheese, entertaining, Fancy, Savory']

recipe_overview: Serves: 3 - 4 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 35 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 (1lb) bag TJ’s Dutch Yellow Baby Potatoes', '1/4 tsp TJ’s Sea Salt', '1/4 tsp TJ’s Ground Black Pepper', '4 Tablespoons TJ’s Extra Virgin Olive Oil']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Bring a medium pot of salted water to a boil. Add potatoes and boil until fork tender, about 10 minutes. Drain potatoes. Place potatoes onto a cutting board then gently smash (we used the base of a heavy glass Pyrex measuring cup) until each potato reaches about half its thickness, being careful to keep the potato intact. Drizzle about 2 tablespoons of olive oil onto a baking tray, then gently transfer each smashed potato onto the baking tray with a spatula. Generously brush the remaining olive oil atop the potatoes then sprinkle with salt and pepper. Place tray of potatoes in the heated oven and bake for 15 minutes. Flip the potatoes, season salt and pepper and bake an additional 10 more minutes the tops are until golden brown and crispy. Serve immediately.', 'Tags: Crispy, Potatoes, Roasted']

recipe_overview: Serves: 12 Prep Time: 25 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 bag TJ’s Jumbo Cooked Shrimp (Peeled, Tail Off, Whole)', '1 TJ’s Baguette', '¾ cup TJ’s Mayonnaise, divided', '3 cups quartered TJ’s Mini Heirloom Tomatoes', '1/4 cup finely chopped TJ’s Parsley', '3 Tablespoons TJ’s Jalapeño Pepper Hot Sauce']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Remove shrimp from bag and place in a colander. Run shrimp under cold water for 5 to 7 minutes to defrost, set aside to drain.', 'Cut baguette into 3-inch pieces lengthwise (about 6 pieces), slice each piece into halves crosswise.', 'Grease skillet on stove and bring to medium heat. Spread 1 teaspoon of mayonnaise on each slice of baguette and toast face-down in skillet until golden brown (about 2 minutes each). (Alternatively, place baguettes, cut side up, on a baking sheet and broil until browned and crispy (about 3-5 minutes).)', 'In a medium sized bowl, mix together defrosted shrimp, tomatoes, parsley, and chili pepper sauce.', 'To assemble, spoon ¼ cup of shrimp mixture over each slice of toasted bread. Enjoy immediately.', 'Tags: Bread, Sauce, Seafood, Shrimp, Summer']

recipe_overview: Serves: 6 - 8
recipe_ingredients: ["1 cup chopped your favorite TJ's Bacon", "1 cup TJ's Onions, diced", "3 cloves TJ's Premium Peeled Garlic, chopped", "4 cans TJ's Organic Baked Beans", "1 teaspoon TJ's Organic Yellow Mustard", "1/3 cup TJ's Brown Sugar", "1/2 cup TJ's Organic Brown Sugar BBQ Sauce & Marinade", "TJ's Salt & Pepper, to taste", 'Fresh Cilantro, chopped, for garnish (optional)']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 400ºF. Heat a large skillet over medium flame, add bacon and brown. Remove bacon and set aside. Pour off bacon fat; add onion to pan and sauté until translucent. Add garlic and stir for 1 minute longer.', 'Pour beans into a 9x13-inch casserole dish. Add bacon, onion, garlic, mustard, brown sugar and bbq sauce. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Place dish in oven and bake for 45 minutes to 1 hour, or until beans are bubbly, caramelized around the edges and slightly browned on top. Garnish with cilantro, chives or parsley. Enjoy!', 'Tags: 4th of July, Bacon']

recipe_description: We're known to be corny and cheesy (Hawaiian shirts anyone?). We thought we'd 'kick' it up with an app that's just right for us. And for your next party.
recipe_overview: Serves: 5 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 20 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 8oz package (about 5) TJ’s Jalapeños', '1 package TJ’s Chunky Artichoke & Jalapeño Dip', '1 cup TJ’s Roasted Corn, defrosted', '1 cup TJ’s Shredded Mozzarella Cheese, divided', '2 teaspoons finely chopped TJ’s Cilantro, plus more for garnish', '1/4 teaspoon TJ’s Ground Black Pepper, or to taste']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Cover a baking sheet with aluminum foil and set aside.', 'When working with jalapeños, wear disposable gloves to avoid eye irritation. Slice the jalapeños in half lengthwise. For a nicer presentation, slice each stem in half as well. Scrape out the seeds and membranes from each half. Place jalapeños on the baking sheet and set aside.', 'In a medium bowl, combine artichoke dip, 1 cup corn, ½ cup mozzarella and 2 teaspoons cilantro. Stir until well incorporated. Taste and add fresh ground black pepper as desired.', 'With a small spoon, fill each jalapeño half with about 1 tablespoon of the cheese mixture. Smooth the mixture so that it fills the entire cavity evenly, reaching the top edge of the pepper, but not overflowing (if the peppers are filled too much, they can tip over while baking). Sprinkle reserved ½ cup of mozzarella over the jalapeños. Arrange peppers on the baking sheet and bake until cheese is browned and bubbling and the peppers have softened, about 20 minutes. Remove from oven and cool before serving. Garnish with extra cilantro.', 'Tags: Big Game, Cheesy, Corn, Meatless, Party, Roasted, Spicy']

recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 15 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 Tbsp TJ’s Butter', '1 medium TJ’s Yellow Onion, sliced thinly', '¼ tsp TJ’s Sea Salt', '2 tsp TJ’s Organic Cane Sugar', '¼ cup TJ’s Balsamic Vinegar of Modena']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'In a medium skillet over medium heat, melt the butter. Add onion slices and stir to coat with butter. Sprinkle the onions with salt. Stir until onions until they cook down and begin to turn golden, about 5 minutes. Add sugar and continue to stir until onions darken to a medium golden color and turn translucent, about 5 more minutes. Add balsamic vinegar, scrape up the bits from the bottom of the pan and turn heat to low. Heat until most of the liquid absorbs, about 5-7 more minutes. Taste and season with more salt if needed, then serve. For richer flavor, the onions can be cooked for up to an additional 45 minutes if desired. Serve in soups or casseroles or on salads, burgers, sandwiches, steaks and eggs. Store in refrigerator for up to three days or freeze.', 'Tags: Caramelized, Fancy']

recipe_overview: Serves: 6 - 8 Prep Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 package TJ’s Anchovy Fillets in Olive Oil, drained and diced', '3 small TJ’s Premium Peeled Garlic Cloves, minced', 'Juice from two TJ’s Lemons', '2 teaspoons TJ’s Dijon Mustard with White Wine', '1/3 cup + 1 Tbsp TJ’s Sicilian Selezione EVOO', '1/4 teaspoon TJ’s Sea Salt, or to taste', '1/4 teaspoon TJ’s Ground Black Pepper, or to taste']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'In a medium bowl, mash the anchovies and garlic with a fork to form a paste. Add the lemon juice and mustard and stir until well incorporated. Slowly whisk in oil until it starts to emulsify. Taste and add salt and pepper as desired. Makes about 1 cup of dressing.', 'Serving ideas: over bitter greens (radicchio, kale, arugula, Belgian endives) with freshly grated parmesan, dress a Niçoise salad or as a dip for crusty bread', 'Tags: Dip, Fancy, Fish, Salad Dressing, Salty, Umami']

recipe_overview: Serves: 6 - 8 Prep Time: 5 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['2 tablespoons grated TJ’s Pecorino, Romano and Parmesan Cheese Blend', '3 tablespoons TJ’s Red Wine Vinegar', '1 teaspoon TJ’s Organic Sugar', '6-8 shakes TJ’s 21 Seasoning Salute', '1/4 teaspoon TJ’s Sea Salt, or to taste', '1/4 teaspoon TJ’s Ground Black Pepper, or to taste', '1/3 cup TJ’s Extra Virgin Olive Oil']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'In a small bowl, whisk together cheese, vinegar, sugar, 21 seasoning salute, salt, and pepper. Slowly whisk in oil until emulsified. Taste and adjust seasoning as desired. Makes about 1 cup of vinaigrette.', 'Serving ideas: mixed in a tortellini salad, or as a marinade for fish or chicken', 'Tags: Cheesy, Marinade, Salad Dressing']

recipe_overview: Serves: 3 - 5 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 5 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 bag TJ’s Shishito Peppers', '3 Tablespoons Spanish EVOO, divided', '2 Tablespoons Lime Juice', '2 Tablespoons TJ’s Plain Greek Yogurt', '2 TJ’s Premium Peeled Garlic Cloves', '1/4 teaspoon TJ’s Sea Salt, or to taste', '1/4 teaspoon TJ’s Ground Black Pepper, or to taste']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Pour 1 tablespoon olive oil in a heavy skillet over medium-high heat. Add the peppers and sauté about 3-5 minutes, turning occasionally until they blister on all sides. Remove peppers from heat and slice off the stems and discard. Combine shishito peppers, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 2 tablespoons lime juice, 2 tablespoons greek yogurt, 2 garlic cloves and salt and pepper in a blender. Pulse until desired consistency. Taste and adjust seasoning as desired. Makes about 1/2 cup of sauce.', 'Serving ideas: Dress a Southwestern salad (butter lettuce, corn, beans, tomatoes, red onion and tortilla chips), drizzle over shrimp tacos, or spread on a BLT sandwich', 'Tags: Roasted, Sauce, Spread']

recipe_overview: Serves: 4 - 6 Prep Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 Tablespoon TJ’s Red Wine Vinegar', '5 grinds TJ’s South African Smoke Seasoning (Seasonal)', '1 teaspoon TJ’s Dried Oregano', '3 TJ’s Premium and Peeled Garlic Cloves', '5 Tablespoons Spanish Organic EVOO, divided', '1/2 cup (packed) fresh TJ’s Cilantro', '1/4 cup (packed) fresh TJ’s Parsley']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Combine 1 tablespoon vinegar, 5 grinds South African seasoning, 1 teaspoon oregano, 3 garlic cloves and 2 tablespoons of EVOO in a blender or food processor. Pulse until garlic minces to desired consistency. Add cilantro and parsley and pulse a few more times until desired consistency. Pour mixture into a small bowl and stir in reserved 3 tablespoons of EVOO. Taste and adjust seasoning as desired. Makes about ½ cup of sauce.', 'Serving ideas: drizzled over a steak, gorgonzola and arugula salad, spoon over grilled salmon or bruschetta.', 'Tags: Colorful, Marinade, Sauce, Spring, Summer']

recipe_overview: Serves: 8 - 10 Prep Time: 15 Minutes Cooking Time: 15 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['Toasts', '1 TJ’s Baguette, cut into 1/4 inch slices', "3 large TJ’s Fresh Mozzarella Balls, cut into 1/4 inch slices or 5 slices of TJ's Pre-Sliced Fresh Mozzarella, cut in half", "5 Tablespoons TJ's Spanish Organic EVOO", 'Smokey Chimichurri Sauce', '2 Tablespoons TJ’s Red Wine Vinegar', '8 grinds TJ’s South African Smoke Seasoning (Seasonal)', '2 teaspoons TJ’s Dried Oregano', '6 TJ’s Premium and Peeled Garlic Cloves', '10 Tablespoons Spanish Organic EVOO, divided', '1 cup (packed) fresh TJ’s Cilantro', '1/2 cup (packed) fresh TJ’s Parsley']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'To make the chimichurri sauce: Combine 2 tablespoons vinegar, 8 grinds South African seasoning, 2 teaspoons oregano, 6 garlic cloves and 4 tablespoons of EVOO in a blender or food processor. Pulse until garlic minces to desired consistency. Add cilantro and parsley and pulse a few more times until desired consistency. Pour mixture into a bowl and stir in reserved 6 tablespoons of EVOO. Taste and adjust seasoning as desired. Makes about 1 cup of sauce. Set aside.', 'To prepare toasts: Brush olive oil on one side of each bread slice then grill face down until golden grill marks appear. Alternatively you can place them on a baking sheet and bake at 400 degrees for 15-20 minutes until they are crisp and browned. Place mozzarella slices on top each toast then spoon chimichurri sauce over the cheese. Serve. Makes about 20 toasts.', 'Tags: Bread, Cheesy, Colorful, Fancy, Meatless, Sauce, Spring, Summer']

recipe_overview: Serves: 5 Prep Time: 15 Minutes Cooking Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['Lentil Salad', '1 Tablespoon TJ’s California EVOO', '1/2 bag TJ’s Organic Tuscan Kale, chopped fine', '1 package TJ’s Steamed Lentils', '1 cup quartered TJ’s Baby Heirloom Tomatoes', 'Lemon-Mustard Vinaigrette', '1 small TJ’s Shallot, minced', '2 Tablespoons Lemon Juice', '1 Tablespoon TJ’s Rice Vinegar', '3 teaspoons TJ’s Dijon Mustard with White Wine', '1 teaspoon TJ’s Clover Honey', '1/4 teaspoon TJ’s Sea Salt, or to taste', '1/4 teaspoon TJ’s Ground Black Pepper, or to taste', '1/2 cup Extra Virgin California Estate Olive Oil']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'To make the vinaigrette: In a small bowl, whisk together shallot, lemon juice, vinegar, mustard, honey then season with salt and pepper. Slowly whisk in oil until emulsified. Taste and adjust seasoning as desired. Makes about 1 cup of vinaigrette. Set aside.', 'In a medium pan on medium heat, add 1 tablespoon of olive oil. Add chopped kale and sauté until wilted, about 3 minutes. Add bag of cooked lentils and stir until heated through, about 3 more minutes. Remove from heat and place into a large bowl. Add quartered tomatoes then gently fold in 1/4 cup of vinaigrette. Taste and add more vinaigrette if needed. This dish is best served warm, but it can also be prepared a day in advance and served cold.', 'Tags: Colorful, Meatless, Protein, Salad, Spring']

recipe_overview: Serves: 6 - 8 Prep Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 small TJ’s Shallot, minced', '2 Tablespoons Lemon Juice', '1 Tablespoon TJ’s Rice Vinegar', '3 teaspoons TJ’s Dijon Mustard with White Wine', '1 teaspoon TJ’s Clover Honey', '1/4 teaspoon TJ’s Sea Salt, or to taste', '1/4 teaspoon TJ’s Ground Black Pepper, or to taste', "1/2 cup TJ's Extra Virgin California Estate Olive Oil"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'In a small bowl, whisk together shallot, lemon juice, vinegar, mustard, honey then season with salt and pepper. Slowly whisk in oil until emulsified. Taste and adjust seasoning as desired. Makes about 1 cup of vinaigrette.', 'Serving suggestions: mix with warmed lentils, wilted kale and tomatoes, drizzle over grilled asparagus, or dress a baby spinach salad (with pistachios, beets, goat cheese and red onion).', 'Tags: No Cook, Salad, Spring, Tart']

recipe_overview: Serves: 6 - 8 Cooking Time: 10 - 15 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['6 slices TJ’s Uncured Apple Smoked Bacon', '1 bag TJ’s Frozen Mashed Potatoes', '1/3 cup Water, plus 2 tablespoons', '1/2 bag TJ’s Cruciferous Crunch Collection', 'Kerrygold Pure Irish Butter']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'In a large frying pan on medium heat, cook 6 slices of bacon. Set cooked bacon aside on a paper towel-lined plate. Discard all but 1 tablespoon of oil from the pan. Add bag of frozen mashed potato medallions and 1/3 cup of water. Cook over moderate heat, stirring frequently. After about 5 minutes, once potatoes begin to soften, add 1/2 bag cruciferous crunch and 2 additional tablespoons of water. Stir then cover to trap steam. Cook for another 2-3 minutes or so, stirring every so often, until greens soften a bit. Chop cooled bacon into small pieces then add to pan of potatoes. Serve right away with a pat of butter on top.', 'Tags: Colorful, Potatoes']

recipe_overview: Serves: 10 - 12 Prep Time: 20 Minutes Cooking Time: 15 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 (32 oz) container TJ’s Canola Oil', '2 pkgs TJ’s Fresh Ravioli (we used our Beef Bolognese variety)', '5 TJ’s Organic Brown Eggs', '1/2 cup TJ’s Milk', '2 cups TJ’s Unbleached All-Purpose Flour', '1 tsp TJ’s Sea Salt, divided', '1 tsp TJ’s Ground Black Pepper, divided', '2 cups TJ’s Organic Breadcrumbs', '1/2 jar TJ’s Creamy Tomato Basil Pasta Sauce', '1/4 cup freshly grated TJ’s Parmesan Cheese', '1 Tablespoon minced TJ’s Parsley']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'In a deep frying pan or pot, empty the container of canola oil. Save the container for easy disposal. Heat the oil on medium-high heat until it reaches 340-360 degrees on a deep-fry thermometer or until a pinch of breadcrumbs drops down the middle of the oil and quickly bobs to the top, turning golden brown.', 'Set up three dipping stations. In the first dish, whisk 5 eggs with 1/2 cup of milk. In a second dish, mix 2 cups of flour and ½ teaspoon each of salt and pepper. In a third dish, mix 2 cups of breadcrumbs with 1/2 teaspoon each of salt and pepper.', 'Dip each ravioli into the eggwash, first one side and then the other. Shake to remove excess. Next, dip the ravioli into the flour, coating all sides evenly then dip into the eggwash again. Finally, coat the ravioli in breadcrumbs. Set aside on a plate.', 'Begin heating 1/2 jar of pasta sauce in a small saucepan on low heat.', 'Using a slotted spoon, gently fry 3-4 breaded ravioli at a time. Depending on the temperature of your oil, fry for about 1-2 minutes per side until golden brown. Transfer ravioli to a paper towel-lined baking sheet to drain.', 'To serve, place marinara in a bowl and arrange fried ravioli on a plate. Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese and parsley and enjoy right away.', 'To dispose canola oil, wait until oil cools completely, drain back into the bottle over a trash can. Do not put oil down kitchen sink.', 'Tags: Big Game, Cheesy']

recipe_overview: Serves: 4 - 6 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 7 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 bag TJ’s Frozen Meatballs (we used the Turkey variety)', '1 bottle TJ’s Organic Sriracha and Roasted Garlic BBQ Sauce', '1 teaspoon chopped TJ’s Chives (optional)']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Empty meatball in a large microwave safe bowl. Cover with a lid or plate. Microwave for 4 minutes.', 'Meanwhile, in a medium saucepan, begin heating entire jar of Sriracha BBQ sauce on low, stirring occasionally.', 'Remove bowl of meatballs from microwave. Bowl will be hot, handle carefully. Add meatballs to saucepan and stir, coating meatballs on all sides with sauce. Continue to heat on low, about 3 minutes until bubbly.', 'Empty meatballs and sauce into a serving bowl. Garnish with chives and serve with toothpicks.', 'Tags: Big Game, Party, Sauce, Turkey']

recipe_overview: Serves: 3 - 5 Prep Time: 15 Minutes Cooking Time: 20 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 bag TJ’s Gluten Free Breaded Chicken Breast Nuggets', '2 TJ’s Jalapenos (optional)', '1 bottle TJ’s Sweet Chili Sauce', '1 box TJ’s Gluten Free Toaster Waffles']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 425° F. Spread frozen nuggets in a single layer on a baking sheet. Place on center rack of oven and begin baking for 10 minutes.', 'Meanwhile, for extra color, heat and crunch, trim the top off of 2 jalapenos. Using a sharp paring knife, core the inside of the pepper to remove seeds. Dispose the seeds. Slice the peppers in half lengthwise then slice into long thin strips. Slice across the strips for a small dice. Set aside.', 'Remove nugget tray from oven, flip nuggets and return to oven to cook an additional 10 minutes or to an internal temperature of 175°F to 180°F.', 'In a small saucepan, add entire bottle of chili sauce. Heat on low, stirring occasionally about 2-3 minutes or until warmed. Remove pan from heat and set aside.', 'While the chicken nuggets are finishing up cooking, place waffles directly onto the oven rack and heat for 2-3 minutes or until hot, crispy and golden brown.', 'Remove chicken and waffles from oven and let stand 1 minute. Slice the waffles into quarters, and begin assembling. Place one nugget on top of one waffle wedge, then spoon warmed chili sauce over the top of the chicken. Sprinkle with diced jalapeno then top with another waffle wedge. Secure with toothpicks if desired. Place finished sandwich bites onto a platter and serve!', 'Tags: Big Game, Chicken, Crunchy, Mini, Savory, Spicy']

recipe_name: Hot & Spicy Wings with Chunky Blue Cheese
recipe_overview: Serves: 3 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 5 - 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 bag TJ’s Hot & Spicy Chicken Wings Sections', '1 cup (about 12) TJ’s Organic Cut and Peeled Carrots', '3 stalks TJ’s Organic Celery Hearts', '1/3 cup TJ’s Chunky Blue Cheese Dressing & Dip', 'A handful of TJ’s Parsley (optional garnish)']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Place wings in a circle (leave space in the center) on a microwave safe plate. Microwave uncovered on high: FROZEN wings 7 to 9 minutes – THAWED wings 4 to 5 minutes or until heated through. Plate will be hot, remove carefully.', 'While wings are heating, rinse celery stalks, trim both ends and cut into thirds.', 'Once wings have cooled for a minute, arrange them on a platter, over a bed of parsley. Serve with a bowl of blue cheese dressing, celery sticks and carrots.', 'Tags: Big Game, Chicken, Dip']

recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 45 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["4 TJ's Sweet Potatoes", "1 Tbsp TJ's 100% Greek Kalamata Olive Oil", "2 cups TJ's Arugula", "4 TJ's Beets in Vinaigrette, julienned", "1 cup TJ's Crumbled Blue Cheese", "1/2 cup TJ's Roasted and Salted Pecans, chopped", "TJ's Balsamic Glaze, for garnish"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 425°F. Wash potatoes and pat dry. Rub olive oil over the skins then place potatoes directly on center rack of oven.', 'Bake potatoes for 45 minutes or until a fork easily pierces the skin. Remove from oven and slice down the center, halfway through, making sure not cut all the way through to the bottom.', 'In a medium bowl, combine arugula, sliced beets, blue cheese and salted pecans. Toss the salad gently with tongs, then divide evenly among sweet potatoes. Garnish with balsamic glaze. Enjoy!', 'Tags: Fancy, Meatless, Salad, Sweet Potato']

recipe_overview: Serves: 8 - 10 Prep Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 pkg TJ's Red & White Belgian Endives", "1 log TJ's Cranberry Chevre (seasonal), softened to room temperature", "1 pkg TJ's Raw Sliced Almonds"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Separate whole endive leaves from the base, rinse and pat dry. Spread cheese evenly on the individual endive leaves, then sprinkle with sliced almonds for garnish and a little crunch.', 'Tags: Colorful, Crunchy, Fancy, Meatless, No Cook, Party, Thanksgiving']

recipe_overview: Serves: 12 - 16 Prep Time: 30 Minutes Cooking Time: 12 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['Biscuits', "1 Bag or 18 oz. TJ's Frozen Mashed Sweet Potatoes (seasonal), defrosted", "1/4 tsp TJ's Ground Nutmeg (seasonal)", "2 Tbsp TJ's Brown Sugar", "1/2 tsp TJ's Ground Cinnamon", "1 tsp TJ's Pure Vanilla Extract", "6 slices TJ's Apple Smoked Bacon, cooked and crumbled", "4.5 cups TJ's Buttermilk Pancake & All-Purpose Baking Mix", "1/2 cup TJ's Milk", "3/4 stick TJ's Salted Butter, softened", 'Honey Butter', "2 parts TJ's Clarified Butter", "1 part your favorite TJ's Honey", 'Supplies', 'Flour for the board', '1.5 inch round cookie cutter']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 450°F. Mix honey and butter together and set aside. Place sweet potatoes in a large bowl and mix with nutmeg, brown sugar, cinnamon, and vanilla; taste and adjust seasoning. Add the bacon and baking mix and blend well. Add butter and milk to the mixture, stirring until soft dough forms. If dough is too sticky add more baking mix a little at a time until dough is soft, but no longer sticky.', 'Flour a work surface and place the dough onto the surface. Dust the top of the dough and your hands with flour, and press the dough into a 3/4-inch-thick rectangle. Sprinkle a small amount of additional flour on the top of the dough. Fold the dough over onto itself as if folding a napkin (also called a tri-fold). If necessary use a metal spatula to lift the dough off the counter and dust under it with flour, turn the dough 1/2 turn, dust the top with flour and roll the dough into a 3/4-inch-thick rectangle and repeat the tri-fold. Repeat this procedure one more time (three times in all). After the third turn and tri-fold, dust under and on top of the dough, if needed, and roll the dough into a 1/2-inch-thick rectangle.', 'Dip a 1.5 inch round cookie cutter in flour and cut out the biscuits; dip the cutter in flour between each biscuit. Press straight down to cut and lift straight up to remove; transfer the biscuits to a baking sheet; place biscuits about 1/2 inch apart.', 'Gently gather the scraps of dough left after cutting, pat and roll out once more; cut as many biscuits from the remaining dough as possible, then hand shape any remaining dough. Bake on center rack of oven for 10-12 minutes or until golden brown. Let stand 3 minutes. Serve warm with honey butter.', 'Biscuits are bite-sized, 1 serving is 3 biscuits. Makes 3 to 4 dozen.', 'Tags: Bacon, Baking, Bread, Sweet Potato, Thanksgiving']

recipe_overview: Serves: 2 Prep Time: 5 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['2 small (1 oz) slices TJ’s Multigrain Bread, toasted', '1/2 TJ’s Avocado', '1 can TJ’s Sardines in Oil']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Mash 1/4 of an avocado with a fork on one slice of toasted bread. Lay half (2oz) of the tin of sardines over the avocado, then drizzle a bit of the extra oil on top. Garnish with microgreens, cilantro or arugula if desired. Repeat on other slice of toast. Enjoy!', 'Tags: Bread, Protein, Seafood, Snack, Toast']

recipe_name: Stuffed Vine Tomatoes with Cheesy Hats
recipe_overview: Serves: 2 - 4 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 35 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['4 TJ’s Tomatoes on the Vine', '1/4 teaspoon TJ’s Sea Salt, or to taste', '1 Tbsp TJ’s 100% Greek Kalamata Olive Oil', '1 TJ’s Sweet Italian Sausage link, casing removed and crumbled', '1/2 cup chopped TJ’s Onion', '1 tsp minced TJ’s Garlic', '4 individual Sliced TJ’s Crimini Mushrooms (best looking for garnish), set aside', '1 cup Sliced TJ’s Crimini Mushrooms, chopped', '1 1/2 cups TJ’s Wild Rice, cooked according to package directions', '2 Tbsp dry TJ’s White Wine (optional)', '1/2 cup shredded TJ’s Gruyere cheese', '1/4 teaspoon TJ’s Ground Black Pepper, or to taste']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Pre-heat oven to 400°F. Slice tomatoes in half, and scoop out insides; set aside. Sprinkle cut sides with a small amount of salt and place over a rack, cut side down, to drain.', 'Heat skillet over medium-high heat; add oil; swirl. Add sausage and begin to brown. Separate out as many tomato seeds as possible and discard. Chop tomato insides. Add to sausage pan along with onions and garlic and sauté for one minute. Add mushrooms and sauté 2 to 3 minutes longer. Add rice; sauté until all ingredients are cooked tender; about an additional 3 or 4 minutes. Deglaze pan with white wine and cook off excess. Add pepper, taste and adjust seasoning.', 'Stuff tomato bottoms with rice mixture; top with cheese and a sliced mushroom. Stuff tomato tops with cheese. Place all in a small enough pan to keep them as upright as possible and into oven to bake until cheese is melted, golden and bubbly. About 10 to 15 minutes. Serve each tomato bottom with a cheesy top.', 'Tags: Cheesy, Fancy, Grains']

recipe_overview: Serves: 4
recipe_ingredients: ["1 large head TJ's Iceberg Lettuce, cut into several wedges", '3/4 cup TJ’s Organic Ranch Dressing', '3/4 cup halved TJ’s Mini Pearl Grape Tomatoes', "2 TJ's Green Onions, white and green parts sliced thin", '1/2 cup TJ’s Crumbled Blue Cheese, crumbled and divided', "1 cup cooked and crumbled TJ's Uncured Black Forest Bacon"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Mix half of the blue cheese with the ranch dressing. Set aside. Place wedges of lettuce on a large serving dish. Pour dressing over saald and top with tomatoes, green onions, remaining cheese, and crumbled bacon. Serve family style.', 'Tags: Bacon, Crunchy, Fancy, Salad, Summer']

recipe_overview: Serves: 6 Prep Time: 15 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1/3 cup diced TJ's Red Onion", "2 tablespoons TJ's Unfiltered Apple Cider Vinegar", "1 teaspoon TJ's Organic Sugar", "1 bag TJ's Shredded Cabbage", "1 cup TJ's Jumbo Raisin Medley OR TJ's Organic Thompson Raisins", "2 tablespoons TJ's Real Mayonnaise", "TJ's Sea Salt & Ground Black Pepper, or to taste", "2 ripe TJ's Peaches, diced"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'In a small bowl, combine diced red onion, vinegar and sugar; set aside to "quick-pickle" the onions for a few minutes.', 'Drain the onions, reserving vinegar solution for the dressing. In a medium bowl, combine the shredded cabbage, raisins, and onions; set aside.', 'Add mayonnaise, salt and pepper to the "quick-pickle" vinegar solution and stir until well incorporated. Gently toss the dressing with the cabbage mixture, then cover and chill. Fold in diced peaches just before serving.', 'Tags: No Cook, Salad, Summer']

recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Prep Time: 15 Minutes Cooking Time: 5 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["3 large TJ's Premium Peeled Garlic Cloves", "3/4 cup TJ's Mayonnaise", "1/2 Tbsp TJ's Olive Oil", "1 tsp TJ's Smoked Paprika", "1 tsp TJ's Lemon juice, more to taste", "1/4 teaspoon TJ's Sea Salt, or to taste", "1/4 teaspoon TJ's Ground Black Pepper, or to taste"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Add garlic to a small saucepan, cover by 1/2 inch with cold water, place over medium flame and poach until water comes to a boil. As soon as the water boils, remove from heat, steep for one minute, drain and rinse with cold water to stop the cooking. Let garlic cool completely. Add the garlic, mayonnaise, olive oil, smoked paprika, and lemon juice to a blender or food processor and process until smooth. Do not over mix. Taste and adjust lemon if desired and then add salt, and pepper to taste. Refrigerate to help marry flavors.', 'Tags: Dip, Sauce, Spread']

recipe_overview: Serves: 4 - 8 Prep Time: 15 Minutes Cooking Time: 45 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['Artichokes', '1 package TJ’s Globe Artichokes (4 count - Seasonal)', '4 TJ’s Lemons', '1 package TJ’s Premium Peeled Garlic Cloves', "2 Tbsp TJ's Extra Virgin California Estate Olive Oil", '1/4 teaspoon TJ’s Sea Salt, or to taste', '1/4 teaspoon TJ’s Ground Black Pepper, or to taste', '1 batch Smoked Aioli, for dipping (optional)', 'Supplies', 'Heavy duty tin foil']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 425°F. Trim half an inch off the top of each artichoke, and cut in half lengthwise, being mindful of the spines. Using a sharp pairing knife, cut out the non-edible purple leaves and the hairy fibers in the center, forming a pocket.', 'Working in batches, place artichokes, leaf-side down, in a shallow bowl and squeeze half a lemon over the outside and inside of each artichoke, then place one or two garlic cloves in the center pocket. Drizzle the inside of each with half a tablespoon of olive oil and sprinkle liberally with salt and pepper. Tightly wrap each artichoke half in large, individual foil pieces.', 'Arrange foil-wrapped artichokes in a large baking dish. Bake for 45 minutes until tender. Once cool enough to handle, being mindful of the steam, remove artichokes from foil. Serve immediately with smoked aioli for dipping.', 'Tags: Fancy, Roasted, Seasonal, Spring']

recipe_description: Charred romaine hearts make an excellent foil for sweet, smoky pork belly and tangy balsamic vinaigrette.
recipe_overview: Serves: 3 - 6 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 30 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 pack TJ's Romaine Hearts, sliced in half lengthwise, rinsed and dried", "4 Tbsp TJ's Balsamic Vinaigrette", "6 oz TJ's Fully Cooked Pork Belly, diced", "1/4 cup TJ's Crumbled Blue Cheese, or to taste", "1/4 teaspoon TJ's Ground Black Pepper, or to taste"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Add pork belly to a 12" non stick skillet over medium heat and brown until crisp on all sides and fat is rendered, about 5 or 6 minutes. Transfer to a paper towel and set aside to cool. Heat grill or grill pan to medium-high. Working in batches, place romaine halves cut-side down on grill, and cook until charred, turn once and continue to grill until slightly wilted, about 4 minutes. Transfer lettuce cut-side up to plates, and season with pepper; drizzle with dressing, and sprinkle with blue cheese and pork belly “croutons.” Serve right away.', 'Tags: Fancy, Grilling, Pork, Salad, Summer']

recipe_overview: Serves: 10 - 15 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 5 - 6 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1/2 tsp TJ’s Sea Salt, more to taste', '1/4 tsp TJ’s Smoked Paprika', '1/4 tsp TJ’s Ground Cinnamon', '1/4 tsp TJ’s Ground Cumin', '1/8 tsp Cayenne Pepper (optional)', '2 Tbsp TJ’s Clarified Butter or TJ’s 100% Canola Oil', '3 Tbsp TJ’s Organic Brown Sugar', '2 cups TJ’s Raw Shelled Pumpkin Seeds', '1 1/2 Tbsp fresh TJ’s Rosemary Leaves, roughly chopped']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Mix salt, paprika, cinnamon, cumin and cayenne together in a small bowl. Set aside. Warm butter (or oil) and sugar together in a large skillet over medium heat; add pumpkin seeds and spice mixture to pan and stir until sugar is melted and the seeds are fragrant, 5 to 6 minutes (add a lid when seeds start to pop). Remove from heat, add fresh rosemary and sprinkle on additional salt (if desired) and toss. Immediately spread seeds out on a parchment-lined baking sheet and cool completely before serving.', 'Tags: Fall, Gift, Party, Seasonal, Snack']

recipe_description: This cool, crunchy summer slaw pairs perfectly with BBQ chicken or grilled shrimp skewers.
recipe_overview: Serves: 6 - 8 Prep Time: 20 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['2 bags TJ’s Organic Shredded Green & Red Cabbage with Orange Carrots', '1 TJ’s Fuji Apple, julienned', '1 cup TJ’s Dried Cranberries', '4-5 Tbsp TJ’s Carolina Gold BBQ Sauce (seasonal)', '2 Tbsp TJ’s Real Mayonnaise (or TJ’s Greek Yogurt)', '1/4 teaspoon TJ’s Sea Salt, or to taste', "1/4 teaspoon TJ's Ground Black Pepper, or to taste"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'To make the dressing, combine BBQ sauce and mayonnaise in a small bowl, mixing a few tablespoons at a time until you reach the desired flavor. Sprinkle dressing with salt and pepper. Combine the remaining ingredients in a medium bowl and toss with the dressing. Chill 30 minutes prior to serving.', 'Tags: Meatless, No Cook, Salad']

recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Prep Time: 15 Minutes Cooking Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["2-3 TJ's Peaches", "1 cup TJ's Apple Juice or TJ's Country Peach Juice", "1 cup TJ's Apple Cider Vinegar", "1/4 cup your favorite TJ's Honey", "2 Tbsp peeled & chopped TJ's Ginger", "1/2 tsp TJ's Ground Cinnamon"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'To peel the peaches, blanch in boiling water for about 2 minutes then immediately transfer with a slotted spoon to a bowl of ice water. Once peaches have cooled a minute or two, gently slide the skins off with your fingertips. Cut peaches in half, remove pits then cut into quarters. To make the pickling brine, combine fruit juice, vinegar, honey, ginger and cinnamon in a medium sized nonreactive pot (any pot EXCEPT that made of aluminum, cast iron or copper). Bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer for 3-5 minutes. To pickle the peaches, add peach segments and cook just until tender, about 3-5 minutes. Carefully remove peaches with a slotted spoon and transfer to a glass jar with a resealable lid. Let pickling mixture cool slightly and then pour over peaches. Seal with lid and store in the refrigerator. Ready to eat immediately, but will develop more flavor overnight. Each batch should keep for an additional week or two in the refrigerator. If any off flavors or smells develop, or if you notice fermentation, please discard. Pairing & Serving Suggestions: Perfect served alongside roasted chicken or ham, warmed and spooned over vanilla ice cream, or even pureed and mixed into a cocktail (try it with sparkling grape juice, prosecco or bourbon)...', 'Tags: Fruit, Gift, Pickled']

recipe_name: Asian Inspired Philly Smoked Salmon Hors d'oeuvres
recipe_overview: Serves: 10 Prep Time: 20 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 tub TJ's Whipped Cream Cheese", "1 package TJ's Smoked Sockeye Salmon", "1 package TJ's Roasted Seaweed Snacks", "1 bag TJ's Savory Thin Rice Crackers", "1 bunch TJ's Green Onions (green sections only)", "1/4 teaspoon TJ's Ground Black Pepper, or to taste", 'You will also need 20 wooden toothpicks']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Using a clean dish cloth, wrap 10 to 15 Savory Thin Rice Crackers. Alternatively you can use a resealable plastic bag. Cover and smash into tiny pieces. Wash and clean green onions then cut into 2" sections. Lay one slice of smoked salmon on top of one slice of seaweed. Spread a thin layer of cream cheese on top of the salmon. Sprinkle with rice cracker bits and season with freshly cracked black pepper. Top with one green onion section. Roll into a tight roll with the seaweed side being on the outside and the cream cheese side on the inside. Keep the roll intact with a toothpick. Serve immediately as the rice crackers will get soggy if left out for too long. Recipe Credit: Trader Joe\'s Stick It! 2013 HiiP Recipe Contest Featuring Food On A Stick Finalist - Shaun Wu.', 'Tags: No Cook']

recipe_description: Trader Joe's Caramelized Onion Dip is one of the smoothest, creamiest onion dips we’ve ever tasted—and believe us, we've tasted quite a few. That’s probably due to the triple play of sour cream, cream cheese and mayo at its base. Pumping up the onion flavor are real, fresh, caramelized yellow and white onions, something we haven’t encountered in other pre-made dips. What a difference!
recipe_overview: Serves: 10 - 15 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 20 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['Sliders', "1 bag TJ's Arugula", "1 container TJ's Caramelized Onion Dip", "2 cups crushed TJ's Ridge Cut Salt & Pepper Potato Chips", "2 containers TJ's Buttermilk Biscuits", "1 bag TJ's Party Size Mini Meatballs, thawed", 'Supplies', '25-30 wooden toothpicks']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Pre-heat oven to 350°F. You will be baking meatballs and biscuits in the oven at the same time. Place thawed mini meatballs on cookie sheet and bake in oven according to package directions.', 'While the meatballs are baking, open the containers of biscuits, lay individual biscuits next to one another on a baking tray and lightly press them together while flattening to about 1/2" thickness. Using a cookie cutter with a 1 1/2" diameter, (an empty 6 oz. can of TJ\'s Tomato Paste does the job well) cut about 25 or 30 biscuit rounds. Remove excess dough and bake according to package directions for 14-16 minutes. Both the meatballs and slider biscuits should be finished at the same time. Take out of oven to slightly cool.', "While meatballs and biscuits are cooling, place half bag of potato chips into baggie and crush. You don't want them to be finely crushed; you want tiny chips to be evident in the spread. Spoon caramelized onion dip into a bowl and slowly fold in crushed chips until the chips are coated. You may not use all the chips.", 'Cut each biscuit in half horizontally, forming a hamburger bun. On bottom half of bun place small dollop of onion/chip spread, then a mini meatball, one or two Arugula leaves and top with the other biscuit half. Place toothpick through slider, serve and enjoy!', "Recipe Credit: Trader Joe's Stick It! 2013 HiiP Recipe Contest Featuring Food On A Stick 2nd Place Winner - Patricia Jensen", 'Tags: Burgers, Party']

recipe_overview: Serves: 4 - 5 Cooking Time: 15 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['Shrimp and Grits', "1 bag TJ's Frozen Shrimp (Jumbo, Peeled, Deveined, Tail On), Defrosted", "1 log TJ's Organic Polenta", "1 package TJ's Chicken Andouille Sausage", "TJ's South African Seasoning Blend (seasonal)", "TJ's Canola Oil Spray", "TJ's Sriracha Sauce (For Dipping)", 'Supplies', '10-12 Wooden Skewers']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Remove polenta from casing and slice lengthwise down the center, then slice each half into half-moon shapes about 1/2" thick. Remove sausage from packaging and slice each link on the diagonal at same thickness. Remove thawed shrimp from packaging and season with Trader Joe’s South African seasoning blend on each side.', 'Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat, and spray liberally with canola oil. Saute polenta slices until golden brown, turning as necessary, and remove polenta from pan. Re-spray if necessary, and add sausage slices. When sausage is just starting to brown, add shrimp to the pan, and cook until opaque. Remove sausage and shrimp from pan.', 'Thread polenta slices, cooked shrimp, and sausage slices onto skewers, alternating between each ingredient. Serve with sriracha sauce for dipping.', "Recipe Credit: Trader Joe's Stick It! 2013 HiiP Recipe Contest Featuring Food On A Stick 3rd Place Winner - Laura Wehrmeyer."]

recipe_overview: Serves: 5 - 6 Cooking Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 Tbsp TJ's Unsalted Butter", "1/2 cup diced TJ's Red Onion", "1 package TJ's Frozen Roasted Corn", "1/2 package (4 oz.) TJ's Feta", "1/4 cup chopped TJ's Organic Cilantro", "1/4 tsp TJ's Red Cayenne Pepper", "2 TJ's Limes", "1/4 teaspoon TJ's Ground Black Pepper, or to taste"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Melt butter in a large frying pan. Saute diced onion for 2-3 minutes until it softens. Add frozen corn and heat 6-7 minutes, until warm. Chop half of the package of feta into small crumbles, it should be about 1 cup. Add feta, cilantro, cayenne pepper and the juice of two limes, to the corn and stir. Add pepper to taste. Serve warm.', 'Tags: Corn, Meatless']

recipe_overview: Serves: 6 - 8 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 package TJ’s Sliced Halloumi Cheese (seasonal)', "1 package TJ’s Watermelon Spears or 1/4 of a TJ's Watermelon, cubed", '1 package TJ’s Fresh Basil Leaves', '1 container TJ’s Black Mission Figs', '2 Tbsp TJ’s Balsamic Glaze']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Cook cheese according to package instructions, remove from pan and cut each slice in half. Slice the watermelon spears into thirds. Assemble 6-8 wooden skewers as follows… Cheese, watermelon, fig, basil. Repeat. Drizzle balsamic glaze over each stick and enjoy!', 'Tags: Party, Refreshing']

recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Prep Time: 20 Minutes Cooking Time: 20 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1/4 cup TJ's Unbleached All-Purpose Flour", "1 package TJ's Plain Pizza Dough", '1 TJ’s Egg', '1 tsp Water', "1 wedge TJ's Pesto Gouda Cheese"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Remove dough from package and let rest on a floured work surface for 10-15 minutes. Preheat oven to 425°F. Spray a large baking sheet with cooking spray, or line with parchment paper. In a small bowl, beat egg with water. Set aside. Roll dough into a large rectangle. Cut dough lengthwise into 4 strips with a pizza cutter. Spread cheese along one edge of a dough strip. Lightly brush the other edge of the strip with egg wash, then stretch the dough over the filling and roll until dough is closed. Repeat for remaining strips. Transfer rolls to baking sheet, seam side down. To make the pretzel shape, form each roll into a “U”, twist the ends twice around one another, then overlap the ends over the bottom of the “U”. Generously brush the egg mixture over the top of the shaped pretzel and underneath where the dough overlaps. Bake 18 to 20 minutes, until the tops of pretzels turn golden brown.', 'Tags: Cheesy, Meatless, Pizza, Snack']

recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Prep Time: 2 Minutes Cooking Time: 35 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 package TJ's Cut and Peeled Butternut Squash or Butternut Squash Zig-Zags", "4 tablespoons TJ's Salted Butter, melted", "2 tablespoons TJ's Organic Light Brown Sugar", "1 teaspoon TJ's Organic Maple Sugar", "1/2 teaspoon TJ's Sea Salt"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 400º F. Toss all ingredients and spread into a single layer in a roasting pan. Cook for approximately 20 minutes. Turn squash with a spatula and continue cooking for 15 minutes or until squash is tender', 'Tags: Autumn, Roasted']

recipe_overview: Serves: 4 - 6 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 15 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["8 medium sized TJ's Organic Gold Potatoes, peeled and cut into one inch cubes", "1 tablespoon TJ's Chives, chopped", "2 tablespoons TJ's Extra Virgin Olive Oil", "1 teaspoon TJ's 100% Spanish Organic Extra Virgin Garlic Flavored Olive Oil", '1/2 teaspoon TJ’s Sea Salt', '1 tablespoon TJ’s Spices of the World, Smoked Paprika']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Place cut potatoes into a pot. Add enough water to cover the potatoes. Bring water to a boil. Cook potatoes until they start to become tender. Drain and place in large mixing bowl. Add chives, olive oil, garlic oil, salt and paprika. Gently toss and serve.', 'Tags: Meatless, Potatoes']

recipe_overview: Serves: 6 Prep Time: 15 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 large TJ's Avocado, diced", "1 jar TJ's Corn and Chile Tomato-less Salsa", "1 can TJ's Black Beans, drained and rinsed", "1/2 container TJ's fresh Sugar Plum Tomatoes (or other small cherry tomatoes)", "1/2 TJ's Orange Bell Pepper, diced", "TJ's Cilantro Salad Dressing, to taste", "1/4 teaspoon TJ's Sea Salt, or to taste", '1/4 teaspoon TJ’s Ground Black Pepper, or to taste']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Combine all ingredients in a bowl and toss with dressing, to taste. Add salt and pepper, to taste. Refrigerate for at least one hour to marry flavors.', 'Tags: Colorful, Corn, Meatless, Salad']

recipe_overview: Serves: 4 - 6 Cooking Time: 25 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 cup TJ's Organic Quinoa", "16 oz. TJ's Pineapple Juice (refrigerated) or 2 cans TJ's 100% Pineapple Juice (shelf-stable)", "1 tablespoon TJ's Grapeseed Oil", "1 cup TJ's Pineapple Tidbits", "1 TJ's Red Bell Pepper, chopped", "1 TJ's Green Onion, chopped", "1/4 teaspoon TJ's Sea Salt", "1/4 teaspoon TJ's Crushed Red Chile Pepper"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Prepare quinoa according to package instructions replacing water with pineapple juice. Coat skillet with grapeseed oil. Add frozen pineapple and pepper. Sauté until the pineapple and pepper soften. Add green onion, salt and red chile pepper. Sauté for an additional two minutes. Combine pineapple mixture with quinoa and serve.', 'Tags: Fruit, Meatless']

recipe_overview: Serves: 10 Cooking Time: 5 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1/2 cup TJ's Unsalted Crunchy Almond Butter", '1/2 cup Water', "2 teaspoons TJ's Organic Toasted Sesame Oil", "4 tablespoons TJ's Seasoned Rice Vinegar", "2 teaspoons Juice of 1 TJ's Lime", '1/4 teaspoon TJ’s Crushed Red Chile Pepper']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Mix all ingredients together. Serve as a dipping sauce or use as a marinade for chicken, shrimp or veggies.', 'Tags: Dip, Marinade, No Cook, Sauce, Thai']

recipe_overview: Serves: 4 - 6 Prep Time: 25 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["3 cups TJ's Tri Color Quinoa, cooked", "1 can TJ's Organic Black Beans, drained and rinsed", "1 cup TJ's Mango, peeled, pitted (or defrosted from frozen) & cut into bite size pieces", "1 TJ's Red Bell Pepper, chopped", "2 TJ's Green Onions, sliced", "1/4 cup TJ's Fresh Cilantro, chopped", "1/4 cup TJ's Extra Virgin California Estate Olive Oil", "Juice of 1 TJ's Lime & 1/2 teaspoon of zest", "1/4 teaspoon TJ's Sea Salt, or to taste", "1/4 teaspoon TJ's Ground Black Pepper, or to taste"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'In a large bowl, combine quinoa, black beans, mango, bell pepper, green onions and cilantro. In a separate smaller bowl, whisk olive oil, lime zest and lime juice. Drizzle over quinoa salad and toss to distribute evenly. Add salt and pepper to taste. Chill and serve.', 'Tags: Fruit, Meatless, Protein']

recipe_overview: Serves: 8 - 10 Prep Time: 15 Minutes Cooking Time: 35 - 45 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 cup TJ's Dried Cranberries", "3 cups TJ's Turkey Broth", "1 stick TJ's Unsalted Butter", "1 container TJ's Mirepoix", "1 box TJ's Cornbread Stuffing Mix", "2 packages TJ's Peeled & Cooked Chestnuts, coarsely chopped", "1/4 teaspoon TJ's Ground Black Pepper, or to taste"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 350°F. Combine cranberries with one cup of turkey broth and set aside. Add butter to skillet and melt. Add veggies and sauté until soft; about 10 to 15 minutes. Place bread cubes from stuffing mix in medium-large bowl. Add cooked veggies to bowl; add broth with cranberries; add chopped chestnuts and mix well. Add additional broth, one cup at a time, and continue to mix until all bread is moist. Season with pepper. Add contents of seasoning packet, to taste, and mix until well combined. Place in a 9" x 13" (approx. 4 qt.) casserole dish and bake for 35 to 45 minutes.', 'Tags: Thanksgiving']

recipe_overview: Serves: 8 - 12 Prep Time: 15 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 package TJ's Hard Cooked Eggs", "2 tablespoon TJ's Avocado’s Number Guacamole", "2 strips of TJ's Grilled Chicken Breast Strips, diced", "1 package TJ's Grape Tomatoes, diced", "4 pieces TJ's Fully Cooked Uncured Bacon, crumbled", "1 bag TJ's Organic Romaine Lettuce"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Slice eggs in half lengthwise and scoop yolks into a bowl. Mash yolks and stir in guacamole and diced chicken. Spoon yolk mixture into egg halves. Layer lettuce leaves on a platter and arrange stuffed eggs on top. Sprinkle diced grape tomatoes and crumbled bacon on top of eggs. Serve chilled.', 'Tags: Eggs, No Cook, Protein']

recipe_overview: Serves: 10 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 45 Minutes - 1 Hour
recipe_ingredients: ["3 cups TJ's Unbleached All-Purpose Flour, sifted", '3 teaspoons Baking Powder', "1/4 teaspoons TJ's Sea Salt", "1/2 cup TJ's Sugar", "1 cup TJ's Thompson Raisins", "1 TJ's Organic Brown Egg", '1 1/4 cup TJ’s Milk', "2 tablespoons TJ's Unsalted Butter, softened"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 375°F (350°F if using a glass pan). Grease an 8-inch square baking pan, set aside. ', 'Mix (by hand) all dry ingredients together in one bowl, egg and milk in another bowl. Mix wet and dry together, then add butter. Pour into prepared baking pan and sprinkle a bit of sugar on top of dough.', 'Bake on center rack of oven for 45-60 minutes. Let cool… if you can. Enjoy!', "Tags: Baking, Bread, St Patrick's Day"]

recipe_name: Teeny Tiny Potatoes with Sweet Roasted Garlic
recipe_overview: Serves: 3 - 4 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 30 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1/2 pound TJ's Teeny Tiny Potatoes", "2 cloves TJ's Peeled Garlic (or more, if you like)", "4 tbsp TJ's Extra Virgin Olive Oil", "1/4 teaspoon TJ's Sea Salt, or to taste", "1/4 teaspoon TJ's Ground Black Pepper, or to taste"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 325°. Wrap garlic in a piece of foil with 1 tbsp of olive oil and roast in the oven until soft; about 30 minutes. At the same time, place potatoes on a baking sheet and into the oven - bake until tender, about 30 minutes. Remove garlic from oven, mash and mix with remainder of olive oil; place in a mixing dish and set aside. Remove potatoes from oven and add to bowl and gently toss with mashed garlic mixture. Toss salt and pepper over potatoes to taste. Serve immediately. Enjoy!', 'Tags: Meatless, Potatoes, Roasted']

recipe_overview: Serves: 6
recipe_ingredients: ["1 package TJ's Mini Pearl Grape Tomatoes", "1 package TJ's Organic Basil, cut into strips", "1 package TJ's Ciliegine Mozzarella", "1 bottle TJ's Balsamic Vinaigrette", "1/4 teaspoon TJ's Sea Salt, or to taste", "1/4 teaspoon TJ's ground Black Pepper, or to taste"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Rinse Tomatoes and Basil. Layer Tomato, Basil and Mozzarella on a toothpick. Season with Salt & Pepper. Serve with Balsamic Vinaigrette for dipping.', 'Tags: Fancy, Italian, Meatless, Mini, No Cook, Party']

recipe_description: A perfect autumn morning calls for a perfect autumn drink, and for our money, nothing fits that bill quite like our new, delightfully unique Maple Espresso Black Tea. Made with a blend of select black & herbal tea leaves, natural maple flavor, and ground espresso beans, a steaming latte made with this Tea is just the thing to help turn a perfect autumn morning into a perfect autumn day.
recipe_overview: Serves: 1 Prep Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["2 TJ's Maple Espresso Black Tea Blend teabags", 'Your favorite milk or non-dairy beverage, warmed ']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Brew 2 tea bags in 1/3 cup of hot water and steep for 8 minutes. Remove tea bags and fill rest of the cup with warm milk or non-dairy beverage. Sweeten if desired.', 'Tags: Coffee, Fall, Maple, Tea']

recipe_description: We’ve been selling orchards full of Trader Joe’s Spiced Cider for more than 20 years, and we anxiously anticipate its return, year after year. This fall-favorite is made exclusively for us with the juice of bursting-with-flavor apples, and brewed with spices like cinnamon, allspice and cloves. Just when you think the flavor has fully revealed itself, you discover a subtle hint of citrus at the finish that really pleases the palate, making it the perfect addition to a cozy, fall-inspired cocktail recipe with a robust bourbon whiskey.
recipe_overview: Serves: 1 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 5 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["5 ounces TJ's Spiced Cider (seasonal)", "1.5 ounces (1 shot) TJ's Sour Mash Tennessee Bourbon Whiskey OR High Rye Bourbon", "1 TJ's Mandarin", "1 TJ's Organic Cinnamon Stick, for garnish (optional)"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Warm cider in a small sauce pan over medium heat, just until simmering (or, heat cider in a microwave-safe mug). Stir in bourbon and remove from heat.', 'Pour warm spiked cider in a mug or other heatproof glass. As it cools slightly, slice a mandarin in half crosswise. Squeeze the juice of a mandarin half into spiked cider. Slice the other mandarin half. Garnish with mandarin slices and a cinnamon stick. Bottoms up!', 'Tags: Apple, Cocktails, Fall, Liquor, Thanksgiving']

recipe_description: The rich flavor of Trader Joe’s Non-Dairy Maple Oat Beverage adds warm, toasty notes and maple-y sweetness to every sip. Creamy and dreamy on its own, it's also fantastic in a fall-inspired latte with Trader Joe's Autumn Maple Coffee (don't forget the Pumpkin Spice Batons for dipping!).
recipe_overview: Serves: 1 Prep Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 part TJ's Non-Dairy Maple Oat Beverage (seasonal)", "1 part freshly brewed TJ's Autumn Maple Coffee (seasonal)", "TJ's Maple Syrup, for garnish (optional)"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Warm oat beverage in the microwave or a small saucepan. Use a frother or small whisk and heartily whip oat beverage until slightly foamy.', 'Add one part beverage and one part hot coffee to a mug. Drizzle with maple syrup and enjoy.', 'Tags: Coffee, Fall, Maple, Non-Dairy']

recipe_description: Dalgona coffee is the “be-your-own-barista” beverage that’s been sweeping social media during this past season of staying home. Stateside, it seemed like this four-ingredient, whipped wonder sprung onto the scene suddenly, but in its native South Korea, dalgona is nothing new. Either way, as it turns out, our super-soluble Trader Joe's Instant Coffee is an ideal ingredient for this cool, creamy, coffee concoction!
recipe_overview: Serves: 1 Prep Time: 5 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["2 teaspoons TJ's Instant Coffee", "2 teaspoons TJ's Organic Cane Sugar", '2 teaspoons hot water', 'TJ’s Unsweetened Non-Dairy Hemp Beverage (or milk, or your favorite non-dairy beverage)', "TJ's Ground Cinnamon (optional)"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Combine coffee & sugar in a mixing bowl and add hot water. Using a round whisk or an electric hand mixer set on high, whip vigorously until mixture appears light & fluffy (about 2-3 minutes if whipping by hand).', 'Fill a glass with ice. Add milk or non-dairy beverage until glass is approx. ¾ full. Fill remainder of glass with fluffy coffee mixture, top with an optional sprinkle of cinnamon, and enjoy!', "Here's a fun video showing the process:", 'Tags: Coffee, Hemp, Non-Dairy']

recipe_description: Trader Joe’s Mango & Cream Bars come to us from the Land Down Under, where they’re made using Australian Kensington Pride Mangos, cream, and cane sugar. Each small, stick-less, gluten free bar is just the right size for satisfying a sweet tooth. Their sorbet-to-sweet-cream split is about 70/30—an ideal ratio for a standalone summer treat or, as it turns out, a frozen, creamsicle-y cocktail with a kick…
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 - 6 Prep Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['TJ’s Chile Lime Seasoning', '1 TJ’s Lime, cut into wedges', 'Juice of 4 TJ’s Limes, divided', '4 oz. tequila (silver or blanco)', '4 oz. TJ’s Mango Nectar', '6 TJ’s Mango & Cream Bars', '4-5 cups ice', '2 TJ’s Jalapeños, sliced']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Prep the glasses: Fill a small saucer with chile lime seasoning. Fill another small saucer with half of the lime juice.
