One by one, holding glasses upside down, dip rims in lime juice, then in seasoning; twist until well coated.', 'Prep the drink: Add remaining lime juice, tequila, mango nectar, ice cream bars & ice to blender. Blend until smooth. Fill glasses and garnish w/ jalapeño & lime. Serve immediately.', 'If you’re jonesing for some extra spice, add jalapeño slices to taste; if you prefer a mocktail to a cocktail, substitute tequila with the juice of an additional lime and 2 additional ounces of mango nectar.', 'Tags: Cocktails, Frozen, Liquor, Mango, Summer']

recipe_description: Trader Joe’s Raspberry & Cream Bars come to us from the Land Down Under, where they’re made using sun ripened raspberries, natural vanilla flavor (derived from real vanilla beans), cream, and cane sugar. Each small, stick-less, gluten free bar is just the right size for satisfying a sweet tooth. Their sorbet-to-sweet-cream split is an even 50/50—an ideal ratio for a standalone summer treat or, as it turns out, a frozen, creamsicle-y cocktail with a bit of basil!
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 - 6 Prep Time: 15 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['TJ’s Organic Cane Sugar', 'Zest of 1 TJ’s Lemon', 'Juice of 2 TJ’s Lemons, divided', '1 Package TJ’s Organic Basil', '8 oz. white rum', '6 TJ’s Raspberry & Cream Bars', '1 Package (6 oz.) TJ’s Raspberries', '4-5 cups ice']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Prep the glasses: Fill a small saucer with sugar. Fill another small saucer with half of the lime juice. One by one, holding glasses upside down, dip rims in lemon juice, then in sugar; twist until well coated.', 'Prep the drink: In a small bowl, muddle 16 large basil leaves with rum. Strain and pour into blender with remaining half of lemon juice, raspberries, ice cream bars, and ice. Blend until smooth. Fill glasses and garnish with basil leaves and lemon zest. Serve immediately.', 'Option: if you prefer a mocktail to a cocktail, muddle basil with the juice of an additional lemon and add an additional ice cream bar to blender.', 'Tags: Cocktails, Lemon, Liquor, Summer']

recipe_description: The Brazilian supplier of our Acerola Puree Packets harvests ripe, organic acerola then purées the fruit and strains out the seeds. They add nothing to the fruit. The result is a smooth, very tangy pulp that will add serious zip to your smoothies and juices. Not only that, it will add serious vitamin C to your diet—each of our 3.5-ounce packets of frozen Unsweetened Organic Acerola Puree delivers a whopping 1180% of the daily recommended value of vitamin C!
recipe_overview: Serves: 2 Prep Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 small TJ's Banana", "1 cup Trader Joe's Orange Juice", "1/2 cup TJ's Shredded Carrot", "1/2 cup TJ's Greek Yogurt", "1 cup frozen TJ's Pineapple Tidbits", "2 TJ's Organic Acerola Puree Packets"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Add banana, OJ, carrot and yogurt to blender. Blend on high until carrot is well blended, 2-3 minutes. Add pineapple and acerola packets and blend just until smooth. Divide among two glasses and enjoy.', 'Tags: Acerola, Fruit, On-the-go, Smoothie, Summer']

recipe_description: Each Trader Joe’s Absolutely Acerola Juice Shot contains the cold-pressed juice of 12 acerola cherries. That’s it! And just a single, two fluid-ounce serving (one bottle) contains 1010% of your daily recommend amount of vitamin C. (Just to be clear, we did not accidentally add an extra zero. It really is over 1000%!) Jumpstart your day with a straight shot, or add to smoothies and mixed drinks for a tangy zip of bright flavor.
recipe_overview: Serves: 1 Prep Time: 15 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 TJ's Acerola Juice Shot", "1/2 teaspoon TJ's Chia Seeds", "6 ounces TJ's Mango Nectar", "4 ounces TJ's Unsweetened Coconut Beverage", "2 tablespoons crumbled TJ's Freeze Dried Strawberries", "TJ's Lime wedge and fresh Mint, for garnish (optional)"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Add chia seeds and acerola shot to a tall glass. Cover and let sit 15 minutes.', 'Fill glass with ice. Top with mango nectar and coconut beverage and stir. Top with freeze dried strawberries and stir. Garnish with lime wedge and mint (if desired) and enjoy.', 'Tags: Acerola, Chia, Coconut, Mango, Summer']

recipe_description: The greatest thing about a Michelada? It's a bracing, refreshing beverage on a sizzling summer day. The second greatest thing? The recipe can be molded to fit your mood (less tomato juice, more hot sauce, extra lime juice)...whatever your preference, make sure you have enough supplies on hand for seconds.
recipe_overview: Serves: 1 Prep Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["TJ's Chile Lime Seasoning Blend", "2 TJ's Limes", "2-3 ounces TJ's Bloody Mary Mixer", "TJ's Jalapeño Hot Sauce", "1 ice-cold can TJ's Simpler Times Lager (or your favorite lager)"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Pour a tablespoon of chili lime seasoning into a shallow rimmed plate. Slice a lime in half and rub it around the edge of a pint glass. Dip the edge of the glass in chili lime seasoning to coat.', "Fill the glass 2/3 full with ice. Add bloody mary mixer and 5-8 shakes of hot sauce (start small if you're not big on heat).", 'Squeeze the juice of 1 lime into glass. Top up with beer, garnish with a fresh lime slice and enjoy.', 'Tags: Beer, Brunch, Cocktails, Summer']

recipe_description: Remember that one big-brand orange juice commercial from back in the day? You know, the one where the lady sticks a straw straight into an orange and starts sipping? Well, our single-serve Cold Pressed Orange Juice actually tastes like it came straight from an orange. Because it did. And it only gets better once you make the base of this magnificent, minty-lime mocktail — which can, of course, morph into a cocktail with but a single drop of rum, vodka, gin, etc….
recipe_overview: Serves: 1 Prep Time: 5 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['3 large TJ’s Mint Leaves', '¼ TJ’s Lime, cut into wedges', '¾ cup TJ’s Organic Cold Pressed Orange Juice', '½ cup TJ’s Sparkling Lime Water', 'Ice (optional)']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Place mint leaves and lime wedges in the bottom of a large, sturdy drinking glass. Use a muddler (or the back of a spoon) to crush the mint and lime wedges to release the mint oils and lime juice.', 'Add ice if desired.', 'Pour mineral water and orange juice on top of the crushed mint leave and lime wedges.', 'Stir together and enjoy!', 'Tags: Cocktails, Cold Pressed, Lime, Orange']

recipe_description: Coming to Trader Joe’s from a family-owned German winery, this bubbly beverage is just peachy, and if you add some peach purée, it’s just Peachy-Peach! Its lower alcohol content (8% ABV) begs for a brunchy application, but lest you get the wrong impression, it also sparkles with apps or dessert… Pretty much anytime is fine for this sweet, celebratory wine.
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 - 5 Prep Time: 5 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 bottle Secco Peach Bellini', '1 cup TJ’s Frozen Freestone Peach Slices', 'TJ’s Organic Mint for garnish (optional)']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'In a blender, blend peaches slightly to make a chunky purée.', 'Spoon about a tablespoon of puree into the bottom of a champagne flute. Poor Bellini over purée. \\', 'Top with mint leaves and enjoy!', 'Tags: Peach, Sparkling, Wine']

recipe_description: Our Triple Ginger Brew might be seasonal, but you can make this marvelous mocktail all year long! Simply swap the Triple for our everyday (equally delicious) offering, and you're in business. Looking for something a stronger? Spike your Gingerosa with a splash of vodka. No cranberries in sight? No problem! Use blueberries instead. (See? We're all about problem-solving...)
recipe_overview: Serves: 2 - 4 Prep Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 bottle TJs Triple Ginger Brew (seasonal) OR 4 bottles TJ's Brewed Ginger Beer", "1 cup TJ's 100% Pure Florida Orange Juice (No Pulp)", "¼ cup TJ's Organic Sugar (for rim of glass)", "1 TJ's Navel Orange, zested (for rim of glass)", "1 bag TJ's Organic Whole Fresh Cranberries (seasonal; optional), rinsed & frozen ahead of time"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Combine Ginger Brew and Orange Juice in a large pitcher.', 'To sugar the rims of your glasses: pour a splash of your liquid mixture onto a small plate. Combine orange zest and sugar on another small plate. Turn glasses upside down. One by one, dip each glass in the liquid mixture—submerging just the rim—then place it on the plate holding the sugar & zest mixture. Rotate glass until rim is sufficiently sugared.  ', "Pour the rest of the beverage into the sugared glasses carefully, so as not to rinse off the rim! For garnish, add as many frozen cranberries as you'd like... And if you add a splash of vodka or bourbon, we won't tell.", 'Tags: Non Alcoholic, Party, Seasonal, Winter']

recipe_description: Trader Joe’s White Chocolate Baking Chips have all the smooth sweetness you would expect in White Chocolate. While these Chips are perfect for adding some yummy flavor to chocolate chip cookies, we’ve used them in this innovative hot chocolate recipe. When the creaminess of the coconut milk combines with the festive flavors of cinnamon, vanilla, and White Chocolate, it creates a drink that will warm you up, especially when it’s cold outside.
recipe_overview: Serves: 3 - 4 Prep Time: 2 Minutes Cooking Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["2 cans TJ's Organic Coconut Milk", "1/2 cup TJ's White Chocolate Chips (seasonal)", "1/2 teaspoon TJ's Organic Pure Bourbon Vanilla Extract", '1 teaspoon Cinnamon', "TJ's Whipped Cream (optional)"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Pour coconut milk into medium-size saucepan and heat over medium-low heat. Add white chocolate chips and stir until melted and hot, but not boiling.', 'Remove from heat, mix in vanilla and cinnamon. Pour into mugs and garnish with whipped cream or shredded coconut, if desired. Serve and enjoy.', 'Tags: Chocolate, Sweet, Winter']

recipe_description: A creamy, non-dairy matcha latte is easy to enjoy anytime and won’t cost you more than 5 minutes of your time – enter Trader Joe’s Matcha Green Tea Single-Serve Packets and Trader Joe’s Non-Dairy Oat Beverage.  Just a few steps below yields a rich, smooth, slightly earthy & sweet cup. Enjoy hot or cold!
recipe_overview: Serves: 1 Prep Time: 5 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['¼ cup hot water', '1 package TJ’s Matcha Green Tea Single-Serve Packages', '¾ cup TJ’s Non-Dairy Oat Beverage']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Empty matcha powder package in hot water and whisk until dissolved.', 'Add oat beverage and whisk until combined. Serve and enjoy immediately.', 'Tags: Dairy Free, Green Tea, Matcha, Non-Dairy']

recipe_description: A spin on a perennially popular TJ’s holiday fave, Trader Joe’s Pumpkin Pie Spiced Ginger Brew is a new, non-alcoholic beverage that’s bound to resonate with ginger lovers and pumpkin-product aficionados alike. Our brewer blends a fizzy, mulled apple cider-like base with a generous amount of ginger purée & plenty of pumpkin pie spices (cinnamon, cardamom, nutmeg, allspice, & clove), then adds a few natural flavors & a bit of cane sugar, and—voilà!—you’ve got Brew.
recipe_overview: Serves: 1 Prep Time: 5 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['2 parts TJ’s Pumpkin Pie Spiced Ginger Brew (seasonal)', '1 part TJ’s The Art of the Still Organic Vodka', 'TJ’s Pumpkin Pie Spice, for garnish (optional)', 'TJ’s Fresh Ginger, thinly sliced, for garnish (optional)']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Fill a copper mug or highball glass with ice. Add ginger brew and vodka and stir. Take a sip, adding more ginger brew or vodka to taste. Garnish with a sprinkle of pumpkin pie spice and ginger, and enjoy.', 'Tags: Fall, Ginger, Limited Quantity, Liquor, Pumpkin']

recipe_description: Trader Joe’s Simply Almond Beverage is made from just two ingredients: almonds and water. Here we’ve added just three other ingredients to turn it into a hearty breakfast shake: dates for sweetness, hemp seeds for a crunch, and rolled oats to fill you up when you’re on the go!
recipe_overview: Serves: 1 Prep Time: 5 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['3 TJ’s Fancy Medjool Dates, pitted', '1/4 cup TJ’s Gluten Free Rolled Oats', '1 cup TJ’s Simply Almond Beverage', '3 Tablespoons TJ’s Raw Shelled Hemp Seed, plus more for garnish']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Add dates and rolled oats to a small bowl and cover with 1/2 cup of hot water for 1 minute to soften. Drain.', 'Add softened dates and oats, almond beverage, and hemp seed to a blender and pulse until smooth.', 'Pour into a glass and garnish with extra hemp seed. Enjoy!', 'Tags: Hemp, Oats, Smoothie, Sweet']

recipe_description: It’s not always easy to get your greens, especially when you’re on the go or in a hurry. As vital as verdant veggies like kale and spinach are to a healthy diet, they can be easy to overlook in your day-to-day eating. That’s why we recommend getting them in your day-to-day hydrating, in the form of Trader Joe’s Organic Cold Pressed Green Juice Beverage—a delicious and refreshing blend of leafy greens, veggies, and zesty citrus fruit.
recipe_overview: Serves: 1 Prep Time: 5 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["8 fl. oz. TJ's Organic Cold Pressed Green Juice Beverage", "1 heaping cup TJ's Frozen Pineapple Tidbits", "4 tablespoons TJ's Oven Toasted Old Fashioned Organic Oats", "2 tablespoons TJ's Organic Flaxseed Meal", 'Handful ice cubes']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Add all ingredients to a blender. Cover and blend on high until thoroughly combined. Pour into a glass and enjoy!', 'Tags: Fruit, No Cook, Smoothie, Vegetable']

recipe_description: Nothing calls upon a summer’s day quite like a ripe, juicy watermelon, and Trader Joe’s Sparkling Watermelon Juice is like a summer’s day in a can!
recipe_overview: Serves: 2 Prep Time: 5 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['½ cup (6-8 cubes) TJ’s Watermelon, plus a few more cubes for garnish', 'TJ’s Fresh Mint', '4 ounces TJ’s Versatile Spirit Vodka', '1 can TJ’s Sparkling Watermelon Juice (seasonal)', '1 TJ’s Fresh Lime, sliced']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Muddle watermelon and a few mint leaves in a 2-cup measuring glass. Divide mixture among 2 old fashioned glasses. Fill the glasses with ice. Divide vodka among glasses, top up with sparkling watermelon juice, and stir just until combined. Garnish with a watermelon cube, more fresh mint, and a squeeze of lime. Cheers!', 'Tags: Cocktails, Liquor, Refreshing, Summer']

recipe_description: Each bite of Trader Joe’s Gluten Free Cocoa Crunch Cereal is perfectly chocolatey, splendidly sweet (without being altogether too sugary) with an easy, airy texture and just a faint hit of rice flour nuttiness. There’s a lot to love here, but our personal favorite thing about it is how it turns a whole bowl of milk (or non-dairy alternative) rich and chocolatey.
recipe_overview: Serves: 2 Prep Time: 20 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['TJ’s Midnight Moo Chocolate Flavored Syrup', '1 cup TJ’s Gluten Free Cocoa Crunch Cereal, plus more for garnish', "1 cup TJ’s Whole Milk or TJ's Chocolate Whole Milk made with Fair Trade Cocoa", 'TJ’s Ultra Chocolate Ice Cream', 'Whipped Cream']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Coat the inside of two tall glasses with a few drizzles of chocolate syrup. Place in the freezer to chill.', 'Place cereal and milk in a bowl; refrigerate for 15 minutes to infuse. Add cereal and milk to a blender pitcher, along with 4 heaping scoops of ice cream. Blend until ingredients are fully incorporated.', 'Remove glasses from freezer and divide milkshake evenly among glasses. Garnish with chipped cream, chocolate syrup and cereal. Enjoy immediately.', 'Tags: Chocolate, Ice Cream, Sweet']

recipe_description: With tangy tomato purée, briny clam juice, and a savory spice blend, Trader Joe’s Bloody Mary Mixer stands up to any homemade version. Simply add vodka, ice, and garnish with abandon to recreate this classic brunch beverage.
recipe_overview: Serves: 1 Prep Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["TJ's Chile Lime Seasoning Blend", "4 ounces TJ's Bloody Mary Mixer", "1 1/4 ounce TJ's Vodka Of The Gods", "1 TJ's Lemon, sliced", "1 TJ's Celery Stalk, rinsed and trimmed", "TJ's Colossal Olives Hand Stuffed With Garlic Cloves, plus one tablespoon brine from jar (optional)"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Spread a thin layer of chile lime seasoning on a shallow dish or clean cutting board. Rub a slice of lemon around the rim of a glass. Place rim of glass in seasoning and twist and turn to coat.', 'Fill the chile-rimmed glass with ice. Add bloody mary mixer, vodka, and olive brine, if using. Stir and add more mixer or vodka to taste. Garnish with a celery stalk, a few stuffed olives, and sliced lemon. Cheers!', 'Tags: Brunch, Cocktails']

recipe_description: Year after year, Trader Joe’s French Market Sparkling Lemonade comes up a winner. It makes sense—our supplier has been crafting lemonade in a small, French village for over 100 years now, and our sparkling version is crisp, tart, and totally refreshing. Plus, it’s made with simple ingredients, like hand-crafted lemon syrup and water sourced from a natural spring inside the bottling room! For a backyard party beverage that's sure to please, look no further than this refreshing combination of sweet, sparkly lemonade and crisp, herbal Trader Joe’s Preeminence Gin.
recipe_overview: Serves: 1 Prep Time: 5 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["2 slices TJ's Cucumber, plus more for garnish", "2 parts TJ's French Market Sparkling Lemonade", "1 part TJ's Preeminence Gin", "TJ's Fresh Rosemary, for garnish"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Muddle 2 cucumber slices in the bottom of a rocks glass. Fill with crushed ice, lemonade and gin, and gently stir to combine. Garnish with rosemary and another cucumber slice, and serve.', 'Tags: Cocktails, Lemon']

recipe_description: With aromas of chocolate and coffee, assertive hopping, and sweet caramel malty flavors, our Boatswain Chocolate Stout is a natural pairing for velvety French Vanilla Ice Cream.
recipe_overview: Serves: 3 Prep Time: 5 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 bottle Boatswain Chocolate Stout OR Campanology’s Bûche de Noël Stout', "TJ's French Vanilla Ice Cream", 'Whipped Cream & chocolate chunks, for garnish (optional)']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Place two scoops of ice cream into a tall glass. Slowly pour stout into glass, covering scoops. Top with whipped cream and chocolate chunks. Repeat with remaining glasses and enjoy immediately.', "Tags: Beer, Ice Cream, No Cook, St Patrick's Day"]

recipe_description: A sweetened blend of black currant, apple, and lemon juices, with cinnamon, clove, nutmeg, cardamom, ginger, and orange peel, Trader Joe’s Winter Wassail is a fruit punch whose flavors and aromas evoke the holidays. You can serve it chilled, over ice with bourbon; or warmed, in a big mug, with a cinnamon stick garnish. It’s also a merry mulling mixer with red wine, simmered on the stovetop and served steaming for holiday crowds of all sizes.
recipe_overview: Serves: 1 - 20
recipe_ingredients: ['For Wassail (per serving, multiply depending on the thirst of your guest list)', "1 part TJ's Bourbon (we used TJ's High Rye Bourbon)", "2 parts TJ's Winter Wassail", 'For Ice Ring', "1 TJ's Navel Orange, thinly sliced", "Handful TJ's Frozen Raspberries, plus more for serving", "TJ's Fresh Rosemary", 'bundt pan']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Prepare the ice ring (optional): line the bottom of a bundt pan with navel slices, raspberries and a few sprigs of rosemary. Fill pan halfway with water; freeze until solid.', 'To serve: add bourbon and wassail to large punch bowl, stir briskly to combine. Remove bundt pan from freezer and let sit at room temperature for 5 minutes. Run bottom and sides of pan under hot water, until ice ring slides out. Flip ice ring over and gently place in punch bowl. Serve punch with frozen raspberries for garnish.', 'Tags: Cocktails, Party, Winter']

recipe_overview: Serves: 2 Prep Time: 5 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["2 TJ's Fresh Strawberries, roughly chopped, plus 2 whole strawberries for garnish", "8 ounces TJ's Brewed Ginger Beer", "4 ounces TJ's Distinqt Tequila Reposado", "Juice of 2 TJ's Limes", "TJ's Plain Sparkling Mineral Water"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Add chopped strawberries to a large measuring glass. Muddle or mash into a pulp with the back of a spoon. (For a spicy kick, muddle fresh cilantro and two slices of jalapeño with the strawberries.) ', 'Add ginger beer, tequila and lime juice and stir to combine.', 'Fill two copper mugs with ice. Divide tequila mixture among mugs and top up with sparkling water. Garnish each mug with a fresh strawberry and serve.', '  Tags: Cocktails, Spring, Strawberry, Summer']

recipe_description: Spiced Chai Latte Mix, a generous splash of Cold Brew, topped off with homemade vanilla chai whipped cream... Mmm... Does it get any better? Actually, yes! Plan ahead and make your own Cold Brew ice cubes.
recipe_overview: Serves: 2 Prep Time: 15 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['Chai Iced Latte', "6 tablespoons TJ's Spicy Chai Tea Latte Mix", '1/2 cup hot water', "1 cup TJ's Cold Brew Coffee Concentrate", 'Vanilla Chai Whipped Cream', '1/2 cup Heavy Cream', "2 teaspoons TJ's Spicy Chai Tea Latte Mix", "1 teaspoon TJ's Organic Pure Bourbon Vanilla Extract"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'To make whipped cream: in a large bowl, with a hand mixer or stand mixer combine: 1/2 cup heavy cream, 2 teaspoons Chai Mix and 1 teaspoon Bourbon Vanilla Extract. Whip until stiff peaks form, about 4 minutes. Set aside.', 'To make chai iced latte: In a medium-sized pitcher, whisk together 6 tablespoons chai mix and 1/2 cup hot water until mix completely dissolves. Add 1 cup cold brew to pitcher and stir until combined. Serve chilled or pour over ice (we recommend making your own cold brew ice cubes), then top with reserved whipped cream.', 'Tags: Chai, Coffee, Cold Brew']

recipe_overview: Serves: 2 Prep Time: 5 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 cup TJ's Unsweetened Original Almond Beverage or TJ's Unsweetened Almond, Cashew & Macadamia Nut Beverage", "½ cup TJ's 100% Tart Cherry Juice", "1 TJ's Organic Virgin Coconut Oil Packet", "2 TJ's Steamed & Peeled Baby Beets, sliced", "3 TJ's Medjool Dates", "1 bag TJ's Organic Frozen Strawberries"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Combine almond beverage, cherry juice, coconut oil, beets and Medjool dates in a blender and blend until smooth. Add strawberries and continue pulsing until well blended. Serve immediately.', "Tags: Coconut, Smoothie, Strawberry, Valentine's Day"]

recipe_overview: Serves: 8 - 10 Prep Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1/2 bottle (32 ounces) TJ's Organic Lemonade", "1 cup TJ's Frozen Pineapple Tidbits", "3 cups TJ's French Sparkling Limeade, chilled", "2 cups TJ's 100% Cherry Juice, chilled", "3 cups TJ's Blanc de Blancs Sparkling wine (or TJ's Plain Sparkling Spring Water), chilled", 'Sliced lemons and limes, for garnish (optional)']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Fill a large punch bowl with ice and set aside. Add lemonade and pineapple tidbits to a blender pitcher and blend until smooth. Pour blended mixture into punch bowl. Add limeade and cherry juice, stir to combine.', 'Top off punch bowl with Blanc de Blancs immediately before serving. Garnish with lemon and lime slices, if desired.', 'Tags: Big Game, Party, Sweet, Tart']

recipe_overview: Serves: 1 Prep Time: 1 Minute Cooking Time: 5 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['8 ounces TJ’s Lemon Ginger Echinacea Juice Blend', '1 bag TJ’s Harvest Blend Herbal Tea (seasonal)']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Place one tea bag in a mug and set aside. Pour the juice blend in a small saucepan. Place saucepan on stove and heat over medium-high, just until boiling. Pour into mug and allow tea bag to steep for 3-5 minutes. Remove tea bag, allow to cool slightly and serve.', 'Tags: Fall, Tea']

recipe_overview: Serves: 1 Prep Time: 5 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['4 ounces TJ’s Organic Lemonade, chilled', '8 ounces Josephsbrau Plznr, chilled', 'Lemon slices, for garnish (optional)']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Combine lemonade and Plznr in a tall glass and garnish with a lemon slice. Serve immediately.', 'Tags: Cocktails, Fall, Fancy, Party']

recipe_description: This nonalcoholic Sparkler combines favored fall flavors into one bright, bubbly, party-ready beverage.
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Prep Time: 5 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['8 ounces TJ’s Sparkling Cranberry Juice', '4 ounces TJ’s Brewed Ginger Beer', '12 ounces TJ’s Sparkling Apple Cider', 'Orange slices, for garnish (optional)']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Mix cranberry juice, ginger beer and apple cider in a large pitcher with ice. Pour into glasses, garnish with orange slices and serve.', 'Tags: Fall, Fancy, Non Alcoholic, Party, Thanksgiving']

recipe_description: really
recipe_overview: Serves: 2 Prep Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 Tbsp TJ's Chile Lime Seasoning", "2 TJ's Lime (1 for .5 oz juice, 1 for garnish & glass prep)", "1 TJ's Mango, peeled, pitted & coarsely chopped", "6 oz TJ's Margarita Mixer", '4 oz Silver Tequila (optional)', '1 cup Ice']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Prepare the Glasses', 'Place the chile lime seasoning in a shallow dish or spread in a small pile (shape depends on glass) on a clean cutting board. Rub a slice of lime around the rim of each glass. Turn glasses over and place directly in the pile seasoning; twist and turn it so the rim gets coated with seasoning.', 'Blend the Mangorita:', 'Place mango, 1 tablespoon lime juice, margarita mix, tequila and ice into a blender. Pulse several times until mixture is well blended and slushy.', 'Pour into chile-lime rimmed glasses, garnish (optional), sip back and revel.', 'Tags: Cocktails, Mango, Party, Summer, Tropical']

recipe_overview: Serves: 8 Prep Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 container TJ’s Organic Lemonade, chilled', "2 1/2 cups TJ's Frozen Raspberries", "2 TJ's Lemons, sliced into rounds (garnish)"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Pour lemonade into serving pitcher and add frozen raspberries. Stir occasionally, allowing raspberries to defrost in lemonade for about 5 minutes. Pour into glasses and garnish with a lemon slice.', 'Tags: Fruit, Non Alcoholic, Refreshing, Spring, Summer']

recipe_description: Refresh, rehydrate, and recharge with this coconut water-based smoothie, boasting sweet strawberries, bright pineapple, and tangy Trader Joe’s Greek Yogurt.
recipe_overview: Serves: 2 Prep Time: 5 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 cup TJ’s Coconut Water', '1 cup (about 12) TJ’s Organic Cut and Peeled Carrots', '3 TJ’s Strawberries, hulled', '1/2 cup TJ’s Frozen Pineapple Tidbits', '1/2 TJ’s Banana, frozen', '1/2 cup TJ’s Plain Greek Yogurt', "1 tsp your favorite TJ's Honey"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Combine all ingredients in a blender and pulse until smooth.', 'Tags: Fruit, Smoothie, Spring']

recipe_overview: Serves: 2 Prep Time: 5 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["2 cups TJ's Premium Vanilla Ice Cream", "3/4 cup TJ's Egg Nog or Almond Nog (seasonal)", "1 tsp TJ's Nutmeg", "1 tsp TJ's Ground Cinnamon", "1 jar TJ's Cinnamon Sticks (optional garnish)"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'In a blender, pulse together ice cream, egg nog, nutmeg, and ground cinnamon until smooth and uniform. Pour into a glass and top with a sprinkle of cinnamon. Garnish with a cinnamon stick or two. Enjoy!', 'Tags: Ice Cream, Seasonal, Winter']

recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Prep Time: 15 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 Tbsp TJ’s Sea Salt', '6 TJ’s Limes, 1 sliced for garnish', '1/2 cup TJ’s Limeade (or TJ’s Organic Jalapeño Limeade, if you enjoy a kick!)', "3/4 cup (4 shots) TJ's Reposado Distinqt Tequila (optional)", '2 cups TJ’s Organic Frozen Mango Chunks', '1 TJ’s Orange, juice only', '1 Tbsp TJ’s Agave Sweetener', '2 cups Ice']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Begin by rimming the glasses: Add salt to a small plate, then squeeze the juice of 1 lime onto a separate plate. Dip the rim of the drinking glasses into the lime juice, then dip into the salt. Set aside. Then, in a blender, add the juice from 4 Limes with the Orange Juice, Mango Chunks, Limeade and the Agave Sweetener. Pulse several times until liquefied, then add the Ice and pulse again. Pour into salt-rimmed glasses and garnish with lime slices.', 'Tags: Cocktails, Mango, Party, Tropical']

recipe_overview: Serves: 2 - 3 Prep Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["4 scoops TJ's Cookie Butter Ice Cream or TJ's French Vanilla Ice Cream", "1 Tbsp TJ's Fleur de Sel Caramel Sauce", "6-8 TJ's Speculoos Cookies", "1/2 cup TJ's Milk", '1/4 cup Ice', '2 Tbsp Whipped Light Cream']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'In a blender, pulse together ice cream, caramel sauce, cookies, milk and ice until smooth. Pour into a glass and top with whipped cream, Speculoos cookie crumbles and more caramel sauce.', 'Tags: Ice Cream']

recipe_description: Although we call it a Pasta Sauce, there is so much more you can do with a jar of Trader Joe’s Spicy Chunky Tomato & Pepper Pasta Sauce. It’s perfect as a ready-made base for this Shakshuka recipe. Or, you can use it for a pizza sauce with extra pizazz. Make it your base for soups or stews, such as Chicken Cacciatore. However you use it, you’ll find this Sauce is a handy helper for creating all kinds of chunky, spicy, flavorful meals!
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Cooking Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 jar TJ’s Spicy Chunky Tomato & Pepper Sauce', '4 TJ’s Large Eggs', 'TJ’s Crumbled Feta', 'TJ’s Fresh Cilantro, chopped', '1 TJ’s Organic Baguette, heated according to package directions']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Add tomato sauce to a large skillet over medium heat. Cook 5 minutes, stirring occasionally, until sauce is bubbling.', 'Use the back of a spoon to create four wells in the sauce. Crack an egg into each well. Reduce heat to low, cover and continue cooking 3-4 minutes, until the egg whites are set and the yolks are still jiggly. Remove from heat.', 'Top shakshuka with crumbled feta and chopped cilantro. Divide among four bowls and serve with warm baguette on the side for dipping.', 'Tags: Brunch, Eggs, Meatless, One-dish Meal, Spicy, Tomato']

recipe_description: Trader Joe’s Gluten Free Ginger Turmeric Granola is the perfect blend of crunchy, earthy, sweet, and spicy. It’s fabulous on its own or in a bowl of milk, but it truly shines when nestled atop a creamy mango parfait.
recipe_overview: Serves: 1 Prep Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 cup TJ’s Frozen Mango Chunks', '4-6 ounces TJ’s Orange Juice', '1 teaspoon TJ’s Turmeric', 'TJ’s Plain Whole Milk Greek Yogurt', 'Handful of TJ’s Ginger Turmeric Granola, crushed into small pieces', 'Sprinkle of TJ’s Roasted Pumpkin Seeds (optional)']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Add mango chunks, 4 ounces orange juice, and turmeric to a blender. Blend into a smooth purée, stopping to scrape down sides of pitcher and add more juice if needed, set aside.', 'Add a few generous scoops of yogurt to a bowl or large, stemless wine glass. Top with mango purée and garnish with granola and pumpkin seeds. Grab a spoon and dig in!', 'Tags: Greek yogurt, Mango, Snack, Turmeric']

recipe_description: The dough used to make Trader Joe’s Pumpkin Rolls with Pumpkin Spice Icing begins as identical to its cinnamon roll sibling, and then real pumpkin and seasonal spices – cinnamon, nutmeg, and clove – are added. The icing is an original, made with pumpkin purée and more of those warm, Pumpkin Season spices.
recipe_overview: Serves: 6 - 8 Prep Time: 15 Minutes Cooking Time: 25 - 30 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['TJ’s Coconut Oil Spray', '2 cans TJ’s Pumpkin Rolls', '3 tablespoons TJ’s Unsalted Butter, melted', '1/4 cup TJ’s Organic Cane Sugar ', '1 tablespoon TJ’s Pumpkin Pie Spice', 'Two handfuls TJ’s Candied Pecans, chopped (optional)']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 350°F. Grease a 10-inch cast iron skillet with coconut oil spray, set aside.', 'Remove rolls from packaging and reserve icing packets. Lay each roll flat and cut into quarters.', 'In a small bowl, combine sugar and pumpkin spice. One at a time, place rolls in spice mixture and gently turn over to coat. Place snugly in skillet. Repeat with remaining pieces.', 'Brush rolls with melted butter. Place skillet on center rack of oven and bake 25-30 minutes. Remove from oven.', 'In a small bowl, combine one icing packet with 2 tablespoons water. Brush over baked rolls and topped with chopped pecans, if using. Serve with extra icing on the side.', 'Tags: Baking, Fall, Pumpkin, Spices, TJsVideo']

recipe_description: Autumn is the season of freshly picked apples, apple cider, apple cider donuts, bobbing for apples, caramel apples, apple pie... you get the idea. And oh, wow, Trader Joe’s Apple Cider Fruit Spread tastes like the season! It offers tender chunks of sweet apples, tart apple cider, and warm fall spices like cinnamon, clove, ginger, and cardamom.
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Prep Time: 15 Minutes Cooking Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['Pancakes:', '1 ¾ Cups TJ’s Buttermilk Pancake Mix', '1 Large TJ’s Egg', '1 Cup + 2 Tablespoons TJ’s Spiced Cider', '¾ teaspoon TJ’s Pumpkin Pie Spice', 'Syrup:', '1 jar (12 oz) TJ’s Apple Cider Fruit Spread (seasonal)', '6 oz your favorite TJ’s Maple Syrup', 'TJ’s Cultured Salted Butter, for serving (optional)']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Prepare syrup: Add fruit spread and syrup to a microwave-safe bowl. Heat on half-power for 30 second intervals, stirring occasionally, until warm. Set aside.', 'Prepare pancakes: In a medium bowl, whisk pancake mix and pumpkin pie spice. In a small bowl, whisk egg and cider. Add cider mixture to dry mixture and whisk gently, just until combined. Let batter stand 10 minutes.', 'Preheat a large nonstick pan or griddle over medium heat. Working in batches and using a ¼ cup measure per pancake, drop batter into preheated pan. Cook 1-2 minutes, flip pancake and continue cooking 1 minute more. Serve immediately with butter and apple cider syrup. ', 'For a real treat, try griddling these pancakes in a cast iron skillet, with plenty of Trader Joe’s Organic Coconut Oil.', 'Tags: Apple, Brunch, Fall']

recipe_description: The Brazilian supplier of our Acerola Puree Packets harvests ripe, organic acerola then purées the fruit and strains out the seeds. They add nothing to the fruit. The result is a smooth, very tangy pulp that will add serious zip to your smoothies and juices. Not only that, it will add serious vitamin C to your diet—each of our 3.5-ounce packets of frozen Unsweetened Organic Acerola Puree delivers a whopping 1180% of the daily recommended value of vitamin C!
recipe_overview: Serves: 2 Prep Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 small TJ's Banana", "1 cup Trader Joe's Orange Juice", "1/2 cup TJ's Shredded Carrot", "1/2 cup TJ's Greek Yogurt", "1 cup frozen TJ's Pineapple Tidbits", "2 TJ's Organic Acerola Puree Packets"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Add banana, OJ, carrot and yogurt to blender. Blend on high until carrot is well blended, 2-3 minutes. Add pineapple and acerola packets and blend just until smooth. Divide among two glasses and enjoy.', 'Tags: Acerola, Fruit, On-the-go, Smoothie, Summer']

recipe_description: Trader Joe's Mixed Nut Butter is a one-of-a-kind mix of almonds, cashews, walnuts, Brazil nuts, hazelnuts, and pecans, with just a bit of sea salt to round out the flavors. The nuts are dry roasted, then ground together into creamy bliss. Spread on sandwiches, celery sticks, or used in a grilled nut butter & banana sandwich, you’ll love the rich, nutty nature of this Butter.
recipe_overview: Serves: 1 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 5 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['2 slices TJ’s Multigrain Bread', 'TJ’s Salted Butter, softened', 'TJ’s Ground Cinnamon', 'TJ’s Mixed Nut Butter', '1 TJ’s Banana, sliced into thick coins']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat a nonstick pan or griddle over medium-high heat. Spread butter on one side of each slice of bread and sprinkle with cinnamon. Lay bread buttered-side down on clean work surface. Spread mixed nutter on bread, and top one piece with banana coins. Close sandwich.', 'Place sandwich in hot pan and cook until nicely browned, 1-2 minutes. Use a turner to carefully flip sandwich over and brown the other side. Remove from pan and let cool slightly before digging in.', 'Tags: Banana, Brunch, Sweet']

recipe_description: Avocado toast drizzled with Trader Joe's Avocado Oil?! Now, THAT’S meta…
recipe_overview: Serves: 2 - 3 Prep Time: 2 Minutes Cooking Time: 3 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['3 slices of your favorite TJ’s Sourdough Bread', '2 TJ’s Avocados', '5 TJ’s Mini Heirloom Tomatoes or your favorite TJ’s Mini Tomatoes', '1 Tablespoon TJ’s Avocado Oil', 'Salt and Pepper to taste']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Toast bread.', 'In a small bowl, mash avocado with the back of a fork; divide mashed avocado evenly among slices of bread and spread to edges.', 'Slice tomatoes and place on top of avocado.', 'Drizzle with oil and add salt & pepper to taste. Enjoy!', 'Tags: Avocado, Toast']

recipe_name: Potato Pancakes with Asparagus & Poached Eggs
recipe_description: Perhaps best known for their shining role in Hanukkah (and sometimes Passover) festivities, Potato Pancakes, or latkes, are certainly something to celebrate. As a matter of fact, they’re so delicious, we carry Trader Joe’s Potato Pancakes in our freezers all year long!
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 20 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 bag (12oz) TJ’s Asparagus, trimmed', '1 tablespoon TJ’s Olive Oil', 'Juice of 1 TJ’s Lemon', '3 cloves TJ’s Garlic, minced', "1 tablespoon TJ's Apple Cider Vinegar", '4 TJ’s Large Eggs', '4 TJ’s Potato Pancakes (Latkes)', 'Salt and Pepper to taste']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Bring a large pot of water to a rolling boil.', 'While water boils, heat oil in a large sauté pan on medium heat. Add garlic, lemon juice, and asparagus to pan. Use tongs to sauté until asparagus is cooked through, about 3 – 5 minutes. Remove pan from heat and set aside.', 'Prepare latkes according to package instructions, set aside.', 'Fill a pot with 3-4 inches of water and bring to a boil. Lower heat to simmer and add 1 tablespoon apple cider vinegar.', 'Crack an egg into a strainer to separate the yolk from the white (reserve egg whites for an omelet!) and gently pour the yolk into a small bowl. Stir the simmering water with a spoon to create a vortex in the pot. Carefully slide the egg into center of vortex and cook for 3 minutes. Use a slotted spoon to remove the cooked egg and set on a clean plate. Repeat poaching process with remaining eggs.', 'Separate the asparagus onto 4 plates. Top each plate of asparagus with a potato pancake, then top each potato pancake with a poached egg. Add salt and pepper to taste.', 'Enjoy.', 'Tags: Brunch, Eggs, Spring']

recipe_description: Trader Joe’s Blarney Scone is a super-dense, scone-shaped hunk of traditional Irish Soda Bread, made with real buttermilk and real butter and studded with raisins and caraway seeds throughout. It’s sweet, but not too sweet, and tastes divine fried in a skillet and slathered with a bit of Kerrygold® Irish Butter and jam, or topped with slices of TJ’s Corned Beef. Weighing in at nearly two pounds, it’s a hefty hunk o’ Scone, perfectly suitable for sharing.
recipe_overview: Serves: 6 Cooking Time: 8 - 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["TJ's Sunflower Oil", "1 TJ's Blarney Scone (Seasonal)", "TJ's Seville Orange Marmalade", 'Kerrygold® Irish Butter']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Using a large serrated knife, gently slice the scone into 6 thick slices; set aside. Pour enough sunflower oil to create a thin layer in the bottom of a skillet and heat over medium-high.', 'When oil is hot, add two scone slices to the pan and fry 30-40 seconds per side, until browned. Transfer to a plate and repeat with remaining slices, adding more oil as necessary to coat the bottom of the pan.', 'Generously slather scone slices with butter and marmalade, and enjoy immediately.', "Tags: St Patrick's Day, Toast"]

recipe_name: Easy As Crispy Corned Beef Hash
recipe_overview: Serves: 6 Prep Time: 2 Minutes Cooking Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 bag TJ's Roasted Potatoes with Peppers & Onions", '1 pound leftover cooked Corned Beef, cubed to potato size (seasonal)', "2 Tbsp TJ's Pure Imported Olive Oil", "1 Tbsp TJ's Clarified Butter (Ghee)", '1/3 cup Water']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Heat olive oil and butter in a large heavy skillet over medium heat; crowd in the cubed corned beef and potatoes.', 'Spread evenly in the pan and increase heat to high or medium high. Do not stir the potatoes and corned beef; let them brown until sizzling. Use a spatula to peek underneath to check browning. If there is too much sticking, add a little more oil to the pan. Continue to cook in this manner until the potatoes and the corned beef are browned and crispy on the bottom, about 8 minutes.', 'Once browned, add water, then cover with a lid and steam until water evaporates (about 2 to 3 minutes). Remove from heat and serve topped with fried or poached eggs.', "Tags: Beef, Brunch, Savory, St Patrick's Day"]

recipe_description: A bowl of bran flakes for breakfast is a balanced, nutritious, and reliable choice, indeed. Fortunately, Trader Joe's Organic Bran Flakes are pretty darn tasty, too! But if a bowlful of bran sounds boring at best, try baking your bran instead, with this home-run recipe for the “Berry Best Bran Muffins" you ever did taste. What makes them the Berry Best? For starters, they’re fluffy and moist as can be — no sawdust-y bricks of bran here. But really, it’s the berries that elevate these Muffins to “Berry Best” status. (The fact that we shelved the sugar and used honey instead doesn’t hurt, either…)
recipe_overview: Serves: 16 - 18 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 15 - 20 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['TJ’s Canola Oil Spray', '¼ cup TJ’s Unsalted Butter, melted', '½ cup TJ’s Honey', '1 cup TJ’s Whole Milk', '2 large TJ’s Eggs', '1 ½ cups TJ’s Organic Bran Flakes, crushed ', '1 teaspoon TJ’s Ground Cinnamon ', '1 ¼ cups TJ’s All-Purpose Flour ', '2 teaspoons TJ’s Baking Powder ', '½ teaspoon TJ’s Baking Soda ', '½ teaspoon TJ’s Salt', '1 cup TJ’s Wild Organic Frozen Blueberries ', '1 cup TJ’s Organic Frozen Strawberries, cut in quarters ']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 400°F. Thoroughly coat two 12-count muffin tins. Set aside.', 'In a large bowl combine honey, milk, and eggs. Set aside', 'In another large bowl combine crushed bran flakes, flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt.', 'Fold dry ingredients into wet ingredients and add melted butter. Mix just until combine, then mix in berries.', 'Scoop about ¼ cup of batter into each muffin cup, you will only need about 4 to 6 of the spaces in the second tin. ', 'Bake on center rack of the oven for 15-20 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in the middle comes out clean.', 'Remove from oven, let cool, and enjoy!', 'Tags: Blueberry, Strawberry']

recipe_description: Get ready—you’re in for a real treat with this one! Our classic Trader Joe’s Cornbread Mix finally met its match in Trader Joe’s Everything But the Elote Seasoning Blend. It makes perfect sense when you think about it—the components of the Seasoning Blend (Parmesan, chile pepper, chipotle powder, salt, etc.), are literally designed—or at least combined—to be delicious on corn, so *of course* they’re just as delicious in cornbread! Toss some jalapeños in the mix, and you’ve got yourself a sweet n’ savory, slightly spicy, and totally Tex-Mexy breakfast.
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 - 5 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 35 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 box TJ’s Cornbread Mix', '1 cup TJ’s Cultured Lowfat Buttermilk', '1 stick (1/2 cup) TJ’s Unsalted Butter, melted', '2 large TJ’s Eggs', '3 tablespoons TJ’s Everything but the Elote Seasoning Blend', '1 bag TJ’s Fresh Jalapeños, deseeded and diced (use gloves!)', 'TJ’s Honey (for garnish)', 'TJ’s Salted Butter (for garnish)']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'In a large mixing bowl, mix together egg, melted butter, and buttermilk. Mix in cornbread mix and seasoning, stirring until moistened. Mix in diced jalapeños until combine. Do not over-mix.', 'Preheat a large, nonstick pan or griddle over low heat. Working in batches and using about ¼ cup of batter per pancake as your measure, drop batter into preheated pan. Cook 3-4 minutes, flip pancake, and continue cooking for 2 minutes more.', 'Serve immediately, garnished with honey and butter if desired. Enjoy!', 'Tags: Brunch, Corn, Seasoning']

recipe_description: Fans of traditional French toast, be forewarned—one bite of this version’s crispy, corn flake crust will leave you wondering how you ever faced French toast without it! It’s the perfect marriage of moist, fluffy French Brioche and always-crunchy Organic Corn Flakes. Whip up a batch for friends at brunch, and you’ll be crowned the Corn Flake Queen! (Show us a brunch-loving citizen of the world who wouldn’t want THAT title—we’ll wait…)
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 - 6 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 30 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['3 large TJ’s Eggs', '1 cup TJ’s Organic Whole Milk', '3 tablespoons TJ’s Organic Sugar', '3 cups TJ’s Organic Corn Flakes Cereal, crushed', '6 slices TJ’s Sliced French Brioche, halved diagonally', '4 tablespoons TJ’s Unsalted Butter', 'TJ’s Canola Oil Spray', 'TJ’s Maple Syrup']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 375°F.', 'Whisk eggs, milk and sugar in a shallow bowl. Put the crushed cornflakes in another shallow bowl.', 'One piece at a time, soak bread in egg mixture, turning once. Remove bread before it gets soggy, hold over bowl and allow excess egg to drip off, then dredge in crushed cornflakes, pressing gently so that flakes adhere. Set aside on a plate.', 'Lightly spray a sheet pan or a baking sheet with canola oil and set aside.', 'Melt about 1 tablespoon of butter in a large nonstick skillet over medium heat. Place cornflake-coated pieces of bread in skillet and cook for approximately 2 - 3 minutes on each side or until golden-brown. Work in batches, adding more butter to skillet as necessary & transferring cooked pieces to the sheet pan. Arrange bead in an even layer with some space in between each piece.', 'Place sheet pan on the center rack of oven and bake until cooked through, about 10 minutes. Keep an eye on it as it bakes; remove from oven if burning or blackening begins to occur.', 'Remove from oven and let cool slightly.', 'Serve warm with butter & maple syrup. Enjoy!', 'Tags: Brunch, Cereal, Corn, Organic']

recipe_description: The açaí berry trend shows no signs of slowing down—and why should it? With its subtle hints of cacao and powerful berry tang, açaí’s rich, complex flavor profile is refreshingly irresistible. On-the-go cafés and juiceries have devoted entire sections of their menus to energizing smoothies and filling breakfast bowls made with this brilliant berry of the Amazon. These menu offerings, however, are typically packed with sugar and are often quite expensive.
recipe_overview: Serves: 1 Prep Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 TJ's Organic Unsweetened Açaí Purée packet", "1/2 cup TJ's Frozen Organic Mixed Berry Blend", "1-2 tablespoons TJ's Unsweetened Vanilla Almond Milk", "1 TJ's Banana, sliced and divided", "1/3 cup TJ's Toasted Coconut Granola", "2 TJ's Fancy Medjool Dates, chopped", '1 scoop of your favorite protein powder (optional)']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Add Açaí packet, berry blend, almond milk, and half of the banana to blender (and protein, if using). Blend until smooth (adjust almond milk if needed). Scrape smoothie mixture into bowl. Top with remaining banana slices, granola and dates. Grab a spoon and dig in.', 'Tags: Banana, Protein, Smoothie, Tropical']

recipe_description: Trader Joe’s Organic Sweet Potatoes are an extremely versatile vegetable. They can be baked, roasted, fried, grilled, boiled, mashed or grated. In this recipe, we used them to hash out breakfast by roasting them and mixing them with apples, onions, kale, egg and crispy bacon. Rooted in sweet and savory deliciousness, it's a righteous and easy way to start any day.
recipe_overview: Serves: 5 - 7 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 40 - 45 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["4 TJ's Organic Sweet Potatoes, peeled and diced", "1/4 cup TJ's Extra Virgin Olive Oil", "1/4 teaspoon TJ's Sea Salt", "1 package TJ's Uncured Apple Smoked Bacon (or your favorite TJ’s Bacon), chopped", "1 medium TJ's Yellow Onion, chopped", "2 TJ's Gala Apples or TJ's Granny Smith Apples, diced", '½ bag TJ’s Organic Kale', '4 large TJ’s Eggs', "1/4 cup TJ's Organic Maple Syrup"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 400 ºF.', 'Toss sweet potatoes with olive oil and sea salt. Place in roasting pan and bake for 20 minutes.', 'In a large oven-safe skillet, cook bacon over medium heat. Add onions once the bacon has cooked for five minutes and has begun to render fat. Cook until bacon begins to become crisp and onions appear translucent.', 'Add apples and cook for an additional two minutes. Add roasted sweet potatoes to the mixture and cook for approximately five minutes or until potatoes begin to soften. Mix in kale and cook for another two minutes.', 'Create four spaces in the hash mixture where you want to place the eggs and carefully crack one egg in each space.', 'Place skillet in oven and cook for 7 - 10 minutes, or until eggs are fully cooked.', 'Remove from oven, toss with maple syrup and serve.', 'Tags: Bacon, Pork, Roasted, Sweet Potato']

recipe_description: Talk about a powerhouse! Trader Joe’s Organic Chia Seeds pack quite the nutritional punch—each 2-tablespoon serving provides 8 grams of dietary fiber and 4 grams of Omega-3 fatty acid (ALA). But even more impressively, they can absorb up 27 times their weight in water—when you add them to liquids, they swell and become gelatinous, making them an excellent binder for foods like…pudding!
recipe_overview: Serves: 2 Prep Time: 2 Hours 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 cup TJ’s Turmeric Ginger Coconut Beverage', '1/4 cup TJ’s Organic Chia Seeds', '1 teaspoon TJ’s Organic Pure Bourbon Vanilla Extract or TJ’s Alcohol-Free Vanilla Flavor', '1 tablespoon TJ’s Maple Syrup', 'Your favorite toppings (we like whipped cream, TJ’s Unsweetened Coconut Chips, chopped cling peaches, fresh mint, & a sprinkle of cinnamon)']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'In a small bowl, mix coconut beverage, chia seeds, vanilla, and syrup until combined. Let mixture sit 10 minutes, stirring every 2-3 minutes to break up any clumps. Cover bowl and refrigerate for a minimum of two hours, or overnight.', 'Remove pudding from fridge, divide between two small bowls or jars, and garnish as desired.', 'Tags: Chia, Coconut, No Bake, Turmeric']

recipe_description: The nutty, distinctively chewy texture and pure wholesomeness of steel cut oats have made them a hot cereal preference for grain aficionados & warm breakfast lovers alike. Trader Joe’s Quick Cook Steel Cut Oats allows you to reap the benefits of hearty steel cut oats, without the long cook time. This recipe further elevates these Oats with the addition of fragrant cinnamon, sweet, chewy raisins, and crunchy almonds—the same ingredients you’d find in an oatmeal cookie!
recipe_overview: Serves: 2 - 3 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 15 - 20 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 cup TJ’s Quick Cook Steel Cut Oats', '2 cups water', '½ cup TJ’s Unsweetened Apple Sauce', '1 teaspoon TJ’s Ground Cinnamon', '½ cup TJ’s Jumbo Raisin Medley', '¼ cup TJ’s Unsalted Dry Toasted Slivered Almonds', '2 teaspoons TJ’s Brown Sugar']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'In a small saucepan over high heat, combine oatmeal and water. When the mixture begins to boil, reduce heat to low and simmer 5 minutes.', 'Stir applesauce, cinnamon, raisins, sugar, and almond slivers into oatmeal, and continue cooking another 5 minutes. (If you prefer a thinner oatmeal, add more water or applesauce to your preference.)', ' Transfer oatmeal to serving bowls and enjoy.', 'Tags: Hearty, Oats, Pantry, Quick Meal']

recipe_description: PB&J doesn’t just have to be relegated to the realm of sandwiches. Its satisfying mix of savory and sweet lends itself well to all kinds of delights, like this easy-to-make, even-easier-to-enjoy cinnamon roll treat. The addition of bright, fruity Trader Joe’s Organic Reduced Sugar Strawberry Preserves and salty, flavorful Trader Joe’s Creamy Salted Peanut Butter puts a sensational spin on an old favorite. Enjoy as a dessert, or as a particularly opulent brunch option.
recipe_overview: Serves: 5 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 18 - 20 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 package TJ's Jumbo Cinnamon Rolls with Vanilla Icing", "TJ's Organic Reduced Sugar Strawberry Preserves", "TJ's Creamy Salted Peanut Butter"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 350°F. Remove cinnamon rolls from package and transfer to a large cutting board or workspace, reserve icing.', 'Gently separate and unravel cinnamon rolls until you have long strips of dough. Spread a thin layer of jelly atop each strip of dough, followed by a thin layer of peanut butter. Gently roll the dough strips back into their cinnamon roll shape and place on an ungreased baking sheet, about 2 inches apart.', 'Bake on center rack of oven for 18-20 minutes until golden brown. Remove from oven and let cool slightly. Drizzle rolls with reserved icing and enjoy.', 'Tags: Baking, Entertaining, Pastry, Sweet']

recipe_description: Trader Joe’s Spiced Chai Black Tea Concentrate is brewed with filtered water and steeped in small batches to fully develop its characteristic flavors—namely, allspice, black pepper, cardamom, clove, cinnamon, and ginger. This robust rundown of redolent spices is combined with sugar to create the ideal base for a perfectly perfumed, satisfyingly sweet, and altogether tasty Spiced Chai latte.
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 12 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 TJ’s Large Egg, whisked', '1 cup TJ’s Spiced Chai Black Tea Concentrate (do not dilute!)', '1¾ cup TJ’s Buttermilk Pancake & All-Purpose Baking Mix', 'TJ’s Dry Toasted Pecan Pieces', 'Your favorite TJ’s Maple Syrup']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'In a medium bowl, whisk egg and spiced chai concentrate until combined. Whisk in pancake mix until smooth. Let batter stand 5 minutes.', 'Preheat a skillet over medium. Working in batches, use a quarter-cup measuring cup to drop batter into skillet. Cook for 1-2 minutes, flipping pancakes when edges are no longer glossy and bubbles form in the center. Cook another minute or so and transfer pancakes to a serving platter. Serve pancakes with toasted pecan pieces and plenty of syrup for drizzling.', 'Tags: Brunch, Comfort Food, Spices']

recipe_description: Made with a hearty base of egg and Swiss cheese, Trader Joe’s Egg Frittata has a fluffy texture that belies its protein-packed ingredient list. Earthy cauliflower, fried onions, and the aforementioned cheese create the classic, belly-warming breakfast profile: craveably savory and utterly delicious. To amp up the protein content, our supplier uses egg whites, whole eggs, and whey protein concentrate—add it all up, and you get about 12 grams of protein and 15% of your daily calcium needs, at just 5 grams of carbs per fully-cooked Frittata!
recipe_overview: Serves: 2 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 5 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['2 TJ’s British Muffins', 'TJ’s Organic Arugula', '1 package TJ’s Egg Frittata, microwaved according to package instructions', '4 slices TJ’s Fully Cooked Bacon, microwaved according to package instructions', '1 TJ’s Tomato, thinly sliced', 'TJ’s Sriracha Sauce']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Split muffins and toast to desired doneness. Layer arugula, 1 frittata, a couple of tomato slices, and 2 slices of bacon on bottom half of toasted muffin. Drizzle with sriracha sauce and cover with top half of muffin. Repeat steps with remaining ingredients. Serve immediately.', 'Tags: Brunch, Eggs, Quick Meal']

recipe_description: Made with simple, hearty ingredients like whole wheat flour, whole grain oat flour, whey protein concentrate, and buttermilk powder, Trader Joe’s Buttermilk Protein Pancake Mix isn’t just good for a purposefully protein-y product; it’s good, period. It’s also a cinch to prepare—no muscle required. Just combine equal parts Mix and water, and you’re on your way to fluffy, satisfying Pancakes that are packed with Protein (ten grams per two-pancake serving) but free from that dreaded chalky, protein powder-y aftertaste.
recipe_overview: Serves: 3 - 4 Prep Time: 15 Minutes Cooking Time: 12 - 15 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['2 cups TJ’s Buttermilk Protein Pancake Mix', '2 cups Water', '1 bag TJ’s Organic Wild Blueberries, thawed and divided']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Add pancake mix and water to a medium bowl. Whisk just until combined. Gently fold in half of the blueberries. Let batter sit 10 minutes prior to cooking.', 'Add remaining blueberries to a microwave safe bowl. Microwave on 30 second intervals, stirring in between, until hot. Set aside.', 'Preheat a greased skillet or griddle over medium. Pour approximately ¼ cup batter per pancake. Cook 2 to 3 minutes per side, flipping when pancake edges are dry. Repeat until all batter is used. Serve hot pancakes immediately, with warmed berries on top.', 'Tags: Brunch, No Added Sugar, Pantry, Protein']

recipe_description: Soggy sandwich bread, please exit stage left! The dense construction of a bagel's crumb (that’s bakery lingo for its doughy insides) is the ideal match for creamy Trader Joe's Egg Salad. And not turning on the stove or oven to get your egg fix? That’s just the cream cheese on the bagel, as it were. Balance the velvety egg salad and toasty bagel with a glass of your favorite sparkling water or wine for a quick and tasty brunch.
recipe_overview: Serves: 3 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 5 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["3 TJ's Everything Bagels, sliced in half", '1 tub TJ’s Egg Salad', '1 tub TJ’s Pico de Gallo, hot or mild', "TJ's Fresh Chives, chopped, for garnish (optional)"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Toast bagels per your preference. Top bottom half of bagel with egg salad, pico de gallo, and chopped chives. Cover with top half of bagel and serve immediately.', 'Tags: Bagel, Breakfast, Brunch, Eggs, Quick Meal']

recipe_description: There’s a reason certain food pairings become classic in the breakfast canon—they’re just that good. Recreate this masterpiece by coupling your favorite bagel-cream cheese combo with Trader Joe’s Wild Alaskan Sockeye Smoked Salmon. Top it with thinly sliced red onion and briny capers, then toast to your good taste with a glass of bubbly. It’s fancy without the fuss—or the price tag!
recipe_overview: Serves: 3 - 6 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 5 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['3 TJ’s Everything Bagels, sliced in half', '1 tub TJ’s Whipped Cream Cheese', '1 package TJ’s Wild Alaska Sockeye Smoked Salmon', '1/4 TJ’s Red Onion, very thinly sliced', 'TJ’s Capers, drained', 'A few sprigs TJ’s Fresh Dill, for garnish']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Toast bagels per your preference. Slather each half with cream cheese. Top with salmon, red onion, capers, and dill. Serve immediately.', 'Tags: Bagel, Breakfast, Brunch, Quick Meal']

recipe_description: For a picnic-perfect spread, start with crispy Trader Joe’s Breaded Chicken Tenderloin Breasts and cool, spicy slaw on a toasted bagel. Garnish with sriracha mayo and pickle chips, and wash it down with an ice-cold glass of Trader Joe's French Market Sparkling Pink Lemonade. And don’t forget the lawn games!
recipe_overview: Serves: 6 Cooking Time: 25 - 30 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 package TJ’s Breaded Chicken Tenderloin Breasts', '1 package TJ’s Plain Bagels, sliced in half', '1 package TJ’s Organic Shredded Green & Red Cabbage with Orange Carrots', '4 tablespoons TJ’s Mayonnaise, divided', '4 tablespoons TJ’s Sriracha Sauce, divided', 'TJ’s Bread & Butter Pickle Chips']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Position oven racks in upper and lower thirds of oven. Preheat oven to 400°F. Arrange chicken tenderloin breasts on a large baking sheet. Place baking sheet on upper rack of oven and bake 10 minutes.', 'Arrange bagel halves, cut side down, in a single layer on a large baking sheet. Move the baking sheet of chicken to lower rack of oven. Place baking sheet of bagels on top rack. Bake another 15-20 minutes, until bagels are toasted and internal temperature of chicken reaches 165°F. Remove chicken and bagels from oven.', 'While chicken and bagels bake, add 2 tablespoons each of mayonnaise and sriracha to a small bowl. Mix and set aside.', 'Add remaining mayonnaise and sriracha to a medium bowl. Add cabbage & carrots to bowl and toss to combine. Set aside.', 'To assemble sandwiches, slather prepared sriracha mayo mixture on both bagel halves. Place a generous handful of slaw on bottom half of bagel, followed by two chicken tenderloin breasts and a few pickle chips. Top with other bagel half. Repeat with remaining ingredients. Serve immediately.', 'Tags: Bagel, Breakfast, Brunch, Chicken']

recipe_description: Trader Joe’s Fig Butter is a favorite ingredient among recipe testers and tasters alike in our test kitchen, and it’s easy to see why: it shines in sweet and savory applications, packs a punch of flavor in a compact jar, and it’s just downright delicious. Elevate the standard bagel & cream cheese with a healthy dollop of said Fig Butter, followed by chopped walnuts, dried apricots and a generous drizzle of honey. A chilled glass of Trader Joe’s Cranberry & Clementine Sparkling Water adds fruity sparkle without further sweetness, making this a sublime breakfast or afternoon snack.
recipe_overview: Serves: 2 - 4 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 5 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['2 TJ’s Plain Bagels, sliced in half', '1 package TJ’s Cream Cheese, quartered and softened', 'TJ’s Fig Butter', 'Handful TJ’s Dried Apricots, diced', 'Handful TJ’s Walnut Baking Pieces', 'Your favorite TJ’s Honey']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Remove lid from fig butter. Microwave on half power for 30-second intervals, stirring in between, until warm. Set aside.', 'Toast bagels per your preference. Top each half with cream cheese, spreading to cover bagel. Drizzle with warm fig butter. Top with diced apricot and walnuts, followed by a generous drizzle of honey. Enjoy immediately.', 'Tags: Bagel, Breakfast, Brunch, Quick Meal, Sweet']

recipe_description: Shakshuka has become a certified foodie phenomenon as of late, making appearances on menus of trendy joints and gastropubs everywhere. But sometimes you don’t always want to go out to the trendy restaurant (or pay trendy restaurant prices) to get your shakshuka fix. That’s why we’ve introduced Trader Joe’s Shakshuka Starter: everything you need to create a steamy, slightly spicy Shakshuka in about five minutes – all that’s required on your end are a pair of fresh eggs and a microwave or stove!
recipe_overview: Serves: 1 Cooking Time: 8 - 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['TJ’s Shakshuka Starter', '2 TJ’s Eggs', 'TJ’s Crumbled Feta Cheese', 'TJ’s Fresh Mint, torn into pieces', 'Toasted pita, flatbread, or baguette for dipping']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'MICROWAVE: Remove bowl from outer box. Puncture film 3 to 4 times with a fork. Heat on high for 3 minutes; partially peel back film and stir. Re-cover and heat for an additional 2 minutes. Peel back film, stir, make two pockets with the back of a spoon and add 2 fresh eggs. Re-cover and cook for 2 to 2 ½ minutes to cook eggs to desired doneness. Top with feta and mint, and serve with crusty bread for dipping.', 'STOVE: Place contents of shakshuka starter bowl into a small sauté pan with 2 Tbsp. of water and cover. Heat on medium low for 6 to 7 minutes, stirring occasionally, until simmering. Make two pockets with the back of a spoon and add 2 eggs. Re-cover pan and cook for 2 to 2 ½ minutes to cook eggs to desired doneness. Top with feta and mint, and serve with crusty bread for dipping.', 'Tags: Brunch, Eggs, Quick Meal, Savory, Tomatoes']

recipe_description: When you combine two different songs to create a new composition, it’s called a mashup. And when you mash up garbanzo beans & avocado, you call it: Trader Joe’s Organic Spicy Avocado Hummus. Our supplier starts with organic garbanzo beans, blending them with organic Mexican avocados and concentrated lime juice. Tahini and extra virgin olive oil are brought in to add some traditional hummus flavor and to smooth out the mixture, while jalapeños are added to supply spiciness.
recipe_overview: Serves: 1 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 5 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 TJ’s Ciabatta Roll, split lengthwise', 'TJ’s Organic Spicy Avocado Hummus', '2 TJ’s Cage Free Fresh Hard-Cooked Eggs, halved', 'Handful TJ’s Organic Grape Tomatoes, rinsed, dried, and sliced', 'TJ’s Sea Salt & Black Pepper']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Toast roll halves in toaster or oven for 5 minutes, until crisp and golden. Remove from oven. Slather each toast with hummus, and top with two egg halves and a few tomato slices. Season with salt & pepper and enjoy!', 'Tags: Avocado, Eggs, Protein, Quick Meal']

recipe_description: Whether or not you’re a meat eater has nothing to do with whether you’ll enjoy the spiciness of Trader Joe’s Soy Chorizo. Carnivores and herbivores alike sing the praises of this meatless wonder—one bite, and it’s easy to see why.
recipe_overview: Serves: 8 - 10 Prep Time: 15 Minutes Cooking Time: 25 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 bag TJ’s Roasted Potatoes with Peppers & Onions', '3 tablespoons TJ’s Olive Oil, divided', '1 package TJ’s Soy Chorizo, removed from casing', '10 TJ’s Extra Large Eggs', 'TJ’s Sea Salt & Black Pepper', "2 packages TJ’s Corn & Wheat Tortillas, or your favorite TJ's tortillas", 'TJ’s Shredded 3 Cheese Blend', 'TJ’s Mild or Hot Pico de Gallo Salsa', 'TJ’s Avocado, cubed, for garnish']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 400°F. Spread potatoes, peppers & onions on a very large (or 2 medium-sized) rimmed baking sheet. Place sheet on center rack of oven and bake 20-25 minutes, until potatoes are crisp and golden. Remove from oven and transfer to a serving dish.', 'While potatoes roast, prepare soy chorizo: Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add soy chorizo and sauté 5-8 minutes, until slightly browned and temperature reaches 165°F. Transfer to a serving bowl and cover to keep warm (wipe skillet with a paper towel; you’ll use it to scramble the eggs).', 'If desired, warm tortillas in a clean, dry skillet (or use tongs if warming directly over the burner); cover and keep warm for serving.', 'In a large bowl, beat eggs and season with salt and pepper. Melt remaining oil in skillet over medium-high heat. Pour egg mixture into center of pan and stir slowly. When curds start to form, reduce heat to low and gently fold eggs over. Cook 2-3 minutes more, then transfer eggs to a plate and let rest 1 minute to finish cooking.', 'Assembly: Fill a tortilla with soy chorizo, roasted potatoes, and scrambled eggs. Garnish with cheese, salsa, and avocado. Alternatively, lay the ingredients out buffet-style, and let your guests be the captains of their own breakfast taco ships. Enjoy!', 'Tags: Brunch, Eggs, Meatless, Tacos']

recipe_description: We’ve been selling orchards full of Trader Joe’s Spiced Cider for more than 20 years, and we anxiously anticipate its return, year after year. It's made exclusively for us, with the juice of bursting-with-flavor apples, and brewed with spices like cinnamon, allspice and cloves. Just when you think the flavor has fully revealed itself, you discover a subtle hint of citrus at the finish that really pleases the palate.
recipe_overview: Serves: 1 Cooking Time: 15 - 25 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 cup TJ's Spiced Apple Cider (seasonal)", "1/2 cup TJ's Gluten Free Rolled Oats", "TJ's Organic Brown Sugar, Freeze Dried Fuji Apple Slices, and Dried Cranberries, for garnish"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'In a medium saucepan, bring cider to a boil. Reduce heat and add rolled oats. Cook for 10-20 minutes, stirring occasionally, until desired consistency. Remove from heat, cover and let stand two minutes before serving. Top with brown sugar, freeze dried apple slices, and dried cranberries, and enjoy!', 'Tags: Apple, Comfort Food, Fall']

recipe_description: Trader Joe's Egg Nog Yogurt starts with tart, thick, whole milk Greek yogurt that’s packed with protein—11 grams per serving, to be exact! An egg nog base of egg yolks, natural flavors and nutmeg spice is added, creating a light-golden yogurt with an even creamier texture, and just the right amount of egg nog flavor. Sweet enough for dessert, it's a great addition to a breakfast bowl with granola and a handful of TJ's Pomegranate Seeds.
recipe_overview: Serves: 1 Prep Time: 3 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 container TJ's Greek Whole Milk Egg Nog Yogurt OR Cultured Coconut Nog (seasonal)", "TJ's Raspberry Preserves", "Your favorite TJ's Granola", "TJ's Pomegranate Seeds"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Spoon yogurt into a small serving bowl. Top with a spoonful of preserves, a handful of granola, and a few spoonfuls of pomegranate seeds. Enjoy!', 'Tags: Holiday, Quick Meal']

recipe_description: Get your PB&J fix for breakfast, sans bread: Blend Trader Joe’s Organic Vanilla Pea Protein with frozen strawberries, banana and unsweetened almond beverage, then garnish with crunchy Peanut Butter Protein Granola!
recipe_overview: Serves: 2 Prep Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["2 cups TJ's Frozen Strawberries", "2 scoops TJ's Organic Vanilla Pea Protein Powder, TJ's Vanilla Soy Protein Powder, or TJ's Vanilla Whey Protein Powder", "1 small TJ's Banana, peeled", "1/2 cup TJ's Unsweetened Vanilla Almond Beverage", "2 tablespoons TJ's Creamy Salted Peanut Butter, plus more for drizzling", "Handful TJ's Peanut Butter Protein Granola", "Handful TJ's Fresh Strawberries, hulled & thinly sliced, for garnish (optional)"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Add frozen strawberries, protein powder, banana, and almond beverage to a blender pitcher. Blend until smooth, adding more almond beverage if needed (mixture should be thick). Scrape mixture into bowls. Top with granola and sliced strawberries, and drizzle with peanut butter. Grab a spoon and dig in.', 'Tags: Banana, Protein, Quick Meal, Smoothie']

recipe_description: These savory waffles will WOW at breakfast, lunch or dinner.
recipe_overview: Serves: 3 - 6 Prep Time: 1 Hour 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 36 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['Falafel Waffles', "2 cups TJ's Falafel Mix", '1 3/4 cups water', "1 tablespoon TJ's Sunflower Oil", 'Toppings', "TJ's Organic Tahini", "TJ's Fresh Parsley, chopped", "TJ's Roasted Red Peppers, drained and chopped", "TJ's Lemons, sliced into wedges", 'Supplies', 'Waffle Iron']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'In a large bowl, combine falafel mix and water. Cover and let sit 1 hour. Stir in 1 tablespoon sunflower oil.', "Preheat waffle iron. Scoop 1/3 of the batter onto the center of the waffle iron and spread evenly with a spatula toward the edges. Close waffle iron and cook 12 minutes, until golden brown. Remove waffle from iron and repeat process two more times (you'll end up with three large waffles).", 'To serve, garnish waffles with chopped peppers and parsley, a drizzle of tahini and a squeeze of lemon.', 'Tags: Brunch, Mediterranean, Pantry, Savory']

recipe_description: Yes, bacon. Don't be afraid of this bold combo – one bite and this sandwich's sweet-savory flavors will have you sold.
recipe_overview: Serves: 1 - 2 Prep Time: 8 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 TJ's Pretzel Bagel", "2 tablespoons TJ's Cocoa Almond Spread", "2 tablespoons TJ's Creamy Salted Peanut Butter", "2 slices TJ's Uncured Dry Rubbed Sliced Bacon, cooked"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Slice bagel in half and toast until warm. Spread Cocoa Almond Spread over one side of bagel and peanut butter over the other. Cut slices of bacon in half and arrange on one side of bagel. Sandwich the sides together and cut in half. Serve immediately.', 'Tags: Bacon, Brunch, Chocolate']

recipe_description: Long before it became a famed food trend, toasted bread slathered with toppings was simply a satisfying way to start your day, or a satiating snack to get you through between meals. Self-described fans of simple, satiating, and satisfying food that we are, we couldn’t help but adore this restrained “recipe” for ricotta toast. (We know, no one needs a recipe for toast, but we couldn’t resist the photo op!)
recipe_overview: Serves: 1 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 3 - 4 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["TJ's Cultured Butter, softened", "1 slice TJ's Sliced French Brioche", "TJ's Traditional Whole Milk Ricotta Cheese OR Part Skim Ricotta Cheese", "TJ's Raspberry Preserves"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat a nonstick pan over medium-high heat. Slather butter on both sides of brioche. Place in preheated pan and cook 1-2 minutes per side, until golden. Transfer toast to a plate.', 'Cover toast with a generous scoop of ricotta. Use the back of a spoon to create a well in the ricotta and fill with raspberry preserves. Enjoy immediately.', 'Tags: Cheese, Sweet, Toast']

recipe_description: Trader Joe’s Honey with Honeycomb is truly the bee’s knees, and it’s also fairly straightforward: a jar of honey that’s got a piece of honeycomb inside. Drizzle it atop mascarpone cheese and fresh citrus on hearty, whole grain bread for a sweet, sunny start to your day.
recipe_overview: Serves: 1 Prep Time: 5 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["TJ's European Style Multigrain Bread (available in the West Coast) OR your favorite thinly sliced TJ's Multigrain Bread, lightly toasted", "TJ's Mascarpone", "TJ's Clementines, Mandarins, or Grapefruit", "TJ's Honeycomb Honey"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Generously slather toast with mascarpone; set aside. Using a sharp knife, cut the poles off the citrus so the flesh is exposed. Stand citrus upright, and slice peel and pith off in sections until fully removed. Turn citrus on its side and slice thinly. Arrange citrus slices atop prepared toast and drizzle with honey. Serve immediately, with a piece of honeycomb on the side.', 'Tags: Citrus, Spring, Toast, Winter']

recipe_description: You can put almost anything in a breakfast burrito (or brunchfast burrito, if you're not feeling bright-eyed and bushy-tailed until late morning), but two ingredients are absolute musts: eggs and tortillas. You scramble your eggs, you wrap them in a tortilla, and if you’re not feeling very adventurous, you could be done.
recipe_overview: Serves: 6 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 30 - 35 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["12 TJ's Large Eggs", "3/4 cup TJ's Milk", "4 tablespoons TJ's Unsalted Butter", "TJ's Salt & Pepper", "6 TJ's Flour Tortillas, warmed", "1 package TJ's Hashbrowns", "1 package TJ's Dry Rubbed Bacon OR Uncured Fully Cooked Bacon", "1 bag TJ's Shredded 3 Cheese Blend", "1 TJ's Large Avocado, thinly sliced", "Your favorite TJ's Hot Sauce, Salsa, or Sriracha"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 400°F. Arrange oven racks in upper and lower thirds of oven. Place a wire rack on a large rimmed baking sheet. Arrange hash browns on rack and bake on upper rack of oven for 10 minutes.', 'If using dry dubbed bacon: While hash browns are baking, line a second baking sheet with parchment paper and place a wire rack on the baking sheet. Arrange bacon evenly on wire rack. Place sheet on lower rack of oven. Bake hash browns and bacon 20 minutes. Remove from oven and let cool slightly.', 'If using fully cooked bacon: microwave bacon according to package directions; set aside.', 'In a large bowl, thoroughly whisk eggs and milk, set aside. Melt butter in a large nonstick skillet over high heat. Pour egg mixture into center of pan and stir slowly. When curds start to form, reduce heat to low and gently fold eggs over. Cook 2-3 minutes more, then transfer eggs to a plate and let rest 1 minute to finish cooking.', 'Assemble burritos: Lay tortilla on a flat work surface. Place 1/6th of scrambled eggs in the center of the tortilla. Layer a hash brown and 2 slices of bacon atop eggs. Top with 1/4 cup shredded cheese, sliced avocado, and a drizzle of hot sauce. Pull half of the tortilla closest to you up to meet the top half, then pull the tortilla and fillings back toward you. Fold in the left and right sides of the tortilla, then roll tightly until closed. Repeat burrito assembly with remaining ingredients. Enjoy!', 'Tags: Brunch, Eggs, Spring']

recipe_description: You probably know how to assemble a sandwich—but you may not know that cooking bacon on a sheet pan eases sandwich assembly (and cleanup!), giving you time to focus on frying eggs like a pro.
recipe_overview: Serves: 6 - 8 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 25 - 30 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 package TJ's Dry Rubbed Bacon", "1 bag TJ's Organic Arugula", "1 package TJ's Sliced Aged Swiss Cheese", "3-4 TJ's Kumato Tomatoes, sliced", "TJ's Gluten Free Whole Grain or Multigrain Bread (toasted or untoasted, your call!)", "2 tablespoons TJ's Salted Butter, divided", "6-8 TJ's Large Eggs (1 egg per sandwich)", "TJ's Salt & Pepper"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 375°F. Place a wire rack on top of a large rimmed baking sheet. Arrange bacon slices evenly on rack. Bake on center rack of oven for 15-20 minutes. Remove from oven and let cool 5 minutes.', 'Pre-assemble sandwiches: layer a handful of arugula, 2-3 slices bacon, 1 slice cheese, and tomato atop one slice of bread. Repeat for each sandwich.', 'Fry the eggs: melt 1 tablespoon butter in a nonstick skillet over medium heat. Crack 3-4 eggs into skillet and sprinkle with salt & pepper. Cook 1 minute, until whites are slightly opaque. Reduce heat to low, cover skillet with lid and cook 4-6 minutes more, to desired level of yolk doneness.', 'Using a spatula, carefully lift eggs out of skillet and slide onto prepared sandwich halves. Top with second slice of bread. Cook remaining eggs following steps above and assemble remaining sandwiches. Serve immediately.', 'Tags: Bacon, Brunch, Eggs, Sandwich']

recipe_description: Crispy fried rice cradles creamy eggs and avocado in this one-pan brunch (or lunch, or dinner) favorite.
recipe_overview: Serves: 6 - 8 Cooking Time: 15 - 19 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["3 tablespoons TJ's Sunflower Oil", "2 bags TJ's Chicken Fried Rice", "6-8 TJ's Large Eggs (1 egg per guest)", "2 bags TJ's Organic Baby Spinach, for serving", "TJ's Avocado, sliced, and TJ's Sriracha Sauce, for garnish"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Heat oil in a large nonstick pan over medium-high heat. Add fried rice to pan and toss to coat. Cover and sauté 5-7 minutes until chicken is heated through, stirring halfway through cooking.', 'Remove lid and reduce heat to medium. Spread rice evenly in pan and create wells in the rice with the back of a spoon. Crack an egg into each well and replace lid. Cook 5-7 minutes or to preferred egg doneness. Remove lid and remove pan from heat.', 'Divide spinach among plates. Using a spatula, carefully separate rice around each egg into individual servings. Gently place an egg rice patty atop each bed of spinach. Top with sliced avocado and a generous squirt of sriracha sauce, and dig in!', 'Tags: Brunch, One-dish Meal']
