Perhaps, she thought, with a food that’s rich and creamy, filled with healthy fats, and seemingly hipper than ever: the avocado.
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 package TJ’s Quinoa Cowboy Veggie Burgers', '4 TJ’s Whole Wheat Hamburger Buns', '1 tub TJ’s Avocado Tzatziki Dip', '½ TJ”s Red Onion, very thinly sliced', 'TJ’s Fresh Cilantro, chopped']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 450°F. Remove burgers from packaging and place on an ungreased baking sheet. Bake 5 minutes or until browned. Carefully flip and continue to bake an additional 5 minutes, or until heated through and well browned. Remove from oven and let cool slightly.', 'Place burger patty on bottom of hamburger bun. Top with a generous swipe of Avocado Tzatziki dip, followed by sliced red onion and cilantro. Top with hamburger bun and serve immediately.', '  Tags: Burgers, Meatless, Quick Meal, Spicy']

recipe_description: This recipe for Creamy Chicken Gnocchi Soup comes straight from a Crew Member’s kitchen. Simmer Trader Joe’s Kettle Cooked Chicken Soup with a package of shelf-stable Gnocchi and a container of shelf-stable Whipping Cream (shout out to pantry essentials!), and you could be serving it in your kitchen in 10 minutes—yes, you read that right. Serving Trader Joe’s Organic French Rolls with a bowl of this creamy, chicken dumpling-esque soup isn’t required, but it’s absolutely recommended.
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 - 6 Cooking Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["2 tubs TJ's Kettle Cooked Chicken Soup", '1 package Gnocchi (shelf-stable)', "1 package TJ's Whipping Cream (shelf-stable)", "TJ's Fresh Thyme, for garnish (optional)"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Add all ingredients to a medium saucepan. Heat over medium and bring to a simmer. Simmer 10 minutes, stirring occasionally. Garnish with fresh thyme and serve.', 'Tags: Chicken, Comfort Food, Soup, Winter']

recipe_description: Think pasta salad is reserved for spring and summer? This recipe, and our recipe taste-testers, beg to differ. It’s a bright soup with the power to beat the winter blahs, made substantial with Trader Joe’s Mediterranean Pasta Salad. Tangy Lemon Pepper Grilled Chicken adds protein and zingy flavor, balanced by briny feta and olives in the pasta salad. A quick simmer in savory Organic Chicken Stock, and you’ll have the sights and smells of the sunny Mediterranean filling your soup bowl...
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 - 6 Prep Time: 3 Minutes Cooking Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 package TJ's Lemon Pepper Grilled Chicken or Balsamic Chicken", "2 tubs TJ's Mediterranean Style Orzo Pasta Salad", "2 packages TJ's Organic Chicken Stock", "1 TJ's Lemon, sliced into wedges"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Use forks to pull apart chicken and shred into pieces. Add all ingredients to a medium saucepan and heat over medium high. Bring to a boil, then lower heat and simmer 8 minutes. Serve hot with a squeeze of lemon.', 'Tags: Chicken, Lemon, Quick Meal, Soup']

recipe_description: A veteran of our line of frozen Indian entrées, Trader Joe’s Channa Masala is moderately spicy, belly-warming, and undeniably comforting—basically everything you’re looking for when it comes to cold weather cuisine. Paired with full-flavored Organic Roasted Tomato & Red Pepper Soup, it’s ready before you can ask “What’s for lunch?” (Well, almost.) Don’t forget to warm up Trader Joe’s Malabari Paratha for dipping!
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Cooking Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 package TJ’s Organic Low Sodium Tomato & Roasted Red Pepper Soup', '2 packages TJs Channa Masala', 'TJ’s Greek Yogurt or Sour Cream and chopped parsley, for garnish (optional)', 'TJ’s Malabari Paratha, cooked according to package directions, for dipping (optional)']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Add soup to a medium saucepan. Heat over medium-low, stirring occasionally.', 'While soup heats, microwave channa masala according to package directions; stir.', 'Divide soup among 4 shallow serving bowls. Divide channa masala and gently spoon atop center of soup. Garnish with a dollop of yogurt and a sprinkle of chopped parsley. Enjoy!', 'Tags: Comfort Food, Indian, Meatless, Quick Meal, Soup, Winter']

recipe_description: Trader Joe’s Organic Rosé Vinaigrette is light, tangy, and slightly floral, just like its namesake wine varietal. Made with organic sunflower oil, organic red wine vinegar, and organic rosé wine vinegar, it has savory depth thanks to dried garlic, organic dried basil, organic dried oregano, with a bit of organic agave syrup to sweeten the deal. It’s fantastic tossed with hot pasta and halved cherry tomatoes for a light supper.
recipe_overview: Serves: 2 - 4 Prep Time: 15 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['4 handfuls TJ’s Pita Chips, broken into pieces', '1-2 tablespoons TJ’s Extra Virgin Olive Oil', '2 TJ’s Organic Romaine Hearts, chopped into strips', '2-4 tablespoons TJ’s Organic Rosé Vinaigrette', '2 TJ’s Persian Cucumbers, sliced', '½ package TJ’s Organic Cherry Tomatoes, halved', '¼ TJ’s Red Onion, thinly sliced', '1 TJ’s Lemon, sliced, for serving', 'TJ’s Sea Salt & Pepper Grinders']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Add pita chips and olive oil to a medium bowl and toss to coat; set aside.', 'Add romaine and 2 tablespoons dressing to a large bowl, toss to combine. Add more dressing to taste. Top with cucumbers, tomatoes, red onion, and pita chips. Garnish with a squeeze of lemon and a few grinds of salt & pepper. Enjoy immediately, as-is or topped with grilled chicken or tempeh.', 'Tags: Meatless, Salad']

recipe_description: If you’re wondering why Trader Joe’s Organic Corn Chip Dippers made our not-scientific-but-still-pretty-accurate list of Crew Member Favorites, you probably haven’t tried these delightfully crunchy, dippable chips—something you should change very soon. They’re made with a mere three ingredients: organic corn, organic sunflower oil, and salt. That’s it!
recipe_overview: Serves: 2 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 5 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 bag TJ’s Organic Corn Chip Dippers', '1 can TJ’s Turkey Chili, heated according to package directions', 'TJ’s Shredded Three Cheese Mexican Blend', 'TJ’s Hot & Sweet Jalapeños']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Lay the closed bag of corn chip dippers flat on a clean work surface. Using a sharp pair of scissors, cut the corn chip dipper bag in half crosswise, so that each half of the bag contains dippers (even the portions out if necessary). Roll the cut edges of each side down to create “bowls.”', 'Top the dippers with warmed turkey chili, cheese, and jalapeños to taste. Dig in!', 'Tags: Cheese, Corn, Pantry, Spicy']

recipe_description: By combining the bright, zesty tomato and pepper flavors of a traditional chunky salsa with the texture and nuttiness of finely chopped pepitas, Trader Joe's Pepita Salsa has created a savory synthesis of seed and spice. Each bite carries the delicate sweet heat of puréed bell pepper and chipotle spices, making this one seriously satisfying salsa for scooping with tortilla chips or drizzling atop a hearty roasted veggie bowl.
recipe_overview: Serves: 2 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 3 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 package TJ's Frozen Brown Rice, microwaved according to package directions", '2 cups of your favorite roasted vegetables, cold or warm (we used Brussels Sprouts & Delicata Squash, feel free to sub in whatever you have on hand)', "2 handfuls TJ's Kale", "1 TJ's Avocado", "TJ's Pepita Salsa"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Divide rice among two serving bowls. Top each bowl with roasted veggies, a handful of kale and half an avocado. Drizzle with salsa and enjoy.', 'Tags: Fall, Hearty, Meatless, Salsa, Vegetable']

recipe_description: Trader Joe’s Turkey Burgers are made using fresh, white & dark turkey meat, a combination that ensures juicy, flavorful burgers. You can cook them on the stovetop or grill—from frozen, even!—in just a few minutes. Paired with crunchy kale slaw and ridge cut potato chips, dinner doesn’t get much easier than this—and you don’t have to sacrifice quality or taste for the sake of convenience and value.
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 12 - 16 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 package TJ's Turkey Burgers", "1 tablespoon TJ's Olive Oil", "1 package TJ's Broccoli Kale Slaw Complete Salad Kit", "TJ's Gourmet White Hamburger Buns or TJ's Gluten Free Hamburger Buns", "TJ's Ridge Cut Potato Chips (optional)"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Add oil to a grill pan or skillet and turn heat to medium-high. Cook turkey burgers according to package directions; remove from heat.', 'In a medium bowl, toss salad with included toppings and dressing. To assemble, place turkey burger on bottom half of bun. Top with slaw and top half of bun, and serve with potato chips.', 'Tags: Burgers, Grilling']

recipe_description: The kale in Trader Joe's Vegan Kale, Cashew & Basil Pesto gives it some serious depth, while the basil infuses it with freshness, and the cashew butter lends it enough creaminess to leave you saying, “Parmesan? Who needs Parmesan?!” Aside from the obvious pasta pairings, it makes a splash as a spread on burgers and sandwiches, too.
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 8 - 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["2 packages TJ's Portabella Mushrooms, wiped with a damp cloth, stems removed", "TJ's Olive Oil", "TJ's Salt & Pepper", "4 slices TJ's Provolone Cheese", "2 TJ's Roasted Red Bell Peppers, thinly sliced", "4 of your favorite TJ's Artisan Rolls, baked according to package directions", "TJ's Organic Baby Lettuce Mix", "TJ's Vegan Kale, Cashew & Basil Pesto"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat grill to medium-high. Brush mushrooms with olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Grill mushrooms, gill side-down for 5 minutes; flip mushrooms and grill another 3-5 minutes until tender. Remove from heat and place provolone on top to melt.', 'Slice rolls in half lengthwise. Generously slather bottom half of a roll with pesto. Top with mushroom, bell pepper, spring mix, and top half of roll. Repeat with remaining ingredients and enjoy immediately.', 'Tags: Burgers, Grilling, Meatless']

recipe_description: Lusciously velvety, our Fig Butter is full of rich, ripe figs, cooked down with sugar and a bit of lemon to balance the sweetness. It’s a shining star as a glaze for chicken, a supreme spread for cheese boards, and a sweetly craveable counterpoint atop savory buffalo patties.
recipe_overview: Serves: 6 Prep Time: 15 Minutes Cooking Time: 12 - 16 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["2 packages TJ's Ground Buffalo Burgers, thawed according to package directions", "TJ's Sea Salt & Pepper", "6 TJ's Brioche Buns", "TJ's Goat Cheese Crumbles", "1 TJ's Beefsteak Tomato", "1/2 TJ's Red Onion, thinly sliced", "TJ's Organic Arugula", "TJ's Fig Butter"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat a grill to medium-high. Season burgers with salt and pepper. Grill burgers according to package directions; remove from heat and let rest 5 minutes.', 'To assemble, place a burger on the bottom half of a bun. Top with goat cheese crumbles, tomato, arugula and onion. Generously slather fig butter on top half of bun and place on burger. Repeat with remaining ingredients and serve immediately.', 'Tags: Burgers, Grilling']

recipe_name: Veggie Burger with Almond Butter Turmeric Slaw
recipe_description: With an impressive 26 grams of protein per patty (shout out to pea protein!), Trader Joe’s Hi-Protein Veggie Burger offers a texture that’s surprisingly… “meaty.” It’s seasoned with garlic, sea salt and black pepper, making it a good-eating burger that plays well with toppings, such as the grilled sweet potato slabs and almond butter turmeric slaw in this recipe.
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Prep Time: 15 Minutes Cooking Time: 20 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["2 packages TJ's Hi-Protein Veggie Burgers", "2 teaspoons TJ's Olive Oil", '2 TJ\'s Sweet Potatoes, peeled and sliced into 1/4" rounds', "TJ's Sea Salt & Pepper", "1 bag TJ's Organic Shredded Cabbage & Carrots", "1-2 tablespoons TJ's Almond Butter Turmeric Salad Dressing", "TJ's Honey Wheat Hamburger Buns", "1 TJ's Avocado"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 425°F. Place burgers on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Bake 20 minutes on center rack of oven, flipping burgers halfway through cooking; remove from heat.', 'While burgers bake, in a small bowl, toss sweet potato rounds with olive oil. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Heat a grill pan to medium-high. Grill sweet potatoes 3-4 minutes per side; remove from heat.', 'In a medium bowl, toss shredded cabbage with salad dressing; set aside.', 'To assemble: place a veggie burger on the bottom half of a hamburger bun. Top with sweet potato rounds, slaw, sliced avocado, and top half of bun. Repeat with remaining ingredients and serve immdiately.', 'Tags: Burgers, Meatless, Sweet Potato']

recipe_description: Trader Joe’s Organic Kansas City Style BBQ Sauce is a grill’s best friend. Its tangy, sweet-smokiness instantly ups the ante on grilled meat, ribs, and chicken, commanding center of the plate attention with the flick of a basting brush. But you don’t need to fire up the grill to get your fill—try replacing the marinara in a classic meatball sub with a drizzle of this Organic BBQ Sauce for a rib-sticking supper that’s ready in no time.
recipe_overview: Serves: 6 - 8 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 5 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["2 bags TJ's Meatless Meatballs", "1 bottle TJ's Organic Kansas City Style BBQ Sauce", "1 package TJ's Gourmet White Hot Dog Buns", "1 package TJ's Sliced Provolone", "1/2 TJ's Red Onion, diced"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'In a large microwave safe dish, microwave meatballs according to package directions. Pour BBQ sauce over meatballs just to cover, and stir to combine. Continue to microwave on half power at 30-second intervals, stirring in between, until sauce is warmed through.', 'Open hot dog buns and arrange on a large baking sheet. Fill each bun with 4 meatballs and top with warmed sauce and a slice of provolone.', 'Heat broiler to high. Broil subs 3-5 minutes, until cheese is melted and brown, and buns are golden (depending on your broiler, you may have to cover empty side of bun with foil to prevent burning). Remove subs from oven and let cool slightly. Top with diced red onion and enjoy.', 'Tags: BBQ, Meatless']

recipe_description: Do you tend to avoid traditional (read: heavy on the palate) pasta dishes due to the carb-induced slumber often left in their wake? Then try this Cool & Spicy Noodle Salad, a savory, peanut-y side dish that’s a little bit Thai, a little bit Italian, and a whole lot of energizing flavor.
recipe_overview: Serves: 8 Prep Time: 40 Minutes Cooking Time: 7 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 package TJ's Organic Yellow Lentil & Brown Rice Spaghetti", "1 package TJ's Shredded Cabbage", "1/2 package TJ's Shredded Carrots", "2 TJ's Red Bell Peppers, cored and very thinly sliced", "1 cup TJ's Spicy Peanut Vinaigrette, plus more to taste", 'Handful Fresh cilantro, rinsed and chopped (optional)', "Handful of TJ's Half Salted Peanuts, crushed (optional)"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Prepare pasta according to package directions. Meanwhile, prepare a large bowl of ice water. Transfer cooked, drained pasta to ice water to cool. Drain pasta thoroughly and add to a very large mixing bowl.', 'Add cabbage, carrots, bell peppers and vinaigrette to pasta. Gently toss to combine. Adjust dressing to taste and add cilantro, if desired. Cover and chill 30 minutes. Garnish with crushed peanuts prior to serving.', 'Tags: Pasta, Salad, Summer']

recipe_description: These savory waffles will WOW at breakfast, lunch or dinner.
recipe_overview: Serves: 3 - 6 Prep Time: 1 Hour 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 36 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['Falafel Waffles', "2 cups TJ's Falafel Mix", '1 3/4 cups water', "1 tablespoon TJ's Sunflower Oil", 'Toppings', "TJ's Organic Tahini", "TJ's Fresh Parsley, chopped", "TJ's Roasted Red Peppers, drained and chopped", "TJ's Lemons, sliced into wedges", 'Supplies', 'Waffle Iron']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'In a large bowl, combine falafel mix and water. Cover and let sit 1 hour. Stir in 1 tablespoon sunflower oil.', "Preheat waffle iron. Scoop 1/3 of the batter onto the center of the waffle iron and spread evenly with a spatula toward the edges. Close waffle iron and cook 12 minutes, until golden brown. Remove waffle from iron and repeat process two more times (you'll end up with three large waffles).", 'To serve, garnish waffles with chopped peppers and parsley, a drizzle of tahini and a squeeze of lemon.', 'Tags: Brunch, Mediterranean, Pantry, Savory']

recipe_description: A bit of heat, a bit of sweetness, a lot of cream cheese. This 'wich is especially excellent when cut into triangles and served as an appetizer.
recipe_overview: Serves: 3 Cooking Time: 20 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["6 slices TJ's Multigrain Bread", "1 jar TJ's Hot & Sweet Pepper Jelly", '1 block of TJ\'s Cream Cheese, cut into 1/4" slices', "3 tablespoons TJ's Unsalted Butter"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Heat skillet over medium heat. Divide butter and spread evenly on slices of bread. Place one slice butter-down on skillet. Immediately place slices of cream cheese onto bread, enough to cover (about five). Top cream cheese with pepper jelly. Place second slice of bread on top with butter facing up.', 'Let cook for 3-4 minutes, until bottom is golden brown. Flip the sandwich and let it cook for 3-4 more minutes, until bottom is golden brown and the cream cheese has softened.', 'Transfer sandwich to a cutting board and cut into triangles, or your preferred shape.', 'Cook remaining two sandwiches in the same manner. Serve immediately.']

recipe_description: Yes, bacon. Don't be afraid of this bold combo – one bite and this sandwich's sweet-savory flavors will have you sold.
recipe_overview: Serves: 1 - 2 Prep Time: 8 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 TJ's Pretzel Bagel", "2 tablespoons TJ's Cocoa Almond Spread", "2 tablespoons TJ's Creamy Salted Peanut Butter", "2 slices TJ's Uncured Dry Rubbed Sliced Bacon, cooked"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Slice bagel in half and toast until warm. Spread Cocoa Almond Spread over one side of bagel and peanut butter over the other. Cut slices of bacon in half and arrange on one side of bagel. Sandwich the sides together and cut in half. Serve immediately.', 'Tags: Bacon, Brunch, Chocolate']

recipe_overview: Serves: 3 Prep Time: 1 Hour Cooking Time: 7 - 9 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 cup TJ's Falafel Mix", '3/4 cup water', "1 bottle TJ's Sunflower Oil", "9 teaspoons TJ's Crumbled Feta, divided", "Your favorite TJ's Hummus, Salad Greens, and Flatbread (Flatbread, Naan, Malabari Paratha, etc.) for serving (optional)"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Combine falafel mix and water in a medium sized bowl; cover and set aside for one hour.', 'Roughly divide falafel dough into 9 sections. Holding one piece of dough in your palm, press a teaspoon of feta into the center and mold the dough around it to conceal the feta. Repeat with remaining dough (you should have 9 dough balls).', 'Fill a 3-quart stockpot with sunflower oil, about four inches high. Turn heat to medium-high and heat oil to 300°F.', 'Working in batches, use a long-handled slotted spoon to gently lower dough balls into oil. Fry until floating and dark golden brown, 2 to 2 1/2 minutes. Transfer to a paper towel lined plate and cool 2 to 3 minutes before serving. Serve as an appetizer with your favorite hummus, or atop a bed of greens or in a toasted flatbread for a meatless meal.', 'Tags: Meatless']

recipe_name: Grilled Tempeh with Mexican Style Corn & Quinoa Salad
recipe_description: Trader Joe’s Mexican Style Corn & Quinoa Salad is our tribute to esquites, the beloved Mexican street food made from kernels of grilled corn mixed with mayonnaise, cotija cheese, and lime juice. We take the corn, cotija, and lime juice (and sub out the mayonnaise for a poblano-cilantro dressing), and add in some crunchy kale & cabbage, tart grape tomatoes, and a hearty quinoa & brown rice blend.
recipe_overview: Serves: 2 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 19 - 21 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['Salad', "1 package TJ's Organic 3 Grain Tempeh", "TJ's Sunflower Oil", "1 container TJ's Mexican Corn & Quinoa Salad", 'Supplies', 'Steamer basket', 'Grill pan or grill']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Fill a pot with a few inches of water and bring to a boil. Slice tempeh crosswise, about 1/2 inch thick. Place tempeh in steamer basket in pot, cover and steam 15 minutes. Remove from heat and allow tempeh to cool slightly.', 'Heat a grill pan or grill to medium high heat. Brush tempeh slices with sunflower oil. Grill tempeh 2-3 minutes per side and remove from heat.', 'Add salad and dressing to a large bowl, toss to combine. Divide salad between two plates and top with grilled tempeh. Serve immediately.', 'Tags: Corn, Grilling, Meatless, Salad']

recipe_description: One of the best things about Trader Joe's Chicken-less Mandarin Orange Morsels is that if you didn’t know they weren’t chicken, you’d probably think they were chicken. They’re as tender and juicy as can be, and once you coat them in that beloved orange sauce (which comes in a separate packet), you’ll taste nothing but citrusy, gingery, garlicky goodness. Plate them atop sautéed Cruciferous Crunch and you'll have a meatless meal on the table in under 15 minutes.
recipe_overview: Serves: 2 Cooking Time: 10 - 11 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["2 tablespoons TJ's Sunflower Oil", "1 bag TJ's Chickenless Mandarin Orange Morsels", "scant 1/3 cup TJ's Pineapple Tidbits, defrosted", "2/3 bag TJ's Cruciferous Crunch"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Divide cruciferous crunch between two plates, set aside. Heat oil in a nonstick pan over medium heat. Add morsels to pan and cook 6-8 minutes, turning regularly to avoid browning. Add mandarin orange sauce packet and pineapple to pan and cook 2 minutes, stirring to coat. Remove pan from heat. Divide morsels and pineapple among prepared plates and serve immediately.', 'Tags: Meatless, Quick Meal, Salad']

recipe_description: With turkey breast meat, dried cranberries, apples, pecans & sage, our ready-to-eat Turkey Cranberry Apple Salad allows you to enjoy the flavors of Thanksgiving leftovers without cooking the entire meal.
recipe_overview: Serves: 3 Prep Time: 5 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 container TJ's Turkey Cranberry Apple Salad (seasonal)", "6 slices of your favorite TJ's Multigrain Bread (toasted or untoasted, your call)", "3-4 leaves TJ's Organic Romaine Hearts, rinsed and torn into pieces"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Divide turkey cranberry apple salad among three slices of bread. Top each with romaine and another slice of bread. Enjoy!', 'Tags: Fall, Sandwich, Turkey']

recipe_description: Rich, roasted delicata squash, tangy feta with pomegranate seeds, and al dente pasta set the stage for a hearty meal.
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 - 6 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 30 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["2 TJ's Delicata Squash, halved lenghtwise and de-seeded (or substitute 3 cups of your favorite peeled & cubed squash)", "1 tablespoon TJ's Olive Oil", "1 teaspoon TJ's Sea Salt", "1/2 teaspoon TJ's Pepper", "1 package TJ's Organic Brown Rice & Quinoa Fusilli Pasta", "1 package TJ's Organic Pomegranate Seeds"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 400°F. Slice squash 3/4 inches thick and toss with olive oil, salt and pepper. Arrange on a large baking sheet and roast for 30-35 minutes until fork tender, tossing halfway through cooking.', 'While squash cooks, prepare pasta according to package directions. Drain pasta and rinse under cold water to halt the cooking process. Divide baby lettuce among four plates and top with pasta. Top each salad with crumbled feta and pomegranate seeds. Drizzle vinaigrette atop each salad and serve immediately, with more dressing on the side.', 'Tags: Fall, Pasta, Pumpkin, Salad, Squash']

recipe_name: Grilled Blue Cheese, Apricots & Spicy Pecans
recipe_description: This blues-y composition (made flowing with mozzarella) gets jazzy with inflections of bright dried apricots and spicy pecans. You’ll be singing for more!
recipe_overview: Serves: 1 - 2 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['I slice of your favorite TJ’s Multigrain Bread', '½ cup TJ’s Arugula', '3 Tbsp TJ’s Caved Aged Blue Cheese, crumbled', '2 Tbsp TJ’s diced Dried Apricots', '2 Tbsp TJ’s Sweet and Spicy Pecans, chopped', '4 Tbsp TJ’s Shredded Mozzarella Cheese']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 425°F.', 'Lightly toast bread (light setting on toaster) or about 1 to 2 minutes each side in the oven).', 'Mix blue cheese, apricots and pecans together. Set aside.', 'Place arugula on toast, top with mozzarella, and then with the blue mixture. Place in oven and toast until all cheese is melted, apricots are warm and pecans are slightly toasted; about 6 to 8 minutes. Adorn with extra apricots and/or pecans. Serve right away.', 'Tags: Cheese, Fall, Grilled, Sandwich, Toast, Winter']

recipe_overview: Serves: 5 Prep Time: 15 Minutes Cooking Time: 30 - 35 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["2 TJ's Russet Potatoes, rinsed and dried", "1 TJ's Yellow Onion, rinsed and dried", "3 TJ's Whole Organic Carrots, rinsed and dried", '1 bag TJ’s Tricolor Peppers, rinsed and dried', '1 bag TJ’s Organic Broccoli Florets, rinsed and dried', "1 package TJ’s Spicy Italian Chicken Sausages (or your favorite TJ's fully cooked chicken sausage)", '3 tablespoons TJ’s Extra Virgin Olive Oil, divided', '2 teaspoons TJ’s 21 Seasoning Salute, divided', "1 teaspoon TJ's Sea Salt, divided", '2 bags TJ’s Frozen Rice Medley']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'You will need 5 microwave-safe food storage containers for daily meal prep.', 'Adjust oven racks to upper and lower level of oven. Preheat oven to 400°F and line two large baking sheets with parchment paper; set aside.', 'Cube potatoes, onion and carrots. In a large bowl, gently toss cubed veggies with 1 tablespoon olive oil, 1 teaspoon seasoning and 1/2 teaspoon salt. Spread veggie mixture evenly on baking sheet. Bake on upper rack of oven for 10 minutes.', 'While potatoes, onion and carrots are baking, roughly chop peppers and broccoli. Slice sausages. In a large bowl, gently toss peppers, broccoli and sausages with 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1 teaspoon seasoning and 1/2 teaspoon salt. Spread mixture evenly on second baking sheet and set aside.', 'After 10 minutes, move the baking sheet with veggie mixture to the bottom rack of oven. Place the sheet with the sausage mixture on the upper rack of oven. Bake 20-25 minutes, until veggies are fork-tender. Remove both sheets from oven and set aside to cool.', 'Assemble meals: Microwave rice according to package directions. Combine the veggie and sausage mixtures in a large bowl, tossing gently to combine. Lay out five food storage containers. Divide rice evenly among containers. Divide veggie sausage mixture evenly among containers. Cover and refrigerate until ready to eat.', 'To reheat: Remove lid from container and place in microwave. Heat in one minute increments, stirring occasionally, until heated through. Enjoy!', 'Tags: peppers']

recipe_description: Trader Joe's Cage-Free Hard-Cooked Eggs, Fullly Cooked Uncured Bacon, and Blue Cheese Crumbles contribute to this quick, uncomplicated yet filling salad that’s loaded with toppings—which is always the best part of a salad, anyway.
recipe_overview: Serves: 5 Prep Time: 15 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['Ingredients', "1/2 package TJ's Fully Cooked Uncured Bacon", "1 package TJ's Romaine Hearts, rinsed and chopped", "16 oz. TJ's Grape Tomatoes, rinsed and halved", '5 Cage Free Fresh Hard-Cooked Eggs, quartered', "1 package TJ's Grilled Chicken Strips", "1 container TJ's Blue Cheese Crumbles", "2 TJ's Avocados", "1 bottle TJ's Red Wine & Olive Oil Vinaigrette OR 1 jar TJ's Chunky Blue Cheese Dressing", 'Supplies', '5 food storage containers for daily meal prep', '5 small sauce containers for dressing']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Microwave bacon according to package directions. Chop bacon into bite sized pieces. Line up your food storage containers and lay a bed of romaine at the bottom of each. Divide bacon, tomatoes, eggs, and chicken evenly among containers. Top each salad with 2 tablespoons blue cheese. Measure 2 tablespoons dressing into each sauce container. Cover and refrigerate until ready to eat. Save avocado and slice fresh each day.', 'When ready to eat, slice 1/3 of an avocado atop salad and drizzle with dressing. Enjoy!', 'Tags: Bacon, Eggs, Salad']

recipe_description: Pump up your protein intake by building a simple, pre-prepped snack box, consisting of fresh produce, Cage Free Hard-Cooked Egg, and Peanut Butter with Flax & Chia Seeds. (And though it might not be “dessert” in the strictest sense, the cheese is, undoubtedly, a treat.)
recipe_overview: Serves: 5 Prep Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['5 TJ’s Cage Free Fresh Hard-Cooked Eggs', '1 bag TJ’s Organic Cut & Peeled Carrots, rinsed & dried', '1 bag TJ’s Organic Celery Hearts, rinsed & dried', "1 block TJ’s English Coastal Cheddar (or 5 TJ's Sharp Cheddar Snack Pack pre-portioned, individually-wrapped pieces of Cheddar)", '1 jar TJ’s Peanut Butter with Flax & Chia Seeds', "5 of your favorite TJ's Apples"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'You will need food storage containers for ingredients and daily meal prep, and 5 small sauce containers for peanut butter.', 'Prep components:Trim ends of celery and slice into thirds. Slice cheese into 1-inch cubes. Measure 2 tablespoons peanut butter into each of the small sauce containers. Halve eggs. Refrigerate prepped ingredients in separate food storage containers until needed.', 'Assemble protein box: Each morning, place the following in your box: two egg halves, 6-7 carrots, 5-6 celery sticks, 5-6 cubes of cheese, 2 tablespoons of peanut butter, and one apple.', 'Tags: Protein, Snack']

recipe_overview: Serves: 4 - 6 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 package TJ's Fully Cooked Carnitas", "1 package TJ's Corn Tortillas", "1 jar TJ's Salsa Verde", "1 bag TJ's Diced Onions", "TJ's Organic Sour Cream or 1 batch Cilantro Crema (get the recipe)", 'Finely chopped Cilantro and Lime slices, for garnish']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Microwave carnitas according to package directions. When warm, shred meat with forks. Cover and set aside.', 'To prepare tortillas, heat a griddle or grill pan to medium-high heat. Fill a shallow bowl or plate with water. Dip each side of tortilla in water and immediately place on grill pan. Warm tortilla 1 minute each side, then place in foil to keep warm. Repeat for each tortilla.', 'To assemble tacos, layer tortilla with carnitas, salsa, diced onions and a drizzle of crema. Garnish with chopped cilantro and lime wedges, and serve.', 'Tags: Cilantro, Pork, Tacos']

recipe_overview: Serves: 6 Cooking Time: 15 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 package TJ's Corn Tortillas", "1 package TJ's Soy Chorizo", "4 TJ's Avocados, sliced", '1 container Homestyle Especial Salsa - medium', "TJ's Organic Sour Cream or 1 batch Cilantro Crema (get the recipe)", "TJ's Limes, sliced, for garnish"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Remove soy chorizo from casing. In a large skillet over medium heat, add soy chorizo, breaking it up into pieces as it cooks, about 8-10 minutes. When soy chorizo reaches 165°F, remove from heat.', 'To prepare tortillas, heat a griddle or grill pan to medium-high heat. Fill a shallow bowl or plate with water. Dip each side of tortilla in water and immediately place on grill pan. Warm tortilla 1 minute each side, then place in foil to keep warm. Repeat for each tortilla.', 'Slice avocados into half-inch thick pieces. Cook on grill pan for about a minute on each side and remove from heat. When cool enough to handle, gently slice peels away from grilled avocado pieces.', 'To assemble tacos, layer tortillas with soy chorizo, grilled avocado, salsa, and a drizzle of crema. Serve with lime wedges, if desired.', 'Tags: Grilling, Meatless, Tacos']

recipe_description: The national dish of Cornwall, England, the pasty (PASS-tee) is a hand-held, sturdy pastry crust wrapped around a hearty filling. It’s portable, edible packaging and the fact that utensils weren’t required to enjoy it made it the meal of choice for Cornish tin miners.
recipe_overview: Serves: 8 Prep Time: 15 Minutes Cooking Time: 30 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 package TJ's Pie Crusts, thawed according to package directions", '2 trays TJs Channa Masala, microwaved according to package directions', "1 TJ's Large Egg"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 375°F. Line a large baking sheet with parchment paper; set aside.', "Working in two batches, unroll softened dough and smooth together any cracks with your hands. Remove top layer of plastic film and cut dough into quarters. Place a piece of dough on lined baking sheet and top with 1/4 cup channa masala. Starting at one corner and working around the edge of the dough, gently pull dough up toward center, pinching and folding edges to create a dumpling. Repeat with remaining dough and filling (you'll end up with 8 pasties on the baking sheet).", 'In a small bowl, thoroughly whisk the egg. Using a pastry brush, evenly brush the tops of the pasties with whisked egg. Place baking sheet on center rack of oven and bake for 30 minutes, until crust is golden. Allow to cool 5 minutes. Enjoy on the go, or at the table with mixed greens and Cumin-y Riced Cauliflower on the side.', 'Freezing/Reheating Instructions: Wrap leftover pasties in cling wrap and toss in the freezer. To reheat, remove cling wrap and place pasty on a microwave safe dish. Heat at 50% power for 1 minute, then at full power for 1 minute. Allow to cool slightly before serving.', 'Tags: Indian, Meatless']

recipe_description: This take on the pasty
recipe_overview: Serves: 8 Prep Time: 15 Minutes Cooking Time: 30 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 package TJ's Pie Crusts, thawed according to package directions", "2 trays TJ's Palak Paneer, microwaved according to package directions", "1 TJ's Large Egg"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 375°F. Line a large baking sheet with parchment paper; set aside.', "Working in two batches, unroll softened dough and smooth together any cracks with your hands. Remove top layer of plastic film and cut dough into quarters. Place a piece of dough on lined baking sheet and top with 1/4 cup palak paneer. Starting at one corner and working around the edge of the dough, gently pull dough up toward center, pinching and folding edges to create a dumpling. Repeat with remaining dough and filling (you'll end up with 8 pasties).", 'In a small bowl, thoroughly whisk the egg. Using a pastry brush, evenly brush the tops of the pasties with whisked egg. Place baking sheet on center rack of oven and bake for 30 minutes, until crust is golden. Allow to cool 5 minutes. Enjoy on the go, or at the table with mixed greens and Cumin-y Riced Cauliflower on the side.', 'Freezing/Reheating Instructions: Wrap leftover pasties in cling wrap and toss in the freezer. To reheat, remove cling wrap and place pasty on a microwave safe dish. Heat at 50% power for 1 minute, then at full power for 1 minute. Allow to cool slightly before serving.', 'Tags: Indian, Meatless']

recipe_description: Oh-so-creamy Mac & Cheese + savory Turkey Bolognese=instant Italian-inspired feast.
recipe_overview: Serves: 2 - 3 Cooking Time: 8 - 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 package Joe's Diner Macaroni & Cheese", "1 package Trader Joe's Turkey Bolognese", 'Fresh Basil, for garnish (optional)']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Microwave Bolognese according to package directions; set aside. Microwave macaroni & cheese according to package directions. While macaroni is heating, pour Bolognese into a fine mesh strainer over the sink to drain liquid. In a medium sized bowl, gently fold together Bolognese and macaroni. Garnish with fresh basil, if desired, and serve.', 'Tags: Cheese, Quick Meal, Turkey']

recipe_description: boxty
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['For Boxty Shells', '2 TJ’s Eggs', '½ cup TJ’s Heavy Cream', '½ cup TJ’s All-Purpose Flour', '3 cups TJ’s Frozen Hash Browns, thawed', '3 tablespoons TJ’s Chives, chopped', "½ teaspoon TJ's Sea Salt", "1 tablespoons TJ's Unsalted Butter", 'For Taco Filling', '4 Irish Bangers & Gravy', 'TJ’s Fire Roasted Red Peppers, thinly sliced, for garnish', 'TJ’s Cruciferous Crunch, for garnish']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Prepare Boxty Pancakes: Mix hash browns, flour, eggs, heavy cream, chives, and salt in a bowl. Heat butter in nonstick pan on medium high heat until melted. Use ¼ cup measurer to spoon batter into pan. Flip when browned on one side (about 2 minutes), and remove when browned on second side.', 'Assemble Tacos: Place a banger atop each pancake and garnish with sliced peppers and Cruciferous Crunch. Drizzle tacos with gravy and serve immediately.', "Tags: Irish, St Patrick's Day, Tacos"]

recipe_description: These hearty bowls are a cinch to assemble and scale up for a large group. You can lay the ingredients out for guests so they can build bowls to their liking, while you relax and enjoy the party.
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 - 6 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 bag TJ's Quick Cook Farro", "1 bag TJ's Butter Lettuce", "1/3 cup TJ's Balsamic Vinaigrette, plus more for serving", "1 jar TJ's Fire Roasted Red Peppers, sliced", "1 jar TJ's Grilled Artichoke Halves", "1/2 jar TJ's Pitted Greek Kalamata Olives", "1/2 can TJ's Pitted Green Olives", "1 container TJ's Ciliegene Whole Milk Fresh Mozzarella", '1 package Columbus Reduced Sodium Italian Dry Salame']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Add farro and 3 cups water to a saucepan and bring to a boil. Reduce heat, cover pan and simmer 10 minutes. Drain farro into a colander and rinse under cold water for 1 minute. Add farro and vinaigrette to a medium bowl and stir to combine. Set aside.', 'Divide butter lettuce among serving bowls and top each with a scoop of farro. Top each bowl with peppers, artichoke halves, olives, mozzarella and salame and serve immediately.', 'Tags: Quick Meal']

recipe_description: First things first: who the heck is Sam? Why, a Trader Joe’s Crew Member, of course! A Trader Joe’s Crew Member who just so happens to have a boiling passion for vegetarian soups. Sam savors and slurps soups of all sorts, but she’s especially a sucker for soups with sweet potatoes—and her signature Sweet Potato Soup will sweep you off your feet and send you searching for your slippers.
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 45 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['2 tablespoons Avocado Oil', '½ Jumbo Yellow Onion, diced', '2 medium Sweet Potatoes, peeled and cubed', "½ cup TJ's Israeli Couscous", "½ bag TJ's Organic Tuscan Kale", "6 cups TJ's Low Sodium Vegetable Broth", "2-3 teaspoons TJ's Taco Seasoning", "TJ's Salt & Pepper, to taste"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'In a large pot, heat oil over medium heat. Add onion and sweet potato and sauté 5 minutes. Add couscous and sauté 5 minutes to toast. Add 2 tablespoons water to pot, cover and cook 3 minutes.', 'Remove lid and add vegetable broth and taco seasoning. Reduce heat and simmer until sweet potatoes are fork-tender, 25-30 minutes. Add kale and simmer 5 minutes more until wilted. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Ladle soup into large bowls and serve with crusty bread for dipping.', '  Tags: Meatless, Soup, Sweet Potato, Vegan, Winter']

recipe_name: Grilled Sharp Cheddar, Applewood Bacon, & Shaved Sprouts
recipe_description: Grindy! This delicious beast marries applewood smoked bacon, sautéed sprouts and flowing sharp Cheddar on a crispy multigrain crust.
recipe_overview: Serves: 1 - 2 Prep Time: 15 Minutes Cooking Time: 8 - 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["½ cup TJ's Shaved Brussels Sprouts, lightly sautéed", "2 slices TJ's Multigrain Sliced Bread or TJ's Sprouted Wheat Sourdough Bread", "TJ's Canola Oil Spray", "½ cup TJ's Sharp Cheddar, shredded", "2 slices TJ's Uncured Applewood Smoked Bacon, cooked"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Spray one side of each slice of bread with canola oil, and place the slices (sprayed-side down) on a clean working surface.', 'Divide the cheese and pile evenly on each slice of bread. On each slice, place two strips of bacon. On one slice, add the sautéed sprouts. Carefully sandwich the two sides together.', 'Heat a large fry pan or griddle over medium heat until hot. Place the sandwich on the pan and reduce the heat to medium-low. After about a minute, cover the pan with a large lid, and let it cook for about 2-3 minutes more, until the bottom is golden brown. Flip the sandwich and let it cook for 3-4 more minutes (covering again after 1 minute to encourage the melt), until bottom is golden brown and the cheese is melting.', 'Transfer the sandwiches to a cutting board and cut in half. Serve immediately.', 'Tags: Cheese, Grilled, Sandwich']

recipe_overview: Serves: 1 - 2 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 1 Hour
recipe_ingredients: ['Cauliflower Crust (1 flatbread or 4-6 slices)', "2 bags TJ's Frozen Riced Cauliflower", '3 Large Eggs', "½ tsp TJ's Salt, to taste", "½ tsp TJ's Pepper, to taste", "1 ¼ cup TJ's Lite Shredded Mozzarella", 'Grilled Caprese', "TJ's Canola Oil Spray", "4 slices TJ's Pre Sliced Mozzarella", "½ cup TJ's Fresh Basil Leaves", "4 slices TJ's Roma Tomatoes"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Cauliflower Crust', 'Preheat oven to 425º.', 'Pour cauliflower into a pyrex pie dish; microwave on high for 5 minutes; take out and stir—repeat 3 times (total time in microwave = 20 minutes). Spread the heated cauliflower over a large piece of parchment paper or clean dish towel and let cool completely.', 'Add eggs, salt and pepper to a large mixing bowl and whip. Pour in cauliflower and cheese; mix well.', 'Line a quarter-sized sheet pan (about 9 1/2” x 13” x 1”) with parchment paper and spread the cauliflower mixture evenly across the pan. Place in oven for 25 minutes; remove when the cauliflower is baked to a golden brown on top. Allow to cool completely in the pan.', 'Cut into sandwich slices. Use right away or refrigerate or freeze until ready to use. (Once refrigerated or frozen, place in a 350ºF oven for 6 to 10 minutes to bring to room temperature before serving or using in recipes.)', 'Grilled Caprese', 'Taking two slices of the prepared Cauliflower Crust, spray one side of each slice of crust with canola oil, and place the slices (sprayed-side down) on a clean working surface.', 'On each crust, layer on two slices of mozzarella. On one crust, atop the cheese, layer the tomato, and the basil. Carefully sandwich the crusts.', 'Heat a large fry pan or griddle over medium heat until hot. Place the sandwich on the pan and reduce the heat to medium-low. After about a minute, cover the pan with a large lid, and let it cook for about 2-3 minutes more, until the bottom is golden brown. Flip the sandwich and let it cook for 3-4 more minutes (covering again after 1 minute to encourage the melt), until cheese is melting.', 'Transfer the sandwiches to a cutting board and cut in half. Serve immediately.', 'Tags: Cauliflower, Cheese, Grilled, Sandwich']

recipe_description: There is ham and cheese, and then there is grilled Camembert, Apple, & Prosciutto on Cinnamon Raisin Bread. Prepare to be delighted!
recipe_overview: Serves: 1 - 2 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 10 - 12 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["2 slices TJ's Cinnamon Raisin Bread", "TJ's Canola Oil Spray", "½ cup TJ's Camembert, rind removed", "4 slices (thin) TJ's Apple", "2 slices TJ's Prosciutto"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Spray one side of each slice of bread with canola oil, and place the slices (sprayed-side down) on a clean working surface.', 'Cut the camembert into thin pieces and place (lightly spread) on each slice of bread. On one slice of bread, layer the apple, followed by the Prosciutto, atop the cheese. Carefully sandwich the two sides together.', 'Heat a large fry pan or griddle over medium heat until hot. Place the sandwich on the pan and reduce the heat to medium-low. After about a minute, cover the pan with a large lid, and let it cook for about 2-3 minutes more, until the bottom is golden brown. Flip the sandwich and let it cook for 3-4 more minutes (covering again after 1 minute to encourage the melt), until bottom is golden brown and the cheese is melting-to-oozing over the edges.', 'Transfer the sandwiches to a cutting board and cut in half. Serve immediately.', 'Tags: Cheese, Fall, Grilled, Sandwich']

recipe_overview: Serves: 2 - 4 Prep Time: 20 Minutes Cooking Time: 5 - 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 pound TJ’s frozen shrimp 70-110 medium peeled', '1 Tbsp fresh lime juice', '1 Tbsp fresh lemon juice', '1 Tbsp Extra Virgin Olive Oil', '½ medium red onion, finely minced', '1 teaspoon 21 Seasoning Salute', '2 Tbsp. fresh cilantro, minced', '1 cup frozen peaches, thawed', '1 medium ripe avocado', '2 medium red bell peppers', 'Salt and pepper to taste']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Defrost shrimp and peaches according to package instructions; under running water or overnight in the refrigerator. Combine the lime juice, lemon juice, olive oil, onion, 21 seasoning salute, and cilantro in a medium bowl. Cut shrimp into ½ inch pieces and add to mixture. Place bowl to the side and allow to marinade.', 'Meanwhile, dice the peaches, avocado, and red bell pepper into ½ inch cubes. Add this to the bowl of cut shrimp and toss.', 'Serve as is, or alongside Frozen Organic Jasmine Rice for a quick and delicious weeknight meal.', 'Tags: Colorful, No Cook, Party, Refreshing, Salad, Tropical']

recipe_description: Creamy and coolly comforting, Trader Joe's Curried White Chicken Deli Salad warms the palate with cumin, coriander, cardamom, and a kick from cayenne and mustard. Serving it in a ripe papaya offers a tropical counterpoint to the warm spices, and a welcome respite from the standard bread bowl. The ten minute, no-cook prep offers a welcome vacation from the stove on a busy weeknight. Take a bite, close your eyes, and you can almost taste the sunshine…
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 - 6 Prep Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 head TJ's Romaine Lettuce", "1 ripe TJ's Papaya", "1 1/2 (16 oz) cartons TJ's Curried White Chicken Deli Salad"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Slice off the bottom of the romaine lettuce, then wash and separate the leaves. Place lettuce onto a large serving dish. Peel the papaya, slice in half and then remove seeds with a spoon. Place papaya halves on top of lettuce, fill each papaya with half of the curried chicken salad. Serve!', 'Tags: Chicken, Fruit, Salad, Tropical']

recipe_overview: Serves: 6 - 8 Prep Time: 25 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['TJ’s Canola Oil Spray', '1 (6 oz) can TJ’s Wild Alaskan Pink Salmon', '2 Tablespoons TJ’s Unbleached All Purpose Flour', '3/4 cup shredded TJ’s Baby Swiss Cheese, divided', 'TJ’s Sea Salt Crystals', 'TJ’s Black Peppercorns', 'TJ’s Everyday Seasoning', '1/2 cup diced TJ’s Shallots', '1 tablespoon TJ’s Unsalted Butter', '5 TJ’s Large Brown Eggs', '1/2 cup TJ’s Heavy Cream', '1/2 cup TJ’s Frozen Chopped Spinach, defrosted and water squeezed out']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 425°F. Grease a 9-inch broiler-safe pie dish with canola oil spray, set aside.', 'In a medium bowl, mix salmon, flour, ½ cup cheese and 5 grinds each of salt, pepper and everyday seasoning. Place salmon mixture in an even layer on the bottom of the prepared pie dish, set aside.', 'In a medium pan over medium heat, sauté shallots in butter until caramelized, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat and allow to cool.', 'In a separate bowl, beat eggs, then stir in heavy cream, spinach and caramelized shallots. Pour egg mixture over the top of the salmon mixture in the pie dish.', 'Place dish on center rack of oven and bake 20 minutes. Remove dish from oven, add reserved ¼ cup of cheese and broil until cheese begins to brown, about 2-3 minutes. Remove from oven and allow to cool for 5 minutes, slice, and enjoy.', 'Tags: Brunch, Eggs, Savory, Seafood']

recipe_overview: Serves: 4 - 6 Prep Time: 15 Minutes Cooking Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['Salad', '2 (10 oz) packages TJ’s Cheese Tortellini, cooked & drained', '1/2 cup diced TJ’s Red Onions', '2 TJ’s Bell Peppers, cored and diced', '2-3 TJ’s Persian Cucumbers, diced', '1 (5 oz) package Columbus Calabrese Salame, diced', '21 Seasoning Salute Vinaigrette', '2 tablespoons grated TJ’s Pecorino, Romano and Parmesan Cheese Blend', '3 tablespoons TJ’s Red Wine Vinegar', '1 teaspoon TJ’s Honey', '6-8 shakes TJ’s 21 Seasoning Salute', '1/4 teaspoon TJ’s Sea Salt, or to taste', '1/4 teaspoon TJ’s Ground Black Pepper, or to taste', '1/3 cup TJ’s Extra Virgin Olive Oil']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'To make the vinaigrette: In a small bowl, whisk together cheese, vinegar, honey, 21 seasoning salute, salt, and pepper. Slowly whisk in oil until emulsified. Taste and adjust seasoning as desired. Makes about 1 cup of vinaigrette. Set aside.', 'To prepare salad: In a large, bowl combine cooked tortellini, diced onions, bell peppers, cucumbers and salame. Fold in 1/4 to 1/2 cup of prepared dressing. Taste and add additional salt and pepper as desired. Enjoy!', 'Tags: Italian, Pasta, Salad, Spring, Summer']

recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 10 - 15 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1/2 loaf (about 12 ounces) Trader Joe's Sliced Sourdough Bread", "2 Tablespoons Trader Joe's Extra Virgin Olive Oil", "1 package (12 oz) Trader Joe's Uncured Apple Smoked Bacon", "2 cups Trader Joe's Mini Pearl Grape Tomatoes, halved", "1 bag Trader Joe's Baby Spring Mix", "2-4 Tablespoons Trader Joe's Blue Cheese Dressing and Dip"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Slice bread into 1-inch cubes and toss with 2 tablespoons of olive oil. Place bread cubes on a rimmed baking sheet and bake until lightly toasted, about 10 minutes.', 'Meanwhile, fry bacon over medium heat for 10-15 minutes, turning frequently until cooked through. Place cooked bacon on a paper towel lined plate to drain. Once cool, chop or crumble bacon into bite-sized pieces.', 'In a large bowl, combine spring salad mix, bacon pieces, grape tomatoes and sourdough croutons. Toss with desired amount of Blue Cheese Dressing. Enjoy!', 'Tags: Pork, Salad']

recipe_overview: Serves: 2 Prep Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 can TJ's Yellowfin Tuna in Olive Oil, drained", "2 tsp TJ's Mayo", "1 Tbsp diced TJ's Red Onion", "1 Tbsp diced TJ's Celery", "1 Tbsp diced TJ's Red Bell Pepper", "1 tsp minced TJ's Parsley", "1/4 teaspoon TJ's Sea Salt, or to taste", "1/4 teaspoon TJ's Ground Black Pepper, or to taste", "1 TJ's Avocado, sliced in half and pit removed"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'In a medium bowl, combine tuna, mayo, onion, celery, bell pepper, parsley, salt and pepper. For a creamier texture, scrape a spoonful of avocado from each side and add to the bowl. Mash the tuna salad with a fork until well incorporated. Spoon the tuna salad back into each avocado half. Serve and enjoy!', 'Tags: Easter, Fish, No Cook, Protein, Salad, Salty']

recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Prep Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 bag TJ’s Organic Power To The Greens', '2 TJ’s Persian Cucumbers, sliced thin', '4 TJ’s Mini Heirloom Tomatoes On The Vine, cut into quarters', '1/4 TJ’s Red Onion, sliced thin', '1/4 cup TJ’s Jarred & Pitted Kalamata Olives, sliced in half', '1/3 cup TJ’s Crumbled Feta', '4 Tbsp TJ’s Greek Style Feta Dressing']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'In a large salad bowl, toss greens with dressing until the greens are evenly coated. Place greens on individual plates and top with cucumbers, tomatoes, onions, and olives. Sprinkle a small handful of crumbled feta in the center of the salad. Enjoy!', 'Tags: Meatless, Mediterranean, No Cook, Salad']

recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 5 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["3 large TJ's Peaches, firm with a little give", "1 1/2 Tbsp TJ's Extra Virgin California Olive Oil", '1 bag TJ’s Organic Baby Spinach', '1 cup diced TJ’s Sliced Roast Chicken Breast with Rib Meat', '1/4 cup TJ’s Organic Blueberries', "3 Tbsp TJ's Crumbled Goat Cheese", '1/4 cup TJ’s Sliced Honey Roasted Almonds', "6 tablespoons TJ's Fat Free Balsamic Vinaigrette"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Cut the peaches in half and pit them. Cut the halves into wide wedges, and then toss the peaches with olive oil. Place the peaches directly on the grill (or cast iron griddle on stovetop) and cook over a medium heat (on all sides) until grill marks form and peaches are tender but not falling apart; about five minutes. Remove peaches from heat and set aside. In a large serving bowl, layer spinach, chicken, blueberries, goat cheese and almonds. Add peaches and drizzle with balsamic vinaigrette. Enjoy!', 'Tags: Chicken, Fruit, Grilling, Salad, Summer']

recipe_overview: Serves: 6 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 12 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["3 TJ's Bagels cut in half (for a total of 6)", "1 jar TJ's Pizza sauce", "1 package TJ's Shredded Mozzarella", "9 pieces TJ's Pepperoni", "4 pieces TJ's Fully Cooked Uncured Apple Smoked Bacon, chopped"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place all bagel halves on a baking sheet. Spread pizza sauce on each, about 2 heaping tablespoons or more to your liking. Sprinkle shredded mozzarella liberally on each, covering the entire bagel. Chop 4 pieces of fully cooked bacon and put on 3 bagels. Place 3 pieces of pepperoni on top of the remaining 3 bagels. Place in oven for 12 minutes or until cheese is melted and bubbling. We recommend dipping in your favorite Ranch or Blue Cheese Dip. Have fun with the toppings… add more or less to your liking!', 'Tags: Bacon, Cheesy, Pizza']

recipe_overview: Serves: 1 - 2 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 15 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['Aioli Dressing', "3 large TJ's Premium Peeled Garlic Cloves", "3/4 cup TJ's Mayonnaise", "1/2 Tbsp TJ's Extra Virgin California Estate Olive Oil", "1 tsp TJ's Smoked Paprika", "1 tsp TJ's Lemon juice, more to taste", "1/4 teaspoon TJ's Sea Salt, or to taste", "1/4 teaspoon TJ's Ground Black Pepper, or to taste", 'Sandwich', "4 quarter inch slices TJ's Pork Belly", "2 slices TJ's Sourdough Bread or TJ's Organic White Bread", "2-4 leaves TJ's Butter Lettuce", "1/2 large TJ's Heirloom Tomato, sliced thin"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Make the Aioli: Add garlic to a small saucepan, cover by 1/2 inch with cold water, place over medium flame and poach until water comes to a boil. As soon as the water boils, remove from heat, steep for one minute, drain and rinse with cold water to stop the cooking. Wait for garlic to cool completely. Add the garlic, mayonnaise, olive oil, smoked paprika, and lemon juice to a blender or food processor and process until smooth. Do not over mix. Taste and adjust lemon if desired and then add salt, and pepper to taste. Refrigerate to help marry flavors.', 'Cook Pork Belly: Add pork belly to a non stick pan over medium heat and sear on both sides until golden brown, about 3 to 5 minutes per side; remove to a paper towel.', 'Build Sandwich: Toast bread, if preferred. Spread both slices of bread with Smoked Aioli; top one slice with lettuce, tomato and pork belly and top with second slice of bread. Slice in half and eat right away.', 'Tags: Pork, Sandwich']

recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 6 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['Chicken & Salad', "1 pkg TJ's Boneless Skinless Chicken Breast Tenders", "1/2 cup TJ's Flour", '1/4 teaspoon TJ’s Sea Salt, or to taste', "1/4 teaspoon TJ's Ground Black Pepper, or to taste", '2 Tbsp Canola Oil', "1 bag TJ's Butter Lettuce & Radicchio Salad Mix", "1/4 cup TJ's Green Onions (include bottom white sections), chopped", "1/2 cup TJ's Unsalted, Dry Toasted Slivered Almonds", "1/2 cup TJ's Sesame Sticks", "2 Tbsp TJ's Organic Cilantro, chopped", 'Dressing', "6 Tbsp TJ's Canola Oil", "4 Tbsp TJ's White Balsamic Vinegar", "4 Tbsp TJ's Sugar (or 2 Tbsp TJ's Sugar, 2 drops TJ's Organic Liquid Stevia)", '1 Tbsp Lemon Juice', "2 tsp TJ's Toasted Sesame Seed Oil", "2 tsp TJ's Sea Salt", "1/2 tsp TJ's Ground Black Pepper"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Prepare the chicken: Wash and pat dry chicken tenders. Dredge chicken in flour seasoned with salt and pepper, set aside. Add 2 tablespoons canola oil to a frying pan and heat on medium until oil starts to shimmer. Cook chicken tenders about 3 minutes on each side or until internal temperature reaches 165 degrees. Remove from heat, and place chicken in refrigerator to cool.', 'Make the dressing: In a medium jar, dissolve sugar and salt in white balsamic vinegar then add canola oil, lemon juice, sesame seed oil and black pepper. Shake well. Place in refrigerator to chill.', 'Prepare the salad: In a large bowl, combine butter lettuce & radicchio salad mix, green onions, slivered almonds, cilantro and sesame sticks. Slice about 4 or 5 chicken tenders on the diagonal and add to the bowl. Add a few tablespoons of the chilled dressing to the salad just before serving and toss.', 'Tags: Chinese, Salad']

recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 1 Minute
recipe_ingredients: ["1 can TJ's Tuna in Olive Oil, drained", "1 Tbsp diced TJ's Sweet Onion", "2 Tbsp diced TJ's Cornichons", "1 1/2 Tbsp TJ's Organic Mayonnaise", "2-3 TJ's Organic Romaine Lettuce leaves", "2 TJ's Pita Bread Pockets"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'In a medium bowl, combine tuna, onion, cornichons and mayonnaise. Cut each pita in half lengthwise creating a total of four pita pockets. Stuff pita pockets with lettuce and tuna salad.', 'Tags: Fish, No Cook, Sandwich']

recipe_overview: Serves: 3 - 4 Prep Time: 15 Minutes Cooking Time: 1 Minute
recipe_ingredients: ['Salad', "1 package TJ's Frozen Shelled Edamame, heated", "1 cup TJ's Red Quinoa, cooked", "2 TJ's Celery Ribs, sliced", "1/4 cup TJ's Green Onions, chopped", "1/2 cup TJ's Shredded Carrots", "2 tablespoon TJ's Italian Parsley", "1 TJ's Gala Apple, diced", "1 TJ's Avocado, sliced", "1/3 cup TJ's Sliced Almonds", 'Dressing', "1 medium TJ's Lemon (Juice Only)", "2 tablespoons TJ's Extra Virgin California Olive Oil", "2 medium cloves TJ's Garlic, minced (optional)", "1/4 teaspoon TJ's Sea Salt, or to taste", "1/4 teaspoon TJ's Ground Black Pepper, or to taste"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'In a large bowl, combine salad ingredients and set aside. In a separate bowl combine dressing ingredients. Drizzle dressing into salad and enjoy. If preferred chilled, refrigerate an extra 20 minutes before serving.', 'Tags: Meatless, Protein']

recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 15 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 pound TJ's Strawberries, cleaned, dried and hulled", "1 tablespoon TJ's Extra Virgin Spanish Olive Oil", "1 tablespoon TJ's Balsamic Glaze", '6 oz TJ’s Baby Spinach (1 package or 1/2 package depending on region)', "1/3 cup TJ's Chevre Log with Honey, crumbled"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 400. Slice strawberries in half lengthwise. Toss with olive oil and place on a foil lined baking sheet. Cook for 15 minutes. Toss with balsamic glaze and then set aside to cool. Once the strawberries have cooled, combine with spinach and cheese. Toss and serve.', 'Tags: Meatless, Roasted, Salad']

recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Cooking Time: 15 - 20 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 TJ's Baguette, cut into fours and sliced down the middle", "1 package TJ's Frozen Turkey Meatballs or Meatless Meatballs, heated according to package directions", "2 cups TJ's Organic Marinara Sauce", '1 Onion and 1 Green Bell Pepper, thinly sliced and sautéed in olive oil', "1 package TJ's Sliced Mozzarella Cheese"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Toast bread in oven at 300 degrees for about 5-8 minutes or until slightly golden and warm. Remove from oven and add meatballs, onions, peppers sauce and cheese to bread. Return to oven another 3-5 minutes, until cheese is melted.', 'Tags: Cheesy, Italian, Sandwich']

recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Cooking Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["2 cups TJ's Organic Broccoli Slaw", "1 tbsp TJ's Fresh Cilantro, chopped", "3 tbsp TJ's Champagne Pear Vinaigrette with Gorgonzola", "4 TJ's Chili Lime Chicken Burgers", "4 TJ's Multi-Grain or Honey Wheat Hamburger Buns"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Mix broccoli slaw, cilantro and vinaigrette. Heat chicken burgers according to package directions. Place one burger on each bun bottom. Top burger with slaw mixture and close bun. Enjoy!', 'Tags: Burgers, Chicken, Sandwich']

recipe_description: Ah, cauliflower. Is there anything this cruciferous wonder can’t do? It’s certainly a tasty alternative to some of its more carb-heavy comrades—which is precisely why we’ve skipped the potatoes and made Cauliflower Tots the base of Trader Joe’s Cauliflower Tot Casserole.
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Cooking Time: 1 Hour
recipe_ingredients: ['1 package TJ’s Cauliflower Tot Casserole', '1 package TJ’s Turkey Meatballs, thawed', '2 packages TJ’s Turkey Gravy', 'TJ’s Fresh Rosemary', 'TJ’s Cranberry Sauce or Cranberry Orange Relish']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 400°F.  Remove packaging from casserole and place on a rimmed baking sheet. Cover with foil. Bake 45 minutes.', 'Remove foil and bake another 10-15 minutes until casserole is heated through. Remove from oven and let stand a few minutes.', 'After casserole has been in the oven for 30 minutes, add meatballs, gravy, and 2 sprigs of rosemary to a medium saucepan. Cover and warm on medium-low heat, stirring occasionally, until meatballs are heated through.', 'Mash casserole with a fork and divide among 4 serving bowls. Add a few meatballs to each bowl and cover generously with gravy.', 'Garnish each bowl with a dollop of cranberry orange relish and a fresh sprig of rosemary and enjoy!', 'Tags: Comfort Food, Meatballs, Savory, Thanksgiving, Turkey']

recipe_description: With minimal prep (just a combined five minutes in the microwave or a few minutes in a hot skillet will do the trick), our Korean-inspired Bulgogi Beef Fried Rice becomes a delightfully savory side dish or basis for a wide variety of rice bowls. Here we've paired it with scrambled eggs and a spoonful of Trader Joe's Chili Onion Crunch for a no-fuss fried rice recipe.
recipe_overview: Serves: 2 Prep Time: 2 Minutes Cooking Time: 7 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 bag TJ’s Korean Inspired Bulgogi Beef Fried Rice with Kimchi', '2 TJ’s Large Eggs, beaten', 'TJ’s Green Onions (green parts only) thinly sliced', 'TJ’s Chili Onion Crunch']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Heat a skillet over medium high heat. Add fried rice and sauté 5 minutes, stirring frequently. Add beaten eggs and continue sauteing and stirring, a few minutes more, until egg is scrambled and cooked through.', 'Divide fried rice among two bowls. Top with green onions and a dollop of chili onion crunch, and enjoy.', 'Tags: Eggs, Korean, One-dish Meal, Quick Meal']

recipe_description: Much like a traditional mirepoix, a soffritto is a blend of aromatics that are indispensable in a cook’s kitchen. We found that every Italian cook seems to have their own iteration, reflecting their chosen flavor favorites. Our Trader Joe’s Italian Style Soffritto Seasoning Blend includes crispy onions, sun-dried tomatoes, sea salt, garlic, red peppers, parsley, rosemary, and sage.
recipe_overview: Serves: 6 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 20 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 ½ tablespoons your favorite TJ’s Olive Oil', '1 ½ tablespoons TJ’s Italian Style Soffritto Seasoning Blend', '2 handfuls Organic Shredded Kale, chopped', '1 can TJ’s Diced Tomatoes', '2 cans TJ’s Organic Great Northern Beans, drained', 'Juice of 1 wedge of TJ’s Lemon', '2 cups TJ’s Shredded Mozzarella Cheese', '1 bag TJs Organic French Rolls, heated or toasted to your preference']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'In a large skillet over medium heat, add oil and soffritto seasoning. Saute until fragrant, then add kale and diced tomatoes. Saute 5 minutes, until bubbling and kale is wilted.', 'Add beans cook another 5-10 minutes, until sauce thickens and beans are heated through. Remove from heat and stir in a squeeze of lemon wedge.', 'Transfer beans to an 8-inch square broiler-safe pan and top with shredded cheese. Broil on high for 2-4 minutes until cheese is golden and bubbly. Remove from heat and let cool slightly.', 'Ladle beans into bowls and serve with warm French rolls for dipping.', 'Tags: Beans, Comfort Food, Fall, Seasoning, Winter']

recipe_description: Trader Joe’s Holiday Hash offers small dices of butternut squash, sweet potatoes, red onions, and celery, accompanied by a flavorful and fragrant herb-trio of parsley, sage, and rosemary. Grab one container for your stuffing recipe, and a second to use as a soup-starter, paired with leftover turkey and earthy mushrooms & wild rice.
recipe_overview: Serves: 6 Cooking Time: 1 Hour
recipe_ingredients: ['2 tablespoons TJ’s Olive Oil', '1 package TJ’s Holiday Vegetable Hash (seasonal)', 'TJ’s Sea Salt & Pepper', '1 package TJ’s Sliced Cremini Mushrooms', '2 packages TJ’s Turkey Stock (seasonal) OR Chicken Stock', '1 cup TJ’s Wild Rice', '2 cups cooked leftover TJ’s Turkey']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Heat a large pot over medium heat, add 2 tablespoons olive oil.', 'When oil is hot, add hash and a generous pinch of salt. Sauté until onions are translucent, 3-5 minutes.', 'Add mushrooms and sauté another 5 minutes.', 'Add stock and rice to pot and bring to a simmer. Cover and simmer 30 minutes, stirring halfway through.', 'Remove lid, add turkey and continue to simmer another 15-20 minutes, until rice is cooked through.', 'Season to taste with sea salt & pepper. Ladle soup into large bowls and enjoy!', 'Tags: Comfort Food, Soup, Thanksgiving, Turkey']

recipe_description: Within days of harvest, U.S.-grown Trader Joe’s Roasted Broccoli is trimmed to essentially just the “flowers” and seasoned with olive oil, sea salt, and pepper before it’s oven-roasted at 500°F for a short period of time. The high-temperature plus short cooking time ensures true, roasted texture and flavor, ready to enjoy on its own or add a green boost to comfort food favorites, like this classic recipe for broccoli mac & cheese.
recipe_overview: Serves: 6 - 8 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 15 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1lb your favorite short cut of TJ’s Pasta (Macaroni, Farfalle, Fusilli, etc.)', '2 cups TJ’s Whole Milk', '1 package (8 oz.) TJ’s Cream Cheese, cubed', 'Dash of TJ’s Garlic Powder (optional)', '1 bag TJ’s Shredded Sharp Cheddar', '2 tablespoons TJ’s Unsalted Butter', 'TJ’s Black Pepper', '1 package TJ’s Roasted Broccoli, microwaved according to package directions (cut any large pieces into smaller florets, if needed)']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook pasta until barely al dente. Drain and set aside.', 'While pasta cooks, add milk to a large pot and bring to a simmer. Reduce heat to low and whisk in cream cheese and garlic powder until totally smooth.', 'Add cheese and butter and continue whisking until the cheese is fully melted.', 'Add cooked pasta to sauce and stir to coat. Add roasted broccoli and cook a few minutes more, continuing to stir until sauce has thickened slightly. Remove from heat and stir in fresh ground pepper to taste.', 'Let cool slightly before digging in!', 'Tags: Cheese, Cheesy, Comfort Food, Entertaining, Side Dish, Thanksgiving']

recipe_name: Turkey Pot Pie with Buttermilk Biscuit Crust
recipe_description: For some folks, the best part of the holiday meal is the leftovers—think turkey sandwiches, stuffing scrambles, and pot pie. (Yes, we are “some folks,” and we imagine that if you’re still reading, you are, too.) This pot pie recipe gets its comforting creaminess thanks to Trader Joe’s Condensed Cream of Portabella Mushroom Soup, but eschews the classic butter crust in favor of ready-to-bake Trader Joe’s Buttermilk Biscuits. This means you can enjoy those leftover Turkey Day flavor favorites without breaking out the dough roller. Play it again, Joe!
recipe_overview: Serves: 8 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 30 - 35 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 tablespoon TJ’s Olive oil', '½ package TJ’s Mirepoix', '1 ½ cups TJ’s Organic Foursome Vegetable Medley, thawed', '1 container TJ’s Condensed Cream of Portabella Mushroom Soup (seasonal)', '10 ounces TJ’s Turkey Stock (seasonal) OR Chicken Stock', '2 cups chopped leftover cooked TJ’s Turkey', '2 teaspoons chopped TJ’s Fresh Thyme', '2 teaspoons chopped TJ’s Fresh Rosemary', '½ teaspoon TJ’s Ground Black Pepper', '1 package TJ’s Buttermilk Biscuits']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 350°F.', 'In a 3.5-quart, oven-safe skillet over medium heat, add olive oil and mirepoix. Sauté 5 minutes. Add vegetables, condensed soup, stock and turkey and bring to a simmer for 5 minutes.', 'Turn off heat and stir in thyme, rosemary, and pepper.', 'Remove biscuits from packaging. Separate and arrange biscuits evenly atop pot pie filling.', 'Bake 16-18 minutes on center rack of oven, until biscuits are golden brown and filling is bubbling. Remove from oven and let cool slightly before serving.', 'Tags: Comfort Food, Fall, Thanksgiving, Turkey']

recipe_description: Our turkeys are never frozen, but we do keep them super cold. Plan to buy your bird a few days in advance. A good rule of thumb is to allow at least 1 day of "mellowing out" in the fridge for every four pounds of meat. Got a 12 pound bird? Plan on three days. A 16 pound bird? Four days.
recipe_overview: Serves: 6 - 10 Prep Time: 1 Hour Cooking Time: 3 - 5 Hours
recipe_ingredients: ['1 TJ’s Fresh All Natural Turkey', '2 sticks TJ’s Unsalted Butter, softened', '1 package TJ’s Fresh Sage', '1 package TJ’s Fresh Rosemary', '1 package TJ’s Fresh Thyme', 'TJ’s Sea Salt, to taste', 'TJ’s Black Pepper, to taste', '2 TJ’s Yellow Onions, peeled and halved', '2 TJ’s Lemons, cut in quarters', 'kitchen twine for trussing']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Turkey Wrangling', 'Elapsed Time: 20 Minutes', 'On the big day, take the turkey out of the fridge and unwrap and remove the temporary wire truss. Locate and remove the neck & giblets, then set them aside for potential future use (stuffing, gravy, soup, gumbo, etc.) Don’t see them? If you’ve selected one of our birds that “may contain giblets” (as marked on the label), it’s possible that your bird doesn’t have them—but check the bird’s back end just in case.', 'Prepare Compound Butter', 'Elapsed Time: 20 Minutes', 'Chop half a package each of fresh Sage, Rosemary & Thyme. (Parsley is vacationing at Scarborough Faire.) Using a food processor, or by hand, mix herbs, salt, pepper and butter until well blended. Place the mixture on cling wrap and roll into a log. Refrigerate until firm and ready for use. Bundle the other half of the herbs with kitchen twine and set aside for stuffing the cavity [see next step].', '“Beautify” The Bird', 'Elapsed Time: 15 Minutes', 'Transfer turkey to a roasting pan fitted with a rack. Loosen skin by gently sliding your fingers between the skin and breast and working them down to the thigh (note: gentleness is key so as  to avoid puncturing the skin). Cut 3/4 of the herb-butter log into disks. Rub 1 disk on outer skin (to encourage crispness) and carefully push and mush the remainder under the skin. Stuff the cavity with onions, lemons and the bundle of herbs. Melt remaining herb butter for basting and set aside.', "It's Trussing Time", 'Elapsed Time: 5-10 minutes (if you’re a novice)', 'Why truss? Trussing the bird ensures even cooking and ease of carving. Truss the bird according to your tradition. You can keep it loose: tucking the wings snugly under the bird and tying the legs together, making sure the skin flap gets tucked up between them. Or you can make a serious harness for the bird.', 'Pre-heat Oven to 400°F', 'Elapsed Time: Depends on your oven! Why not pour yourself a glass of wine while you wait?', 'Ready To Roast', 'Elapsed Time: 3-5 hours', 'Pounds of Turkey Cook Time (Un-Stuffed) Cook Time (Stuffed)', '12-14 3 - 3¾ 3½ - 4', '14-18 3¾ - 4¼ 4 - 4¼', '18-20 4¼ - 4½ 4¼ - 4¾', '20-24 4½ - 5 4¾ - 5¼', 'Place bird in the oven and roast 30 minutes. After 30 minutes, turn the heat down to 325ºF. After 1 hour, baste every 30 minutes with reserved melted herb butter. At 2 hours or when bird reaches desired brownness, baste once more and tent with foil. Begin checking the temperature in the thigh meat (thickest part of bird), taking care not to let your meat thermometer touch bone.', 'Total cook time depends on the bird’s size, your oven’s temperament and other unforeseen variables. It’s done when the thermometer registers 165ºF and the juices run clear out of the bird.', 'Pro-tip: Be sure to let your bird rest for 20-30 minutes prior to releasing your “official turkey carver!”', 'Tags: Entertaining, Thanksgiving, Turkey']

recipe_name: Everything but the Leftovers Sheet Pan Dinner
recipe_description: When it comes to holiday meals, there are certain flavors so iconic, one taste elicits the whole eating experience. Gravy is one of those tastes. So is stuffing. To create Trader Joe’s Everything but the Leftovers, we’ve distilled the essence of a stellar stuffing and a great gravy down to a shake-able—and vegan—Seasoning Blend so you can add these holiday flavors to anything!
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 - 5 Prep Time: 15 Minutes Cooking Time: 25 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 package (12 oz.) TJ’s Cut Butternut Squash', '1 package TJ’s Brussels Sprouts, trimmed and halved', "1/2 TJ's Red Onion, cut into chunks", '1 tablespoon TJ’s Olive Oil', '4 teaspoons TJ’s Everything But The Leftovers Seasoning, divided (seasonal)', '2 TJ’s Large Eggs, beaten', '1 cup TJ’s Japanese Style Panko Breadcrumbs', '1 package TJ’s Turkey Cutlets (4-5 cutlets), patted dry', '2 medium-sized rimmed baking sheets']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Arrange oven racks in thirds. Preheat oven to 400°F.', 'In a large bowl combine vegetables, olive oil and 2 teaspoons seasoning. Spread vegetables on a baking sheet. Roast vegetables in lower rack of oven for 5 minutes while you prep the turkey cutlets.', 'Mix breadcrumbs with 2 teaspoons seasoning.', 'Dip turkey cutlet in beaten egg and drain off excess, then coat in breadcrumb mixture. Place on second baking sheet. Repeat with remaining cutlets.', 'Place cutlets on upper rack of oven. Bake cutlets and vegetables 18-20 minutes, until internal temperature of cutlets reaches 165°F. Remove from oven and let cool slightly before serving.', 'Tags: Fall, Sheet Pan Meal, Turkey, Winter']

recipe_description: Knowing the popularity of Trader Joe’s Unexpected Cheddar and knowing that our Customers are always looking for more ways to enjoy it, we’ve made the bold (and perhaps unexpected!) move to offer it in handy, Shredded form. Use it in your favorite grilled cheese sandwich recipe, or follow our recipe featuring a garlic bread-style twist on the classic—an unexpected delight, indeed.
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 stick TJ’s Unsalted Butter, softened', '2 tablespoons chopped TJ’s Fresh Parsley', '½ teaspoon TJ’s Organic Garlic Powder OR 1 clove TJ’s Garlic, minced', '8 slices TJ’s Organic White Bread (or your favorite TJ’s sandwich bread)', '1 heaping cup TJ’s Shredded Unexpected Cheddar, divided']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Add butter, parsley and garlic to a small bowl and stir. Butter each slice of bread.', 'Place 4 slices of bread butter side-down on a cold griddle or large skillet. Top each slice with about one-quarter cup cheese.', 'Heat griddle to medium-low. As cheese turns shiny and starts to melt, top with another slice of bread, butter side-up.', 'Cook 2-5 minutes until bread is golden brown, turn sandwich over, and continue cooking until the other side is golden brown and cheese has melted. Remove from heat.', 'Slice sandwiches on a diagonal and serve with a hot cup of tomato soup.', 'Tags: Cheese, Comfort Food, Sandwich']

recipe_description: Although we call it a Pasta Sauce, there is so much more you can do with a jar of Trader Joe’s Spicy Chunky Tomato & Pepper Pasta Sauce. It’s perfect as a ready-made base for this Shakshuka recipe. Or, you can use it for a pizza sauce with extra pizazz. Make it your base for soups or stews, such as Chicken Cacciatore. However you use it, you’ll find this Sauce is a handy helper for creating all kinds of chunky, spicy, flavorful meals!
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Cooking Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 jar TJ’s Spicy Chunky Tomato & Pepper Sauce', '4 TJ’s Large Eggs', 'TJ’s Crumbled Feta', 'TJ’s Fresh Cilantro, chopped', '1 TJ’s Organic Baguette, heated according to package directions']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Add tomato sauce to a large skillet over medium heat. Cook 5 minutes, stirring occasionally, until sauce is bubbling.', 'Use the back of a spoon to create four wells in the sauce. Crack an egg into each well. Reduce heat to low, cover and continue cooking 3-4 minutes, until the egg whites are set and the yolks are still jiggly. Remove from heat.', 'Top shakshuka with crumbled feta and chopped cilantro. Divide among four bowls and serve with warm baguette on the side for dipping.', 'Tags: Brunch, Eggs, Meatless, One-dish Meal, Spicy, Tomato']

recipe_description: Is there anything to which we won’t add pumpkin? To be fair, we’re not the first to add pumpkin to curry, but we might be the first to offer a Spicy Pumpkin Curry Simmer Sauce that’s so easy to use and so incredibly flavorful.  Check out this twist on savory pot pie, with a filling of parsnips, kale, butternut squash and garbanzo beans.
recipe_overview: Serves: 6 - 8 Prep Time: 15 Minutes Cooking Time: 55 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['3 tablespoons TJ’s Olive Oil', '1/2 cup TJ’s Diced Onions', '2 TJ’s Parsnips, chopped in large pieces', '1 cup TJ’s Butternut Zigzags (or 1 cup large chopped pieces of butternut squash)', '3 handfuls Organic Shredded Green Kale, chopped', 'Pinch TJ’s Sea Salt', '1 can TJ’s Organic Garbanzo Beans, drained', '1/3 cup TJ’s Golden Raisins', '1 jar TJ’s Spicy Pumpkin Curry Simmer Sauce', '1 TJ’s Pie Crust, thawed according to package directions (keep refrigerated until ready to use)', 'TJ’s Organic Ghee & Sunflower Oil Spray', '1 Egg']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 400°F. Sauté onion & parsnips in oil for 5 minutes. Stir in squash. Cover and cook 5 minutes. Add kale and salt, stir, cover and cook another 5 minutes or so until vegetables are tender. Add garbanzo beans, sauce and raisins, stir to combine. Cover and reduce heat to simmer 5 minutes. Remove from heat.', 'Remove pie crust from refrigerator. Lay crust on a clean work surface, smoothing any cracks with your hands. Grease a 9-inch pie plate with organic ghee spray. Transfer simmered vegetables to pie plate.
