Top with pie crust, cutting three oblong vents in center of crust.', 'Trim and seal crust edges (use a fork to crimp edges or use your hands for a more rustic look). In a small bowl, whisk egg and 1 tablespoon water. Use a pastry brush to cover crust with egg wash.', 'Bake pie on center rack of oven for 30-35 minutes, or until crust is a deep golden brown. Remove from heat and let sit 15 minutes before serving.', 'Tags: Baking, Dinner, Fall, Pie, Pumpkin']

recipe_description: With its light, herb-y profile and quick cooking time, this veggie-forward pasta is the perfect antidote to hot days and heavy BBQ dishes. Trader Joe’s Hearts of Palm Pasta stands in for the real thing, with a mild flavor that gives the tender zucchini, tangy tomatoes, and sweet corn room to shine—pleasing to the carb-conscious and pasta appreciators alike.
recipe_overview: Serves: 2 - 3 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 15 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['2 tablespoons TJ’s Organic Mediterranean Extra Virgin Olive Oil (or your favorite TJ’s Olive Oil)', '1 cup TJ’s Organic Cherry Tomatoes', '1 TJ’s Zucchini, sliced into half-moons', '1 teaspoon TJ’s Garlic Powder', 'Generous handful TJ’s Fresh Basil, chopped (plus more for garnish)', '1 cup TJ’s Corn (fresh or thawed from frozen)', '1 package TJ’s Hearts of Palm Pasta', 'TJ’s Sea Salt and Black Pepper', 'TJ’s Goat Cheese Crumbles']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Heat oil in a large nonstick pan. Add tomatoes, zucchini, garlic, basil, and a pinch of salt and stir. Cook 5 minutes. Stir in corn and cook another 5 minutes.', 'Stir in pasta and cook 5 minutes or until pasta is heated through. Remove from heat and season to taste with salt & pepper.', 'Plate hot pasta, top with goat cheese crumbles and fresh basil, and enjoy right away.', 'Tags: Meatless, Pasta, Summer, Vegetable']

recipe_description: Trader Joe’s Vegan Caesar Dressing uses an ingenious mix of plant-based ingredients, including tofu, capers, mustard, and miso to create a deliciously savory, enticingly peppery, and satisfyingly creamy Caesar Dressing while remaining totally vegan! This vegan Caesar salad recipe brings the restaurant classic to life, complete with a batch of savory, vegan “Parmesan cheese” and garbanzo bean croutons.
recipe_overview: Serves: 2 - 4 Prep Time: 15 Minutes Cooking Time: 20 - 30 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 can TJ’s Organic Garbanzo beans, drained', '1 tablespoon TJ’s Olive Oil', '1 teaspoon TJ’s Vegan Chicken-less Seasoning Salt', '¾ cup TJ’s Raw Cashew Pieces', '3 tablespoons TJ’s Nutritional Yeast', '¾ teaspoon TJ’s Sea Salt', 'Dash TJ’s Garlic Powder', '1 bag TJ’s Organic Romaine Salad', 'TJ’s Vegan Caesar Dressing', 'TJ’s Black Pepper', '1 TJ’s Lemon, cut into wedges']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Prepare garbanzo beans: Preheat oven to 400°F.', 'Spread drained garbanzo beans on a clean, lint-free towel or paper towels and pat dry. Transfer beans to a small bowl, add olive oil and stir to coat.', 'Spread beans on a rimmed baking sheet and roast on center rack of oven for 20-30 minutes. Remove from oven and toss beans with vegan chicken-less seasoning salt, set aside.', 'Prepare vegan “Parmesan cheese”: While garbanzo beans are roasting, add cashew pieces, nutritional yeast, sea salt and garlic powder to a food processor. Pulse to a fine meal, stopping to scrape down the sides of the bowl as necessary. Set aside. (This recipe will yield enough “cheese” to sprinkle on salads, pasta dishes, omelettes…store the leftovers in an airtight container in the fridge and it will keep for a couple of weeks.)', 'Assemble salad: Arrange romaine salad on a serving platter or large shallow bowl. Drizzle with 3 tablespoons dressing and 1 tablespoon vegan Parmesan and toss to coat. Add more dressing if desired.', 'Top with roasted garbanzo beans, sprinkle with vegan Parmesan, and finish with a few grinds of black pepper. Serve with lemon wedges and more dressing on the side.', 'Tags: Salad, Vegan']

recipe_description: Knowing the popularity of Trader Joe’s Unexpected Cheddar and knowing that our Customers are always looking for more ways to enjoy it, we’ve made the bold (and perhaps unexpected!) move to offer it in handy, Shredded form. The eight-ounce package contains large shreds of Unexpected Cheddar, ready for use in salads, soups, quesadillas...or this weeknight-friendly, easy macaroni & cheese recipe. If you've got an extra 10 minutes, toast up some panko breadcrumbs to take it over the top!
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 15 - 25 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['For the Toasted Breadcrumbs (optional):', "1/2 stick (4 tablespoons) TJ's Unsalted Butter", "1 cup TJ's Japanese Style Panko Breadcrumbs", "Pinch TJ's Sea Salt", 'For the Mac & Cheese:', '1lb your favorite short cut of TJ’s Pasta (Macaroni, Farfalle, Fusilli, etc.)', '2 cups TJ’s Whole Milk', '1 package (8 oz.) TJ’s Cream Cheese, cubed', 'Dash of TJ’s Garlic Powder (optional)', '1 ½ bags TJ’s Shredded Unexpected Cheddar', '2 tablespoons TJ’s Unsalted Butter', 'TJ’s Black Pepper', "sliced TJ's Green Onions and crumbled TJ's Fully Cooked Bacon, for garnish"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Prepare the breadcrumbs (if using):', "Melt butter in a skillet over medium-high heat. Add breadcrumbs and a pinch of salt and stir to coat. Cook 5 minutes or so, stirring frequently, until evenly toasted to a golden brown (don't take your eyes off the pan—the breadcrumbs can go from beautifully burnished to burnt in a flash!). Remove from heat and set aside.", 'Make the macaroni:', 'Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook pasta until barely al dente. Drain and set aside.', 'While pasta cooks, add milk to a large pot and bring to a simmer. Reduce heat to low and whisk in cream cheese and garlic powder until totally smooth.', 'Add cheese and butter and continue whisking until the cheese is fully melted.', 'Add cooked pasta to sauce and stir to coat. Cook a few minutes more, continuing to stir until sauce has thickened slightly. Remove from heat and stir in fresh ground pepper to taste.', 'Serve in bowls, garnished with bread crumbs, green onions, and bacon. Dig in!', 'Tags: Cheese, Cheesy, Italian, Pasta']

recipe_description: Inspired by all the shake-able extras you’d find at a pizza parlor (crushed red pepper, dried oregano, dehydrated garlic, etc.), Trader Joe’s Pizza Seasoned Shredded Toscano Cheese starts with wheels of carefully aged, creamy Toscano that are hand-rubbed with a one-of-a-kind blend of dried herbs, spices & sea salt. The result? A shredded cheese that lends pizza pizzazz to anything you sprinkle it on—pastas, potatoes, actual pizzas, burgers, salads, subs, and so much more…
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Cooking Time: 10 - 15 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 TJ’s Organic French Baguette', 'TJ’s Pizza Sauce', 'TJ’s Pizza Seasoned Shredded Toscano Cheese']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 400°F.', 'Slice baguette in half crosswise, then slice each half lengthwise so you have 4 “crusts.”', 'Place crusts on a baking sheet and bake 5 minutes. Remove from oven, top with pizza sauce and plenty of cheese.', 'Return pizzas to oven and cook another 5-10 minutes, until cheese is melted. Remove from oven and let cool slightly before digging in.', 'Tags: Cheese, Italian, Pizza, Quick Meal']

recipe_name: Sweet & Spicy BBQ Pulled Chicken Sandwiches
recipe_description: Trader Joe’s Organic Sweet & Spicy Pineapple BBQ Sauce is a saucy synthesis of sweet tropical heat that makes for an amazing glaze for ribs or lip-smacking partner to pulled chicken. Slow-cooking it with boneless, skinless chicken thighs yields tender, sweet-spicy meat that's perfect for piling high on sandwiches, adding to rice bowls, or serving alongside a crisp green salad; the hands-off cooking method yields plenty of free time to prep your side dishes or relax with a pre-dinner drink.
recipe_overview: Serves: 6 - 8 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 1 Hour 30 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 ½ cups TJ’s Sweet & Spicy Pineapple BBQ Sauce (seasonal) or your favorite TJ’s BBQ Sauce', '2 packages TJ’s Boneless Skinless Chicken Thighs (or a combination of boneless skinless chicken breasts & thighs)', '1 package TJ’s Organic Cole Slaw Kit', '½ TJ’s Red Onion, very thinly sliced', 'TJ’s Sliced Bread & Butter Pickles', '2 packages TJ’s Brioche Buns']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 350°F. Add BBQ sauce and chicken to a Dutch oven or lidded baking dish and stir to coat.', 'Cover and cook 90 minutes, until chicken is fall apart-tender and reaches an internal temperature of 165°F. Remove from oven and let stand 10 minutes.', 'Toss cole slaw with included dressing in a small bowl, set aside. Use forks to shred chicken in pot.', 'Spoon chicken onto bottom bun and top with prepared cole slaw, pickle slices, and red onion. Cover with top bun. Enjoy and repeat until stuffed!', 'Tags: BBQ, Chicken, Sandwich, Spicy, Summer, Sweet']

recipe_description: Trader Joe’s BBQ Rub and Seasoning with Coffee & Garlic balances the bold flavors of coffee, garlic and paprika with sweet brown sugar and just the right amount of salt to create a singular rub that rises above the rest. It’s perfectly at home on steaks, poultry or pork, and makes a swell seasoning for baked potatoes & grilled vegetables, too.
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 - 5 Prep Time: 1 Hour 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 35 - 40 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['2 packages TJ’s Organic Chicken Drumsticks', 'TJ’s BBQ Rub and Seasoning with Coffee and Garlic']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Remove chicken from packaging and pat dry with paper towels. Rub a generous amount of seasoning onto each drumstick (don’t be shy—the more the better!). Place chicken on a platter, cover and refrigerate 1 hour.', 'When ready to cook, remove chicken from refrigerator.', 'Oven: Preheat oven to 400°F. Set an oven-safe rack inside a large rimmed baking sheet. Arrange drumsticks evenly on rack. Bake on center rack of oven for 35-40 minutes, turning drumsticks halfway through, until internal temperature of chicken reaches 165°F. Remove from oven and let cool slightly before serving.', 'Grill: Generously oil grill grates. Preheat grill to medium-high. Use tongs to arrange chicken on grill and close lid. Cook 30-40 minutes, turning every 10 minutes or so, until internal temperature of chicken reaches 165°F. Remove from grill and let cool slightly before serving.', 'Tags: BBQ, Chicken, Coffee, Grilling, Summer']

recipe_description: The crisp, fresh nature of Trader Joe's Buffalo Ranch Chopped Salad makes it ideal for that hot summer day when you don’t want to cook, but still want interesting flavors to pique your palate. And, it’s enough for a couple people—or more if you’re enjoying it as a side.
recipe_overview: Serves: 2 - 4 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 15 - 20 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["4 TJ's Breaded Chicken Tenderloin Breasts", "1 package TJ's Buffalo Ranch Chopped Salad"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 400°F. Arrange chicken evenly on baking sheet. Place on center rack of oven and bake 15-20 minutes, until internal temperature of chicken reaches 165°F. Remove from oven and set aside.', 'Toss salad, dressing and toppings in a large serving bowl. Slice chicken and place atop salad. Serve and enjoy.', 'Tags: Chicken, Quick Meal, Salad']

recipe_description: Perfectly sized for a number of uses — including as a vehicle for avocado toast, a tortilla or pita, or even as a kind of savory, cheesy pancake, if you’re so inclined—Trader Joe’s Cauliflower Thins provide all the structure and texture of flatbread with a fraction of the carbs (only three grams of carbs per serving of two Thins, to be precise!). Taco night will never be the same…
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 package TJ’s Soy Chorizo', '2 packages TJ’s Cauliflower Thins', '1 TJ’s Romaine Heart, rinsed and finely shredded', 'Handful TJ’s Heavenly Villagio Marzano Tomatoes, chopped', '1 package TJ’s Smoked Cheddar Cheese with Paprika, shredded']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Add soy chorizo to a nonstick pan. Cook over medium heat until it reaches 165°F, about 8-10 minutes, stirring occasionally.', 'While soy chorizo cooks, heat another nonstick pan over medium-high heat. Warm cauliflower thins for a few minutes on each side, transfer to a plate and cover to keep warm.', 'To serve, fill a cauliflower thin with soy chorizo and top with romaine, tomatoes and cheese. Eat and repeat until full.', 'Tags: Cauliflower, Meatless, Quick Meal, Tacos']

recipe_description: Trader Joe's Honey Aleppo Sauce, crafted with a base of olive oil and honey, is sweet, savory, tangy, and slightly spicy. It brings the kind of heat that’s subtle at first, with the tangy overtones from red wine vinegar taking center stage. That heat builds in the most nuanced of ways, and while this Sauce is never house-on-fire hot, it delivers robust flavor and a focused intensity that will give your grilled meats, your salad dressings, shrimp & rice, and even your crudités a new spin you’ll find yourself going back to again and again.
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 15 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 bag TJ’s Wild Uncooked Argentinian Red Shrimp, thawed', '1 bottle TJ’s Honey Aleppo Sauce', '1 box TJ’s Frozen Jasmine Rice', '½ bunch TJ’s Parsley, chopped']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Place thawed shrimp in a medium bowl and add honey Aleppo sauce, stirring to coat. Cover and refrigerate 10 minutes.', 'Cook rice according to package directions. Add to a serving bowl and fold in chopped parsley, cover to keep warm.', 'Add marinated shrimp to a saucepan. Cook over medium heat until shrimp are opaque and reach 145°F, about 5-10 minutes. Remove from heat.', 'Spoon rice into bowls and top with shrimp and sauce. Enjoy.', 'Tags: Quick Meal, Rice, Shrimp, Spicy']

recipe_description: No grill? No problem. Toss some shrimp in Trader Joe’s Organic Sriracha & Roasted Garlic BBQ Sauce and blast them under the broiler. They cook in mere minutes, with complex flavors of hickory smoke, sweet molasses, and fiery peppers that provide a counterpoint to cool, crispy slaw and sweet, charred mango chunks. The spicy, creamy dressing that accompanies said slaw is a snap to pull together, using the same lip-smacking sauce, TJ’s Greek Yogurt and some apple cider vinegar.
recipe_overview: Serves: 2 - 3 Prep Time: 15 Minutes Cooking Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 cup plus ¼ cup TJ’s Organic Sriracha & Roasted Garlic BBQ Sauce', '¼ cup TJ’s Plain Whole Milk Greek Yogurt', '2 tablespoons TJ’s Organic Apple Cider Vinegar', '1 bag TJ’s Organic Shredded Green & Red Cabbage with Orange Carrots', '½ bunch TJ’s Cilantro, chopped', '2 tablespoons TJ’s Coconut Oil, divided', '½ bag TJ’s Mango Chunks, thawed', '1 bag TJ’s Uncooked Wild Argentinian Red Shrimp, thawed', 'TJ’s Pepitas or Sunflower Seeds, for garnish']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'In a medium sized bowl, whisk ¼ cup BBQ sauce with Greek yogurt and vinegar. Add cabbage mixture and cilantro and toss to coat. Cover and refrigerate.', 'Turn broiler to high. In a medium bowl, toss thawed shrimp with 1 tablespoon oil and remaining BBQ sauce, set aside.', 'In a medium bowl, toss thawed mango with 1 tablespoon oil. Spread evenly on one side of a large rimmed baking sheet and broil 5-6 minutes. Remove from oven and turn mango pieces over. Arrange shrimp on other side of baking sheet. Broil 2 minutes. Turn shrimp over and broil another 1-2 minutes until opaque and cooked through (they should be springy to the touch). Remove from oven.', 'Divide slaw among serving bowls. Top with a handful of pepitas or sunflower seeds. Top slaw with broiled shrimp and mango and enjoy immediately.', 'Tags: Salad, Shrimp, Spicy, Summer']

recipe_description: Trader Joe's Pesto Genovese Chicken Breast aims to simplify squeezing in a restaurant-quality dinner for a fraction of the price. Pair this pleasantly pre-marinated pesto poultry with a refreshing green salad topped with tangy tomatoes and fresh mozzarella. Or go for the classic Italian al fresco vibe and couple it with your favorite pasta & breadsticks (and lots of vino).
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Prep Time: 15 Minutes Cooking Time: 8 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['TJ’s Olive Oil', '1 package TJ’s Pesto Genovese Chicken Breast', '2 bags TJ’s Organic Arugula, rinsed and dried', '1 package TJ’s Fresh Basil, stems removed, rinsed and dried', 'TJ’s Balsamic Vinaigrette', '1 tub TJ’s Ciliegine Mozzarella, drained', '1 bag TJ’s Heavenly Villagio Marzano Tomatoes, rinsed, dried, and halved', 'TJ’s Glaze']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Dip a paper towel in olive oil and coat grill grates or grill pan. Preheat grill to medium-high.', 'Grill chicken 3-4 minutes per side, until internal temperature reaches 165°F. Remove from heat and set aside.', 'Toss arugula and basil in a large serving bowl or platter with your preferred amount of dressing. Top with cheese and tomatoes.', 'Thinly slice chicken on a bias and arrange atop salad. Drizzle with TJ’s Glaze and serve.', 'Tags: Chicken, Grilling, Italian, Salad, Summer']

recipe_description: The authentically-flavored marinade in Trader Joe's Carne Asada Auténtica is a very traditional, northern-Mexico-inspired blend of citrus & spice—and it elevates mere meat to something really special. Stuff it into grilled peppers with ripe chunks of buttery avocado and shower with freshly chopped cilantro for a satisfying warm-weather meal that won’t weigh you down.
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 - 6 Prep Time: 15 Minutes Cooking Time: 18 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['TJ’s Olive Oil', '3 TJ’s Bell Peppers', '1 package TJ’s Carne Asada Auténtica', '2 TJ’s Avocados, peeled, de-seeded and cubed', 'TJ’s Cilantro, rinsed, dried, and chopped', 'TJ’s Fresh Organic Salsa', 'TJ’s Limes, sliced']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Dip a paper towel in olive oil and coat grill grates or grill pan. Preheat grill to high.', 'Use tongs to place peppers on grill, close lid and cook 5 minutes. Turn peppers, close lid and cook another 5 minutes.', 'Open lid, move peppers away from heat and add carne asada. Keeping the lid open, grill carne asada 3-4 minutes per side, until nicely browned and internal temperature reaches 160°F. Remove peppers and carne asada from heat.', 'Slice peppers in half lengthwise and scoop out seeds and membrane, being careful not to puncture the pepper skin. Set aside.', 'Thinly slice carne asada against the grain. Fill prepared peppers with carne asada and top with avocado, salsa, and cilantro. Serve with lime wedges and enjoy.', 'Tags: BBQ, Grilling, Meat, Mexican, Summer']

recipe_description: The bold, spicy flavor of Harissa plus boneless, skinless Chicken Thighs equals a package of pre-marinated poultry that’s perfectly suited for the center of your plate—or better yet, a full-fledged Sheet Pan Dinner! Just place your ingredients on the pan, hand-toss ’em in olive oil & excess harissa marinade, arrange ’em in a single layer, bake, and—bam!—you’ve got yourself a meal. And a hearty one at that.
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 30 - 35 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 package TJ’s Harissa Flavored Chicken Thighs', '2 TJ’s Sweet Potatoes, peeled and cubed', '1 TJ’s Sweet Onion, sliced', '1 can TJ’s Organic Garbanzo Beans, drained', '4 tablespoons TJ’s Olive Oil', '1 TJ’s Lemon, sliced into rounds']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 425°F.', 'Add chicken, sweet potatoes, onions, garbanzo beans, and any harissa marinade remaining in package to rimmed sheet pan.  Drizzle with olive oil and gently toss to coat.', 'Spread ingredients in a single layer, keeping chicken pieces a few inches apart. Top chicken with lemon slices.', 'Bake on center rack of oven for 30-35 minutes, or until sweet potatoes are easily pierced with a fork and the internal temperature of the chicken reaches 165°F.', 'Divide among plates and enjoy!', 'Tags: Chicken, Quick Meal, Sheet Pan Meal']

recipe_description: With a few fridge basics and some simple prep, you’re minutes away from tasty, meal-building blocks of savory tofu. Make a double batch and you’ll have protein on hand for quick lunches all week long!
recipe_overview: Serves: 3 - 4 Prep Time: 20 Minutes Cooking Time: 30 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 16 oz. package your favorite TJ’s Tofu', '1/3 cup TJ’s Coconut Aminos or Soy Sauce']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Drain tofu and slice lengthwise into thirds. Press between 2 paper towels to soak up excess moisture. Cut the tofu slabs into 1-inch cubes.', 'Place tofu in a shallow dish and coat with coconut aminos. Marinate for at least 15 minutes, turning the cubes periodically.', 'Preheat oven to 375°F. Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil. Arrange marinated tofu cubes in a single layer on baking sheet.  Place baking sheet on center rack of oven and bake 30 minutes, flipping tofu halfway through cooking. Remove from oven and let cool slightly before serving.', 'Add to salads, curries, soups, or anywhere you’d like the taste of tofu!', 'Tags: Meatless, Protein, Tofu']

recipe_description: For a comforting meal that won’t weigh you down, look no further than this deceivingly humble, decidedly delicious bowl of soup. This Tuscan-inspired combo calls on zucchini, tomato, and garlic chicken sausage to build a flavorful base, but feel free to sub in whatever suits your available supplies.
recipe_overview: Serves: 6 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 30 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['2 tablespoons TJ’s Olive Oil', '1 TJ’s Yellow Onion, diced', '2 TJ’s Zucchini, chopped', '1 can (14 oz) TJ’s Diced Tomatoes', '1 package TJ’s Fully Cooked Garlic & Herb Chicken Sausage, sliced into coins', '1 cup TJ’s Red Split Lentils, rinsed and drained', '1 package TJ’s Organic Free Range Chicken Stock', 'TJ’s Salt & Pepper, to taste', 'TJ’s Grated Parmesan, lemon & chopped fresh herbs for garnish (optional)']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'In a large pot, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add onion, zucchini and a pinch of salt. Sauté until onion is translucent.', 'Add tomatoes, chicken sausage, lentils, chicken stock, and 1 cup water to pot and stir. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat, cover and simmer until lentils are cooked through, about 10 minutes.', 'Season soup to taste with salt & pepper. Ladle into bowls, garnish with grated Parmesan, fresh herbs, or a squeeze of lemon (or all three!) and dig in.', 'Tags: Comfort Food, Lentils, Soup']

recipe_description: In search of a dinner adventure? Avoiding a trip to the store to restock? In either case, fridge foraging is the answer. This recipe gives you the basic building blocks for a fantastic fried rice, with plenty of leeway for ingredient substitutions. How much leeway? We tested a version using ketchup & balsamic glaze in place of tangy marinade—and it worked just fine!
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 15 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 tablespoon TJ’s Soy Sauce', '1 tablespoon TJ’s Soyaki Sauce, Stir Fry Sauce, or other tangy marinade you might have sitting in your fridge', '1 tsp TJ’s Garlic Powder, if you’ve got it', '1/4 cup TJ’s neutral oil (Sunflower, Canola, Grapeseed, etc. will all work here)', '1 generous cup any TJ’s Vegetables you might have on hand (green/red/yellow onion, bell peppers, carrots, mushrooms, frozen peas/corn/edamame/broccoli), thawed if frozen, and chopped', '3 or 4 cups cooked, day-old TJ’s Rice', '2 TJ’s Large Eggs, beaten']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'In a small bowl, mix soy sauce, marinade and garlic powder, set aside.', 'Heat oil in large skillet or wok on medium heat. Fry chopped veggies in oil just until tender. Add rice to skillet, breaking up any clumps, and fry a few minutes more. Add eggs and stir until fully cooked. Add soy sauce mixture and stir to coat.', 'Spoon fried rice into bowls and serve as-is, or top with avocado, sriracha sauce, crumbled bacon pieces, chopped scallions…', 'Tags: Asian, Pantry, Quick Meal, Rice']

recipe_description: In need of a comforting concoction to beat the dinner doldrums? Look no further than a warm bowl of al dente pasta topped with savory meat sauce. This recipe relies on pantry and fridge basics (namely, noodles, sauce, meat, and veggies), so feel free to substitute with whatever you’ve got on hand. Enjoy the finished dish as-is, or lean into the checkered tablecloth restaurant vibe and serve with garlic bread and a glass of Grifone Sangiovese.
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Cooking Time: 35 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 pound TJ’s Organic Ground Beef', '1-2 teaspoons TJ’s Garlic Powder', '½ bag TJ’s Organic Broccoli Slaw, chopped into small pieces', '1 jar TJ’s Organic Marinara Sauce', '1 pound package TJ’s Pasta']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Add ground beef to a large skillet and season with garlic powder. Cook until slightly browned. Add chopped slaw to browned beef and cook a few minutes more, stirring occasionally. Add marinara, stir, then simmer for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.', 'While sauce simmers, bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook pasta according to package directions. Before draining, reserve a half-cup of pasta water and stir into sauce.', 'Drain pasta, then toss with a bit of olive oil to keep from sticking. Divide pasta among serving bowls and top with meat sauce. Yum!', 'Tags: Comfort Food, Italian, Pantry, Pasta']

recipe_description: We put together a mouthwatering “#StayHome soup” using a box of soup, a can of beans, and some onions, olive oil, and cumin. We used Trader Joe's Organic Butternut Squash Soup & Organic Garbanzo Beans, but you can use *any* box or can of soup and *any* kind of beans—simply adjust your featured spice accordingly.
recipe_overview: Serves: 2 - 4 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 package TJ's Low Sodium Organic Butternut Squash Soup", "1 tablespoon TJ's Olive Oil", "1/2 TJ's Yellow Onion, diced", "1 1/2 teaspoons TJ's Cumin", "1 can TJ's Organic Garbanzo Beans, partially drained", "TJ's Sea Salt"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Heat soup according to package directions; set aside and keep warm.', 'Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add onion and cumin, sauté until onions are translucent.', 'Add beans and a pinch of salt to pan. Sauté until beans are heated through and liquid is reduced. Remove from heat.', 'Ladle soup into shallow serving bowls. Top each bowl with a scoop of beans and garnish with salt and olive oil. Serve as-is, or with crackers, or crusty bread, or crisp salad greens...', 'Tags: Beans, Comfort Food, Pantry, Soup, Spices']

recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 15 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 pound package TJ's Pasta", "Your favorite TJ's Olive Oil", "4 cloves TJ's Organic Garlic, minced", "1 can of your favorite TJ's Fish, drained", "1 tablespoon TJ's Red Chili Flakes", "1 teaspoon TJ's Basil", "1 teaspoon TJ's Oregano", 'Grated Parmesan Cheese & Lemon wedges, for serving (optional)']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain & toss with a splash of olive oil.', 'Heat 3 tablespoons olive oil in empty pasta pot over medium heat. Add garlic, fish, and seasonings, and sauté for a few minutes to form a savory paste.', 'Turn off heat and add pasta back to pot. Toss to coat with fish mixture.', 'Transfer pasta to serving bowls. Garnish with cheese and a squeeze of lemon and serve.', 'Tags: Fish, Pantry, Pasta']

recipe_description: Inspired by a favorite dish at a nearby Chinese restaurant, this combination of sesame stir-fried ground chicken, crunchy cashews, warm ginger, et al. really pops when portioned out atop cool, crisp (not to mention naturally low-carb) lettuce leaves. Not cooking for five? No problem! This recipe has Sunday night #mealprep written all over it.
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 - 5 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 15 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 tablespoon TJ’s Olive Oil', '1 tablespoon TJ’s Organic Toasted Sesame Oil', '1 pound TJ’s Ground Chicken', '1 bag TJ’s Diced Onions', '1/3 cup TJ’s Island Soyaki', '2 tablespoons TJ’s Soy Sauce', '2 tablespoons TJ’s Rice Vinegar', '1 teaspoon TJ’s Ginger, grated', '1 package TJ’s Chile & Garlic Cashews, chopped', '1 tablespoon TJ’s Chives, chopped', '½ teaspoon TJ’s salt', '½ teaspoon TJ’s Ground Pepper', '1 head TJ’s Iceberg Lettuce']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Combine olive & sesame oils and heat in large skillet. Add chicken and cook over medium-high heat until chicken is cooked through, about 8 minutes, or until internal temperature reaches 165°F.', 'Add diced onions, stir to combine, and cook for about 5 minutes or until onion is soft and translucent. Stir occasionally.', 'Add Soyaki, soy sauce, rice vinegar, ginger, cashews, chives, salt and pepper. Cook for another 5 minutes or until fragrant.', 'Remove from heat and let cool slightly.', 'Rise head of lettuce, pat dry, and pull off desired leaves. Spoon about ¼ cup of the mixture into each of the lettuce leaves to serve. Enjoy!', 'Tags: Chicken, Nuts & Seeds, Quick Meal']

recipe_description: Inspired by a well-known & well-loved dish at an equally well-known & well-loved Italian restaurant here in L.A., Trader Joe’s Limone Alfredo Sauce tastes like a bright, sunny spring afternoon… If said spring afternoon was, say, mixed with whole milk, whipping cream, butter & real Parmigiano Reggiano cheese, that is! This zesty, creamy Alfredo is perfect with long-cut pasta like Trader Joe’s Linguine, and since it also brightens up seafood like you wouldn’t believe, we suggest adding some garlic-sautéed shrimp to the pasta party…
recipe_overview: Serves: 2 - 3 Prep Time: 2 Minutes Cooking Time: 10 - 15 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['½ package TJ’s Linguine', '1 cup TJ’s Limone Alfredo Sauce', '½ bag TJ’s Frozen Cooked Medium Shrimp', '2 tablespoon TJ’s Unsalted Butter', '2 cloves TJ’s Garlic, minced', 'TJ’s Parsley (optional, garnish)', 'TJ’s Salt, to taste']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'In a large pot, bring water to a rolling boil; add salt if desired. Add noodles and stir gently to separate. Bring water back to a boil and cook 8 – 10 minutes or until desired doneness is reached.', 'Remove from heat and drain pasta well. Place pasta back in empty pot.', 'In a medium skillet, melt butter. Once melted, add shrimp and garlic; sauté for 2 – 3 minutes, just until shrimp are thoroughly heated.', 'Add sauce and shrimp to noodles and mix until thoroughly coated. Add parsley if desired and salt to taste.', 'Serve and enjoy!', 'Tags: Lemon, Pasta, Spring']

recipe_name: Creamy Pesto Chicken & Broccoli Bow Tie Pasta
recipe_description: You might be dining in your jammies tonight (#JOEMO!), but this classy entrée brings the bow ties anyway! Don’t let elegant neckwear fool you, though—this Creamy Pesto Chicken & Broccoli Bow Tie Pasta is seriously a cinch to whip up.
recipe_overview: Serves: 1 - 3 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 20 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['½ bag TJ’s Italian Farfalle', '½ package (4oz) TJ’s Mascarpone ', '1/3 cup TJ’s Genova Pesto ', '1 cup TJ’s Grilled Chicken Strips ', '1 cup TJ’s Roasted & Salted Pecan Halves ', '½ package TJ’s Organic Broccoli Florets (fresh not frozen)', '½ teaspoon TJ’s Salt']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Bring a medium pot of salted water to a boil. Add pasta to boiling water. Cook uncovered, stirring occasionally for about 7-10 minutes. Remove pasta and drain thoroughly. Place back in empty pot.', 'Cook broccoli according to package instructions. Chop broccoli and chicken into bite-sized pieces; chop or smash pecans into smaller pieces.', 'Add pesto, mascarpone, broccoli, chicken, pecans, and salt to pasta and mix until thoroughly combined. If needed, place pot back on burner and mix over low heat instead. (Heat will soften the mascarpone, making it easier to work with.)', 'Serve and enjoy!', 'Tags: Chicken, Pasta']

recipe_description: Grains are great, but legumes? Legumes are legendary. Trader Joe’s Organic Chickpea & Red Lentil Risoni isn't just a rice replacement— it's remarkably tasty in its own right! Cook it up and see for yourself with this Caprese-inspired recipe…
recipe_overview: Serves: 2 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 15 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 cup TJ’s Organic Chickpea & Red Lentil Risoni', '1 container TJ’s Ciliegine Fresh Mozzarella', '6 TJ’s Organic Tomatoes on the Vine', '¼ cup TJ’s Genova Pesto', '3 Tablespoons of TJ’s Balsamic Glaze']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'In a medium saucepan, bring 1.5 cups of water to a boil. Stir in 1 cup of Risoni and return to boil. Reduce heat and simmer uncovered for 9 minutes, stirring occasionally.', 'Remove from heat and let stand, covered, for 5 minutes.', 'Cut tomatoes into quarters.', 'Mix together Risoni, tomatoes, pesto, cheese, and drizzle with glaze.', 'Serve immediately and enjoy!', 'Tags: Cheese, Quick Meal, Tomato']

recipe_description: Like their cauliflower cousins, these chewy pillows of real, fresh kale, potato starch, and chickpea flour offer up a surprising amount of flavor and boast the same, satisfyingly chewy texture of “regular” gnocchi. You can serve them with whatever sauce & accoutrements you fancy, but we quite like them all dressed up in Trader Joe’s Vegan Kale, Cashew & Basil Pesto. (Never hurts to double-down on kale, right?)
recipe_overview: Serves: 2 - 3 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 7 - 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['TJ’s Olive Oil', '1 package TJ’s Kale Gnocchi', "10 TJ’s Grape Tomatoes or TJ's Heavenly Villagio Marzano® Tomatoes, halved", '10 pieces TJ’s Ciliegine Fresh Mozzarella', "¼ cup TJ's Vegan Kale, Cashew & Basil Pesto"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Heat 1 – 2 tablespoons of oil in a sauté pan over medium heat.', 'Add gnocchi and heat for 7 to 10 minutes.', 'In a medium bowl combine gnocchi, tomatoes, cheese, and pesto. Mix until evenly coated.', 'Serve warm and enjoy!', 'Tags: Italian, Kale, Quick Meal, Tomato']

recipe_description: Who wouldn’t want to come home to a nice, warm meal? This Salsa Verde-style salute to the slow cooker yields you just that! Simply toss two jars of Trader Joe’s Salsa Verde, two pounds of Trader Joe's Chicken Thighs, twelve cloves of minced garlic, half a teaspoon of ground cumin, and a large diced onion into your cooker, and you’ve got yourself an easy-peasy, hands-off, mess-free meal in just a few hours.
recipe_overview: Serves: 6 - 8 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 6 - 8 Hours
recipe_ingredients: ['Chili Verde', '1 large TJ’s Onion, diced', '12 cloves TJ’s Premium Peeled Garlic, minced', '2 TJ’s Jalapeños, deseeded and diced (use gloves!)', "2 pounds TJ's Chicken Thighs", '2 jars TJ’s Salsa Verde', '1/2 teaspoon TJ’s Ground Cumin', 'Sides and Garnish', 'TJ’s Organic Jasmine Rice, heated', 'TJ’s Organic Black Beans, heated', "TJ's Lime wedges, chopped Cilantro, for garnish (optional)"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Add onion, garlic, jalapeño, chicken thighs, salsa verde and cumin to slow cooker and stir to combine.', 'Cook on LOW for 6-8 hours or HIGH for 2-4 hours, until chicken reaches an internal temperature of 165 degrees.', 'Shred chicken with a fork and serve with rice and beans.', 'Garnish with lime wedges and chopped cilantro.', 'Tags: Chicken, Hearty, Mexican, Protein, Stew']

recipe_description: Named for a guy who didn’t eat meat but who really knew his chili, this has to be one of the easiest, tastiest meatless dishes we’ve cooked up all year—and that’s saying something! (Carnivores, stay calm; just brown some ground beef & toss it in the pot if you’d like.) The secret ingredient? Trader Joe’s Organic Chili Seasoning Blend, of course…
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 - 6 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 3 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 cup TJ’s Organic Tricolor Quinoa', '2 cups water', '2 tablespoons TJ’s Olive Oil', '1 bag TJ’s Diced Onions', '1 can TJ’s Organic Tomato Sauce', '1 can TJ’s Organic Diced & Fire Roasted Tomatoes with Organic Green Chiles', '1 can TJ’s Organic Kidney Beans, drained', '2 tablespoons TJ’s Organic Chili Seasoning Blend', '1 teaspoon TJ’s Salt']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Rinse quinoa thoroughly in cold water & drain. Place rinsed quinoa in a medium pot with 2 cups of water and bring to a boil. Reduce to a simmer, cover, and cook for about 15 minutes, or until all water is absorbed. Remove from heat and set aside.', 'Heat olive oil in a large pot, add onions, and sauté for about 5 minutes, or until they began to soften. Add quinoa, tomato sauce, tomatoes, beans, chili seasoning and salt and mix until well combined.', 'Let simmer uncovered for about 25 minutes. Remove from heat and let rest for 5 minutes.', 'Serve warm and enjoy!', 'Tags: Meatless, Pantry, Quinoa, Seasoning']

recipe_description: Greens don’t need be the foundation of a salad.  Nutty, ancient grains give flavor, subtle crunch, and a slightly chewy texture to complement squash, cranberries and pecans. Makes a great potato topper!
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 45 - 50 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['4 TJ’s Murasaki Sweet Potatoes', '1 container TJ’s Harvest Grain Salad (seasonal)', "TJ's Organic Crumbled Feta or TJ's Crumbled Goat Cheese (garnish) "]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 425°F.', 'Prick sweet potatoes all over with a fork and place on a lined baking sheet.', 'Bake for 45- 50 minutes or until tender and a fork can be easily inserted in the thickest part of the potato.', 'Let cool slightly, cut potatoes partially open (length-wise) with a knife. Loosely "stuff" and top with salad. Sprinkle with cheese crumbles (optional) and serve immediately. Enjoy!', 'Tags: Fall, Limited Quantity, Meatless, Salad, Sweet Potato']

recipe_description: When the weather starts to cool down, and Trader Joe's Organic Pumpkin cans make their debut in the grocery aisle, you'll know it's time to make this chili. Tender ground turkey, savory seasonings and velvety pumpkin purée make this dish a hearty, stick-to-your-ribs kind of meal.
recipe_overview: Serves: 6 Cooking Time: 40 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['Chili', '1 Tbsp TJ’s Pure Imported Olive Oil', '1/2 TJ’s White Onion, diced', '1 TJ’s Bell Pepper (Orange or Yellow)', '2 cloves TJ’s Garlic, diced', '1 pkg (1.5 lbs) TJ’s All-Natural Ground Turkey', '1 can TJ’s Organic Diced & No Salt Added Tomatoes', '2 cans TJ’s Organic Pumpkin (seasonal)', '1 can TJ’s Organic Kidney Beans, drained', '1/2 can TJ’s Whole Kernel Corn, drained', '2 tsp TJ’s Sea Salt', '1 tsp TJ’s Cumin', '1 tsp TJ’s Ground Black Pepper', 'Garnish', '1 cup TJ’s Sour Cream', '1/2 cup TJ’s Shredded Cheddar Cheese', '1 package TJ’s Organic Cilantro', '1 Avocado, diced']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'In a large saucepan or stockpot, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add onions and bell peppers and sauté until onions are translucent and fragrant, about 3-4 minutes. Add garlic and stir for 30 seconds. Add turkey and break up in pan with spoon, sautéing until turkey is browned and cooked through. Stir in tomatoes, pumpkin, beans, corn and spices. Bring to a boil, and then reduce heat and simmer 20-30 minutes, stirring occasionally. Garnish with sour cream, cheese, avocado and cilantro, and serve.', 'Tags: Fall, Hearty, Seasonal, Turkey']

recipe_description: Trader Joe’s Sweet & Crisp Whole Kernel Corn has been warming our shelves with its bright yellow label for years, making it one of our most recognizable products. In this recipe, we’ve paired these naturally sweet kernels with the savory flavors of an unrolled enchilada. Layers of corn tortillas, cheese, butternut squash, black beans, and hatch chiles round out this meatless dish for a meal that won’t disappoint. Top with crunchy green onions and sliced avocado for a satisfying dinner you’ll want to add to your weekly rotation after just one bite.
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 - 6 Prep Time: 15 Minutes Cooking Time: 30 - 40 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 Bags TJ’s Cut Butternut Squash', '1 Can TJ’s Whole Kernel Corn, drained', '1 Can TJ’s Organic Black Beans, drained', '½ Can TJ’s Hatch Chopped Green Chiles', '1 ½ Teaspoon TJ’s Taco Seasoning', '1 ½ Cups TJ’s Enchilada Sauce divided', '2 Cups TJ’s Shredded Fancy Mexican Style Cheese Blend divided', '6 TJ’s Corn Tortillas', '3 TJ’s Green Onions diced, for garnish', '1 ripe TJ’s Avocado, diced, for garnish', 'TJ’s Sea Salt to taste']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 350°F. Grease a 10-inch pie pan or casserole dish and set aside.', 'Cut the corner of the bag of squash and microwave, 3 minutes until softened. Let cool slightly and dice.', 'Combine corn, beans, chile, squash, taco seasoning, a pinch of salt and ½ cup enchilada sauce in a bowl and mix until evenly coated.', 'Pour remaining enchilada sauce on a large plate. Coat both sides of the tortillas in sauce. Place a layer of tortillas on the bottom of the prepared pan, tearing tortillas as needed to fill the gaps. Top with ½ of the vegetable mix and ½ cup of cheese. Cover with another layer of dipped tortillas, top with the remaining vegetable mix and another ½ cup of cheese. Add the final layer of dipped tortillas and the remaining 1 cup of cheese on top.', 'Place pie on center rack of oven and bake for 30-40 minutes, or until cheese is melted and golden brown, and pie is slightly bubbling. Remove from oven and let cool slightly. Garnish with green onion and avocado and enjoy.', 'Tags: Casserole, Corn, Meatless, Mexican, Spicy']

recipe_description: In South America, Chimichurri is perhaps as common a condiment as ketchup is in America — albeit much more flavorful and distinctive. Trader Joe’s Peruvian Style Chimichurri Rice with Vegetables delivers on this distinction with the inclusion of cilantro, créme fraiche, garlic, ginger and Peruvian panca peppers.
recipe_overview: Serves: 3 - 5 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 15 - 20 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['TJ’s Olive Oil', '1 Package TJ’s Jalapeño Chicken Sausage', '2 Packages TJ’s Peruvian Style Chimichurri Rice with Vegetables', '1 Package TJ’s Broccoli Florets']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Slice sausage into coins. Add a small amount of oil to a large skillet over medium heat and pan fry sausage for 7 to 9 minutes flipping halfway through, until browned on both sides. Remove sausage from pan and let cool slightly.', 'Add broccoli and 3 tablespoons of water to the same pan, cover and cook over medium heat for 5 minutes. Remove cover, add Chimichurri rice and two additional tablespoons of water and stir. Cook over medium heat for 5 additional minutes, or until rice is hot, stirring occasionally.', 'Add sausage back to pan and cook a minute more to warm through. Spoon into serving bowls and enjoy.', 'Tags: Chicken, One-dish Meal, Quick Meal, Spicy']

recipe_description: Cut to resemble the sunflowers, or girasoli, that blanket the Italian countryside each summer, Trader Joe’s Ricotta & Lemon Zest Ravioli are a revelation in warm-weather cuisine. Made for us by a trusted Italian pasta partner, these tender, eggy, sunflower-shaped pasta pockets are stuffed with a bright & creamy filling of fresh ricotta cheese, real Sicilian lemon zest, salt, butter, & breadcrumbs. For a delicious dinner in a flash, simply throw together a crisp arugula salad, then top it with these quick-cooking Ravioli and a shower of salty, shaved Parmesan... Mangia bene!
recipe_overview: Serves: 3 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 3 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 package TJ’s Ricotta & Lemon Zest Ravioli (limited)', '1 bag TJ’s Organic Arugula', 'TJ’s Organic Rosé Vinaigrette', 'TJ’s Shaved Parmesan, Romano & Asiago Cheese', 'TJ’s Lemon Pepper', "TJ's Dry Toasted Pine Nuts OR TJ's Roasted Not So Salty Cashew Pieces"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Bring 4 quarts of lightly salted water to a boil. Add ravioli, bring back to a gentle boil. Cook 3 minutes until al dente. Drain and set aside.', 'In a large bowl, toss arugula with a small amount of dressing to coat. Divide dressed arugula among shallow serving bowls. Top with ravioli, a generous shower of cheese, a sprinkle of pine nuts (optional), and a few grinds of lemon pepper. Serve immediately, with more dressing on the side.', 'Tags: Italian, Pasta, Quick Meal, Summer']

recipe_description: Trader Joe’s Italian Bomba Hot Pepper Sauce builds heat, bite by bite, until you reach a crescendo of spice so invigorating that it paradoxically keeps you coming back for more. Drizzle it on pizza, grilled chicken, veggies, or scrambled eggs. Or, sauté it with garlic, oil, cheese and lemon to create a vibrantly flavored sauce for coating pasta.
recipe_overview: Serves: 6 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 package TJ’s Organic Italian Artisan Gigli Pasta', '¼ cup TJ’s Olive Oil', '1-2 tablespoons TJ’s Italian Bomba Hot Pepper Sauce', '1 teaspoon TJ’s Garlic Powder or Minced Garlic', 'Zest and juice of ½ a TJ’s Lemon (juice reserved)', '1 cup TJ’s Grated Parmesan Cheese, plus more for garnish']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'In a large pot, bring 4 quarts salted water to a rolling boil. Add pasta, stir gently and return to a boil; boil 4-5 minutes until very al dente, stirring frequently. Drain pasta, reserving ½ cup of pasta water for sauce.', 'Add oil, garlic, lemon zest, and bomba sauce to a large, high-sided skillet. Sauté over medium heat until garlic and lemon are fragrant. Add pasta and cheese to skillet and fold gently to coat.  Add reserved pasta water a splash at a time, if needed, to thin sauce as desired. Remove from heat and fold in lemon juice. Divide pasta among serving bowls and garnish with more cheese before serving.', 'Tags: Cheesy, Pantry, Pasta, Spicy']

recipe_description: While Trader Joe’s Bavarian Bratwurst weren’t around for the inaugural Oktoberfest festivities, we think they’d fit right in on the buffet table if they were. Made in Germany, these pork-sausage Brats are succulently plump, well-seasoned, and fully cooked, needing only a quick pan-fry or turn on the grill to achieve a golden-brown glow. They’re the ideal summer-to-fall transition food, ready to pair with cool, crunchy Trader Joe’s Sauerkraut with Pickled Persian Cucumbers and Josephsbrau Oktoberfest Lager.
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 8 - 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 package TJ’s Uncured Bavarian Bratwurst', '4 TJ’s Hot Dog Buns', 'TJ’s Sauerkraut with Pickled Persian Cucumbers', 'TJ’s Deli Style Spicy Brown Mustard', 'Josephsbrau Oktoberfest Lager, for serving (optional)']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Heat a skillet over medium. Add bratwurst and pan-fry 8-10 minutes, until lightly browned and bratwurst reach an internal temperature of 165°F. Remove from heat.', 'To serve, place each sausage in a hot dog bun, top with sauerkraut and drizzle with mustard. Serve with cold bottles of Josephsbrau Oktoberfest Lager on the side.', 'Tags: Fall, Pork']

recipe_description: A bright combo of veggies makes up the crisp and flavorful base of Trader Joe’s Sesame Crunch Chopped Salad Kit, including: Savoy and Red cabbages, and sweet carrots, with a special appearance by Chinese cabbage, aka Bok Choy. Further contributing to the Crunch of this Kit are some important components: Cashews add a nutty, buttery crunch, Nori flakes (seaweed) contribute their thin crispness and salty, ocean-y flavor, and of course, there’s some of this Salad’s namesake component: crunchy, sesame-spiked sticks.
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 7 - 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['2 tablespoons TJ’s Grapeseed Oil or Sunflower Oil', '1 package TJ’s Organic High Protein Super Firm Tofu, torn into chunks', 'TJ’s Salt & Pepper', '1 TJ’s Sesame Crunch Chopped Salad Kit', '1 can TJ’s Mandarin Oranges in Light Syrup, drained']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high until sizzling. Carefully add tofu to pan (use tongs or a slotted spoon to avoid oil spatter) and stir fry for 7-10 minutes, until golden brown. Transfer tofu to a paper-towel lined plate and season with salt & pepper, set aside.', 'In a serving bowl, toss salad with included dressing and toppings. Add tofu and mandarins and gently toss to combine. Enjoy immediately.', 'Tags: Meatless, Quick Meal, Salad, Sesame']

recipe_description: Making a taco better than its already-delicious self sounds like a tall task, but then you probably haven’t tried a taco that’s been doused in Trader Joe’s Organic Spicy Taco Sauce. We start with a base of distilled vinegar and tomato paste; add some heat thanks to chili pepper powder, red jalapeño pepper purée, and cayenne peppers; and round out the flavor with spices like garlic powder, pepper, and oregano.
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 - 6 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 12 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 tablespoon TJ’s Olive Oil', '½ package TJ’s Portobello Mushrooms, diced', '1 package TJ’s Beef-less Ground Beef', '½ cup plus 2 tablespoons TJ’s Organic Spicy Taco Sauce', 'Your favorite TJ’s Tortillas', '½ head of TJ’s Iceberg Lettuce, shredded', '2 TJ’s Roma Tomatoes, diced', 'TJ’s Mild Shredded Cheddar Cheese']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add diced mushrooms to skillet and let cook undisturbed for 5 minutes, until most of the moisture has evaporated. Add beef-less beef and taco sauce to skillet and sauté another 5-7 minutes, until heated through.', 'To serve, scoop beef-less beef into a warm tortilla and top with lettuce, tomato and cheese. Fold as you like and serve with more taco sauce for drizzling.', 'Tags: Meatless, Mexican, Quick Meal, Spicy']

recipe_description: Like its namesake brunch beverage, Trader Joe’s Bloody Mary Salsa boasts a base of sweet, juicy tomatoes, buoyed by a sour pickling brine, lemon juice, & nose-tingling horseradish. Jalapeño & green chili peppers add heat; Worcestershire sauce, capers, garlic, & onions offer a savory balance. It’s that tangy, tongue-tingling Bloody Mary taste you love, plus just enough spice to keep you sipping—or in this case, dipping—for more.
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 6 - 8 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 box TJ’s Premium Salmon Burgers', '1 package TJ’s Brioche Buns', 'TJ’s Bloody Mary Salsa', '1 TJ’s Large Avocado, pitted and thinly sliced', '¼ TJ’s Jumbo Red Onion, peeled and very thinly sliced', 'TJ’s Microgreens or Arugula']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Prepare salmon burgers according to package instructions. Place cooked salmon burger on bottom of brioche bun. Spoon salsa over burger. Arrange a few avocado slices atop salsa, followed by red onion and a handful of greens. Close burger with top half of brioche bun. Repeat with remaining ingredients and enjoy right away.', 'Tags: Burgers, Fish, Grilling, Summer']

recipe_description: On a heat scale of “Meh” to “Yowza!!” Trader Joe’s Green Dragon Hot Sauce rates a solidly satisfying “Whoa!” (About a 7 on the more mundane 1-10 scale). Made with jalapeños, tomatillos, cilantro, garlic, and habanero pepper powder, with a dash of vinegar and a splash of lime juice, it’s a creative condiment that’s delicious on… just about everything. Seriously! Drizzle Green Dragon on eggs, salads, burgers, enchiladas, fried rice, fish tacos...
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 15 - 18 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['TJ’s Battered Fish Nuggets', '2-3 TJ’s Organic Tomatoes on the Vine', 'TJ’s Corn Tortillas', 'TJ’s Organic Shredded Green & Red Cabbage with Orange Carrots', 'TJ’s Green Dragon Hot Sauce']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 475°F. Arrange fish nuggets on a greased baking sheet. Bake on center rack of oven for 15-18 minutes until crisp. Remove from oven and let cool slightly.', 'While fish nuggets bake, slice tomatoes and set aside. Warm tortillas in a pan over medium heat or directly over the gas flame, using tongs to flip.', 'To assemble each taco, place two nuggets in a warm tortilla and top with tomatoes and cabbage. Drizzle with as much hot sauce as you like and enjoy!', 'Tags: Fish, Quick Meal, Spicy, Tacos']

recipe_description: With a recipe that’s more than 50% jalapeños, Trader Joe’s Jalapeño Sauce is hot without being overwhelmingly spicy, and smooth and creamy without any dairy (in fact, it’s vegan!). Drizzle it over eggs for breakfast. Employ it as a replacement for traditional enchilada sauce in an enchilada bake at dinnertime. Or, use it to add some verve to your favorite grilled protein or veggie bowl.
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 package TJ’s Fully Cooked Traditional Carnitas', '2 bags TJ’s Frozen Organic Jasmine Rice', '1 can TJ’s Organic Black Beans, rinsed and drained', 'TJ’s Pico de Gallo', 'TJ’s Avocado’s Number Guacamole', 'TJ’s Jalapeño Sauce', 'TJ’s Fresh Cilantro, sliced Jalapeno, and sliced Lime, for garnish (optional)']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Microwave carnitas according to package directions. Shred with forks, set aside.', 'Microwave rice according to package directions. Divide among four serving bowls. Top bowls with carnitas, black beans, pico de gallo, and guacamole.  Drizzle generously with jalapeño sauce. Garnish with fresh cilantro, sliced jalapeño, and a squeeze of lime, if using. Enjoy!', 'Tags: Mexican, Quick Meal, Spicy']

recipe_description: Trader Joe’s Pollo Asado Autentico is, more or less, the chicken version of our classic Carne Asada: thin strips of boneless, skinless chicken breast, marinated in an ever-so-slightly spicy, bright, citrus-y marinade. The chicken is grill-ready, but also makes a lip-smackingly simple sheet pan meal when roasted with peppers and onions. Nothing complicated or fancy here; but oh boy is it delicious.
recipe_overview: Serves: 6 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 25 - 30 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 TJ’s Yellow Onion, thinly sliced', '1 bag TJ’s Frozen Mélange à Trois (Red, Yellow & Green Bell Pepper Strips)', '2 tablespoons TJ’s Olive Oil', 'TJ’s Salt & Pepper', '1 package TJ’s Pollo Asado Autentico', 'Your favorite TJ’s Tortillas', '1 TJ’s Lime', 'TJ’s Cilantro', 'TJ’s Pico de Gallo']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Position oven racks in upper and lower thirds of oven. Preheat oven to 400°F.', 'Place onion, bell peppers, and olive oil in a medium bowl and toss to combine. Divide mixture among two large baking sheets; set aside.', 'Remove pollo asado from package and slice into 2x1-inch strips. Divide pollo asado between baking sheets. Place sheets on upper and lower racks of oven and bake 25-30 minutes, rotating halfway through, until chicken reaches 165°F. Remove from oven and let cool slightly.', 'While fajitas bake, slice limes into wedges. Rinse and dry cilantro and remove stems. Warm tortillas in a skillet over medium heat, or directly over flame, if desired.', 'To assemble, fill a warm tortilla with fajitas and top with pico de gallo, cilantro, and a squeeze of lime. Repeat until satisfied.', 'Tags: Mexican, Sheet Pan Meal']

recipe_description: A consistent member of the Trader Joe’s Customer Choice Awards winners circle, Trader Joe’s Chicken Tikka Masala boasts chunks of roasted chicken served in a creamy, mildly spicy, tomato-based, curry flavored sauce. (You can read more about this dish's origins here.) Our Chicken Tikka Masala was so favored for so many years, in fact, that we developed a vegan version to live alongside it in our frozen case. With a base of soy protein in place of meat, and bathed in an equally flavorful, slightly spicy sauce, Trader Joe’s Vegan Tikka Masala skyrocketed to fame and earned a coveted spot in our Customer Choice Awards, right alongside its meat-based counterpart.
recipe_overview: Serves: 2 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 5 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 package TJ’s Chicken Tikka Masala OR Vegan Tikka Masala', '2 TJ’s Flour Tortillas', '½ cup TJ’s Organic Peas, heated according to package directions and drained', 'TJ’s Mango Chutney', 'TJ’s Plain Yogurt', 'Fresh Cilantro, chopped']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Remove tikka masala tray from carton and puncture film 2 to 3 times. Microwave on high for 3 minutes. Carefully peel back film enough to gently stir sauce. Heat an additional 1 to 1½ minutes to an internal temperature of 165°F. Carefully remove film; set aside.', 'Warm tortillas in a dry skillet or directly over flame. Remove from heat and lay tortillas on a clean work surface. Divide rice and tikka masala between tortillas. Top each with peas, a few dollops of yogurt and chutney, and cilantro.', 'To roll, pull half of the tortilla closest to you up to meet the top half, then pull the tortilla and fillings back toward you. Fold in the left and right sides of the tortilla, then roll tightly until closed. Enjoy!', 'Tags: Indian, Quick Meal']

recipe_description: Encouraged by our Customers’ love for TJ’s Cauliflower Pizza Crust, our Buyer recently approached our Italian supplier to see what else we could come up with. After tinkering with the recipe for a stretch to get it juuuust right, a new star was born: Trader Joe’s Broccoli & Kale Pizza Crust. Like its predecessors, its gluten-free ingredient list is simple as can be: broccoli and black kale (which make up over 50% of the recipe), corn flour, water, cornstarch, potato starch, olive oil, and salt.
recipe_overview: Serves: 3 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 29 - 32 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 TJ’s Broccoli & Kale Pizza Crust', '1/3 jar TJ’s Red Pepper Spread with Eggplant & Garlic', '5 slices TJ’s Fresh Mozzarella Cheese Log']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Par-bake crust according to package directions. Remove crust from oven. Slather red pepper sauce evenly atop crust, followed by cheese slices. Return pizza to oven and cook 5-8 minutes, or until cheese is melted. Remove pizza from oven and let cool slightly before slicing and serving.', 'Tags: Cheese, Kale, Pizza']

recipe_description: Pickling spices of mustard, coriander, bay leaf, red chili pepper, and dill seed create the signature flavor profile of Trader Joe’s Uncured Corned Beef Brisket: savory and fragrant, balanced by tangy vinegar powder and sweet brown sugar. We’ve opted for a high quality, tender brisket cut with no nitrates or nitrites, which creates an impossibly juicy, incredibly flavorful finished dish.
recipe_overview: Serves: 6 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 2 Hours 5 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 TJ’s Jumbo Yellow Onion, trimmed and cut into large chunks', '1 TJ’s Corned Beef Brisket (seasonal)', '1 bottle (11.2 fl. oz.) Guinness Draught Irish Stout', '2 cups water', '1 bag (1.5 pounds) Organic Mini Potato Medley OR Red Potatoes', '1 bag TJ’s Organic Cut & Peeled Carrots', '1 head TJ’s Green Cabbage, trimmed and cut into wedges', 'TJ’s Whole Grain Mustard, for serving']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Place onion chunks in pressure cooker. Remove brisket from package and cut into three large pieces. Arrange brisket atop onions, fat-side down. Pour beer and water over brisket.', 'Seal pressure cooker lid and cook on high pressure for 20 minutes per pound (that’s 70 minutes for a 3.5-pound brisket; add or subtract cook time as necessary based on the weight of your brisket). Let pressure release naturally for 20 minutes, then manually release remaining pressure. Carefully transfer brisket pieces to a cutting board and cover with foil.', 'Strain cooking liquid, reserving 1.5 cups liquid to cook vegetables; discard solids. Add potatoes, carrots and cabbage wedges to pressure cooker and cover with reserved liquid. Seal lid and cook on high pressure for 3 minutes. Quick release pressure. Use tongs to transfer vegetables to a large serving platter; reserve cooking liquid for serving.', 'Gently slice corned beef against the grain and arrange next to vegetables on serving platter. Spoon cooking liquid atop corned beef. Serve with whole grain mustard on the side.', "Tags: Beef, Pressure Cooker, St Patrick's Day"]

recipe_name: Vegetable and Soba Noodle Shrimp Stir Fry
recipe_description: Prepare Trader Joe’s Vegetable and Soba Noodle Stir Fry Kit as directed, and the vegetables (namely, broccoli florets, Bok Choy, savoy cabbage, snow peas, and green onion) will be crunchy, and the soba blissfully chewy—both enhanced by the included sweet stir fry sauce with classic ginger, garlic and sesame flavors. Add some thawed, fully cooked shrimp during the last few seconds of cooking, and in less than 10 minutes, you’ll have a complete meal on your hands!
recipe_overview: Serves: 3 - 4 Cooking Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 package TJ’s Vegetable and Soba Noodle Stir Fry', '1 tablespoon TJ’s Sunflower Oil', '1 package TJ’s Fully Cooked Medium Shrimp (70-110 count)']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Remove noodles from package and soak in a bowl of hot water for two minutes to soften (or microwave in a microwave safe bowl filled with water for 30 seconds). Drain and use your fingers to gently separate noodles; set aside.', 'Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high. Add vegetables and sauté 3 to 4 minutes, stirring frequently. Add noodles to skillet and sauté an additional 1 to 2 minutes, or until heated through. Add sauce and toss to coat the vegetables and noodles. Turn off heat. Add shrimp to pan and toss once more to coat. Divide among shallow serving bowls and enjoy immediately.', 'Tags: Quick Meal, Shrimp, Vegetable']

recipe_description: We created Trader Joe’s Creamy Chicken Poblano Ravioli with one of our trusted ravioli suppliers, starting with a filling made from chunks of breast meat that comes from chickens raised cage-free and fed an all-vegetarian diet with no antibiotics ever. The chicken is paired with plenty of poblano peppers, giving each bite a fresh-chili flavor and mild heat. Four kinds of cheese (ricotta, mozzarella, Parmesan & Romano) fill out the filling, along with heavy cream, and breadcrumbs—all seasoned with oregano, garlic, sea salt, and black pepper, then wrapped in egg & durum wheat pasta. Whew!
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Cooking Time: 15 - 20 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 package TJ’s Mexican Style Roasted Corn with Cotija Cheese', '1 package TJ’s Creamy Chicken Poblano Ravioli', 'Your favorite TJ’s Olive Oil', 'Fresh cilantro, chopped, for garnish (optional)']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'In  large pot, bring 4 quarts of water to a boil. While water boils, prepare roasted corn according to package directions, reserving cotija cheese for serving. Set aside.', 'Add ravioli to boiling water and cook 5 to 6 minutes. Using a slotted spoon, gently transfer ravioli to a colander to drain.', 'Divide prepared corn among four plates, followed by ravioli. Drizzle with olive oil and garnish with reserved cotija cheese and cilantro, if using. Enjoy immediately.', 'Tags: Chicken, Corn, Pasta, Spicy']

recipe_name: Quinoa Veggie Burgers with Avocado Tzatziki
recipe_description: For more than 20 years, our Customers’ love of Tzatziki has remained tried & true. So our Buyer had a thought: why not combine this TJ’s classic with something new? Perhaps, she thought, with a food that’s rich and creamy, filled with healthy fats, and seemingly hipper than ever: the avocado.
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 package TJ’s Quinoa Cowboy Veggie Burgers', '4 TJ’s Whole Wheat Hamburger Buns', '1 tub TJ’s Avocado Tzatziki Dip', '½ TJ”s Red Onion, very thinly sliced', 'TJ’s Fresh Cilantro, chopped']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 450°F. Remove burgers from packaging and place on an ungreased baking sheet. Bake 5 minutes or until browned. Carefully flip and continue to bake an additional 5 minutes, or until heated through and well browned. Remove from oven and let cool slightly.', 'Place burger patty on bottom of hamburger bun. Top with a generous swipe of Avocado Tzatziki dip, followed by sliced red onion and cilantro. Top with hamburger bun and serve immediately.', '  Tags: Burgers, Meatless, Quick Meal, Spicy']

recipe_description: If you’ve gone overboard with cheesy casseroles or creamy pastas in search of cold weather comfort food, let this reset recipe guide you back to balanced shores. Sautéed onion, crimini mushrooms, and tender bok choy are bathed in Trader Joe’s Miso Broth, which boasts a triple-flavor-threat of miso, mushroom and ginger, and adds incredible depth and lip-smacking savory-ness to anything in its presence. The addition of Organic Sprouted Tofu in the last few minutes of cooking makes this soup ideal for a light lunch on its own (although you could always serve it in smaller portions as a first course!).
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 - 8 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 20 - 25 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["2 tablespoons TJ's Olive Oil", "1/2 TJ's Yellow Onion, diced", "TJ's Sea Salt", "1 bag TJ's Sliced Crimini Mushrooms", "2 packages TJ's Miso Ginger Broth", "1 package TJ's Baby Bok Choy, rinsed and trimmed", "1 package (16 oz.) TJ's Organic Extra Firm Sprouted Tofu, cut into bite-size pieces", "TJ's Sesame Oil & Soy Sauce, for garnish"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Heat a large pot over medium heat, add 2 tablespoons olive oil. When oil is hot, add onion and a pinch of salt. Sauté onions for 3 minutes. Add mushrooms and stir. Saute 10-15 minutes, until mushrooms are browned and most of the water from the mushrooms has evaporated.', 'Add broth to pot and bring to a boil. Add bok choy and reduce heat to a simmer. Cook for 5 minutes. Add tofu and cook another 2-3 minutes, just until heated through. Remove from heat and season to taste with salt. Ladle soup into large bowls, garnish with a splash of sesame oil and soy sauce, and enjoy!', 'Tags: Comfort Food, Ginger, Meatless, Mushrooms, Soup, Umami, Winter']

recipe_description: The aromatic marinade enveloping Trader Joe’s Shawarma Chicken Thighs pulls double duty as a tenderizer and flavor booster in this well-spiced (but not spicy) take on classic chicken & rice soup. Built on a base of Trader Joe’s Mirepoix, a convenient, chopped & ready-to-cook blend of carrots, celery & onion, this is a soup that tastes even better after a day in the fridge, where the spices can further intensify. Serve it alongside a crisp green salad and warm pita for a comforting winter meal.
recipe_overview: Serves: 8 - 10 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 55 Minutes - 1 Hour
recipe_ingredients: ["1 package TJ's Shawarma Chicken Thighs", "TJ's Olive Oil", "1 tub TJ's Mirepoix", "TJ's Sea Salt", "2 packages TJ's Organic Chicken Stock, plus 2 cups water", "1 cup TJ's Brown Basmati Rice (dry)", "1 teaspoon TJ's Ground Cumin", "Juice of 2 TJ's Lemons"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Using a sharp knife, chop chicken into bite-size pieces. Transfer chicken to a paper towel-lined plate to blot some of the excess oil, set aside.', 'Heat a large pot over medium heat, add 2 tablespoons olive oil. When oil is hot, add mirepoix and a pinch of salt. Sauté until onions are translucent, 3-5 minutes. Add chicken, chicken stock, and water to pot and stir. Partially cover and simmer for about 30 minutes, until chicken is cooked through.', 'Add rice, cumin, and 1 teaspoon salt to pot and stir. Cover and cook for 15-20 minutes more. Uncover, remove from heat and let stand 5 minutes. Skim excess oil and stir in lemon juice. Season soup to taste with salt. Ladle soup into large bowls and enjoy!', 'Tags: Chicken, Comfort Food, Soup, Winter']

recipe_description: This recipe for Creamy Chicken Gnocchi Soup comes straight from a Crew Member’s kitchen. Simmer Trader Joe’s Kettle Cooked Chicken Soup with a package of shelf-stable Gnocchi and a container of shelf-stable Whipping Cream (shout out to pantry essentials!), and you could be serving it in your kitchen in 10 minutes—yes, you read that right. Serving Trader Joe’s Organic French Rolls with a bowl of this creamy, chicken dumpling-esque soup isn’t required, but it’s absolutely recommended.
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 - 6 Cooking Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["2 tubs TJ's Kettle Cooked Chicken Soup", '1 package Gnocchi (shelf-stable)', "1 package TJ's Whipping Cream (shelf-stable)", "TJ's Fresh Thyme, for garnish (optional)"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Add all ingredients to a medium saucepan. Heat over medium and bring to a simmer. Simmer 10 minutes, stirring occasionally. Garnish with fresh thyme and serve.', 'Tags: Chicken, Comfort Food, Soup, Winter']

recipe_description: Think pasta salad is reserved for spring and summer? This recipe, and our recipe taste-testers, beg to differ. It’s a bright soup with the power to beat the winter blahs, made substantial with Trader Joe’s Mediterranean Pasta Salad. Tangy Lemon Pepper Grilled Chicken adds protein and zingy flavor, balanced by briny feta and olives in the pasta salad. A quick simmer in savory Organic Chicken Stock, and you’ll have the sights and smells of the sunny Mediterranean filling your soup bowl...
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 - 6 Prep Time: 3 Minutes Cooking Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 package TJ's Lemon Pepper Grilled Chicken or Balsamic Chicken", "2 tubs TJ's Mediterranean Style Orzo Pasta Salad", "2 packages TJ's Organic Chicken Stock", "1 TJ's Lemon, sliced into wedges"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Use forks to pull apart chicken and shred into pieces. Add all ingredients to a medium saucepan and heat over medium high. Bring to a boil, then lower heat and simmer 8 minutes. Serve hot with a squeeze of lemon.', 'Tags: Chicken, Lemon, Quick Meal, Soup']

recipe_description: A veteran of our line of frozen Indian entrées, Trader Joe’s Channa Masala is moderately spicy, belly-warming, and undeniably comforting—basically everything you’re looking for when it comes to cold weather cuisine. Paired with full-flavored Organic Roasted Tomato & Red Pepper Soup, it’s ready before you can ask “What’s for lunch?” (Well, almost.) Don’t forget to warm up Trader Joe’s Malabari Paratha for dipping!
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Cooking Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 package TJ’s Organic Low Sodium Tomato & Roasted Red Pepper Soup', '2 packages TJs Channa Masala', 'TJ’s Greek Yogurt or Sour Cream and chopped parsley, for garnish (optional)', 'TJ’s Malabari Paratha, cooked according to package directions, for dipping (optional)']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Add soup to a medium saucepan. Heat over medium-low, stirring occasionally.', 'While soup heats, microwave channa masala according to package directions; stir.', 'Divide soup among 4 shallow serving bowls. Divide channa masala and gently spoon atop center of soup. Garnish with a dollop of yogurt and a sprinkle of chopped parsley. Enjoy!', 'Tags: Comfort Food, Indian, Meatless, Quick Meal, Soup, Winter']

recipe_description: Inside each bag of Trader Joe’s Organic Green Vegetable Foursome is a verdant vegetable blend of broccoli florets, shelled peas, trimmed French green beans, and tender zucchini quarters. The veggies are organically grown, blanched & gently cooked with organic garlic, onions, parsley, and savory spices.
recipe_overview: Serves: 2 Prep Time: 30 Minutes Cooking Time: 14 - 18 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 TJ’s All-Natural USDA Choice Premium Angus Beef New York Strip Steak', 'TJ’s Olive Oil', 'TJ’s Sea Salt & Black Pepper Grinders', '1 bag TJ’s Organic Green Vegetable Foursome', 'TJ’s Aioli Garlic Mustard Sauce OR Dijon Mustard', 'TJ’s Parsley, chopped, for garnish (optional)']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Unwrap steak and season liberally with salt and pepper. Let rest for 30 minutes.', 'Coat steak with 1 tablespoon of olive oil. Heat a cast iron skillet over medium-high. Add steak to skillet and cook about 2 minutes per side, until the internal temperature reaches 120°F (this will take about 10 minutes, leaving you with a medium-rare steak after resting— if you prefer your steak medium, add a few more minutes of cook time and remove the steak when it reaches 130°F). Transfer steak to a plate to rest.', 'Add vegetables to skillet and sauté 4-5 minutes, until heated through. Use a slotted spoon to transfer vegetables to a serving platter. Slice steak and arrange atop vegetables. Serve with a generous drizzle of mustard sauce, garnish with parsley, and dig in!', "Tags: One-dish Meal, Steak, Valentine's Day"]

recipe_description: Umami is the word used to describe the fifth taste – in addition to sweet, salty, sour, and bitter. Taken from Japanese, the word translates to “pleasant savory taste,” and really, it’s just that. And Trader Joe’s Mushroom & Company Multipurpose Umami Seasoning Blend is really just something you’re going to want to put on… everything.
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Prep Time: 35 Minutes Cooking Time: 13 - 18 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 package (16 oz) TJ's All Natural Ground Turkey", '¼ cup minced TJ’s Yellow Onion', '2 teaspoons TJ’s Mushroom & Company Multipurpose Umami Seasoning Blend', 'TJ’s Olive Oil', "4 TJ’s Ciabatta Rolls (halved lengthwise) or 4 TJ's Brioche Buns", '4 slices TJ’s Sliced Aged Swiss Cheese', 'TJ’s Balsamic Glaze and/or Organic Yellow Mustard, whichever you prefer', 'Your favorite crunchy TJ’s Salad Greens or Microgreens']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Add onion to a large bowl. Use your hands to break ground turkey into pieces and add to bowl. Sprinkle seasoning evenly over meat. Use your hands to gently mix until onion, turkey and seasoning are evenly combined. If using our pre-formed Ground Turkey Patties, season both sides of each patty generously and evenly. Cover and refrigerate 20 minutes.', 'Remove turkey from refrigerator. Use your hands to form the meat into 4 patties.', 'Pan-Fry: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat and add oil to coat the bottom of the skillet. When oil is hot, use a spatula to carefully transfer patties to skillet. Cook 6-8 minutes, undisturbed, until bottom is well-browned and releases easily from the pan. Flip patties, adding more oil to the pan if necessary, and cook another 6-8 minutes, until internal temperature reaches 165°F. Transfer to paper towel lined plate, set aside.', 'If you’re in a rush, you can skip ahead to assembly. But if you want warmed rolls with melty cheese, turn broiler to high. Place roll halves on a baking sheet. Top half of the rolls with a slice of cheese. Broil for 1-2 minutes to melt cheese (watch carefully to ensure rolls don’t burn!). Remove pan from broiler and let cool slightly.', 'Place burger on the bottom half of the roll with melted cheese, followed by salad greens. Generously spread glaze and mustard on top half of the roll, and place on burger.', 'Grill: Preheat grill to medium high. Place seasoned patties on grill and cook, covered, for 6 minutes. Flip burgers and cook, covered, about 6 more minutes or until internal temperature of patties reaches 165°F. Place a slice of cheese on each patty during the last 1-2 minutes of cooking to melt. Remove sand let cool slightly before serving.', 'Tags: Burgers, Grilling, Turkey, Umami']

recipe_description: If you’re wondering why Trader Joe’s Organic Corn Chip Dippers made our not-scientific-but-still-pretty-accurate list of Crew Member Favorites, you probably haven’t tried these delightfully crunchy, dippable chips—something you should change very soon. They’re made with a mere three ingredients: organic corn, organic sunflower oil, and salt. That’s it!
recipe_overview: Serves: 2 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 5 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 bag TJ’s Organic Corn Chip Dippers', '1 can TJ’s Turkey Chili, heated according to package directions', 'TJ’s Shredded Three Cheese Mexican Blend', 'TJ’s Hot & Sweet Jalapeños']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Lay the closed bag of corn chip dippers flat on a clean work surface. Using a sharp pair of scissors, cut the corn chip dipper bag in half crosswise, so that each half of the bag contains dippers (even the portions out if necessary). Roll the cut edges of each side down to create “bowls.”', 'Top the dippers with warmed turkey chili, cheese, and jalapeños to taste. Dig in!', 'Tags: Cheese, Corn, Pantry, Spicy']

recipe_description: Don’t let the challenging-to-pronounce name intimidate you. Trader Joe’s Mirepoix (pronounced meer-pwah) is a ready-to-use blend of carrots, onions and celery, named for the French aristocrat who employed the chef who likely institutionalized the use of this combination for cooking.
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 - 6 Prep Time: 15 Minutes Cooking Time: 45 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 package TJ's Spicy Italian Chicken Sausage (or any spicy TJ's Chicken Sausage)", "3 tablespoons TJ's Extra Virgin Olive Oil, divided", "1 container TJ's Mirepoix", "1 teaspoon TJ's Spice of the World, Garlic Powder", "1/2 teaspoon TJ's Spices of the World, Oregano", "1 teaspoon TJ's Sea Salt", "1/2 teaspoon TJ's Black Pepper", "2 containers TJ's Organic Low Sodium Chicken Broth", '2 cups water', "1 cup TJ's Organic Red Quinoa, rinsed and drained", "1 bag TJ's Organic Tuscan Kale, stems removed", "TJ's Grated Parmesan Cheese or Fresh Lemon, sliced, for garnish"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Slice sausage links into half-inch thick coins, then slice coins in half. Heat a skillet over medium heat and add 1 tablespoon olive oil. When oil is hot, add sausage to pan and cook undisturbed for 5 minutes. Flip sausage pieces and continue to cook until browned, 3-5 minutes. Remove from heat and set aside.', 'Heat a large pot over medium heat, add remaining olive oil. When oil is hot, add mirepoix, garlic powder, oregano, salt and pepper. Sauté until onions are translucent and spices are fragrant, 3-5 minutes.', 'Add broth, water, and quinoa, and bring to a boil for 5 minutes. Add kale, cover pot and simmer for 10-15 minutes, until kale is tender and quinoa is cooked. Add sausage and cook another few minutes until warmed through. ', 'Ladle soup into large bowls and garnish with grated parmesan or a squeeze of lemon. Serve with crusty bread for dipping and dig in!', 'Tags: Hearty, Kale, Soup, Stew, Winter']

recipe_description: One of the best things about comfort food is, of course, its ability to provide comfort… one of the lesser-discussed benefits is its flexibility. Take chicken pot pie, for example. You may have a favorite version, your best friend may have a different favorite, and yet, they all bring comfort.
recipe_overview: Serves: 5 Prep Time: 20 Minutes Cooking Time: 20 - 30 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['Pot Pies', "1 package TJ's Gourmet Pie Crusts, defrosted in the refrigerator", "1 cup TJ's Organic Foursome Vegetables", "1/2 cup diced TJ's Yellow Onion", "1 1/2 cups TJ's Just Chicken", "1 bottle TJ's Thai Yellow Curry Sauce", 'Supplies', '5 small, oven-safe ramekins', 'small rimmed baking sheet']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 400ºF. Unroll crusts, leaving plastic sleeves in place, and smooth together any cracks in the dough. Using a small cereal bowl and juice glass as your guides, cut out 5 small circles and 5 medium circles from the dough. Cut a small vent hole in each of the small circles and place them in refrigerator.', 'Line each ramekin with with a medium-sized dough circle and place on rimmed baking sheet. Poke holes in the crusts with a sharp knife. Place sheet on center rack of oven and par-bake crusts 10-15 minutes. Remove from oven and set aside.', 'Remove small pie crust circles from refrigerator. Add organic foursome and onions to a microwave-safe bowl and microwave 1 minute on high. Add chicken and curry sauce to bowl and gently stir to combine.
