Divide mixture among ramekins and top each with a small pie crust circle.', 'Return baking sheet to oven and bake 20-30 minutes, or until crusts are golden and filling is bubbling. Remove from oven and let cool 5 minutes prior to serving.', "Recipe Credit: Trader Joe's 2011 HiiP Recipe Showdown Winner - Linda Wang.", 'Tags: Chicken, Curry, Hearty, Pie, Winter']

recipe_overview: Serves: 4 - 6 Cooking Time: 35 - 45 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 container TJ’s Mirepoix', '1 tablespoon TJ’s Extra Virgin Olive Oil', '1 teaspoon TJ’s Rosemary, chopped', '1 teaspoon TJ’s Thyme, chopped', '1 teaspoon TJ’s Parsley, chopped', '2 large TJ’s Russet Potatoes, diced into 1/2 inch cubes', '1 package TJ’s Turkey Stock (seasonal)', '1 container TJ’s Condensed Cream of Portabella Mushroom Soup (seasonal)', '1 bag TJ’s Organic Foursome Vegetable Medley', '2 cups cooked TJ’s Turkey, shredded or cubed', 'TJ’s Sea Salt & Pepper, to taste', 'TJ’s Fresh Sage, for garnish (optional)', '1 package TJ’s Sweet Pull-Apart Aloha Rolls or Holiday Herb Rolls, for serving (optional)']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'In a large pot over medium heat, add olive oil. When heated, add mirepoix and a pinch of salt, and sauté 5 to 7 minutes. Add rosemary, thyme, parsley, and potatoes; continue to cook another minute. Add broth and bring to a boil; cover and reduce heat to simmer for 10 minutes.', 'Add cream of mushroom soup and organic foursome to pot. Simmer 3-5 minutes, stirring occasionally, until vegetables are warmed through. Add turkey and continue to cook until warmed through. Season soup to taste with salt & pepper.', 'Ladle soup into bowls, garnish with sage and serve with rolls.', 'Tags: Hearty, Seasonal, Soup, Thanksgiving']

recipe_description: Subtly sweet and not too hot, Trader Joe’s Sweet Italian Pork Sausage is pre-seasoned and ready to star in everything from sausage & peppers to meat sauce. Add to it this stuffing recipe for your Turkey Day Feast, and be prepared for coworkers to ask, “What’s that delicious smell?” when you reheat leftovers for lunch.
recipe_overview: Serves: 10 - 12 Prep Time: 20 Minutes Cooking Time: 35 - 45 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['TJ’s Canola Oil Spray', '1 box TJ’s Cornbread Stuffing Mix', '4 tablespoons TJ’s Unsalted Butter', '4 cups Water', '1 lb. TJ’s Sweet Italian Pork Sausage or Hot Italian Pork Sausage, casing removed', '½ bag TJ’s Organic Tuscan Kale', '1 package TJ’s Organic Cooked & Peeled Chestnuts, halved', 'TJ’s Shaved Parmesan, Romano & Asiago Cheese', 'TJ’s Cranberry Sauce & Turkey Gravy, for serving (optional)']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 350°F. Grease a 13x9-inch casserole dish with canola oil spray and set aside.', 'In a large saucepan, mix butter, water and seasoning pouch from stuffing mix and bring to a low boil for 3-5 minutes. Remove from heat and gently fold in croutons until thoroughly moistened. Transfer to a large bowl, cover and let sit 10 minutes.', 'While stuffing sits, heat a large sauté pan or skillet over medium. Add sausage to pan and sauté, stirring occasionally, until cooked through, about 8 minutes. Add kale to pan and sauté a few minutes more to wilt. Remove from heat and stir in chestnuts.', 'Gently fold sausage mixture into stuffing until evenly distributed. Transfer to casserole dish in an even layer. Top with a generous handful of cheese.', 'Place dish on center rack of oven and bake until center is heated through and top is golden brown, 30-45 minutes. Remove stuffing from oven and let cool slightly. Serve with gravy and cranberry sauce on the side.', 'Tags: Casserole, Comfort Food, Fall, stuffing, Thanksgiving']

recipe_description: This rectangular Pizza Crust is studded with golden bubbles and offers a pleasantly yeast-y chew. Keep some simple toppings on hand (cheese, sauce, et. al.) and everyday can be Pizza Day!
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 5 - 8 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 TJ's Pizza Crust", "TJ's Olive Oil", "1/2 cup TJ's Pizza Sauce", "1 1/2 cups TJ's Organic Shredded Mozzarella Cheese", 'Sliced Pepperoni', "A few dashes TJ's Organic Oregano (optional)"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat to 425°F. Lightly brush top and bottom of crust with oil. Spread sauce evenly over crust to within half an inch of the edges. Top with cheese, pepperoni, and oregano. Place on a pizza pan, baking sheet, or for a crisper crust directly on oven rack, and bake 5 to 8 minutes. Cook until cheese is melted and crust is golden brown and crisp on edges.', 'Tags: Cheese, Pizza']

recipe_description: Can't decide between burgers and pizza for dinner? With this recipe from a Crew Member's home kitchen, you don't have to!
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 - 6 Prep Time: 40 Minutes Cooking Time: 25 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 package TJ's Pizza Dough", "TJ's All-Purpose Flour, for work surface", "2 teaspoons TJ's Olive Oil, plus more for brushing pizza crust", "1/2 TJ's Yellow Onion, diced", "1 package (1 pound) TJ's Organic Grass Fed Ground Beef", "1/4 cup TJ's Pizza Sauce", "1 cup TJ's Mild Shredded Cheddar Cheese", "TJ's Organic Sweet Bread & Butter Pickles", "TJ's Organic Ketchup & Yellow Mustard, for garnish"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Gently remove dough from bag, place on a lightly floured work surface and let sit at room temperature for 30 minutes.', 'Add olive oil and onion to a skillet over medium heat. Sauté about 5 minutes, until translucent. Add ground beef to skillet and cook until meat is no longer pink and reaches 160°F. Drain, loosely cover and set aside.', 'Preheat oven to 475°F. Stretch dough by hand or rolling pin into a circle 12 inches in diameter. Place on a lightly oiled pizza pan or baking sheet. Spread sauce evenly over crust to within half an inch of the edges, and top with ground beef mixture and cheese. Brush edges of dough with olive oil.', 'Place pan on center rack of oven and bake for about 25 minutes, or until cheese is golden and bubbly around the edges and the bottom of the crust is a light golden brown. Remove pan from oven and let cool slightly. Top pizza with pickles, drizzle with ketchup & mustard and serve.', 'Tags: Burgers, Pizza']

recipe_description: Consider Trader Joe's Cauliflower Pizza Crust your personal canvas for pizza creation. Here, we've covered it in spicy, herb-y Trader Joe's Zhoug Sauce and crowned it with savory Trader Joe's Shawarma Chicken Thighs—it's fiery, flavorful, and not for the faint of heart.
recipe_overview: Serves: 2 - 3 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 32 - 35 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 TJ's Cauliflower Crust", "1/4 cup TJ's Zhoug Sauce", "3/4 cup grated TJ's Fontina Cheese", "1/2 cup TJ's Shawarma Chicken Thighs, prepared according to package directions", "2-3 tablespoons TJ's Julienned Sundried Tomatoes, drained"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Par-bake crust according to package directions. Remove crust from oven and top with cheese and chicken. Return to oven and cook 5 minutes. Turn broiler to high and broil 3-5 minutes until cheese is golden. Remove pizza from oven and top with sundried tomatoes. Let cool for a few minutes before slicing and serving.', 'Tags: Cauliflower, Pizza, Spicy']

recipe_description: This herby Potato Pizza eschews traditional sauce in favor of rich, roasted garlic and bright Spanish Extra Virgin Olive Oil. Pair it with a crisp Sauvignon Blanc and let happy hour commence.
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 - 6 Prep Time: 40 Minutes Cooking Time: 5 - 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 package TJ's Garlic & Herb Pizza Dough", "2 heads TJ's Fresh Garlic", "TJ's Spanish Extra Virgin Olive Oil", "1/2 TJ's Yellow Onion, thinly sliced", "4 TJ's Dutch Yellow Potatoes", "4 stems TJ's Fresh Rosemary"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Place a pizza stone or baking sheet on the center rack of oven and preheat to 450°F. Peel away the loose skin of the garlic, leaving the heads intact. Trim 1/4 inch off the top of the garlic heads and place in small squares of aluminum foil. Drizzle exposed garlic cloves with olive oil and wrap tightly with foil. Bake about 30 minutes, remove from oven and set aside.', 'While garlic cooks, gently remove dough from bag, halve and place on a lightly floured work surface; let sit at room temperature for 30 minutes. Add 1 tablespoon olive oil and onions to a skillet over medium-low heat. Sauté about 20 minutes until golden brown. Remove from heat and set aside. Slice potatoes very thinly with a sharp knife or on a mandoline and set aside. Unwrap garlic heads and squeeze roasted cloves into a small bowl. Mash with a fork and set aside.', 'Stretch one piece of dough by hand or rolling pin to 8 inches in diameter. Place on a lightly floured pizza peel or cutting board. Brush dough with olive oil cover with half of the roasted garlic. Top with half of the potatoes and onions. Strip rosemary from stems and sprinkle half atop pizza.', 'Gently slide pizza onto preheated stone or baking sheet and bake 5-10 minutes, or until crust is blistered and potatoes are golden around the edges. Remove from oven with pizza peel, transfer to a cutting board and drizzle lightly with olive oil. Repeat pizza prep with remaining dough and ingredients. Slice and enjoy!', 'Tags: Pizza, Potatoes']

recipe_description: Trader Joe’s Turkey Burgers are made using fresh, white & dark turkey meat, a combination that ensures juicy, flavorful burgers. You can cook them on the stovetop or grill—from frozen, even!—in just a few minutes. Paired with crunchy kale slaw and ridge cut potato chips, dinner doesn’t get much easier than this—and you don’t have to sacrifice quality or taste for the sake of convenience and value.
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 12 - 16 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 package TJ's Turkey Burgers", "1 tablespoon TJ's Olive Oil", "1 package TJ's Broccoli Kale Slaw Complete Salad Kit", "TJ's Gourmet White Hamburger Buns or TJ's Gluten Free Hamburger Buns", "TJ's Ridge Cut Potato Chips (optional)"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Add oil to a grill pan or skillet and turn heat to medium-high. Cook turkey burgers according to package directions; remove from heat.', 'In a medium bowl, toss salad with included toppings and dressing. To assemble, place turkey burger on bottom half of bun. Top with slaw and top half of bun, and serve with potato chips.', 'Tags: Burgers, Grilling']

recipe_description: The kale in Trader Joe's Vegan Kale, Cashew & Basil Pesto gives it some serious depth, while the basil infuses it with freshness, and the cashew butter lends it enough creaminess to leave you saying, “Parmesan? Who needs Parmesan?!” Aside from the obvious pasta pairings, it makes a splash as a spread on burgers and sandwiches, too.
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 8 - 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["2 packages TJ's Portabella Mushrooms, wiped with a damp cloth, stems removed", "TJ's Olive Oil", "TJ's Salt & Pepper", "4 slices TJ's Provolone Cheese", "2 TJ's Roasted Red Bell Peppers, thinly sliced", "4 of your favorite TJ's Artisan Rolls, baked according to package directions", "TJ's Organic Baby Lettuce Mix", "TJ's Vegan Kale, Cashew & Basil Pesto"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat grill to medium-high. Brush mushrooms with olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Grill mushrooms, gill side-down for 5 minutes; flip mushrooms and grill another 3-5 minutes until tender. Remove from heat and place provolone on top to melt.', 'Slice rolls in half lengthwise. Generously slather bottom half of a roll with pesto. Top with mushroom, bell pepper, spring mix, and top half of roll. Repeat with remaining ingredients and enjoy immediately.', 'Tags: Burgers, Grilling, Meatless']

recipe_description: Lusciously velvety, our Fig Butter is full of rich, ripe figs, cooked down with sugar and a bit of lemon to balance the sweetness. It’s a shining star as a glaze for chicken, a supreme spread for cheese boards, and a sweetly craveable counterpoint atop savory buffalo patties.
recipe_overview: Serves: 6 Prep Time: 15 Minutes Cooking Time: 12 - 16 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["2 packages TJ's Ground Buffalo Burgers, thawed according to package directions", "TJ's Sea Salt & Pepper", "6 TJ's Brioche Buns", "TJ's Goat Cheese Crumbles", "1 TJ's Beefsteak Tomato", "1/2 TJ's Red Onion, thinly sliced", "TJ's Organic Arugula", "TJ's Fig Butter"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat a grill to medium-high. Season burgers with salt and pepper. Grill burgers according to package directions; remove from heat and let rest 5 minutes.', 'To assemble, place a burger on the bottom half of a bun. Top with goat cheese crumbles, tomato, arugula and onion. Generously slather fig butter on top half of bun and place on burger. Repeat with remaining ingredients and serve immediately.', 'Tags: Burgers, Grilling']

recipe_name: Veggie Burger with Almond Butter Turmeric Slaw
recipe_description: With an impressive 26 grams of protein per patty (shout out to pea protein!), Trader Joe’s Hi-Protein Veggie Burger offers a texture that’s surprisingly… “meaty.” It’s seasoned with garlic, sea salt and black pepper, making it a good-eating burger that plays well with toppings, such as the grilled sweet potato slabs and almond butter turmeric slaw in this recipe.
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Prep Time: 15 Minutes Cooking Time: 20 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["2 packages TJ's Hi-Protein Veggie Burgers", "2 teaspoons TJ's Olive Oil", '2 TJ\'s Sweet Potatoes, peeled and sliced into 1/4" rounds', "TJ's Sea Salt & Pepper", "1 bag TJ's Organic Shredded Cabbage & Carrots", "1-2 tablespoons TJ's Almond Butter Turmeric Salad Dressing", "TJ's Honey Wheat Hamburger Buns", "1 TJ's Avocado"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 425°F. Place burgers on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Bake 20 minutes on center rack of oven, flipping burgers halfway through cooking; remove from heat.', 'While burgers bake, in a small bowl, toss sweet potato rounds with olive oil. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Heat a grill pan to medium-high. Grill sweet potatoes 3-4 minutes per side; remove from heat.', 'In a medium bowl, toss shredded cabbage with salad dressing; set aside.', 'To assemble: place a veggie burger on the bottom half of a hamburger bun. Top with sweet potato rounds, slaw, sliced avocado, and top half of bun. Repeat with remaining ingredients and serve immdiately.', 'Tags: Burgers, Meatless, Sweet Potato']

recipe_description: Trader Joe’s Organic Kansas City Style BBQ Sauce is a grill’s best friend. Its tangy, sweet-smokiness instantly ups the ante on grilled meat, ribs, and chicken, commanding center of the plate attention with the flick of a basting brush. But you don’t need to fire up the grill to get your fill—try replacing the marinara in a classic meatball sub with a drizzle of this Organic BBQ Sauce for a rib-sticking supper that’s ready in no time.
recipe_overview: Serves: 6 - 8 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 5 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["2 bags TJ's Meatless Meatballs", "1 bottle TJ's Organic Kansas City Style BBQ Sauce", "1 package TJ's Gourmet White Hot Dog Buns", "1 package TJ's Sliced Provolone", "1/2 TJ's Red Onion, diced"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'In a large microwave safe dish, microwave meatballs according to package directions. Pour BBQ sauce over meatballs just to cover, and stir to combine. Continue to microwave on half power at 30-second intervals, stirring in between, until sauce is warmed through.', 'Open hot dog buns and arrange on a large baking sheet. Fill each bun with 4 meatballs and top with warmed sauce and a slice of provolone.', 'Heat broiler to high. Broil subs 3-5 minutes, until cheese is melted and brown, and buns are golden (depending on your broiler, you may have to cover empty side of bun with foil to prevent burning). Remove subs from oven and let cool slightly. Top with diced red onion and enjoy.', 'Tags: BBQ, Meatless']

recipe_description: Trader Joe’s All Natural Bone-In, Skin-On Chicken Thighs are ready to grill at a moment’s notice. A little lemon pepper seasoning and lemon juice marinade will go a long way with these Chicken Thighs because of their inherently robust flavor, and by leaving the skin on and the bone in, we’ve left them in perfect condition for grilling, frying, baking, slow-cooking, and more.
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Prep Time: 4 Hours Cooking Time: 30 - 35 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1/4 cup of your favorite TJ's Olive Oil, plus more for oiling grill grate", "Juice of 2 TJ's Lemons, plus 1 more Lemon (halved) for grilling", "1 tablespoon TJ's Rice Vinegar", "1 tablespoon TJ's Oregano", "1/2 teaspoon TJ's Sea Salt", "30 grinds TJ's Lemon Pepper Seasoning", "1 package TJ's All Natural Bone-In Skin-On Chicken Thighs"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'In a large non-reactive baking dish, whisk olive oil, lemon juice, vinegar, oregano, salt and lemon pepper seasoning. Add chicken pieces and toss to coat. Cover and refrigerate 4 hours or overnight.', 'Preheat one side of the grill to high. Dip a crumpled paper towel in a tiny bit of olive oil, and use tongs to oil the grill grate with the paper towel.', 'Place chicken on cool side of the grill and cook for 5 minutes. Turn chicken over and cook another 20 minutes.', 'Place lemon halves on hot side of grill. Move chicken to the hot side of the grill, skin side-down, and cook until skin is crisp and chicken is cooked to 165°F. Remove from heat and serve with grilled lemon halves.', 'Tags: BBQ, Chicken, Grilling, Lemon, Summer']

recipe_description: Beyond its high status in the streams & seas, Salmon is also a true star of the barbie. However, given its delicate nature, the right kind of fillet makes all the difference when you’re grilling a gilled dish. Try Trader Joe’s BBQ Cut Fresh Atlantic Salmon Fillet, which has the skin left on to act as a natural barrier between the fish and the hot flame. Before cooking it skin-down, give it a marinade in our Carrot Ginger Miso Dressing and you’ll see the star-power of Salmon rising, right in your own backyard.
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Prep Time: 4 Hours Cooking Time: 8 - 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1/2 bottle TJ's Carrot Ginger Miso Salad Dressing, plus more for serving", "2 tablespoons TJ's Soy Sauce", "2 packages TJ's BBQ Cut Fresh Atlantic Salmon Fillets", "TJ's Olive Oil"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Whisk dressing and soy sauce in a shallow casserole dish. Place salmon in dish skin side-up, making sure to coat sides of fillets with marinade. Cover and refrigerate 4 hours or overnight.', "Remove salmon from refrigerator about 20 minutes before you're ready to grill. Heat grill to high. Shake excess marinade from salmon, rub skin with olive oil and place directly on grill over center burners, skin side-down. Reduce heat to medium, close lid and cook salmon 4-5 minutes.", 'Open lid; salmon should be nearly done. Turn off center burners, close lid and finish cooking over indirect heat, about 2-3 minutes more. Salmon is ready when flesh is opaque and flakes easily with a fork. Remove from heat and let rest a few minutes. Add a dollop of dressing to each fillet just before serving.', 'Tags: BBQ, Ginger, Grilling, Summer']

recipe_description: These savory waffles will WOW at breakfast, lunch or dinner.
recipe_overview: Serves: 3 - 6 Prep Time: 1 Hour 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 36 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['Falafel Waffles', "2 cups TJ's Falafel Mix", '1 3/4 cups water', "1 tablespoon TJ's Sunflower Oil", 'Toppings', "TJ's Organic Tahini", "TJ's Fresh Parsley, chopped", "TJ's Roasted Red Peppers, drained and chopped", "TJ's Lemons, sliced into wedges", 'Supplies', 'Waffle Iron']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'In a large bowl, combine falafel mix and water. Cover and let sit 1 hour. Stir in 1 tablespoon sunflower oil.', "Preheat waffle iron. Scoop 1/3 of the batter onto the center of the waffle iron and spread evenly with a spatula toward the edges. Close waffle iron and cook 12 minutes, until golden brown. Remove waffle from iron and repeat process two more times (you'll end up with three large waffles).", 'To serve, garnish waffles with chopped peppers and parsley, a drizzle of tahini and a squeeze of lemon.', 'Tags: Brunch, Mediterranean, Pantry, Savory']

recipe_description: This meatless main is extremely versatile—serve it in tacos or an omelette, atop crisp butter lettuce, on nachos...
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 - 6 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 15 - 20 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["2 tablespoons of your favorite TJ's Olive Oil, divided", "1/2 TJ's Jumbo Yellow Onion, diced and divided", "2 cans TJ's Green Jackfruit in Brine, drained and deseeded", "2 teaspoons TJ's Cumin", "2 teaspoons TJ's Nutritional Yeast", "2 teaspoons TJ's Organic Oregano", "2 teaspoons TJ's Smoked Paprika", "1/2 teaspoon TJ's Pepper", "1/2 teaspoon TJ's Salt", "3 tablespoons TJ's Organic Coconut Aminos", "2 teaspoons TJ's Organic Apple Cider Vinegar", "Juice of 1 TJ's Orange", "Juice of 1 TJ's Lime"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Add 1 tablespoon olive oil to a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add half of the diced onion to pan and sauté until translucent, 3-5 minutes. Meanwhile, roughly chop jackfruit. Add jackfruit to pan and sauté another 5 minutes.', 'Add cumin, nutritional yeast, oregano, paprika, salt and pepper to pan, stirring to coat jackfruit. Sauté 3 minutes. Add coconut aminos, apple cider vinegar and orange juice to pan and sauté an additional 5 minutes, breaking jackfruit down into smaller pieces with a wooden spoon. Add remaining tablespoon olive oil and stir to coat. Let cool slightly.', 'Garnish cooked jackfruit with remaining diced onion and lime juice. Enjoy!', 'Tags: Jackfruit, Meatless, Pantry']

recipe_description: The ingredients from which the Trader Joe’s Tahini, Pepita & Apricot Slaw Kit got its name take it from an ordinary slaw into something profoundly delicious. Such a vibrant Slaw Kit allows for quick—and tasty—weekday meal prep. It’s as easy as adding a piece of grilled salmon, TJ's Grilled Chicken Strips, or Falafel. Serve it as a side dish to a larger meal, or toss a crunchy addition into sandwiches, wraps, or tacos.
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 7 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["2 teaspoons TJ's Sunflower Oil", "1 package TJ's Beef-less Ground Beef", "1/2 package TJ's Taco Seasoning", "1 package TJ's Taco Shells", "1 bag TJ's Tahini, Pepita & Apricot Slaw Kit"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 425°F. Add sunflower oil to a sauté pan over medium-high heat. When heated, add beef-less beef and sauté 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add taco seasoning and continue stirring until beef-less beef is warmed through and seasoning is thoroughly mixed, about 2 minutes.', 'To warm taco shells, place shells on a sheet pan and warm in preheated oven for 2-3 minutes. Remove from oven and let cool slightly before handling.', 'Assemble tacos: Spoon beef-less beef into warm taco shell. Top with slaw and drizzle with included dressing packet. Serve immediately.', 'Tags: Meatless, Tacos']

recipe_description: This autumnal-inspired sauce calls on Trader Joe's Organic Canned Pumpkin for its velvety texture, vibrant orange hue, and slightly sweet, earthy flavor. It's the perfect accompaniment to al dente pasta or fluffy baked potatoes when the weather turns chilly.
recipe_overview: Serves: 8 - 10 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 1 Hour 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1/2 TJ's Organic Yellow Onion, diced", "3 TJ's Organic Carrots, diced", "2 cloves TJ's Organic Garlic, diced", "2 cans TJ's Organic Diced No Salt Added Tomatoes", "2 cans TJ's Organic Pumpkin (seasonal)", '1/2 cup water', "1 teaspoon TJ's Sea Salt", '2 sprigs Rosemary, de-stemmed and chopped', '2-3 Sage leaves, finely chopped', "1/2 cup TJ's Heavy Cream", "3 teaspoons TJ's Maple Syrup", "1 pound of your favorite TJ's Pasta, cooked"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Heat oil in a sauce pot over medium heat. Add onion, carrots and garlic, and saute 3-5 minutes, until onions are translucent.', "Add tomatoes, pumpkin, water, herbs and salt to sauce pot. Stir to combine. Bring to a simmer and cook, covered, for 1 hour, stirring occasionally to ensure sauce doesn't stick to pot.", 'Turn off heat. Use an immersion blender or blend sauce mixture in batches until smooth. Stir in half & half and maple syrup, and season to taste. Serve over hot pasta and garnish with fresh herbs, if desired. Enjoy immediately.', 'Tags: Fall, Pasta, Pumpkin']

recipe_overview: Serves: 2 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 6 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["2 TJ's Tilapia Filets, defrosted according to package directions", "2 teaspoons TJ's Ghee", "1 bag TJ's Frozen Organic Jasmine Rice", "TJ's Smoky Peach Salsa", "TJ's Smoked Paprika, Sea Salt & Pepper", "TJ's Lemons &Cilantro, for garnish"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Microwave rice according to package directions. Pat tilapia filets dry with paper towels and generously season both sides with paprika, sea salt & pepper.', 'In a nonstick skillet over medium-high heat, melt ghee. Add tilapia to skillet and cook 2-3 minutes per side, until fish is opaque and flakes easily with a fork. Remove from heat.', 'To assemble: Divide rice among two plates and top each with a tilapia filet. Drizzle filets with desired amount of salsa, and garnish with lemon slices and cilantro. Enjoy immediately.', 'Tags: Fish, Quick Meal, Salsa']

recipe_description: The natural acids in Trader Joe’s Plain Greek Yogurt act as a mellow tenderizer in this tangy marinade recipe. Paired with lemon, olive oil, and a bit of salt, it’s a foolproof way to ensure moist meat, every time you fire up the grill. It was an instant hit on Trader Joe's Organic Boneless Skinless Chicken Breasts with our test kitchen tasters, but feel free to sub in your favorite cut.
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 - 6 Prep Time: 1 Hour Cooking Time: 12 - 18 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["½ cup TJ's Plain Greek Whole Milk Yogurt", "Juice of ½ a TJ's Lemon", "1 tablespoon TJ's California Estate Olive Oil", "2 teaspoons TJ's Onion Salt", "1 ½ lb TJ's Organic Boneless Skinless Chicken Breasts", 'Lemon slices, for garnish (optional)']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Add yogurt, lemon juice, olive oil and onion salt to a medium bowl and stir to combine. Add chicken and stir to coat evenly. Cover bowl and refrigerate one hour.', 'Oil the grill grate and preheat to medium-high. Shake excess marinade from chicken and grill 6-8 minutes per side, until juices run clear and internal temperature reaches 165°F. Remove from heat and pair with fresh greens, steamed rice or pasta salad.', 'Tags: BBQ, Chicken, Grilling, Summer']

recipe_description: This surprisingly creamy, dairy-free mac 'n cheese gets an umami flavor boost from the addition of nutritional yeast. Eat it plain, or enjoy with hot sauce, chopped herbs, sliced vegan sausage, roasted broccoli, wilted greens...
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 - 6 Prep Time: 60 Minutes Cooking Time: 15 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 package TJ's Organic Tricolor Radiatore Pasta", "1 1/2 cup TJ's Unsweetened Almond Beverage", "1 cup TJ's Raw Cashews", "2 cloves TJ's Garlic", "1/3 cup TJ's Nutritional Yeast", "Juice of 1/2 a TJ's Lemon", "1 teaspoon TJ's Turmeric Powder", "1/2 teaspoon TJ's Yellow Mustard", "1/2 teaspoon TJ's Sea Salt", "1/8 teaspoon TJ's Ground Black Pepper", "1/8 teaspoon TJ's Smoked Paprika", '1/8 teaspoon Cayenne Pepper', "Your favorite TJ's Olive Oil"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Add cashews and almond milk to a blender pitcher or food processor. Cover and set aside for one hour to soak.', 'Purée soaked cashews and almond milk until smooth. Scrape down the sides of the pitcher. Add all remaining ingredients (except pasta) and purée to combine.', "Prepare pasta according to package directions. Drain pasta and add back to warm pot. Pour sauce mixture into pot and stir gently to combine. Turn heat to low and continue stirring for 2-3 minutes until sauce is warm (you may need to add more almond milk to maintain desired texture). Scoop into serving bowls, drizzle with your favorite TJ's olive oil and dig in.", 'Tags: Cheesy, Pasta, Vegan']

recipe_overview: Serves: 3 Prep Time: 2 Minutes Cooking Time: 8 - 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 package TJ's Roasted Cauliflower Mezzelune", "TJ's Sunflower Oil", '10 Fresh Basil Leaves, rinsed and dried', "TJ's Extra Virgin Olive Oil", "TJ's Grated Parmesan"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Prepare mezzelune according to package directions. While mezzelune cooks, place a small skillet over medium heat and pour just enough sunflower oil in it to coat the bottom. Set a paper-towel-lined plate close to the skillet to drain and dry the fried basil. When the oil is hot, use tongs to carefully lower basil leaves into the skillet. Fry for 5–15 seconds, then flip them and fry another 5–15 seconds. Remove fried basil from skillet and set on paper towels to dry.', 'Plate the cooked mezzelune and generously drizzle with olive oil. Garnish with grated parmesan and fried basil, and enjoy immediately.', 'Tags: Cauliflower, Pasta, Quick Meal']

recipe_description: Our Smoked Salmon Dip with Capers goes from dip to dinner in under 10 minutes—just add pasta.
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Cooking Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 package TJ's Spinach & Chive Linguine", "1 tub TJ's Smoked Salmon Dip with Capers", 'Lemon slices, for garnish (optional)']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add pasta and boil 2-4 minutes, until al dente. Drain pasta, reserving 1 cup pasta water; set aside. Add salmon dip and 1/2 cup pasta water to empty pot, stirring to combine. Return pasta to pot and toss with sauce to coat, adding more pasta water to thin out sauce if needed. Scoop pasta into bowls, garnish with lemon and serve immediately.', 'Tags: Pasta, Quick Meal, Spring']

recipe_description: It’s nice to feel fancy. It’s even nicer to feel fancy without putting forth too much effort, or forking over too much of your hard-earned money. And that’s exactly what you’ll get with this Fancy Lemon Farfalle recipe. Fancy without the fuss. Or the price tag.
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 - 6 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 20 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["4 tablespoons TJ's Extra Virgin Olive Oil, divided", "1/2 cup TJ's Japanese Style Panko Breadcrumbs", "1/2 package TJ's Diced Onions", '1 container Crème Fraîche', "Zest and juice of 1 TJ's Lemon", "1 package (1 pound) TJ's Farfalle Pasta", "1/2 package TJ's Frozen Peas", "1/2 cup TJ's Grated Parmesan Cheese", "TJ's Salt & Pepper, to taste"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. While water boils, add 2 tablespoons oil and panko to a large saucepan over medium heat. Stir to coat panko with oil and sauté for 5 minutes, shaking pan occasionally to ensure even browning. Pour toasted panko into a small bowl and set aside.', 'Add remaining oil and onions to the pan and sauté over medium heat until lightly browned, about 7 minutes. Turn off heat. Add crème fraîche, lemon zest and juice and stir gently to combine.', 'While onions are cooking, add pasta to boiling water. Boil 4 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add peas and boil another 4-5 minutes. Drain pasta and add to crème fraîche mixture. Turn heat to high and stir until pasta is well coated and sauce thickens, about 2 minutes.', 'Turn off heat and add Parmesan to pan, stirring to coat pasta. Season with salt & pepper, to taste. Ladle pasta into bowls, top with toasted panko and serve immediately.', 'Tags: Meatless, Pasta, Quick Meal, Spring']

recipe_description: Trader Joe's Rigatoni Pasta is the key to this smoky, cheesy casserole. Large enough to feed a crowd, this recipe can be made ahead for busy weeknights—once assembled, simply cover with foil and refrigerate or freeze, then pop it in the oven when you're ready to serve.
recipe_overview: Serves: 6 - 8 Prep Time: 25 Minutes Cooking Time: 35 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 pound TJ's Rigatoni Pasta", "1 package (about 1 pound) TJ's Sweet OR Hot Italian Sausage, casing removed", "2 teaspoons TJ's Extra Virgin Olive Oil", "2 teaspoons TJ's Smoked Paprika", "1 3/4 jars TJ's Tomato Basil Marinara", "1 cup TJ's Whole Milk Ricotta Cheese", "1/2 cup TJ's Grated Parmesan, divided", "2 cups TJ's Shredded Mozzarella Cheese, divided", 'Fresh Basil, shredded, for garnish (optional)']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 350°F. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add rigatoni to pot and boil for 10 minutes, just until al dente. Drain and set aside.', 'While pasta is cooking, in a small bowl, combine ricotta and half of the grated parmesan. Stir and set aside. In a large sauce pan over medium heat, add olive oil and sausage. Brown sausage for 7-9 minutes until it reaches 145°F, breaking meat up with a spoon as it cooks. Add paprika and stir to combine. Reduce heat to low and add marinara. Heat until sauce is warmed through, stirring occasionally.', 'Return drained pasta to pot and add half of marinara mixture, stirring to combine. Gently fold in ricotta mixture. Transfer half of the pasta to a 9x13 pan. Sprinkle half of the Mozzarella over pasta. Top with remaining pasta and remaining sauce and spread in an even layer. Top pasta with remaining Mozzarella and Parmesan cheeses.', 'Place pan in middle rack of oven and bake until edges are bubbling and cheese is melted, about 35 minutes. Remove pan from oven and let cool for 10 minutes. Garnish with shredded basil, if desired, and serve.', '*If cooking from frozen, leave foil on and bake for 1 hour, then remove foil and bake an additional 15 minutes.', 'Tags: Casserole, Cheesy, Italian, Pasta, Winter']

recipe_description: champ
recipe_overview: Serves: 3 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 25 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['Bangers', "3 tablespoon TJ's Olive Oil", "1 package TJ's Irish Bangers", '½ cup water', 'Gravy', '½ TJ’s Yellow Onion, thinly sliced', "2 TJ's Garlic Cloves, minced", "2 tablespoons TJ's Olive Oil", "3 tablespoons TJ's All-Purpose Flour", "3 cups TJ's Beef Broth", 'Champ', '1 bag TJ’s Frozen Mashed Potatoes', "½ cup TJ's Green Onions, chopped", "2 tablespoons TJ's Unsalted Butter", "TJ's Salt and Pepper, to taste"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Prepare the Bangers: In a large skillet or frying pan over medium heat, heat 3 tablespoons oil. Add bangers and brown on all sides, about 10 minutes. Add water and cook until bangers until internal temperature reaches 165?F. Remove bangers from pan and set aside.', 'Prepare the Gravy: Add remaining oil, onion, and garlic to skillet and cook over medium heat until onions are translucent. Add flour and mix thoroughly. Add one cup of broth and stir until a thick paste is formed. Pour in remaining beef broth, one cup at a time, mixing thoroughly between additions. Continue heating until gravy has thickened (about 5 minutes). Turn heat to low and cover pan until ready to serve.', 'Prepare the Champ: Heat frozen mashed potatoes in microwave or on the stovetop according to package directions. Once heated through, stir in butter and scallions. To serve, place a large scoop of champ on a plate, top with bangers and a generous ladleful of gravy.', "Tags: Irish, St Patrick's Day"]

recipe_description: Unassumingly gourmet—garbanzo beans, spinach, and richly roasted tomatoes are simmered in an exuberant Thai Green Curry Simmer Sauce. Spooned over quinoa, this robust, vegetarian stew wholly satisfies.
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 - 6 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 45 - 50 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 pkg Organic Red Cherry Tomatoes', "2 teaspoons TJ's Olive Oil", "TJ's Sea Salt & Pepper", "1 cup TJ's Organic Quinoa", "1 Jar TJ's Green Curry Sauce", "2 cans TJ's Organic Garbanzo Beans", "1 bag TJ's Organic Baby Spinach"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 400°F. Toss the tomatoes lightly with olive oil, salt and pepper and spread them out into one layer on a sheet pan. Roast for 15 to 20 minutes, until the tomatoes are soft. While tomatoes are roasting, prepare quinoa according to package directions.', 'Warm the curry sauce in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add garbanzo beans and tomatoes and stir to combine. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 15 minutes. Add spinach and simmer until wilted and tender, about 10 minutes. Serve curry atop a bed of cooked quinoa.', 'Tags: Grains, Meatless, Protein']

recipe_description: This Corny Squash Soup is a little sweet, a lot savory, and positively brimming with a variety of delectable veggie flavors and textures, including soft chunks of Butternut Squash, sweet, snappy kernels of corn, and tasty, tender greens, all set in a base of oh-so-flavorful Trader Joe's Creamy Corn & Roasted Pepper Soup.
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 - 6 Prep Time: 5 Minutes Cooking Time: 25 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 tablespoon TJ’s Avocado Oil', '2 TJ’s Shallots, diced', '1 bag TJ’s Cut Butternut Squash, cut into 1/2-inch pieces', '¾ bag TJ’s Organic Power to the Greens', '1 container TJ’s Creamy Corn & Roasted Red Pepper Soup', '1 can TJ’s Whole Kernel Corn, drained', '1 teaspoon TJ’s Sea Salt', '½ teaspoon TJ’s Pepper', 'Fresh crusty bread for dipping (optional, but encouraged)']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add shallots and squash and sauté for 5-8 minutes. Add soup, corn and greens to pan and bring to a low boil. Reduce heat and simmer for about 15 minutes, stirring occasionally, until greens are wilted and squash is fork-tender. Add salt and pepper to soup and stir to combine. Spoon soup into bowls and serve with fresh, crusty bread for dipping.', 'Tags: Corn, Meatless, Soup, Squash, Winter']

recipe_description: Combine Trader Joe’s Cowboy Caviar Salsa with diced tomatoes, tender quinoa, and shredded cheese for a bright, spicy, Southwestern-style casserole.
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Prep Time: 15 Minutes Cooking Time: 30 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 cup Trader Joe’s Organic Multicolor Quinoa, dry', "1 jar TJ's Cowboy Caviar Salsa", "1 can TJ's Organic Diced No Salt Added Tomatoes", '1 cup TJ’s Mexican Blend Shredded Cheese', 'Organic Spanish Extra Virgin Olive Oil Spray, to grease pan', "TJ's Sour Cream and Fresh Cilantro, for garnish (optional)"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 350°. Add Quinoa and 2 cups water to a medium saucepan. Bring to a boil and reduce to a simmer. Cover and cook for 10-12 minutes, until water is completely absorbed. Turn off heat and fluff quinoa with a fork.', 'In a large bowl, fold together cooked Quinoa, Cowboy Caviar, Diced Tomatoes and Cheese, just until mixed. Grease an 8-inch square baking pan with Organic Olive Oil Spray and spread mixture into pan. Cook for 25 minutes, then turn broiler on high and cook 5 more minutes. Remove from oven and let cool 5 minutes. Top with Sour Cream and Cilantro, if desired and serve.', 'Tags: Casserole, Corn, Quinoa, Winter']

recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 20 - 30 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 Acorn Squash, peeled, de-seeded and cubed', "2 teaspoons TJ's Extra Virgin Olive Oil", "2 teaspoons TJ's Taco Seasoning", "1 package TJ's Corn Tortillas", "1 bag TJ's Shredded Cabbage", "1 jar TJ's Chipotle Black Bean Dip", "1 jar TJ's Island Salsa", 'Lime wedges & Fresh Cilantro, chopped, for garnish']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 400ºF. Place squash in a large bowl. Drizzle with extra virgin olive oil and taco seasoning and toss to coat. Spread seasoned squash on a large baking sheet and roast for 20-25 min until fork-tender, tossing squash halfway through cooking.', 'While squash is roasting, remove lid from Chipotle Black Bean Dip and microwave on half-power for one-minute intervals, stirring in between, until warm. Warm tortillas over low heat.', 'To assemble tacos: spread warm bean dip on tortillas and layer with cabbage, squash and salsa. Garnish with cilantro and limes wedges. Serve immediately.', 'Tags: Fall, Seasonal, Squash']

recipe_name: Teriyaki BBQ Tofu with Soycutash Greens
recipe_description: Inspired by a similar dish at very popular LA restaurant, we decided to recreate using our own TJ's products! It's simple, nutritious, satisfying, and much, much lighter on your wallet.
recipe_overview: Serves: 2 Prep Time: 5 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 package Trader Joe’s Organic Baked Teriyaki Tofu', '1 cup TJs Organic Brown Sugar BBQ Sauce & Marinade, plus more to finish, if desired', "1/2 bag TJ's Soycutash", '2 tablespoons water, or more if needed', "2 bags TJ's Organic Power to the Greens", '1 tablespoon Extra Virgin Olive Oil', 'Salt & pepper, to taste']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Remove tofu from package and pat dry with paper towels; place in a shallow dish and cover with barbecue sauce. Set aside for 30 minutes.', 'Place soycutash in a microwave safe dish, add water and cover with damp paper towels; heat on high for 2 minutes or until heated through. Set aside.', 'Heat grill to high, add tofu and sear on both sides; lower heat and continue to cook until warmed through; about 5 minutes.', 'Heat olive oil in a large skillet; add greens and sauté until wilted, about 3 to 5 minutes; season with salt and pepper. Remove from heat and divide between 2 plates. Divide soycutash and layer atop greens. Slice tofu lengthwise, arrange atop soycutash and drizzle with warmed barbecue sauce, if desired.', 'Tags: BBQ, Tofu, Vegan']

recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Prep Time: 1 Hour Cooking Time: 10 - 15 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['Steak & Marinade', "6 Tbsp TJ's Organic Sugar", "5 Tbsp TJ's Reduced Sodium Soy Sauce", "1 ½ Tbsp TJ's Sriracha Sauce", '1 Tbsp iuice from ½ TJ’s Lime , squeezed fresh', "1 Tbsp TJ's Organic Toasted Sesame Oil", "4 cloves TJ's Garlic, minced", "1 pkg (about 1 lb) TJ's USDA Choice Premium Angus Beef Flank steak, sliced against the grain into thin strips", "1/8 tsp TJ's Salt", 'Taco Accoutrements', '1 cup TJ’s Raw Sauerkraut, with Persian Cucumbers removed', '1 cup TJ’s Organic Shredded Green & Red Cabbage', '8 TJ’s de mi Abuela Corn and Wheat Tortillas', '3 Tbsp TJ’s Green Onions, sliced', 'TJ’s Traditional Tunisian Harissa, to taste', 'Special Utensil (not sold at TJ’s)', '8 Bamboo Skewers, soaked in water']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Combine sugar, soy sauce, sriracha, lime juice, sesame oil and garlic in a shallow dish. Add steak, cover and marinate for 1 hour; turn after 30 minutes.', 'While steak is marinating combine sauerkraut and fresh cabbage together and set aside.', 'Preheat grill to medium-high. Remove steak and discard marinade. Thread steak onto skewers; sprinkle with salt. Place skewers on grill and cook 3 minutes on each side or until desired degree of doneness. Remove, cover and set aside.', 'Grill tortillas 30 seconds on each side or until lightly charred; keep warm.', 'Place 2 tortillas per plate, and divide steak evenly among tortillas. Top each taco with cabbage mixture; sprinkle with onions, top with harissa and serve.', '  Tags: Grilling, Steak, Tacos']

recipe_name: Loaded Baked Potato Soup Bread Bowl
recipe_overview: Serves: 8 - 10 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 30 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 package TJ's Uncured Applewood Smoked Bacon, sliced into strips", "1 package TJ's Mirepoix", "1 quart package TJ's Organic Chicken Broth", "2 packages TJ's Frozen Mashed Potatoes", "2/3 cup TJ's Unsalted Butter", "3/4 cup TJ's Unbleached All Purpose flour", "3 cups TJ's Whole Milk", "1 teaspoon TJ's Salt", "1 teaspoon TJ's Pepper", "1 container (8 oz) TJ's Sour Cream", "1 block TJ's Cheddar Cheese with Caramelized Onions, shredded", "TJ's Chives, sliced (garnish)", "4 TJ's Sourdough Bread Boules (optional serving bowl)"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'In a large skillet, cook bacon lardons over medium heat, about 6 minutes or until crisp. Remove cooked bacon from heat and set aside to drain on paper towels. Reserve 2 tablespoons bacon grease in skillet. Cook mirepoix in bacon grease over medium-high heat, about 6 minutes or until veggies are almost tender.', 'In a large pot or Dutch oven, add cooked mirepoix, broth and frozen potatoes. Stir and heat mixture until it starts to boil, then reduce the heat to low.', 'Meanwhile, in the same skillet used to cook the bacon, melt butter over low heat. Add flour and whisk until smooth. Cook and stir 1 minute to brown the flour slightly. Gradually stir in 2 cups of the milk. Pour milk mixture into potato mixture. Add remaining 1 cup milk, salt and pepper. Continue to cook over medium heat, stirring constantly with whisk, until soup is bubbling around the edges.', 'Finally, stir in half of the cooked bacon, the sour cream and, half of the cheese. Cook until thoroughly heated and cheese is melted. To serve, garnish individual bowls of soup with remaining bacon & cheese then sprinkle with chives.', 'Tags: Bacon, Cheese, Cheesy, Potatoes, Soup, Winter']

recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 (quart) package TJ's Butternut Squash Soup", "1 tablespoon TJ's Olive Oil", "1 package TJ's Sweet Italian Sausage, casing removed", "1 cup shaved TJ's Parmesan", "4 tablespoons chopped TJ's Chives"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'In a medium saucepan, heat soup over medium heat, about 5 minutes. Stir occasionally until simmering; reduce heat to low.', 'While soup cooks, heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Add sausage to pan and spread evenly. Break sausage pieces into smaller bits with a wooden spoon and brown until heated to 165°F, about 5-7 minutes. Remove from heat.', 'To serve, ladle the soup into individual bowls, then garnish with sausage, cheese and chives. Enjoy!', 'Tags: Fall, Savory, Soup, Winter']

recipe_description: This fish dish gets its zing from a tangy honey mustard spread and our very own Sweet & Spicy Pecans
recipe_overview: Serves: 2 - 4 Prep Time: 25 Minutes Cooking Time: 35 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1/2 cup (1 stick) TJ’s Unsalted Butter, melted', '3 Tablespoons TJ’s Aioli Garlic Mustard Sauce', "1 1/2 Tablespoons your favorite TJ's Honey", '1 bag (28 oz) TJ’s Potato Medley', '2 Tablespoons coarsely chopped fresh TJ’s Rosemary', 'TJ’s Canola Oil Spray', '1/4 cup TJ’s Japanese Style Panko Breadcrumbs', '1/4 cup finely chopped TJ’s Sweet and Spicy Pecans', '4 teaspoons chopped TJ’s Parsley, plus more for garnish', '1/8 teaspoons TJ’s Salt', '1/8 teaspoons TJ’s Pepper', 'TJ’s Fresh Salmon Boneless Skinless Fillets (2 large fillets)', '1 TJ’s Lemon, sliced into wedges (garnish)']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', '1. Preheat oven to 425 degrees F.', '2. In a small bowl, stir together melted butter, mustard, and honey.', '3. Cut potatoes into eighths and coat with ½ cup of the honey mustard mixture, set the rest of the mixture aside. Sprinkle rosemary over potatoes.', '4. Grease a baking sheet with canola oil spray then spread coated potatoes in an even layer, leaving room to add the salmon filets later. Begin baking potatoes for 20 minutes.', '5. Meanwhile, in another small bowl, mix together panko crumbs, pecans, and parsley, then set aside.', '6. Place salmon filets skin-side down on a plate. Season with salt and pepper then brush generously with reserved honey mustard mixture. Sprinkle the tops of the fillets with the panko crumb mixture.', '7. After 20 minutes, remove tray of potatoes from oven then add salmon filets, skin side down on the tray next to the potatoes. Bake salmon and potatoes for an additional 10 to 15 minutes, or until salmon flakes easily with a fork. Serve with a wedge of lemon and garnish with extra parsley.', 'Tags: Seafood, Spicy, Sweet']

recipe_description: The formula for Trader Joe’s Organic Sriracha & Roasted Garlic BBQ Sauce is simple: sriracha + BBQ Sauce… but, the genius is in the details. We combine spicy Sriracha (our very recipe of chili peppers, garlic, sugar, and vinegar), and combine it with what some might call “Memphis-style” BBQ Sauce—referring to its tomato-base, thick texture, reddish-brown color, and the taste of sweet molasses.
recipe_overview: Serves: 4
recipe_ingredients: ["1 package TJ's Boneless Chicken Breasts, cut into 2” cubes", '1/2 cup TJ’s Organic Sriracha & Roasted Garlic BBQ Sauce', "2 tablespoons chopped TJ's Fresh Cilantro (optional garnish)", 'You will also need Bamboo Skewers, soaked in water for at least 20 minutes']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Heat grill to medium-high. Thread 4 or 5 chicken pieces onto each skewer.', 'Grill chicken until it begins to brown, flipping often, about 5-7 minutes. During the final stages of cooking, continually baste chicken with Sriracha BBQ sauce, about 3-5 minutes. Remove from grill when internal temperature of chicken reaches 165°F. Garnish with cilantro and serve.', 'Tags: BBQ, Chicken, Grilling, Protein, Spicy, Summer']

recipe_overview: Serves: 6 Prep Time: 20 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 pound TJ’s Organic Ground Beef or Grass Fed Angus Ground Beef', '2 teaspoon TJ’s 21 Seasoning Salute', "1/3 cup finely shredded TJ's Cheddar with Caramelized Onions", '4 slices TJ’s Fully Cooked Uncured Bacon, chopped', '1 Tablespoon TJ’s Sriracha & Roasted Garlic BBQ Sauce', '1/2 cup TJ’s Real Mayonnaise', '1 cube Dorot Garlic Cubes', '1 teaspoon TJ’s Dijon Mustard with White Wine']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'In a bowl, with attitude, combine ground beef with 21 Seasoning Salute.', 'Separate beef into 8 portions, like you mean business, then form each into a patty.', 'With enthusiasm, mix cheddar, bacon and sriracha BBQ sauce together in a separate bowl to form the stuffing.', 'Spoon the stuffing evenly in the center of 4 of the patties. Top each patty with another patty and press down on the edges with your fingertips.', 'Grill burgers over medium-high heat, flipping once until desired doneness is reached, approximately 4 minutes each side for medium. Or in a medium skillet over medium-high heat, sear burgers 4 minutes on each side.', 'To make the sauce, combine mayo, garlic and mustard. Serve burgers with "sauce." ENJOY! You Sassy Thing, YOU!', "Recipe Credit: Trader Joe's 2015 Crew Member Strut Your Stuffed Recipe Contest 2nd Runner-Up - Donalee Quinn - Boise, ID (Store #360)", 'Tags: Beef, Burgers, Cheesy, Grilling, Protein']

recipe_name: Teriyaki Chicken Fried Rice Stuffed Pineapple
recipe_description: “I’m stuffed!” It’s the universal exclamation of fullness, content, and satisfaction after a great meal—it’s also how you’ll feel after enjoying this Trader Joe’s Crew Member-created recipe for Teriyaki Chicken Fried Rice Stuffed Pineapple. Starchy brown rice and pineapple pieces are stir-fried with our ever-popular Soyaki Sauce to create a tantalizingly tangy base for savory Trader Joe's BBQ Chicken Teriyaki.
recipe_overview: Serves: 4
recipe_ingredients: ['1 TJ’s Pineapple', '2 bags TJ’s Frozen Jasmine Rice, heated', '1 bag TJ’s Frozen BBQ Chicken Teriyaki', '2 Tablespoons TJ’s Coconut Oil', '1/2 cup TJ’s Soyaki']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Slice whole pineapple lengthwise into 2 halves.', 'With a sharp knife, carefully score the insides of both halves like a checker board. With a large spoon, scoop out the inside which will produce bite-sized pineapple pieces. Set pineapple pieces along with their juice aside in a separate bowl.', 'Add 2 tablespoons of coconut oil to a non-stick skillet over medium heat. Add the chicken and cook for 5 minutes until heated through. Add cooked rice, soyaki and reserved pineapple pieces and juices to the pan and continue to stir to heat through until the rice becomes a little sticky, about 2 minutes. Add sauce packets that come with the BBQ Chicken Teriyaki. Continue to sauté until heated through.', 'Add fried rice to the pineapple halves and serve.', "Recipe Credit: Trader Joe's 2015 Crew Member Strut Your Stuffed Recipe Contest Winner - Michael Ryan - Cerritos, CA (Store #104)", 'Tags: Chicken, Colorful, Side, Stuffed, Tropical']

recipe_description: With all the rich, smoky flavors of spaghetti carbonara, and the gooey, cheesy goodness of home-baked lasagna, this recipe brings two giants of cozy, pasta-based comfort food together at last. Starting with the basic building blocks of a world-class lasagna (Ricotta, Shredded Mozzarella, and the phenomenally easy-to-use no-boil Trader Joe's Lasagna Noodles), we add Uncured Apple Smoked Bacon, peas, and plenty of garlic, carbonara-fying the dish into a marvelous pasta mash-up.
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 - 6 Prep Time: 20 Minutes Cooking Time: 1 Hour
recipe_ingredients: ['1 package Uncured Apple Smoked Bacon, cooked crispy, drained and chopped into small pieces', '2 cups TJ’s Shredded Mozzarella Cheese, divided', '1/2 can TJ’s Cannellini White Kidney Beans, rinsed, drained and pureed until smooth', '1/2 tub (1 cup) TJ’s Whole Milk Ricotta', '1 cup TJ’s Grated Parmesan, divided', '4 medium cloves TJ’s Premium Peeled Garlic, minced', '1/2 teaspoon dried TJ’s Basil', '1/4 teaspoon TJ’s Red Chili Pepper Flakes, or more to taste', 'TJ’s Sea Salt & Ground Black Pepper, to taste', '1 cup TJ’s Organic Frozen Peas, defrosted and drained', '3/4 cup TJ’s Organic Low Sodium Chicken Broth, divided', '1 box TJ’s No Boil Italian Lasagna Noodles', 'TJ’s Canola Oil Spray']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Heat the oven to 350°F and arrange a rack in the middle. Combine chopped bacon and 1 cup mozzarella cheese in a medium bowl, set aside.', 'In a large bowl, place the half can of pureed cannellini beans, 1 cup ricotta, 1/2 cup Parmesan cheese, 4 minced garlic cloves, 1/2 teaspoon basil and 1/4 teaspoon of chili flakes. Mix until combined, creating a cheese spread. Season with salt and pepper, to taste.', 'In a blender or food processor, combine 1 cup defrosted peas, 1/2 cup parmesan, and 1/2 cup broth. Blend until smooth. Season pea sauce with salt and pepper, to taste.', 'Spread 1/2 cup of pea sauce in an even layer over the bottom of an 8-by-8-inch baking dish. Place two sheets of lasagna over the top of the sauce in the middle of the dish. There will be room around the edges of the noodles. Add one third of the ricotta cheese spread over the noodles. Use the back of a spoon to spread the cheese to the edges of the noodles. Next, sprinkle one third of the bacon mixture on top. Add another layer of noodles and repeat process two more times. Cover the top layer of noodles with remaining pea sauce. Sprinkle 1 cup of mozzarella over the top. For extra moisture, add 1/4 cup broth around the edges of the noodle stack.', 'Coat 1 side of a large piece of aluminum foil with canola oil spray and cover the dish tightly with the foil, oil-side down. Bake until the sauce is starting to bubble around the edges, about 40 minutes. Remove the foil and continue baking until the top of the cheese begins to brown, about 20 minutes more. Remove the pan and let cool for at least 15 minutes before slicing.', '  Tags: Bacon, Cheesy, Italian, Pasta, Spring']

recipe_overview: Serves: 2 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 25 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["2 cups TJ's Gluten Free Organic Brown Rice & Quinoa Fusilli Pasta", "1 1/2 Tablespoons of TJ's Clarified Butter (Ghee), or more", "1 1/2 cups trimmed and cut TJ's Asparagus (sliced into thirds)", "1 1/2 cups TJ's Mini Pearl Grape Tomatoes", "1/2 cup fresh sliced TJ's Basil (sliced into thin strips)", "1/2 TJ's Lemon", "1/2 cup TJ's Dry Toasted Pignolias (Pine Nuts)", "2 Tablespoons TJ's Shaved Cheese Blend"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Bring a large pot of water to boil, adding salt, if desired. Add 2 cups of pasta and cook uncovered, stirring occasionally for about 7-10 minutes or until al dente. Do not overcook. Remove pasta and drain thoroughly. Set aside.', 'Heat a large pan over medium heat. Add 1 1/2 tablespoons of clarified butter and heat another minute or so until it starts to shimmer. Add 1 1/2 cups of sliced asparagus, stirring until all sides are coated with clarified butter. Let cook without stirring for 2-3 more minutes until asparagus edges begin to turn golden. Add 1 1/2 cups of grape tomatoes and continue stirring until tomatoes are heated through, about 2-3 minutes. Add as much cooked pasta as desired to the pan, then mix in 1/2 cup fresh sliced basil, the juice of 1/2 a lemon and 1/2 cup of pine nuts. Keep stirring until ingredients are well incorporated, about 1-2 minutes. At this point, add up to 1 tablespoon more clarified butter if desired. Stir. Divide the pasta among two plates and top with shaved cheese blend. Enjoy!', "Tags: Cheesy, Italian, Meatless, Pasta, Valentine's Day"]

recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Prep Time: 20 Minutes Cooking Time: 25 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["4 TJ's Portobello Mushrooms (2 packages), stemmed", "6 Tbsp TJ's 100% Kalamata Olive Oil, divided", "1/4 teaspoon TJ's Sea Salt, or to taste", "1/4 teaspoon TJ's Ground Black Pepper, or to taste", "1 package (about 15-20 spears) TJ's Asparagus, bottoms trimmed", "1 package TJ's Polenta, crumbled", '1/4 cup Water', "1/2 TJ's Red Onion, sliced thin", "1/2 cup TJ's Ricotta", "4 Tbsp TJ's Genova Pesto or TJ's Pesto Alla Genovese", "4 Tbsp TJ's Sun-dried Tomatoes"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', '1. Preheat oven to 425 degrees.', '2. Arrange mushrooms stem side down on a foil-lined baking sheet. Brush 1 tablespoon of olive oil all over each mushroom then season with salt and pepper.', '3. On a separate foil-lined baking sheet, arrange asparagus. Drizzle with 1 tablespoon of olive oil then season with salt and pepper. Toss veggies to coat evenly. Set aside.', '4. Place mushrooms on the center rack of the oven and roast for 25 minutes.', '5. After 15 minutes of roasting, flip the mushrooms. Place the tray of asparagus on the bottom rack and roast with the mushrooms for the last 10 minutes.', '6. Meanwhile, in a medium sauce pan over medium heat, add crumbled polenta and 1/4 cup of water. Break up polenta with a spoon and stir until the mixture is smooth. Heat until bubbly, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat and set aside.', '7. Heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil in medium pan on medium heat. Saute sliced red onions until caramelized, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat and set aside.', '8. Remove mushrooms and asparagus from oven, and slice asparagus spears into thirds.', '9. Assemble your stacks. In order, evenly divide the following ingredients among 4 small plates, a bed of polenta, ricotta, sliced asparagus, portobello mushroom, pesto, caramelized onions and top with sun-dried tomatoes.', '10. Serve immediately and enjoy!', 'Tags: Cheesy, Fancy, Italian, Meatless, Roasted, Savory']

recipe_overview: Serves: 6 - 8 Prep Time: 25 Minutes Cooking Time: 30 - 40 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 lb leftover cooked TJ's Turkey, diced", "1/2 cup TJ's Canned Corn", "1/2 cup TJ's Frozen Shelled Edamame", "1/2 package TJ's Mirepoix", "1 carton TJ's Condensed Cream of Portabella Mushroom Soup (seasonal)", "1 cup (or more) TJ's Organic Low Sodium Chicken Broth", "1 box TJ's Pie Crusts, both crusts defrosted", "1-2 Tbsp TJ's Olive Oil for sautéing"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place one pie crust in the bottom of a pie dish and par-bake until lightly golden, about 10-12 minutes. Set aside.', 'In a medium-sized bowl, mix condensed mushroom soup and 1 cup broth (adding up to ½ cup more broth as needed until desired thickness is reached). Set aside.', 'In a large pan over medium heat, add oil. When heated, add mirepoix, corn and edamame and sauté until fragrant and onions turn translucent, about 3 minutes. Add soup mixture and turkey to pan and cook, stirring often, until filling is heated through and begins to simmer. Remove from heat.', 'Pour filling into pre-baked bottom crust, then cover with remaining unbaked crust. Cut a slit or design in top crust to allow venting. Place pie in center rack of oven and bake at 350°F for 30-40 minutes until crust turns golden brown. Let cool slightly before serving.', 'Tags: Colorful, Leftovers, Pie, Savory, Thanksgiving, Turkey, Winter']

recipe_overview: Serves: 3 - 4 Cooking Time: 40 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['Pork Loin', "1/3 cup TJ's Organic Bread Crumbs", "1/3 cup TJ's Unbleached All Purpose Flour", "3 tsp TJ's Ground Black Pepper, or to taste", "3 tsp TJ's Sea Salt, or to taste", "1 tsp TJ's Smoked Paprika", "1 tsp TJ's Garlic Powder", "1 cup TJ's Milk", "2 TJ's Organic Brown Eggs", "1 TJ's All Natural Crate Free Pork Tenderloin", 'Honey Mustard Dipping Sauce', "1/2 cup TJ's Real Mayonnaise", "1 1/2 Tbsp TJ's Dijon Mustard with White Wine", "1 1/2 Tbsp your favorite TJ's Honey", "1/2 tsp TJ's Apple Cider Vinegar"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat the oven to 400°F. Grease a baking sheet with cooking spray or line with foil and set aside.', 'In a medium-sized bowl, add milk, eggs, 1 teaspoon salt, and 1 teaspoon black pepper. Whisk to combine; set aside. In a medium-sized baking dish, combine bread crumbs, flour, 2 teaspoons black pepper, 2 teaspoons salt, paprika, and garlic powder and mix with a fork until blended; set aside.', 'Dip pork loin in milk wash and roll to coat evenly on all sides. Dip pork loin in breading mixture and roll to coat on all sides. Place pork loin on baking sheet. Bake for about 30 minutes, or until it reaches an internal temperature of 145 degrees.', 'While pork loin cooks, assemble dipping sauce: in a medium sized bowl, combine mayonnaise, mustard, honey, vinegar and a pinch of salt. Cover and refrigerate until ready to serve.', 'Once pork reaches an internal temperature of 145 degrees, remove from oven and let cool 5 minutes. Slice and serve with dipping sauce.', 'Tags: Dip, Pork, Sauce']

recipe_overview: Serves: 5 Cooking Time: 30 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['Mexican Rice', '2 Tbsp Clarified Butter or Canola Oil', "1/2 medium TJ's Sweet Onion, diced", "2 cups TJ's Jasmine Rice", "1/2 tsp TJ's Cumin", "1 1/2 tsp TJ's Sea Salt", "4 cloves TJ's Garlic, minced", "2 1/2 cups TJ's Organic Low Sodium Chicken Broth (or Water)", "1 can (15 oz) TJ's Tomato Sauce", 'Fiesta Bowl', "TJ's Fully Cooked Carnitas, heated", "TJ's Frozen Roasted Corn, heated", "TJ's Organic Black Beans, heated", "TJ's Mexican Blend Cheese", "TJ's Avocado's Number Guacamole or TJ's Reduced Guilt Guacamole", "TJ's Salsa (optional)"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'To prepare Mexican Rice: In large heavy-bottomed pan or dutch oven, heat oil until it shimmers. Add onion and saute until softened, about 2 minutes. Add rice, coating all the grains with oil. Stir often, until rice begins to brown, about 3 minutes. Add cumin, salt and garlic and stir about 1 minute until fragrant. Stir in broth and tomato sauce and bring to a boil. Cover with a tight-fitting lid and simmer about 15 minutes or until all liquid absorbs.', 'Assemble bowls with rice, carnitas, corn and black beans. Garnish with cheese, guacamole and salsa.', 'Tags: Cheesy, Corn, Grains, Mexican']

recipe_name: Seared Spicy Peanut Ahi Tuna Tacos
recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Prep Time: 15 Minutes Cooking Time: 5 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 package TJ’s Frozen Ahi Tuna Steaks (about 1 pound)', '1 bottle TJ’s Spicy Peanut Vinaigrette', '1 package TJ’s Smallish Gems Sweet Lettuce (seasonal) OR TJ’s Romaine Hearts, leaves separated, rinsed, patted dry and chilled in the refrigerator', '1/2 cup sliced TJ’s Sugar Snap Peas', "1/2 cup diced TJ's Sliced Fresh Del Monte Gold Pineapple Spears", '1 TJ’s Valencia Orange, peeled and diced', '1 large TJ’s Avocado, diced', '1 Tbsp chopped TJ’s Chives', '1/4 cup TJ’s Old Fashioned Salted Blister Peanuts OR TJ’s Organic Roasted & Salted Valencia Peanuts', '1 can TJ’s Canola Oil Spray']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'To marinate fish, remove frozen Ahi from packaging and place into a medium baking dish. Pour half the bottle of Spicy Peanut Vinaigrette over steaks, cover dish with plastic wrap and leave in refrigerator 8 hours or overnight, flipping steaks half way through. Alternatively, defrosted steaks can marinate in vinaigrette for 1 hour in the refrigerator prior to preparation. To sear the Ahi, bring a medium frying pan up to medium high to high heat, and coat the bottom of the pan lightly with canola oil spray. Remove and discard excess marinade from fish. Sear the fish for 1-2 minutes on each side until desired doneness. Remove from pan onto a cutting board and slice against the grain into 1/2 inch-thick slices. Arrange tuna slices atop lettuce leaves, then sprinkle with snap peas, pineapple, oranges, avocado, chives and peanuts. Drizzle fresh dressing over each taco and enjoy!', 'Tags: Crunchy, Marinade, Seafood, Summer, Tacos, Tropical']

recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Prep Time: 15 Minutes Cooking Time: 30 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 lb. TJ's Beef Filet Mignon, cut into 1 inch cubes ", "1/2 lb. TJ's Beef Rib Eye Steak, cut into 1 inch cubes", "1 Tbsp TJ's Everyday Seasoning", "1/4 tsp TJ's Sea Salt", "1/2 tsp TJ's Ground Black Pepper", "2 Tbsp TJ's Unsalted Butter, melted", "4 TJ's Rolls, split", "TJ's Garlic Aioli, to taste", "TJ's Mayonnaise, to taste", "8 TJ's Pickle Slices", "1 1/2 cups TJ's Butter Lettuce, torn", "2 TJ's Heirloom Tomatoes, sliced thin"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', "Bring meat to room temperature. Place into meat grinder or food processor; grind. Add to large bowl and season with Everyday Seasoning, salt and pepper. Mix well and form into four patties. (If you'd like to skip this burger-making step, start with a package of TJ's Organic Ground Beef Patties instead.) Baste burgers with butter; place on grill or in a cast iron skillet and cook over medium flame. Turn frequently until medium or pale pink on the inside. About 6 minutes per side. Remove from grill, cover and rest for 5 minutes. Place each patty on a roll bottom and top with hot sweet mustard, mayo, pickle, butter lettuce, 2 slices tomato, and finally, roll top.", 'Tags: BBQ, Beef, Burgers, Fancy, Grilling, Steak']

recipe_overview: Serves: 3 - 4 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 30 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1/2 quart TJ’s Buttermilk', '2 Tbsp TJ’s Extra Virgin Olive Oil', '3 cloves of TJ’s Garlic, crushed', '1 tsp TJ’s Sea Salt', '1/2 tsp TJ’s Ground Black Pepper', 'Dash TJ’s Smoked Paprika', '3 TJ’s Shallots, sliced thinly', '1 package TJ’s All Natural Drumsticks']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Combine all ingredients in a resealable bag. Place in refrigerator to marinate for at least 4 hours (preferably overnight). Remove chicken and excess marinade and let drumsticks come to room temperature. Grill drumsticks on medium-high heat for about 30 minutes, flipping every 5 minutes until juices run clear or until internal temperature reaches 165. Let rest 10 minutes before serving. Enjoy! Serving suggestion: Serve with TJ’s Green Beans and Buttermilk Biscuits.', 'Tags: BBQ, Chicken, Marinade, Protein']

recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 10 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['1 package TJ’s Carne Asada Autentica', '1 package TJ’s Baby Romaine Lettuce', '1 cup TJ’s Mexican Blend Shredded Cheese, divided', '4 Tbsp TJ’s Cilantro Dressing, divided', '1 TJ’s Avocado, sliced', '4 Tbsp TJ’s Sour Cream, divided', '4 Tbsp TJ’s Salsa Autentica, divided', '2 Tbsp chopped TJ’s Cilantro (garnish)']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Grill Carne Asada Autentica on high heat, about 3 minutes each side. Remove from grill and allow to rest for about 5 minutes, then slice across the grain. On each plate, arrange lettuce, sprinkle 1/4 cup cheese, drizzle 1 tablespoon of Cilantro Dressing, place carne asada slices and top with avocado. Dollop 1 tablespoon of sour cream over the top and serve with a side of salsa. Garnish with cilantro and serve.', 'Tags: BBQ, Beef, Grilling, Mexican, Salad']

recipe_overview: Serves: 6 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 5 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["3/4 bag TJ's Shredded Cabbage", "1 container TJ's Fresh Mango & Pineapple Salsa or TJ's Pineapple Salsa", "1 tsp TJ's Cumin", "6 small TJ's Corn Tortillas", "12 oz piece TJ's Fully Cooked Pork Belly", "1/2 container TJ's Avocado’s Number Guacamole", "3 TJ's Limes, sliced", "1 package TJ's Fresh Cilantro, chopped"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Mix cabbage, salsa and cumin together, set aside. Wrap 6 tortillas in a paper towel and microwave for 1 minute. Remove from microwave and set aside to cool slightly. Add full piece of pork belly to sauté pan and brown on all sides until golden and warmed through. Remove from pan and slice into very thin slivers. Place a tortilla on a plate and spread with a layer of Avocado’s Number, top with cabbage mixture, pork, lots of lime and cilantro; fold over and eat right away.', 'Tags: Colorful, Pork, Tacos']

recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 25 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["2 cups TJ's Low Sodium Chicken Broth", "6 oz TJ's Fully Cooked Pork Belly, 3/4 inch dice", "1 10 oz. bag TJ's Kale", "3 cloves TJ's Garlic, sliced thin", "TJ's Red Pepper Flakes, to taste"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Place broth in a 4 quart stock pot over medium heat; add kale and boil until just wilted, 10 to 15 minutes or until desired tenderness. Stir until all greens are wet. Add pork belly to a large skillet over medium heat and brown on all sides until golden and crisp. Remove from pan to a paper towel. Pour off all but 2 tablespoons of fat. Lower heat; add garlic to skillet, and sauté until garlic begins to sizzle. Add a pinch of red pepper flakes and sauté until the garlic is tender and lightly golden, 1 to 2 minutes longer. Pour kale, broth and pork belly into skillet and deglaze pan while sautéing kale until heated through, about 3 to 4 minutes. Serve with a side of cornbread.', 'Tags: Pork, Winter']

recipe_overview: Serves: 5 - 6 Prep Time: 30 Minutes Cooking Time: 12 - 15 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['Chicken Skewers', "1 package TJ's Boneless Chicken Breasts, cut into 2” cubes", "1 bottle of TJ's Spicy Peanut Vinaigrette", "1 package TJ's Sliced Fresh Pineapple, cut into chunks", "2 TJ's Green Bell Peppers, cut into 1.5” pieces", "2 or 3 TJ's Oranges cut into approximately 6 slices (keep peel on)", "2 TJ's Red Onions, sliced into large chunks", 'Supplies', '10-12 wooden skewers']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat grill to 375°F. Put cut chicken pieces in a bowl and the cut veggies and fruit into another bowl. Fill each bowl with half the bottle of spicy peanut vinaigrette. Let marinate for at least 20 minutes, though preferably overnight. Soak skewers in water while ingredients are marinating.', 'When ready, assemble ingredients on skewer in the following order: green pepper, onion chunk, pineapple slice, chicken piece, orange slice (skew through the skin), pineapple slice, chicken piece. Repeat until skewer is filled (not too tightly).', 'To keep the skewers from sticking, spray the top of the grill with canola oil. Grill for 12-15 minutes (turning skewer at 6 min). Chicken is done once it reaches an internal temperature of 165°F.', "Recipe Credit: Trader Joe's Stick It! 2013 HiiP Recipe Contest Featuring Food On A Stick 1st Place Winner - Shari Walsh.", 'Tags: BBQ, Chicken, Grilling, Marinade, Tropical']

recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 20 - 25 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 package TJ's Taquitos (Beef or Chicken)", "1 jar TJ's Enchilada Sauce", "2 cups TJ's Shredded Mexican Cheese Blend, divided", "1/2 can TJ's Sliced Black Olives", "3 TJ's Green Onions, white and green parts, sliced", "1/2 can TJ's Fire Roasted Diced Green Chiles"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 425°F. Arrange taquitos in a single layer in a 7-inch by 10-inch baking dish and cover evenly with enchilada sauce. Top with 1 1/2 cups cheese, followed by olives and chiles.', 'Bake casserole on center rack of oven for 20 to 25 minutes, or until internal temperature reaches 165°F. Remove pan from oven and garnish with remaining cheese and green onions. Allow to cool slightly before serving.', 'Tags: Casserole, Mexican']

recipe_overview: Serves: 3 - 4 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 25 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ['Pasta', '1 package (17.6 oz.) Gnocchi, cooked and drained', "1 package TJ's Brussels Sprouts, microwaved and quartered", "1 Tbsp TJ's Extra Virgin California Olive Oil", "4 strips TJ's Peppered Uncured Turkey Bacon, diced", "1/2 cup TJ's Yellow Onion, diced", "2 medium cloves TJ's Garlic, minced", 'Sauce', "1 cup TJ's New Zealand Organic Cheddar, grated", "1/2 cup TJ's Milk", "1 Tbsp TJ's Unsalted Butter", "1 Tbsp TJ's Unbleached All-Purpose Flour", "1/4 tsp TJ's Ground Nutmeg (seasonally available)"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Heat olive oil in a large pan on medium heat, then sauté diced bacon, onions and Brussels Sprouts until onions turn translucent and Brussels Sprouts start to caramelize. Add garlic and stir occasionally for another two minutes. Meanwhile, add cheese, milk, butter, flour & nutmeg to the pot with the cooked gnocchi and heat on medium-low until the cheese melts. Then fold bacon-veggie sauté mixture into the pasta. Enjoy!', 'Tags: Bacon, Cheesy, Italian, Pasta, Pork']

recipe_overview: Serves: 2 - 3 Prep Time: 10 Minutes Cooking Time: 20 - 25 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1/2 package TJ's Steamed Lentils", "1 pouch TJ's Frozen Organic Brown Rice, heated", "2 large handfuls of TJ's Baby Spinach", "1 TJ's Red Bell Pepper, sliced", "1/2 Medium TJ's Red Onion, chopped", "2 tablespoon TJ's Sundried Tomatoes in Olive Oil", "2 medium TJ's Garlic Cloves, peeled and diced", "2 tablespoons TJ's Balsamic Glaze", "2 tablespoons TJ's Italian Parsley, chopped", "1 tablespoons TJ's Extra Virgin Olive Oil"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Add onions to a large skillet on medium heat then stir in olive oil and garlic. Add spinach and bell pepper and cook until spinach begins to wilt. Empty half the package of lentils into the mix and then add sundried tomatoes. Heat and stir another two minutes and then mix in the parsley and balsamic glaze. Divide brown rice onto individual plates and ladle sauté over each serving.', 'Tags: Grains, Meatless, One-Dish Meal, Protein']

recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Cooking Time: 35 - 40 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1 package TJ's Mashed Potatoes (frozen)", "1 tablespoon TJ's Extra Virgin Olive Oil", "1/4 cup TJ's Organic Sweet Onion, diced", "1 package TJ's Ground Turkey", "1/2 teaspoon TJ's Spices of the World, Garlic Powder", '1/4 teaspoon TJ’s Sea Salt', '1 can TJ’s Whole Kernel Corn']
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 400°F. Prepare mashed potatoes according to package instructions, set aside.', 'In a skillet, sauté onions and ground turkey seasoned with garlic powder and salt in olive oil until turkey begins to brown. Layer the bottom of an 8-inch square casserole dish with cooked turkey, set aside.', 'Add corn to a food processor and pulse until somewhat creamy, with some chunks of corn remaining. Place pureed corn over turkey. Top with mashed potatoes.', 'Bake on center rack of oven for approximately 25 minutes, or until the potatoes begin to brown around the edges. Remove from oven and let cool slightly before serving.', 'Tags: Casserole, Fall, Hearty, Pie, Turkey, Winter']

recipe_overview: Serves: 6 Prep Time: 15 Minutes Cooking Time: 1 - 2 Hours
recipe_ingredients: ["2 small TJ's Acorn Squash (seasonal), sliced lengthwise and cleaned of seeds and string", "TJ's Olive Oil Cooking Spray", "TJ's Sea Salt and TJ's Black Pepper, to taste", "1 cup TJ's Traditional Ricotta Cheese", "1 cup TJ's Frozen Kale, defrosted and squeezed of water", "1 clove TJ's Garlic, chopped fine", "1 jar TJ's Arrabiata Sauce", "2 packages TJ's Polenta, sliced into 24 1” rounds", "1 1/4 cups TJ's Shredded Mozzarella Cheese", "1/2 cup TJ's Grated Parmigiano Reggiano Cheese"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 375°F. Slice squash halves into 1/2" half-moon-shaped slices. Spray a large baking sheet with a light dusting of oil and sprinkle with a little sea salt and pepper. Place the slices on the sheet in a single layer. Lightly spray the tops and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Bake until the slices are tender, about 35 minutes. Remove from oven and set aside to cool; lower oven temperature to 350°F.', 'Place ricotta, kale, garlic and 1/4 teaspoon salt into a bowl and combine. Set aside.', 'Assemble the stacks: Coat the bottom of a 9" x 13" baking dish with a light layer of sauce. Lay 12 Polenta rounds side by side and season with a little salt and pepper; cover with sauce. Next, top each round with squash slices facing each other, trim to fit neatly. Top each set of squash with the ricotta-kale mixture and smooth out. Top with more sauce, followed by a layer of polenta and the last layer of squash. Pour over the remainder of sauce and top each stack with Mozzarella cheese, followed by Parmesan cheese.', 'Cover with foil and bake for about 40 minutes. Uncover for the last 10 minutes or until cheese is golden and bubbly. Remove from oven and rest 15 minutes before serving.', 'Tags: Casserole, Cheesy, Fall, Meatless']

recipe_overview: Serves: 4 Cooking Time: 30 Minutes
recipe_ingredients: ["1/2 large TJ's Spaghetti Squash (seasonally available)", "1/2 package TJ's Party Meatballs", "TJ's Extra Virgin Olive Oil", "1/2 jar TJ's Marinara Sauce", "TJ's Grated Parmesan Cheese, to taste", "TJ's Sea Salt & Ground Black Pepper, to taste"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Cook the squash: Use a sharp knife to cut squash in half lengthwise. Use a large table spoon to scrape out the seeds and string. Season with salt and pepper, place cut side up in a microwave safe dish and add about an inch of water to the bottom of the dish. Cover dish with cling wrap and microwave on high for 10-14 minutes. Allow to cool enough to handle before unwrapping. Use a table fork to scrape squash from top to bottom to separate flesh into strands of "spaghetti."', 'Prepare Meatball Marinara: Place meatballs in large skillet and cook according to package stove top directions. Once warmed through, add marinara sauce and cooked squash. Toss to cover and heat through; add Parmesan, salt and pepper, to taste. Serve right away.', 'Tags: Fall, Italian, Pasta, Squash']

recipe_overview: Serves: 6 - 8 Prep Time: 15 Minutes Cooking Time: 1 - 2 Hours
recipe_ingredients: ["1 large TJ's Butternut Squash (seasonally available), peeled, sliced lengthwise and cleaned of seeds and string", "TJ's Olive Oil Cooking Spray", "TJ's Sea Salt & Pepper", "2 jars TJ's Alfredo Sauce", "2 cups TJ's Chopped Frozen Spinach, defrosted and squeezed of some water", "15 ounces TJ's Traditional Ricotta Cheese", '1/4 teaspoon TJ’s Nutmeg (seasonally available)', "12 sheets TJ's No Boil Lasagna Noodles", "1 cup TJ's Shredded Mozzarella Cheese", "1/2 cup TJ's Grated Parmigiano Reggiano Cheese"]
recipe_directions: ['DIRECTIONS', 'Preheat oven to 375°F. Slice squash halves into 1/2" half-moon-shaped pieces. Spray a large baking sheet with a light dusting of oil and sprinkle with a little sea salt and pepper. Place the slices on the sheet in a single layer. Lightly spray the tops and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Bake until the slices are tender, about 35 minutes. Remove from oven and set aside to cool; lower oven temperature to 350°F.', 'Empty Alfredo sauce into a sauce pan; warm over very low heat, just enough to liquefy, and remove from heat. Place ricotta, spinach, nutmeg and a pinch of salt into a bowl and combine. Set aside.', 'Assemble lasagna: Coat the bottom of a 9" x 13" baking dish with a light layer of Alfredo sauce.
